Name: HECTOR
Overall Comment: Excelente como siempre , la atención servicio limpieza espacios comunes , la gastronomía !! Todo 10puntos
Reason for Brand Question Rating: No hay dudas que la calidad y servicio son lo más importante !
Translated Overall Comment: Excellent as always, the attention, service, cleaning, common areas, gastronomy!! Everything 10 points

Name: OTTMAR
Overall Comment: Sehr gut , super Empfang ! Gratis Bier und Snack , Ales sehr gut
Reason for Brand Question Rating:
Der zuvorkommende Mitarbeiter , besonders die Frühstücks Ceffin 
Frau Camila Ayelen Tores sowie Marcia Meza , und der Direktor Herr Norberto
Translated Overall Comment: Very good, great reception! Free beer and snack, ales very good

Name: ADRIAN
Overall Comment:
Visitamos   Buenos Aires de "escapada" con mi esposa por el fin de semana, además aproveché a correr la 1/2 Maratón.
En el hotel lo pasamos espectacular, súper cómodos, con todos los servicios y excelente atención. La ubicación inmejorable, volveremos sin lugar a dudas.
Translated Overall Comment: My wife and I visited Buenos Aires for a weekend getaway, and I also took advantage of the opportunity to run the 1/2 Marathon. We had a great time at the hotel, super comfortable, with all the services and excellent attention. The location is unbeatable, we will return without a doubt.

Name: EMERSON
Overall Comment: Ótima estada, hotel muito bem localizado e aconchegante.
Reason for Brand Question Rating: Tudo funcionou como planejado e acordado.
Translated Overall Comment: Great stay, very well located and cozy hotel.

Name: JORDANA
Overall Comment: Hotel muito bom e atendentes agradáveis.
Translated Overall Comment: Very good hotel and pleasant staff.

Name: ANTONIO
Overall Comment: Tuvimos la mala experiencia de tener que usar un ascensor de servicio y pasar a través de la cocina para acceder a nuestra habitación, además de quedarnos sin servicio de TV en la noche, mala experiencia
Translated Overall Comment: We had the bad experience of having to use a service elevator and go through the kitchen to access our room, as well as being left without TV service at night, bad experience

Name: EZEQUIEL
Overall Comment: Excelente la atención, las instalaciones. Nuestra 2da visita al hotel, seguramente habrá una 3ra
Translated Overall Comment: Excellent service and facilities. Our 2nd visit to the hotel, there will surely be a 3rd.

Name: JOSE
Overall Comment: hermoso lugar, excelente atencion de todos desde recepcion hasta los  mozos, los chicos de la pile,un paraiso.
Translated Overall Comment: Beautiful place, excellent service from everyone from reception to the waiters, the pool boys, a paradise.

Name: MIGUEL
Overall Comment: Atención excelente.
Translated Overall Comment: Excellent service.

Name: LEONARDO
Overall Comment: Estuvo todo muy lindo. Pero hay un problema con la leche en el desayuno.
Reason for Brand Question Rating: Existe un problema con la leche en el desayuno.
Translated Overall Comment: Everything was very nice. But there is a problem with the milk at breakfast.

Name: JIE
Overall Comment: The staff members were very friendly and provided us recommendations for local restaurants and other attractions. The location is in the city center close to most of the attractions. Nothing to complain about. Will definitely stay in this hotel again if we come back to Buenos Aires
Reason for Brand Question Rating: All the facilities are modernized to the higher level of safety and standards.
Translated Overall Comment: The staff members were very friendly and provided us recommendations for local restaurants and other attractions. The location is in the city center close to most of the attractions. Nothing to complain about. Will definitely stay in this hotel again if we come back to Buenos Aires

Name: CARLOS
Overall Comment: Cuartos muy viejos y elevadores de terror
Translated Overall Comment: Very old rooms and scary elevators

Name: MARCELO
Overall Comment: Todo fantastico. Excelente amabilidad en la atencion en todos lados. Limpieza absoluta. Excelente estadia
Translated Overall Comment: Everything was fantastic. Excellent kindness in the attention everywhere. Absolute cleanliness. Excellent stay.

Name: JAMES
Overall Comment: i was traveling with a group that booked the hotel. the room was well appointed but the bathroom needed updating. the shower was not the best. the included breakfast was not really up to what i had just experienced in brazil. needs a great deal of work. we are not argentines. we are world travelers and expect something better.
Translated Overall Comment: i was traveling with a group that booked the hotel. the room was well appointed but the bathroom needed updating. the shower was not the best. the included breakfast was not really up to what i had just experienced in brazil. needs a great deal of work. we are not argentines. we are world travelers and expect something better.

Name: JORGE
Overall Comment: Como siempre lo mas destacable es el personal, pero siendo honestos y como huésped frecuente, los servicios en general del hotel han desmejorado, desde los horarios de Room Service, el frigobar, ascensores que no funcionan y servicios en la pileta o el spa. Es notable la reducción de servicios
Reason for Brand Question Rating: Lo dicho anteriormente, esperaría siempre en un hotel de esta categoría que los servicios mejoren no que desmejoren
Translated Overall Comment: As always, the most notable thing is the staff, but being honest and as a frequent guest, the services in general of the hotel have deteriorated, from the Room Service hours, the minibar, elevators that do not work and services in the pool or spa. The reduction in services is noticeable.

Name: RAFAELCA
Overall Comment:
The bathroom from room 1110 is simply impossible to imagine that someone planned it.  Unfortunately, I encountered a significant issue with the shower area. The glass divider in the shower was immovable, which might have been fine if the showerhead wasn’t fixed to the ceiling in a spot that the glass divider didn’t cover. As a result, every time I took a shower, water would splash out and soak the entire bathroom floor.

I took a video to illustrate this issue more clearly. I believe this could be an easy fix that would greatly enhance the comfort and experience of your guests.
Reason for Brand Question Rating:

Name: RAMON

Name: NESTOR

Name: GABRIELA
Overall Comment: Nos gustó mucho este hotel, por su espacio. La atención del personal exquisita.

Overall Comment: Genial

Name: JOANNE
Overall Comment: the staff was wonderful and accommodating.  The property was beautiful and in a central location.  The executive lounge provided a comfortable island for breaks in the sea of activities that my vacation took me on.  Bravo to the Buenos Aires  !

Name: CRISTOBAL
Overall Comment:
Quiero agradecer a todo el equipo de buenos Aires sobre todo a Juan de recepción y Pilar. 

Cada vez que viajo Juan se preocupa de sobre manera en que mi estadía sea la mejor de todas. Pilar primera vez que la veo en recepción, realice check in y check out con ella, encantadora y súper profesional 

Por favor háganle saber mis felicitaciones

Un gran abrazo
Cristobal Nelson
Reason for Brand Question Rating: Simplemente por el gran equipo que tienen
Translated Overall Comment: I would like to thank the entire Buenos Aires team, especially Juan at reception and Pilar. Every time I travel, Juan is extremely concerned that my stay is the best of all. Pilar is the first time I see her at reception, I checked in and out with her, charming and super professional. Please let her know my congratulations. A big hug, Cristobal Nelson

Name: JEFFREY
Overall Comment: Exceptional service. Room was beautiful, and level 23 is always memorable.
Translated Overall Comment: Exceptional service. Room was beautiful, and level 23 is always memorable.

Name: YAMILA
Overall Comment: La habitación y sobre todo el baño es pequeño. Me tocó una habitación que se comunicaba con una contigua y se escuchaba absolutamente todo. No es seguro ni cómodo.
Translated Overall Comment: The room and especially the bathroom are small. I had a room that was connected to an adjoining one and I could hear absolutely everything. It is not safe or comfortable.

Name: ALNOOR
Overall Comment:
The hotel overall was not up to par for a  . The entrance and the dining area was very grand and welcoming .  The swimming pool area was very good.
The reception staff were very good and helpful. 

However , our room (728) was  below   standard. Very dated . Needs an update. Our bathroom tub had grout/ caulking coming out . Poor paint Job in the room. 
Also , there is a ( 1/4 to 1/2 inch )  gap on top of the room door . Being just outside the elevator , the gap let in a lot noise .

The room floors also looked like they needed a refresh. 

Definetly not a 4 star +  . 

Thanks

Name: GUSTAVO

Overall Comment: Lovely hotel and kind staff. My room TV didn’t work, and they provided me a very generous upgrade and were super helpful for my entire stay.

10 puntos!

Name: MARK
Overall Comment:
Hubo problema con la calefacción. 
El día que llegue no había batería en los controles, tocó llamar para que lo pongan 
Olía la habitación a picturs fresca y me hizo arder la garganta. Soy susceptible a los olores
Translated Overall Comment: There was a problem with the heating. The day I arrived there was no battery in the controls, I had to call to have it replaced. The room smelled of fresh paints and it made my throat burn. I am susceptible to smells.

Name: CARLOS
Overall Comment: Muy agradable, espectaculares las instalaciones, muy amable el personal, seguramente vamos a volver mientras tengan esas promociones tan buenas

Name: HECTOR
Overall Comment:
Excelente estancia.
Habitación confortable.
Nos dieron un upgrade.
Agradecidos por la cortesía de te y café. 
Desayuno normal para la categoría de hotel y en el piso 23 la mejor piscina y vistas de Buenos Aires.
Translated Overall Comment: Excellent stay. Comfortable room. We were given an upgrade. Thankful for the courtesy of tea and coffee. Breakfast was normal for the category of hotel and on the 23rd floor there was the best pool and views of Buenos Aires.

Name: CAROLINA
Overall Comment:
Toda la experiencia muy buena.
La atención en la recepcion muy cálida, la atencion y comida del desayuno muy buenas.

Name: MARCELO
Overall Comment: Awesome property as usual! Room was great. Even though I used some NUA's the front desk clerk did give me an additional upgrade which I trully appreciate. The Club delightful. Thanks Flor and Patricio for making our stay a bit more pleasant again. Hope to see you soon!
Reason for Brand Question Rating: Buenos Aires   always Delivers beyond my expectations.

Name: MARIA

Translated Overall Comment: Excellent

Overall Comment: I would recommend this hotel in Buenos Aires to all.  It’s located in a prime location and the staff is super friendly.

Name: CECILIA
Overall Comment: Todo estuvo excelente pero tengo un problema y es que no me esta apareciendo la estadia en mi aplicación BonVoy. Gracias
Translated Overall Comment: Everything was great but I have a problem and it is that the stay is not appearing in my BonVoy application. Thank you.

Name: FERNANDO
Overall Comment: I had a wonderful stay at   Buenos Aires. The hotel has an amazing location. I was upgraded to a suite thanks to my Titanium status and was welcomed with a bottle of chilled champagne and macarons. The staff made the difference. EVERYONE was super warm, friendly, professional and efficient, which is VERY hard to find these days. Special thanks to Camila, Eugenia y Vanesa who manage reservations. The rooftop pool is simply amazing and the views of the city are incredible. I definitely recommend this property, whether is for business or pleasure!
Translated Overall Comment: I had a wonderful stay at   Buenos Aires. The hotel has an amazing location. I was upgraded to a suite thanks to my Titanium status and was welcomed with a bottle of chilled champagne and macarons. The staff made the difference. EVERYONE was super warm, friendly, professional and efficient, which is VERY hard to find these days. Special thanks to Camila, Eugenia y Vanesa who manage reservations. The rooftop pool is simply amazing and the views of the city are incredible. I definitely recommend this property, whether is for business or pleasure!

Name: RICHARD
Overall Comment: The room is very small and no coffee maker. For the the price I paid, unexpected more. Very disappointed.
Translated Overall Comment: The room is very small and no coffee maker. For the the price I paid, unexpected more. Very disappointed.

Name: NORMA
Overall Comment: En la habitación de mayor precio todo el servicio en general fue bueno, pero la otra habitación, de menor precio, no estaba completamente en funcionamiento
Reason for Brand Question Rating: Sería mejor que, sin importar el precio pagado, se reciba la misma calidad en el servicio.
Translated Overall Comment: In the higher priced room the overall service was good, but the other, lower priced room was not fully operational.

Name: CLARISA
Overall Comment:
Instalaciones del hotel limpias y ordenadas. 
Habitación cómoda.
Personal muy amable, en especial Joel y Agustín de recepción.
Reason for Brand Question Rating: Por qué tienen un personal idóneo para eso y además tienen muy buenas instalaciones.
Translated Overall Comment: Clean and tidy hotel facilities. Comfortable room. Very friendly staff, especially Joel and Agustín at reception.

Name: LEONARDO
Overall Comment: Muy buena estadia, es la segunda vez que voy con mi señora, linda y grande habitación, cama espectacular, excelente el baño. No fuimos esta vez a la piscina pero el año pasado nos encanto. En cuanto a comida solo probamos el desayuno muy rico y variado. En cuanto a la atención del personal muy buena y servicia. La ubicación a pasitos de la Calle Corrientes para ir a ver espectaculos. Redondeando volvimos porque nos habia gustado mucho y lo haremos nuevamente.
Translated Overall Comment: Very good stay, it is the second time I have been there with my wife, nice and big room, spectacular bed, excellent bathroom. We did not go to the pool this time but we loved it last year. As for food, we only tried the breakfast, which was very rich and varied. As for the attention of the staff, it was very good and helpful. The location is just a few steps from Corrientes Street to go see shows. To sum up, we returned because we really liked it and we will do it again.

Name: CARLOS
Overall Comment: Debe mejorar la calidad del anana en el desayuno
Reason for Brand Question Rating: La infraestructura muy bien, pero el cafe en el desayuno estaba frio Y el club sandwich en la habitacion tambien frio

Overall Comment: Staff is amazing, much better than the facilities. The human component of the hotel is very important for me as my stays are long.

Name: ASLAM
Overall Comment:
I have been a long time member with various levels over the years. I have always been loyal to  . But in 2023 my travel dropped and I was reduced from Silver Elite to Member. 

I requested late departure—2 pm. They said best they can do is 1 pm. However, they gave my partner 4 pm. When I got back at 12:20 pm, I was locked out of my room. 

Very poor customer service. Only reason I am giving a score of 6 is because of my past experiences with  . No way to treat a customer who has been loyal to   for over 25 years.
Reason for Brand Question Rating: See my remarks onbthe first page

Me pasan un cupon de 1 millon de pesos, y luego a los minutos pago el total de la estadia, ahora VISA me congelo 1 millon por varios dias , una verguenza.

Overall Comment: Awful hotel - with zero regards towards people with disabilities. Staff was kind and helpful, great people who tried helping us all along. Can't say enough about the girl at the lounge, the young fellows who helped us with wheelchair rides to navigate the hotel's 100% lack of accessibility.
Reason for Brand Question Rating: the hotel only had one type of accessible room - there was no way to provide an upgraded room with an accessible toilet/shower/etc. This is saying to customers who have disabilities that they do not deserve to be treated as people with no disability. The pool was another example of this. No access to a bathroom, or changing facilities. The changing room was 19 steps away from the pool deck, the pool has no accessibility -only wall steps that would not allow a person who is disabled to enter or exit the pool. The lounge elevator was cancelled (apparently for years now). Accessing the lounge meant going through a long way and jumping over an extra step. And another step to reach a bathroom (that was not accessible of course). The ramp access to the building did not have an automatic opener or even someone watching over - there was someone around the entrance, never watching the ramp access or helping. I guess you get an idea by now and I have not even yet described the   Buenos Aires hotel's concept of "accessible bathroom"
Translated Overall Comment: Awful hotel - with zero regards towards people with disabilities. Staff was kind and helpful, great people who tried helping us all along. Can't say enough about the girl at the lounge, the young fellows who helped us with wheelchair rides to navigate the hotel's 100% lack of accessibility.

Name: RICARDO
Overall Comment: Excelente
Reason for Brand Question Rating: Por todas las atenciones recibidos. Desde el muchacho que me conseguía un taxi, pasando los los valet parkings y las chicas de recepción por su calidez y comprensión. Ahh y no quiero olvidarme de las chicas que me ayudaron con la Reserva (Eugenia)... Todos con mucha cordialidad y amabilidad. Me sentí con mi Sra muy comodo.
Translated Overall Comment: Excellent

Name: LEANDRO
Overall Comment: La habitación que me ofrecieron al principio era una más barata a la que yo había reservado. Como no tenían ninguna disponible conforme lo que yo había reservado me hicieron esperar 3hs hasta que liberaron una y me la ofrecieron.
Translated Overall Comment: The room they offered me at first was cheaper than the one I had booked. Since they didn't have any available that matched what I had booked, they made me wait 3 hours until they freed one up and offered it to me.

Name: DIANE
Overall Comment: Nice central location and the staff is wonderful.  Beds are very comfortable.  The decor and condition of the rooms need updating.
Reason for Brand Question Rating: The hotel is clean, with comfortable beds and wonderful staff.  It is in a great central location with many great amenities.  With that, the hotel is in need of a renovation and the breakfast buffett was sub-par.  The room service menu could be expanded and improved.
Translated Overall Comment: Nice central location and the staff is wonderful.  Beds are very comfortable.  The decor and condition of the rooms need updating.

Name: DIEGO
Overall Comment: Lindo Hotel. Amable su gente. el desayuno demasiado discreto. y tarifa un poco alta
Translated Overall Comment: Nice hotel. Friendly people. Breakfast too modest. Rates a bit high.

Name: STEPHENJ
Overall Comment: The room was clean, the staff was nice and they were all helpful. Two issues that i did have was the ATM machine in your lobby only let you withdraw 20,000 pesos at a time and there was only 500 pesos bills witch is 50 cents US. The second issue was you have a vending machine area which holds food beverages and incidental items such as razors, soap, etc. we were there for 3 nights and the machines did not work. my guess is because i had an international "US" credit card.
Reason for Brand Question Rating: Again the hotel was clean and the staff friendly need better attention to details for a 5 star hotel.
Translated Overall Comment: The room was clean, the staff was nice and they were all helpful. Two issues that i did have was the ATM machine in your lobby only let you withdraw 20,000 pesos at a time and there was only 500 pesos bills witch is 50 cents US. The second issue was you have a vending machine area which holds food beverages and incidental items such as razors, soap, etc. we were there for 3 nights and the machines did not work. my guess is because i had an international "US" credit card.

Name: URIEL
Overall Comment: It was great, room was extremely clean, bed was fantastic and comfy. Luciernaga's food was on point and service good and warm, although We were tended to by a trainee. I ate the salmon and my girlfriend the seafood pasta with a wonderful dv cattena Chardonnay Chardonnay. If I had to point something out, it would be the initial temperature of our wine, which was fine after letting it sit in ice for a while and the cleaning lady who came in a rather unfortunate time for us. Other than that, amazing.

My wife might be biten by bedbugs  on this room.  Second stay was upgraded to a king bedroom with city view and newly renovated.  We love it.

The location of this hotel is perfect, walking distance to anywhere .  The lounge was great and the breakfast was good.

I would highly recommend this place.

Overall Comment: Ecxelente

Name: FRANCO
Overall Comment: Muy buena atención y hermosas instalaciones. Lo único a criticar es que reservamos un paquete con algunas promos incluidas como tapeo con aperitivo y trago de bienvenida y cuando las pediamos nos hacian sentir incomodos diciendo que era algo chiquito y dandonos muchas vueltas para darnoslo, ya que no sabían de la promo (cuando nos la ofrecieron en el hotel directamente). Siento que es algo importante de mejorar, ya que si ofrecen algo, mínimamente deben conocer de que trata
Translated Overall Comment: Very good service and beautiful facilities. The only thing to criticize is that we booked a package with some promos included like tapas with an appetizer and a welcome drink and when we asked for them they made us feel uncomfortable saying that it was something small and giving us a lot of trouble to give it to us, since they didn't know about the promo (when they offered it to us directly at the hotel). I feel that it is something important to improve, since if they offer something, they should at least know what it is about.

Name: PABLO
Overall Comment: Excelente Hotel Precio-Calidad-Atencion. Muy Buen Desayuno.

Translated Overall Comment: Excellent Hotel Price-Quality-Attention. Very Good Breakfast.

Name: JAMES
Overall Comment: The staff uniformly was professional and friendly.
Reason for Brand Question Rating: I perceived of the staff as a TEAM, and that usually doesn’t happen accident. Kudos to your leadership.
Translated Overall Comment: The staff uniformly was professional and friendly.

Name: EDUARDO
Overall Comment:
My wife and I just stayed at the Buenos Aires   for six nights. During this week, we interacted with many of the Hotel's associates. 
From our check in, masterfully handled by Agustin at the front desk, to the greeting people at the lobby, at the pool, restaurant or housekeeping, every person we met that works at this exceptional hotel, was committed to us having an unforgettable time at this great city.
On top of that, its location, in between the Obelisco and Teatro Colon, close to great restaurants, with unique views of the city from its 23rd floor open terrace, makes you feel that you are right in the center of everything that is meaningful in this unique city.
Reason for Brand Question Rating: I explained this in my first comments. Our room, a mini suite, had all the space and ammenities that we needed, plus a fantastic bed, pillows, and linen, which made it feel super luxurious.
Translated Overall Comment:
My wife and I just stayed at the Buenos Aires   for six nights. During this week, we interacted with many of the Hotel's associates. 
From our check in, masterfully handled by Agustin at the front desk, to the greeting people at the lobby, at the pool, restaurant or housekeeping, every person we met that works at this exceptional hotel, was committed to us having an unforgettable time at this great city.
On top of that, its location, in between the Obelisco and Teatro Colon, close to great restaurants, with unique views of the city from its 23rd floor open terrace, makes you feel that you are right in the center of everything that is meaningful in this unique city.

Felicitaciones
Reason for Brand Question Rating: Por lo explicado anteriormente, me siento muy cómoda, y también ofrece servicios como de cualquier hotel extranjero
Translated Overall Comment: The hotel is very comfortable, warm, the decoration is very good, the gym and pool are comfortable, spacious with good air conditioning. For me everything is 5 stars. I love staying in the lobby, it is majestic!! Congratulations

Name: OMAR
Overall Comment: la verdad con mi pareja la pasamos de lo mejor. excelente atencion en el trato de todos sus empleados. amabilidad, cordialidad, respetuosos. La comida tanto en el desayuno como en el almuerzo y la cena una belleza. gracias muy agradecidos por como nos recibieron.
Reason for Brand Question Rating: porque vimos algo muy confiable y de mucha calidad en todos sus servicios. Comparado con otros   la verdad muy bueno todo

Name: GUSTAVO
Overall Comment: buena, solo que al contratar mi estadia , no decia que NO INCLUIA el DESAYUNO!!!!!!tan siquiera darme la opcion de elegir de si o no tomaba ese servicio, solo me entero al hacer el Chek in,Malisimo.
Translated Overall Comment: Good, but when I booked my stay, it didn't say that BREAKFAST WAS NOT INCLUDED!!! They didn't even give me the option to choose whether or not to take that service, I only found out about it when I checked in. Terrible.

Overall Comment: muy correcto todo, la atencion del personal 10 puntos

Name: VICENTE

A piscina deveria ficar aberta até mais tarde.
O  Café da manhã deveria iniciar às 06:00
O box para banho é extremamente pequeno
Translated Overall Comment: The hotel is very good

Name: LAURA
Overall Comment:
Se interrumpió la tensión eléctrica 5 veces por lo menos. El servicio de cable en la habitación por lo tanto se vio a afectado en el horario dónde deseaba ver el partido de boca durante todo el primer tiempo en la fecha del 19 de junio. 
Al utilizar la piscina ese mismo 19 de junio mi acompañante se corto el pie en la pileta con el filo del azulejo en la parte externa de la piscina.
En el desayunador durante el día 
20 de junio estuvo bastante tiempo la máquina de café fuera de servicio.
En cuanto a la facturación en el flyer de reserva indicaba un valor de 229.000 final pero al momento de facturar indicaron 230.627,94 a pesar de no contar con ningún cargo extra en la habitación.
Reason for Brand Question Rating: Aunque ya había visitado anteriormente el hotel en un día de spa y eso me hizo regresar, en esta segunda oportunidad la experiencia hospedandome no fue del todo satisfactoria, tal vez se viera principalmente afectada mi satisfacción  por los cortes de luz.
Translated Overall Comment: The power went out at least 5 times. The cable service in the room was therefore affected at the time I wanted to watch the Boca game during the entire first half on June 19. When using the pool on June 19, my companion cut his foot in the pool on the edge of the tile on the outside of the pool. In the breakfast room on June 20, the coffee machine was out of service for quite a while. Regarding the billing, the reservation flyer indicated a final value of 229,000 but at the time of billing they indicated 230,627.94 despite not having any extra charge in the room.

Name: MAURICIO
Overall Comment: Como siempre mi experiencia fue exelente. Muchas gracias por todo
Reason for Brand Question Rating: Mi habitación le hubiera venido bien una renovación. Más que nada de comodidades como ser enchufes accesibles en la cama

Name: MARIAFERNAND
Overall Comment:
Estimado Sr. Nathaniel,

Por medio del presente mensaje quiero agradecerle a Usted y a través suyo a todo el personal del hotel. Nuestra estancia en el   Buenos Aires fue inolvidable. Fueron 3 días muy felices. La atención recibida fue excepcional. Esperamos volver muy pronto.-

Saludos cordiales,

María Fernanda de la Iglesia
Reason for Brand Question Rating: Pienso que es el mejor hotel de Buenos Aires. Un oasis en mi bella ciudad. Su personal es de excelencia. Espero poder volver muy pronto y disfrutar del spa.-
Translated Overall Comment: Dear Mr. Nathaniel, I would like to thank you and, through you, the entire hotel staff. Our stay at the Buenos Aires was unforgettable. We spent 3 very happy days. The attention we received was exceptional. We hope to return very soon. Best regards, María Fernanda de la Iglesia

Name: JOSHUA
Overall Comment: Excellent helpful service at the front desk and throughout the hotel. There was unfortunately a fair amount of noise in my room from construction throughout my stay which I could done without. I would also suggest that the tiered amenities - instituted since my last stay - are a bit off-putting. At a 4 star hotel, some rooms having espresso machines and others boil pots just aren't appropriate differences, and shouldn't be tied to cost. Elsewise, it was very nice coming back.
Translated Overall Comment: Excellent helpful service at the front desk and throughout the hotel. There was unfortunately a fair amount of noise in my room from construction throughout my stay which I could done without. I would also suggest that the tiered amenities - instituted since my last stay - are a bit off-putting. At a 4 star hotel, some rooms having espresso machines and others boil pots just aren't appropriate differences, and shouldn't be tied to cost. Elsewise, it was very nice coming back.

Una lástima porque el bar tenía todas las comodidades necesarias
Translated Overall Comment: Everything was spectacular! I felt at home.

Overall Comment: Everyone on the staff was lovely, especially those at the front desk! They were very welcoming and had good recommendations!
Translated Overall Comment: Everyone on the staff was lovely, especially those at the front desk! They were very welcoming and had good recommendations!

Overall Comment: Estuvimos tres días espectaculares, la atención de personal es excelente, trato cordial y ameno; nos resolvieron todos los inconvenientes de la estadía, las habitaciones muy cómodas y limpias...
Reason for Brand Question Rating: La calidad de las empleados, instalaciones, servicios y ubicación del hotel, lo hacen inigualable.
Translated Overall Comment: We spent three spectacular days, the staff was excellent, friendly and pleasant; they resolved all the problems of our stay, the rooms were very comfortable and clean...

Overall Comment: Estuve con mi esposa y disfrutamos una estancia muy feliz.Destacamos la amabilidad del personal,la limpieza del lugar y servicio del spa; además de la sensación de seguridad.
Reason for Brand Question Rating: Hemos estado por segunda vez,y está última superó a la experiencia anterior .
Translated Overall Comment: I stayed with my wife and we had a very happy stay. We highlight the friendliness of the staff, the cleanliness of the place and the spa service; in addition to the feeling of security.

Name: KADY
Overall Comment: This is my third time staying at the Buenos Aires  . I love it because the service has always been on point and facilities are kept up-to-date with beautiful rooms. The rooftop roof, gym and spa is a must! I am looking forward to coming back.
Translated Overall Comment: This is my third time staying at the Buenos Aires  . I love it because the service has always been on point and facilities are kept up-to-date with beautiful rooms. The rooftop roof, gym and spa is a must! I am looking forward to coming back.

Name: LETICIA
Overall Comment:
Nos sentimos muy a gusto en las instalaciones compartidas. La limpieza del lugar, el orden y el personal, fueron excelentes. El desayuno muy rico y ordenado. 
La habitación espaciosa, la cama muy cómoda. 
La pileta un lugar realmente disfrutable 💞

El único inconveniente que tuvimos es que estábamos cerca de los ascensores, dónde las personas se ponían a hablar muy fuerte en horas de madrugada... 
Y la puerta de servicio (estaba al costado de nuestra puerta) un día quedó mal cerrada y golpeó durante largo rato el lunes a las 6am.
Fueron los dos momentos de descanso que sentimos no se respetaron.
Reason for Brand Question Rating:
La habitación tenía algunos defectos de desgastado, pisos, pintura de paredes, sonidos externos.
El resto fue muy acordé a lo que esperábamos.
Translated Overall Comment: We felt very comfortable in the shared facilities. The cleanliness of the place, the order and the staff were excellent. The breakfast was very rich and tidy. The room was spacious, the bed very comfortable. The pool was a really enjoyable place 💞 The only inconvenience we had was that we were close to the elevators, where people started talking very loudly in the early hours of the morning... And the service door (it was next to our door) was one day left badly closed and it banged for a long time on Monday at 6am. These were the two moments of rest that we felt were not respected.

Name: MIKE
Overall Comment: Bed in room wasn’t comfortable

Overall Comment: I have stayed here one time before (November 2023) and had no issues with the stay (in fact it was quite nice).  This time also wasn't that bad, but had issues with room service that really left a sour taste in my mouth.  Further, I also found out that my issue wasn't isolated to me as one of my coworkers who stayed at the hotel at the same time (based on my recommendation) also had the same issue.
Reason for Brand Question Rating: Overall I appreciate the consistency of the hotel, the brand, and what it represents.  I had an issue with the stay (room service) which is reflected in my response.

Name: HECTOR
Overall Comment: Primero: hice la reserva con 10 días de antelación, me dieron otro precio menor , de un 7 % menos ,el cual no se cumplió , segundo : en todo momento les indiqué que iban menores 7 / 10 años , por consiguiente reservé 2 habitaciones, les mandé un mail consultando que los menores podían ir a la cinta del Gyn , acompañados con un mayor y jamás obtuve respuesta
Translated Overall Comment: First: I made the reservation 10 days in advance, they gave me another lower price, 7% less, which was not met, second: at all times I indicated to them that minors 7/10 years old were going, therefore I reserved 2 rooms, I sent them an email asking if minors could go to the Gynecological belt, accompanied by an adult and I never got a response.

Name: ALEJANDRO
Overall Comment: EXCELENTE
Translated Overall Comment: EXCELLENT

Name: JESSICA
Overall Comment:
Lo que puedo resaltar es la amabilidad del personal de recepción, las veces que llame a recepción fueron tan gentiles en solucionar o dar respuestas a mis consultas. Lo del desayuno bufett no tanto nisiquiera saludan x ahi deberian reforzar.
La limpieza A1 los de limpieza a habitaciones reamables.
Reason for Brand Question Rating:
En general la comida pienso que le falto sazón, en el desayuno pusieron piña q estaba verde pr lo tanto nada jugosa, mas habia dulces y no proteina q se debe consumir en el desayuno.
Pienso q la limpieza a habitacion deberia ser todos los dias yo tuve q pedir q limpiaran pero lo hicieron inmediatamente y con mucha amabilidad
Translated Overall Comment: What I can highlight is the kindness of the reception staff, the times I called reception they were so kind in solving or answering my questions. The buffet breakfast not so much, they don't even say hello, they should reinforce that. The cleanliness A1, the room cleaners are very friendly.

Name: RENGASAMI
Overall Comment: Friendly and helpful staff . Well designed rooms . Buffet breakfast was good . Close to tourist attractions . Value fr money .
Translated Overall Comment: Friendly and helpful staff . Well designed rooms . Buffet breakfast was good . Close to tourist attractions . Value fr money .

Name: HORACIO
Overall Comment: Atención perfecta
Translated Overall Comment: Perfect attention

Name: DANIEL
Overall Comment: I would not recommend this hotel. There are several other high end hotels in the area at similar price points that are much nicer. The room was very warm, and the thermostats did not appear to control anything. The food was not good, and made me sick one night. The service was not good either. It was impossible to reach the hotel before coming to stay, we tried multiple times to call based on number listed on bonvoy and what is listed online, and could not reach anyone or find an email address. When we finally got a hold of someone 2 days before travel, I only requested help with possible flowers in the room or a bottle of champagne waiting in room to help celebrate our anniversary. The response was I needed to reach out weeks ahead of time to set that up. Which seems difficult when you’ve made it impossible to get ahold of anyone. There were other issues, but honestly I don’t think you need an exhaustive list to understand why it was not a good stay. We checked out early and went to the Hyatt, which was by far a superior experience, for the same nightly rate. I have been on the fence about leaving Bonvoy to commit to Hyatt, but this will probably be the event that makes that decision easier for us.
Reason for Brand Question Rating: As stated earlier this was a very poor experience. It was so bad we checked out early to go to the local Hyatt. The Hyatt was so superior I wish we’d stayed there the whole time.
Translated Overall Comment: I would not recommend this hotel. There are several other high end hotels in the area at similar price points that are much nicer. The room was very warm, and the thermostats did not appear to control anything. The food was not good, and made me sick one night. The service was not good either. It was impossible to reach the hotel before coming to stay, we tried multiple times to call based on number listed on bonvoy and what is listed online, and could not reach anyone or find an email address. When we finally got a hold of someone 2 days before travel, I only requested help with possible flowers in the room or a bottle of champagne waiting in room to help celebrate our anniversary. The response was I needed to reach out weeks ahead of time to set that up. Which seems difficult when you’ve made it impossible to get ahold of anyone. There were other issues, but honestly I don’t think you need an exhaustive list to understand why it was not a good stay. We checked out early and went to the Hyatt, which was by far a superior experience, for the same nightly rate. I have been on the fence about leaving Bonvoy to commit to Hyatt, but this will probably be the event that makes that decision easier for us.

Overall Comment: Excelente atencion y facilidades.

Name: JORGE
Overall Comment: Our stay was nice overall. I was just surprised that the bathrooms in both rooms (my parents and mine) had a few hooks for the towels; there was none! The same with the lightning in our rooms, one switch controlled every light in the room which was super uncomfortable. My parents’ room had two showers but one was not working and the door was not closing properly so water was always coming out :-) I think having access to the lounge was awesome, would have loved to have access for my parents as well. The one thing that was really annoying was that my parents were told we needed to switch their room for the last night because we added it at the end when trip plans changed. So they packed everything the night before and were ready to move to a new room when I went to the check in desk to find out more details about the new room when they told me they could stay in the same room. A call or message about that would have been helpful.

Overall Comment: En general muy buena estadía, positivo el upgrade de habitación por status BonVoy. En las oportunidades están: 1) Ducha de baño, ya que se sale el agua y lo reportamos pero no lo solventaron. 2) En el desayuno, nunca cambiaron de opciones, ejemplo en proteína, siempre es huevo revuelto (en casos líquido) y 3) Por último pero más importante, mencioné en varias oportunidades el tema de acreditación de mis puntos en   BonVoy 297437571 pero me llama la atención que por 11 noches de estadía, solo me acreditaran 131 puntos. Agradezco de antemano su atención. Saludos.
Reason for Brand Question Rating: En general muy buena estadía, positivo el upgrade de habitación por status BonVoy. The opportunities are: 1) Bathroom shower, since the water leaks and we reported it but they did not fix it. 2) At breakfast, they never changed the options, for example in protein, it is always scrambled egg (in some cases liquid) and 3) Last but most important, I mentioned on several occasions the issue of crediting my points in BonVoy 297437571 but it calls my attention that for 11 nights of stay, they only credited me 131 points. I appreciate your attention in advance. Greetings.

Name: OSCAR
Overall Comment: La estancia fue excepcional. La calidad y el detalle se perciben a cada metro del hotel. El personal muy atento y servicial. La habitacion comoda, amplia y muy limpia. El ambiente que se vive en el hotel es una experiencia en si misma, que nos motivan a volver a alojarnos!!.
Translated Overall Comment: The stay was exceptional. The quality and detail can be seen in every square meter of the hotel. The staff was very attentive and helpful. The room was comfortable, spacious and very clean. The atmosphere in the hotel is an experience in itself, which motivates us to stay again!!

Name: MARIA
Overall Comment: Foi surpreendente! O Hotel é lindo e bem localizado!  Um ótimo café da manhã!  Mas, o surpreendente fica por conta da vista! Nossa acomodação em frente ao Teatro Colon,  nos encantou! E o 23°andar? Maravilhoso!  Querem saber mais?  Recomendo o Hotel  !
Reason for Brand Question Rating: O hotel funciona perfeitamente,  com toda a disponibilidade e cortesia da equipe!  Tem uma ótima estrutura!  E mesmo sendo um hotel grande,  com muitas acomodações e hóspedes , a sensação é de estar em casa!
Translated Overall Comment: It was amazing! The hotel is beautiful and well located! A great breakfast! But the amazing thing is the view! Our accommodation in front of the Teatro Colon enchanted us! And the 23rd floor? Wonderful! Want to know more? I recommend the hotel!

Todo gracias a las Personas que allí trabajan y al entorno edilicio que es simplemente MARAVILLOSO.¨ Gracias   Hotel por habernos hecho sentir como Casa.

Name: PEDRO
Overall Comment: La estancia fue regular, no andaban ascensores, ni la calefaccion, no nos dieron el estacionamiento comprometido, ni las copas de vino, el sistema de reserva o alguna otra accion nos bloqueo la tarjeta Amex. Al Viernes 24/05 siguiente volvimos con deseos de no quedarnos con un sabor amargo,  la calida y eficaz recepcion de Agustin, que nos dio rapidas soluciones, disculpas y atenciones, junto con el hermoso recuerdo y enorme cariño que sentimos por el el hotel desde la epoca del Panamericano y Tomo I dejo las cosas como al principio (incluso como desde nuestra noche de bodas del casamiento civil) Lo decimos siempre que estamos en el exterior, es el mejor hotel de Buenos Aires.
Translated Overall Comment: The stay was average, the elevators did not work, nor the heating, they did not give us the promised parking, nor the glasses of wine, the reservation system or some other action blocked our Amex card. The following Friday 24/05 we returned with the desire not to be left with a bitter taste, the warm and efficient reception of Agustin, who gave us quick solutions, apologies and attentions, along with the beautiful memory and enormous affection that we feel for the hotel since the time of the Pan American and Volume I left things as they were at the beginning (even as since our wedding night of the civil wedding). We always say it when we are abroad, it is the best hotel in Buenos Aires.

Name: ALEXANDRE
Overall Comment: Sempre dei preferência para o   em minhas hospedagens em Buenos Aires, porém dessa vez a experiência foi muito ruim. No último dia da minha estadia, percebi que entraram em meu quarto sem minha permissão, mesmo com o aviso de "não perturbe" na porta. Cheguei ao hotel depois de um dia exaustivo de trabalho, entrei em meu quarto e percebi que os itens do frigobar haviam sido removidos. Questionei à recepção se alguém havia entrado e eles não sabiam, pediram tempo para revisar as câmeras (precisavam acesso que só seria concedido no dia seguinte) e enviaram alguém da equipe para fazer algumas perguntas. Me orientaram a ficar tranquilo e descansar, pois eles estariam vigiando meu quarto, mas obviamente fiquei preocupado com a possibilidade de que alguém estranho tivesse acesso e pudesse entrar de surpresa. Fiquei com medo e ansioso, não consegui dormir e não pude descansar antes de sair para pegar meu voo. Ao fazer o check-out, o responsável pela segurança veio conversar comigo e dizer que haviam identificado que realmente um funcionário do hotel entrou em meu quarto para remover as bebidas do frigobar, de maneira equivocada (deveria fazer isso na outra torre, não na em que eu estava). De qualquer maneira, achei péssima a experiência, pois me senti exposto e inseguro. Com certeza voltarei a Buenos Aires (trabalho com frequência na região) e gosto muito do  , mas vou ter que pensar bem na hora de decidir onde ficar em minhas próximas visitas, infelizmente.
Reason for Brand Question Rating: O motivo já foi descrito em minha resposta à primeira pergunta desse questionário. Quero acreditar que tenha sido um ponto muito fora da curva, e que não se repita, dada a sua gravidade para a confiança que o   quer transmitir aos seus hóspedes e membros.
Translated Overall Comment: I have always preferred to stay in Buenos Aires, but this time the experience was very bad. On the last day of my stay, I noticed someone had entered my room without my permission, even though there was a "do not disturb" sign on the door. I arrived at the hotel after an exhausting day of work, went into my room and noticed that the items in the minibar had been removed. I asked the front desk if anyone had entered and they didn't know. They asked for time to check the cameras (they needed access that would only be granted the next day) and sent someone from the staff to ask me a few questions. They told me to stay calm and rest, as they would be watching my room, but I was obviously worried about the possibility that someone strange had access and could enter by surprise. I was scared and anxious, I couldn't sleep and I couldn't rest before leaving to catch my flight. When I checked out, the security officer came to talk to me and said that they had discovered that a hotel employee had actually entered my room to remove drinks from the minibar, in the wrong way (he should have done this in the other tower, not the one I was in). In any case, I thought the experience was terrible, as I felt exposed and unsafe. I will definitely return to Buenos Aires (I work in the area frequently) and I really like it, but I will have to think carefully when deciding where to stay on my next visits, unfortunately.

During the checking, according to the agent that  check us in, Miss Celeste,  told us that we did not have access to the executive lounge. Then, I was assigned to the 9th floor, where due to renovations in the hotel,  I was changed to the 8th floor and unfortunately the noise from the renovations was something that could not be tolerated. So I check out a few hours after checking in and went to another hotel. I wasted my time and my money after a 10 hour trip.

Buenos dias somos habitues del hotel y siempre lo recomedabamos, 
 y no solo  fueron muchos familiares sino  amigos nuestros pero esta vez no la pasamos bien ni fue grata muestra estadía. Lo ms lindo del hotel que es el piso 23 y la piscina no pudimos disfrutarlo ya que el agua de la pileta estuvo los das dos fria pese a que hicimos el reclamo el primer dia sumado a que cuando llegamos a la habitacion  no funcionaba la cafetera y tuvimos que esperar que vinieran a traenos una. Por tales motivos solicitamos poder volver en otra oportunidad para disfrutar de una estadia agradable como soliamos tener, a lo cual el geremte que nos atendió nos dijo que no era posible, Espero tengan a considerar lo sucedido para poder revertir mi experiencia con el   y podeR seguir recomendandolo, Muchas gracias, Romina Telic
Translated Overall Comment: Good morning, we are regulars at the hotel and we always recommend it, and not only many family members came but also our friends, but this time we did not have a good time nor was our stay pleasant. The most beautiful thing about the hotel, which is the 23rd floor and the pool, we could not enjoy it because the water in the pool was cold both days despite the fact that we made the complaint on the first day, added to the fact that when we arrived at the room the coffee maker did not work and we had to wait for them to come and bring us one. For these reasons we requested to be able to return on another occasion to enjoy a pleasant stay as we used to have, to which the manager who attended us told us that it was not possible. I hope you will consider what happened in order to reverse my experience with it and be able to continue recommending it. Thank you very much, Romina Telic

Overall Comment:
My stay was incredbly disappotining and I will be posting a review stating as such. The rooms were not up to   standard. All of the furniture and fixtures were falling apart. When I asked to speak to the night manager he was rude and told me that I had purchased an economy ticket so I was not entitled to a first class seat.  I was not looking for a first class seat, I was looking for a clean room that was not falling apart and up to the standards I come to expect from a  .

I will say the bellman who helped me and showed me a few rooms, Andres, was wonderful.

Name: JUAN
Overall Comment: Mi estadía la primera noche orible, están haciendo una gran obra reforma en el piso 11 me dan la habitación 1025 no dormí esa noche y todo el día ya al día siguiente o sea la noche me cambiaron por suerte, pude descansar esa noche, algo que no entiendo es una empresa así como pueden vender las habitaciones haciendo tal obra y reclame por teléfono me decían que iban a ver no sabían los de recepción que están en obra, espero respeten y solucionen ese tema
Reason for Brand Question Rating: Un hotel de esta categoría solo por su nombre y como una gran empresa tendría que tener en cuenta que si estás haciendo una gran obra no podrás vender habitaciones como las de los piso 9 10 12 etc
Translated Overall Comment: My stay the first night was horrible, they are doing a big renovation on the 11th floor, they gave me room 1025, I didn't sleep that night and all day, the next day, that is, they changed my room, luckily, I was able to rest that night, something I don't understand is how can a company like that sell rooms doing such a work and I complained by phone, they told me they were going to see, the receptionists didn't know that they were doing work, I hope they respect and solve that issue

La habitación estaba muy bien, muy moderna respecto del resto de otras habitaciones que me han tocado.
Jesus el barman que atiende el Bar, habría que explicarle que no se debe poner en posición de dueño del hotel ni tampoco interrumpir cuando uno trata de hablar, a Jesus lo mandaría a clases de comportamiento, educación  y de respeto de a los pasajeros.
Reason for Brand Question Rating: como hotel trata de mantener los estándares internacionales, lamentablemente personan como Jesus del Bar son lo que ponen la nota baja.
Translated Overall Comment: The room was very nice, very modern compared to the other rooms I've had. Jesus, the bartender who runs the bar, should be told that he shouldn't put himself in the position of owner of the hotel or interrupt when someone tries to talk. I would send Jesus to classes on behavior, education and respect for passengers.

Name: SANTIAGO
Overall Comment: Ya he visitado   en dos ocasiones. En la primera fue perfecto todo, pero en la mas reciente, no me atendieron como estaba acostumbrado. Hicieron diferencia por mi dress code, no me explicaron nada acerca de la habitacion, desayuno, piscina (como si lo hicieron antes, por eso se reconocerlo ahora) y al final solo pague una noche, sin disfrutar del desayuno ni de la piscina, ni de ninguna comodidad, solo fui a dormir.
Translated Overall Comment: I have already visited twice. The first time everything was perfect, but the most recent time, I was not treated as I was used to. They made a difference because of my dress code, they did not explain anything to me about the room, breakfast, pool (as they did before, that's why I can recognize it now) and in the end I only paid for one night, without enjoying breakfast or the pool, or any of the amenities, I just went to sleep.

Name: WESLEY
Overall Comment:
During our stay at the Buenos Aires  , we were delighted to discover that our room had a stunning view of Avenida 9 de Julio. The ambiance was perfect, and we were enjoying our stay until a minor water leak occurred in our bathroom. Unfortunately, the hotel was fully booked that evening, and no vacant rooms were available for us to move to. 

However, the following morning, we were pleasantly surprised to receive an upgrade to a beautiful room on the 18th floor, which offered us breathtaking views of the heart of Buenos Aires. 
We were impressed with the level of attention and exceptional customer service provided by the hotel staff, including Celeste, Demian, Juan, and Noemi from the front desk/reception. All of them welcomed us warmly and made sure that we felt comfortable throughout our stay. Additionally, Luis in the breakfast room was always ready to serve us with a smile and went above and beyond to fulfill our requests. 

We would like to commend these individuals for their outstanding representation of the   family. We are confident that our friends and colleagues who plan to visit Buenos Aires will have an equally delightful experience at the Buenos Aires  , and we will certainly recommend it to them.

Overall Comment: I stay with   all over the world and this was my 4th stay in the past year.  While this hotel's location is excellent, the room's condition was probably the worst of all the stays.  Wish you would pay attention to maintaining the room as you do with the grand lobby.

Name: LESLIE
Overall Comment: I stayed here two different times as I was going back and forth to Brazil.  The first was a one night stay on March 26.  And a two night stay beginning March 31.  I was upgraded to an Executive Suite without any requesting in advance or asking at the front desk at check in.  It was automatically tagged to my reservation!!  I so much appreciate this.  Then I also received a welcome gift in addition to benefits already requested!  Thanks for recognizing my Titanium status.  Also I want to point out the great service of Augustin at the front desk.  I had requested to store luggage on March 25 before my stay on March 26.  He handled it so perfectly and I felt well taken care of.  He also took some laundry for me to do.  Both the laundry and my luggage were awaiting in my room when I arrived.  When I checked out I asked why the laundry wasn't on my bill.  It was comped!!  All those gestures mean a lot to me!  And Augustin, but all your front desk staff as well, was very kind and helpful.
Reason for Brand Question Rating: I think your service and room quality is superior to many   brands I have stayed at.  It is comparable to a luxury brand.  I was truly satisfied.
Translated Overall Comment: I stayed here two different times as I was going back and forth to Brazil.  The first was a one night stay on March 26.  And a two night stay beginning March 31.  I was upgraded to an Executive Suite without any requesting in advance or asking at the front desk at check in.  It was automatically tagged to my reservation!!  I so much appreciate this.  Then I also received a welcome gift in addition to benefits already requested!  Thanks for recognizing my Titanium status.  Also I want to point out the great service of Augustin at the front desk.  I had requested to store luggage on March 25 before my stay on March 26.  He handled it so perfectly and I felt well taken care of.  He also took some laundry for me to do.  Both the laundry and my luggage were awaiting in my room when I arrived.  When I checked out I asked why the laundry wasn't on my bill.  It was comped!!  All those gestures mean a lot to me!  And Augustin, but all your front desk staff as well, was very kind and helpful.

Name: LUCAS
Overall Comment:
Hola! Quiero aclarar que el hotel está bien, pero no ayuda a tener una buena experiencia. Si bien lo que no me gustó son detalles, creo que son demasiados para un hotel de esta categoría. En otro tipo de hotel ni lo hubiera considerado, pero en esta ocasión fui buscando una buena experiencia.
En primer lugar, al momento de querer usar el sauna tuve el problema de que no podía encontrar una ducha libre entre las entradas al sauna (es decir, las duchas frías para cortar el calor). Si bien el vestuario es grande, y tiene una capacidad de lockers de 20, sólo hay 2 duchas. En los días es que estuve hubo muy poca gente, y el sauna siempre estuvo vacío. Incluso en la pileta no había demasiada gente. Por eso era llamativo que, en el transcurso de una hora no hubiera una ducha disponible. Imagino que en días donde la asistencia sea mayor esto debe ser un problema. Y, hablando de una actividad que debería sea relajante, puede estropear toda la experiencia.
Otro punto que me llamó la atención fue la oferta de té. Tanto en room service como en el bar decía "Selección de tés". Sin embargo, la elección era de lo más normal. Creo que un hotel como este debería poder ofrecer, además de lo normal, algo superior (siempre pensando en mejorar la experiencia). Podría decir lo mismo del café, pero entiendo que para esto se necesitaría un barista y puede ser que no tengan esta demanda, pero el té es más simple.
Otro punto que quería traer era la falta de batas en la habitación y en la zona de la pileta. Si bien se resuelve pidiéndolas, creo que se podría agregar al servicio de la habitación (cuando pregunté me dijeron que siempre se piden).
Como dije antes, estas cosas son pequeñas, pero creo que detalles como estos hacen la diferencia entre un hotel y otro.
Ediliciamente el hotel está muy bien, y la atención personal es correcta. Pero en esta categoría son cosas esperables.
Quiero aclarar que esta crítica está hecha con la mejor voluntad. No hay en ella ningún ánimo de ofender a nadie.
Reason for Brand Question Rating: Todos los puntos están cubiertos en mi primer texto
Translated Overall Comment: Hello! I want to clarify that the hotel is fine, but it doesn't help to have a good experience. Although I didn't like the details, I think they are too many for a hotel of this category. In another type of hotel I wouldn't have even considered it, but on this occasion I was looking for a good experience. First of all, when I wanted to use the sauna I had the problem that I couldn't find a free shower between the entrances to the sauna (i.e. the cold showers to cut the heat). Although the locker room is large, and has a capacity of 20 lockers, there are only 2 showers. On the days I was there there were very few people, and the sauna was always empty. Even in the pool there weren't too many people. That's why it was striking that, for the course of an hour there was not a shower available. I imagine that on days where attendance is higher this must be a problem. And, speaking of an activity that should be relaxing, it can spoil the whole experience. Another point that caught my attention was the tea offer. Both in room service and in the bar it said "Selection of teas". However, the choice was the most normal. I think that a hotel like this should be able to offer, in addition to the normal, something superior (always thinking about improving the experience). I could say the same about the coffee, but I understand that for this a barista would be needed and they may not have this demand, but tea is simpler. Another point I wanted to bring up was the lack of bathrobes in the room and in the pool area. Although it is solved by asking for them, I think that it could be added to the room service (when I asked, they told me that they are always asked for). As I said before, these things are small, but I think that details like these make the difference between one hotel and another. Building-wise, the hotel is very good, and the personal attention is correct. But in this category, these are things to be expected. I want to clarify that this criticism is made with the best will. There is no intention in it to offend anyone.

Name: LEONARDO
Overall Comment:
Reseña del  :

Mi reciente estancia en el   fue una experiencia gratificante en muchos aspectos, principalmente gracias al excepcional servicio proporcionado por su personal. Desde el momento en que llegamos, nos recibieron con una cálida bienvenida y nos brindaron asistencia en todas nuestras necesidades.

El personal del   demostró un compromiso excepcional con la satisfacción del cliente. Siempre estaban dispuestos a resolver cualquier situación que surgiera durante nuestra estadía. Desde preguntas sobre las comodidades del hotel hasta solicitudes especiales, el equipo estuvo disponible y dispuesto a ayudar en todo momento.

Sin embargo, hubo algunas áreas en las que notamos algunas deficiencias. Por ejemplo, el jacuzzi en los baños no funcionaba durante nuestra estancia, lo cual fue decepcionante ya que esperábamos disfrutar de esa comodidad. Además, nos vimos obligados a cambiarnos de habitación debido a la insuficiente iluminación en el baño de nuestra habitación inicial. Aunque el personal manejó la situación de manera eficiente y nos ayudó a cambiar de habitación sin problemas, este inconveniente inicial fue un contratiempo.

Además, observamos un pequeño inconveniente en cuanto a la cantidad de toallas proporcionadas en las habitaciones. En una habitación para cuatro personas, notamos que si se dejaban solo dos toallas en el baño, automáticamente generaba una llamada a recepción. Aunque apreciamos la atención al detalle, esta política podría revisarse para brindar una experiencia aún más fluida para los huéspedes.

A pesar de estos contratiempos menores, el personal del   siempre respondió de manera profesional y eficiente a nuestras preocupaciones, lo que mitigó cualquier inconveniente que pudiera haber surgido. En general, mi experiencia en el   fue positiva, gracias en gran parte al excepcional servicio brindado por su dedicado personal.
Translated Overall Comment: Review: My recent stay at the was a rewarding experience in many ways, primarily thanks to the exceptional service provided by its staff. From the moment we arrived, we were greeted with a warm welcome and assisted with all of our needs. The staff at the demonstrated an exceptional commitment to customer satisfaction. They were always willing to resolve any situation that arose during our stay. From questions about hotel amenities to special requests, the team was available and willing to help at all times. However, there were a few areas where we noticed some shortcomings. For example, the jacuzzi in the bathrooms was not working during our stay, which was disappointing as we were hoping to enjoy that convenience. Additionally, we were forced to change rooms due to insufficient lighting in the bathroom of our initial room. Although the staff handled the situation efficiently and helped us change rooms without any issues, this initial inconvenience was a setback. Additionally, we noted a minor inconvenience regarding the number of towels provided in the rooms. In a room for four people, we noticed that if just two towels were left in the bathroom, it automatically triggered a call to the front desk. While we appreciate the attention to detail, this policy could be revised to provide an even smoother experience for guests. Despite these minor hiccups, the staff at the always responded professionally and efficiently to our concerns, which mitigated any inconveniences that may have arisen. Overall, my experience at the was a positive one, thanks in large part to the exceptional service provided by its dedicated staff.

Name: REGINA
Overall Comment:
La comida pésima.
Yo soy una mamá lactante, enfrié y congelé mi leche extraída en el minibar del cuarto, lo cual para mi sorpresa muy funcional. Tenía que hacer checkout, ya que mi vuelo salía unas horas después del mismo. Entregué mi leche congelada para que me la resguardaran en congelamiento, al volver por ella, la había descongelado. Si no pueden hacer algún servicio debería ser claros, yo hubiera buscado otra opción, en cambio me echaron a perder toda la leche de mi bebé y todo el esfuerzo de mis días en resguardarla. Terrible!
Translated Overall Comment: The food was terrible. I am a nursing mother, I chilled and froze my expressed milk in the minibar in the room, which was very useful to my surprise. I had to check out, since my flight was leaving a few hours after. I handed in my frozen milk so they could keep it in the freezer, but when I came back for it, it had already been defrosted. If they cannot provide any service, they should be clear. I would have looked for another option, but instead they ruined all my baby's milk and all the effort I had spent days trying to keep it. Terrible!

Name: SONJA
Overall Comment:
The service of the hotel was not appropriate given the 5-stars and the price one pays per night!
When we arrived with all of our luggage, three doormen were in the lobby watching us but did not offer help.
At breakfast half of the staff was working very hard while the other half was at their phones or slowly folding napkins during peak breakfast times which lead to all tables being occupied because they were not cleaned off after guests left, glasses missing for juices and all coffee machines being out of order for more than 10 minutes because they needed service. It never took me that long to have breakfast..
Worst, however, I had to ask for clean bed linen three times at the first day and they repeatedly got changed with another dirty linen (make-up stains, black grease, ...) and the next day after room service 
 I again had a dirty pillow case. This is not acceptable at a three star hotel and definetly not at a 5 star house. 
As a   Gold member and also Hyatt Discoverist I have seen several 4 and 5 star houses around the world and unfortunately, this was the worst   I have ever stayed at.
Reason for Brand Question Rating: Service staff in the lobby and housekeeping is definetly not up to   standards

Reason for Brand Question Rating: Muy buena atención y las comodidades que ofrecen

Name: DARIO
Overall Comment: Excelente servicio, instalaciones de primera linea y el staff por sobre todo
Reason for Brand Question Rating: Viajo mucho por trabajo y me quedo en hoteles en distintas ciudades y quede gratamente sorprendido por este hotel
Translated Overall Comment: Excellent service, top-of-the-line facilities and the staff above all

Name: BRUCE
Overall Comment: empleados agradables y servicios excelentes
Translated Overall Comment: Friendly staff and excellent services

Name: ALBERTO
Overall Comment: Excelente atención y lugar
Reason for Brand Question Rating: En general por su confort y atencion
Translated Overall Comment: Excellent service and place

Name: JOHN
Overall Comment: Our room was inadequate and poorly appointed.  Although of adequate size, there was next to no furniture - just a bed, a desk and a desk chair.  Otherwise open floor space.  No art.  The bathroom was terribly cramped, especially the tiny shower enclosure, and the sink was very small.  The window looked out on a huge blank wall.  Our towels were not replenished.  The only real attention paid to our room was an eagle eye on the minibar (we didn’t use anything in it).  The roof pool and bar were nice, and the hotel has a good location.  Otherwise mediocre.
Translated Overall Comment: Our room was inadequate and poorly appointed.  Although of adequate size, there was next to no furniture - just a bed, a desk and a desk chair.  Otherwise open floor space.  No art.  The bathroom was terribly cramped, especially the tiny shower enclosure, and the sink was very small.  The window looked out on a huge blank wall.  Our towels were not replenished.  The only real attention paid to our room was an eagle eye on the minibar (we didn’t use anything in it).  The roof pool and bar were nice, and the hotel has a good location.  Otherwise mediocre.

Name: JAMES
Overall Comment: While the staff was consistently excellent, the room conditions was awful. From toilet seat  looked damaged and very very old. I have pictures (worth a thousand words). Wallpaper coming off the wall, damaged shelves, unfinished wood floors, etc. Have remained a loyal   fan but now seriously reconsidering.
Translated Overall Comment: While the staff was consistently excellent, the room conditions was awful. From toilet seat  looked damaged and very very old. I have pictures (worth a thousand words). Wallpaper coming off the wall, damaged shelves, unfinished wood floors, etc. Have remained a loyal   fan but now seriously reconsidering.

Name: MARTIN
Overall Comment: I stayed here for a two-week business trip as it was the only available chain hotel for the team. The hotel itself has a nice lobby area, though the rooms are a little dated. While the staff were friendly and attentive, the bar was very understaffed. Drinks took forever to arrive and the barman was working both bar and dining area and would disappear for extended periods.  You're losing a lot of money with slow bar service. I also cannot recommend the location, although it's close to central BA, the traffic is loud and the area is plagued with homelessness and petty crime. Sorry, but there are nicer hotels in more tourist friendly areas.
Reason for Brand Question Rating: See initial review....this hotel does not provide the   experience I expect.
Translated Overall Comment: I stayed here for a two-week business trip as it was the only available chain hotel for the team. The hotel itself has a nice lobby area, though the rooms are a little dated. While the staff were friendly and attentive, the bar was very understaffed. Drinks took forever to arrive and the barman was working both bar and dining area and would disappear for extended periods.  You're losing a lot of money with slow bar service. I also cannot recommend the location, although it's close to central BA, the traffic is loud and the area is plagued with homelessness and petty crime. Sorry, but there are nicer hotels in more tourist friendly areas.

Name: MARTIN
Overall Comment: The hotel itself was enjoyable, and the pool and exercise room were fantastic.  I do have an issue with the food served - the breakfasts were fine for the most part, but never seemed the freshest.  I had to depart early and was provided a bagged breakfast - my apple was actually rotten and my sandwich had a large mold spot on the bread inside it.  Needless to say, I went hungry until I arrived at the airport.
Translated Overall Comment: The hotel itself was enjoyable, and the pool and exercise room were fantastic.  I do have an issue with the food served - the breakfasts were fine for the most part, but never seemed the freshest.  I had to depart early and was provided a bagged breakfast - my apple was actually rotten and my sandwich had a large mold spot on the bread inside it.  Needless to say, I went hungry until I arrived at the airport.

Name: PATRICK
Overall Comment:
The Staff was excellent, but the room was terrible.
The room was very dark, inadequate lighting on the desk and in the closets. Floor was beautiful, but there was no carpet at all on the floors. The bed and side table were positioned so I couldn't open closet doors. The view was of a building 20 feet away, so there was little ambient light from the windows. The window drapes were broken so they were extremely hard to close. The bathroom was all glass, unfrosted glass with no curtains or blinds, so any visitors or staff could see you in the shower if they came in your room. Shower pressure was very bad and the refrigerator was not cool at all. It actually made our wine and water WARMER than when we put it in there.
Reason for Brand Question Rating: The in-room experience was really a driving force for this rating.
Translated Overall Comment:
The Staff was excellent, but the room was terrible.
The room was very dark, inadequate lighting on the desk and in the closets. Floor was beautiful, but there was no carpet at all on the floors. The bed and side table were positioned so I couldn't open closet doors. The view was of a building 20 feet away, so there was little ambient light from the windows. The window drapes were broken so they were extremely hard to close. The bathroom was all glass, unfrosted glass with no curtains or blinds, so any visitors or staff could see you in the shower if they came in your room. Shower pressure was very bad and the refrigerator was not cool at all. It actually made our wine and water WARMER than when we put it in there.

Overall Comment: The staff and location of this hotel was excellent.
Reason for Brand Question Rating: The hotel delivered what they promised
Translated Overall Comment: The staff and location of this hotel was excellent.

Name: ALVIMAR
Overall Comment:
Even though I am a Platinum Elite member, and have reserved my room weeks before, the room I got was not at al at the level I always get in Buenos Aires  . I had to require more than once to be moved to a room where at least I would be able to have a worktable.
I think this type of coordination should be done early.

Overall Comment: We had a wonderful stay - the hotel was very accommodating of our changing travel plans and allowed us to check into our room early. Everything was clean and updated, and the pool offered amazing views of the city. We would definitely stay here again!
Translated Overall Comment: We had a wonderful stay - the hotel was very accommodating of our changing travel plans and allowed us to check into our room early. Everything was clean and updated, and the pool offered amazing views of the city. We would definitely stay here again!

Name: YASUHIRO
Overall Comment: チャットによるリクエストへの迅速な対応など、スタッフ教育などのソフト面がしっかりしていると感じた。
Reason for Brand Question Rating: このホテルの前に宿泊したブラジルのシェラトングランデリオの施設の劣悪さとスタッフの対応の悪さに辟易していた。しかし、Bonvoyのカスタマーサービスによる適切な対応により、ブエノスアイレスマリオットでは建物の古災害においてはほぼ満足できる滞在であった。
Translated Overall Comment: I felt that the soft aspects, such as staff training and prompt responses to requests via chat, were solid.

Name: BELLA
Overall Comment: I am a   Gold member, because my flight is delayed. I asked for late check out. The front desk they don’t offer for us. I am very upset & disappointed. I will never ever to stay in this hotel again.
Reason for Brand Question Rating: They don’t provide a clean room for us. The toilet has stains all around & the toilet shower tub is watering until I asked to clean again my room. We are feel very uncomfortable & unsatisfied.
Translated Overall Comment: I am a   Gold member, because my flight is delayed. I asked for late check out. The front desk they don’t offer for us. I am very upset & disappointed. I will never ever to stay in this hotel again.

It really is not behaving like a 5 star hotel but would be a very good 4 star hotel.

Melvin Davis
  Gold Member

Overall Comment: El hotel está bien ubicado y es comfortable. Los mesoneros en el desayuno poco amables. Había una falla en la luz del bañ (no se apagaba) y nunca la arreglaron.

Overall Comment: Location is excellent. Clean big hotel. The people at the door could be more polite and greet customers as they walk in the hotel.

Overall Comment: Loved everything about it.  The hotel is nice and well taken care of.  The gym is excellent for a hotel gym.  The staff and lounge are amazing. Overall Comment: Lovely hotel in great location for exploring the city. Staff was welcoming and helpful. Name: THOMAS
Overall Comment: We enjoyed our stay.  We had a wonderful check in experience with Luciana.  We enjoyed our upgraded room.  Thank you!  Augustin was wonderful as were the bellman on duty. The M Club frequently seemed understocked and undeserved.
Reason for Brand Question Rating: Please see earlier comments.  Restaurant service and food need substantial improvement.

Name: XIMENA
Overall Comment:
el hotel ya está un poco dated, las almohadas muy usadas, el colchón se sentía pandeado y la silla del escritorio muy incómoda (muy baja para el escritorio). 
Usualmente los desayunos de los hoteles   son muy buenos y como tenía poco tiempo en BsAs decidí quedarme ahí confiando en unas buenas facturas, no fueron nada buenas. Pedí una hamburguesa a room service y no me gustó, la carne muy pasada (la pedí al punto) lo cual afectó el sabor completamente.
No creo que vuelva a quedarme en este hotel.
Reason for Brand Question Rating: ya la dí al principio del review
Translated Overall Comment: The hotel is already a bit dated, the pillows were very worn, the mattress felt saggy and the desk chair was very uncomfortable (too low for the desk). Usually hotel breakfasts are very good and since I had little time in Buenos Aires I decided to stay there trusting in good bills, they were not good at all. I ordered a hamburger from room service and I did not like it, the meat was very overcooked (I asked for it medium rare) which affected the taste completely. I do not think I will stay at this hotel again.

Overall Comment:
