Name: GIOVANNI
Overall Comment: L’unica cosa positiva è stata la cordialità dello staff alla hall. Per il resto sono stato tre giorni con rumori fortissimi (trapano e martello come se fosse nella stanza accanto o al piano di sopra) che non hanno consentito a me ed a mia moglie di riposare dopo il giro turistico nel pomeriggio. Nessun provvedimento è stato preso dal management per risolvere la cosa (tipo cambiare di stanza) anche se è stato da me fatto presente al manager di turno (anche se io avevo chiesto di parlare con il direttore dell’albergo ma non mi é stato concesso). Inoltre qualità della colazione mediocre e ripetitiva
Translated Overall Comment: The only positive thing was the friendliness of the staff at the lobby. For the rest I stayed three days with very loud noises (drill and hammer as if it were in the next room or upstairs) that did not allow me and my wife to rest after the tourist tour in the afternoon. No action was taken by the management to resolve the matter (such as changing rooms) even though I reported it to the manager on duty (even though I had asked to speak to the hotel manager but it was not granted). Furthermore, the quality of the breakfast was mediocre and repetitive

Name: DENNIS
Overall Comment:
The location is marvelous, but it was not up to the standards that I am used to with  . First, I requested an early check in because I was coming off a cruise ship but it was not available which was very understandable. However, I arrived at the hotel at 9:45am and was told that I would receive a text whenever my room would be ready and never did. I returned to the hotel at 3:30pm without notification exhausted as we had walked around the area of the hotel and checked in. 
The room and view were lovely, however, there was no electrical converter in the room upon arrival and towels in the bathroom and pool area looked and felt very worn out. 
I guess that we expected the same level of accommodation as we had at the   Park Tower Hotel we stayed at prior to the cruise.

Name: TRACEY
Overall Comment: On the whole our stay was good. There seemed to be a lack of knowledge with regards to the coffee amenities in each room.
Reason for Brand Question Rating:
We felt communication was lacking in our requests being filled.  Our room had a kettle and instant coffee packs. This is absolutely fine but more should be available at the front desk. We had to ask repeatedly for more coffee each day and trying to convey we did not have a coffee machine therefore could not use pods became frustrating as we kept getting the wrong thing. A comment regarding the portion sizes. A normal club sandwich is 3 slices of bread with the fillings. The fact that 2 full sandwiches (6 slices of bread) and fries was the serving here is extremely wasteful as we can’t imagine many people would be able to consume that amount of food. We gave the extra sandwich to a homeless person with a child.  There were a lot of staff in the restaurant doing nothing but only one bartender in Ruby Bar who found it difficult to keep up with bar and table service.  Finally - we arrived at the hotel at 7:45am and realized this is well before check-in time and fully expected to wait. We were told our room would be queued for housekeeping. As a Gold Member I am shocked that we did not get our room until 3:45pm. I believe they were readying rooms for a group arrival but as GM of a hotel in Canada I feel that the individual guests have to be prioritized as well. 
Joel on the front desk was the standout team member for our stay. Kudos to him.
Translated Overall Comment: On the whole our stay was good. There seemed to be a lack of knowledge with regards to the coffee amenities in each room.

Name: BRADFORD
Overall Comment:
We visited at the end of Jan. 2024. The Buenos Aires   had friendly, helpful staff, a nice continental breakfast, a nice lounge for Bonvoy members, a spacious king room with a mini-fridge, great views from the rooftop, where the indoor-ish pool is located, and working air conditioning.  It  is very close to the subway, and the Obelisk monument. There are snack shops, shopping, and grocery stores within an easy walk. You can also walk to the oldest cafe (Tortoni 1858) in 20-30 minutes; order the hot chocolate and churros. 
Our remote control batteries were dead, but that was fixed quickly with a call to housekeeping. We only had 2 bath towels in our bathroom, so I would suggest an improvement would be to add a couple of hand towels.
Reason for Brand Question Rating: Rooms, bathrooms, lobby, restaurant, and lobby bathrooms were all clean and neat. Pretty flower arrangements. Helpful and friendly staff.
Translated Overall Comment:

Name: CATHERINE
Overall Comment: We were warmly greeted to the hotel by  Luciana at the Reception Center. We did have to wait until 3 PM to check into our room 530. We were delighted to be assigned an upgraded room in the North Tower and it exceeded our expectations. We ate dinner and Leandro was our server and took very good care of us. The Angus beef burgers were delicious. The next morning we ate breakfast in the same location and enjoyed the food and great service. We sat at the pool on Level 23 and loved being there. We ordered a Club Sandwich from the staff member on duty and it tasted great as well. We made a reservation for Tango Senor and Andreas at the hotel entrance helped us connect with our driver to transport us to Tango Senor. The next morning we checked out of the hotel to transfer to the Viking Jupiter in the port and again the hotel employees couldn’t have been more helpful and friendly.

Overall Comment: Rooms are dated, reception staffs are not friendly at all.
Reason for Brand Question Rating: It was four of us, including my wife, my 7-year-old daughter and my 13-year-old daughter (just turned 13 in November), and we only booked one room. We were staying at Hilton Buenos Aires for four nights before checking in at   Buenos Aires. Hilton gave us a double-bed room and didn't raise any concern on the limitation of occupants. Though I totally understand each brand and individual hotel may have different policies regarding numbers of occupants, I wasn't appreciated the way I was treated. I was asked to speak to a reservation manager over the phone, who told me in a very demanding tone and unfriendly way that I had to book another room.  I don't understand why the check-in desk couldn't explain this to me face to face. I felt a bit of discrimination and humiliated. Yes, part of the reason of booking one room was to save cost, and it was also because my wife wasn't comfortable to have the two girls stayed in a separate room by themselves. I requested two connecting rooms after I booked another room on the spot, but I was told there wasn't any connecting rooms available.  We were forced to stay in two separate rooms.
Translated Overall Comment: Rooms are dated, reception staffs are not friendly at all.

Name: TODD
Overall Comment:
I had great stay at the Buenos Aires  . Staff was friendly and helpful (particularly in the lounge).  Facilities were sufficient, and the location is extremely convenient for exploration of BA.  

That said, there are some things that could be improved upon. Specifically, I'd like to see a wider selection at breakfast.  It's pretty meager compared to similarly priced and branded  s across Asia / Oceania.  It was often hard to find a table at breakfast -- tables weren't bussed very quickly.  And the front doors of the hotel need some serious maintenance.

Many others have noted that the property is a little dated; while this is true, I didn't find that it impacted my stay in away. Housekeeping was great and everything in my room was top notch and in working order.
Reason for Brand Question Rating:
Others have complained about the age of the property;  I personally didn't find that to be a problem.

But there is a glaring weakness: some of the staff just aren't very friendly.  For example, the entrance doors are *very* sticky and hard to open.  Nobody opened the door, greeted me, or helped with luggage.  I usually travel with a digital piano and this would have been a real struggle just to get into the hotel.  Once inside, I noticed a group of bellboys / concierge staff just standing well back from the front doors talking amongst themselves.

And it wasn't just when I arrived. Every time I came and went from the hotel, they'd be standing around, apparently doing nothing. They never helped, or said hello, or anything - just indifferent stares.  Very weird and not welcoming.

I contrast this with  s across Asia where the bellboys and concierge staff greet you at the door, help you with luggage, just say hello and ask if there is anything you need.

At breakfast, there may (or may not) have been a to-order omlet or egg station. Nobody told me but I saw other patrons with omelets. Some mornings it was hard to find a table because tables hadn't been cleared in a timely manner.

If there was one thing that could be done to improve the hotel, it would simply be to increase the attentiveness of the staff.  It doesn't have to be anything major, they should just be looking for things to do, ask if people need assistance, etc.  And this should be applicable to guests who are non-native Spanish speakers, too.
Translated Overall Comment:
I had great stay at the Buenos Aires  . Staff was friendly and helpful (particularly in the lounge).  Facilities were sufficient, and the location is extremely convenient for exploration of BA.  

That said, there are some things that could be improved upon. Specifically, I'd like to see a wider selection at breakfast.  It's pretty meager compared to similarly priced and branded  s across Asia / Oceania.  It was often hard to find a table at breakfast -- tables weren't bussed very quickly.  And the front doors of the hotel need some serious maintenance.

Many others have noted that the property is a little dated; while this is true, I didn't find that it impacted my stay in away. Housekeeping was great and everything in my room was top notch and in working order.

First of all, the wooden floors are all scratched and dirty, the toilet seats, which are basic, are peeling, and the springs in the beds creak. Why go on? Bad price/quality ratio.

Translated Overall Comment: Good stay.

Name: RUI
Overall Comment:
Positive: Good location. The room was nice and the shower was specially good. The bed was at the excellent   level. The balcony was very nice too. Some staff were helpful and nice, specially in the pool and spa area.

Negative: Unprofessional conduct by a security guard at the hotel entrance. Unfriendly, looking in a discriminatory way at my partner and asking questions in an aggressive and inconvenient way.
The last day when we arrived at the room the door was left open, I guess it was the cleaning team that left it like that. Nothing was missing. The soundproofing of the room was bad. We could hear everything from other rooms and hallway.
Reason for Brand Question Rating: Unprofessional security person. The design in some areas could be updated.

Name: JAMES
Overall Comment: I liked everything about my stay at tge Buenos Aires  . All the staff members are friendly, attentive, and helpful. The guest rooms are very nice. The central location is great. The fitness centre has great equipment. The foods offered in the ground floor restaurant and M Lounge are excellent, as is the selection.

The central location is great. The fitness centre has great equipment. The foods offered in the ground floor restaurant and M Lounge are excellent, as is the selection.

Name: ANDRES
Overall Comment: Hotel bien localizado. Tengo   gold y no me hicieron un upgrade. Mi primer cuarto estaba mal diseñado pues en la regadera el vidrio cubría el lugar equivocado causando que todo se mojara era un cuarto muy pequeño y olía mal. Mi segundo cuarto fue mejor pero no fue un upgrade. El servicio fue agradable. He estado poco satisfecho con la política reciente de   que limitas los beneficios de los miembros Gold elite
Reason for Brand Question Rating: Antes   ofrecía mejor calidad y respetaba mas a sus miembros ahora parece que el objetivo es hacer más plata y dar menos beneficios a sus miembros
Translated Overall Comment: Hotel is well located. I have a gold and they didn't give me an upgrade. My first room was poorly designed because the shower had glass covering the wrong place causing everything to get wet. It was a very small room and it smelled bad. My second room was better but it wasn't an upgrade. The service was nice. I've been a little dissatisfied with the recent policy of limiting the benefits of Gold elite members.

Name: FABIA
Overall Comment: Habitación huele muy fuerte a moho y humedad. Tuve problemas con alergia. Opciones de desayuno en el lounge muy pobres. El precio de la tarifa cobrada no justifica eses servicios.
Translated Overall Comment: Room smells very strong of mold and humidity. I had problems with allergies. Breakfast options in the lounge are very poor. The price of the rate charged does not justify these services.

Would recommend this hotel to all.
Thanks so much

Beautiful and clean hotel, delicious breakfast, and wonderful front desk and bellman. Perfect location.

Overall Comment: Estuvo todo bien , lo único que en la noche el bar cierra muy temprano. Gracias

Name: JULIO
Overall Comment: estuve poco tiempo , habitación muy buena , comimos en el bar , sándwich de Jamón crudo en pan francés , con la feta de jamón , casi transparente , rúcula y Cherry , bien , algo para mejorar luego me retire a las 23:30 hs por razones personales , saludos
Translated Overall Comment: I was there for a short time, the room was very good, we ate at the bar, a raw ham sandwich on French bread, with a slice of ham, almost transparent, arugula and cherry, good, something to improve, then I left at 11:30 pm for personal reasons, greetings

Name: KENNETH
Overall Comment: appreciated the late checkout since we had an airplane flight late in the day, and the massage was outstanding
Translated Overall Comment: appreciated the late checkout since we had an airplane flight late in the day, and the massage was outstanding

Name: DAVID
Overall Comment: Muy placentera nuestra estadía, lo único que no me gusto fue que el día sábado había una convención, y cuando fuimos a almorzar al restaurante, no solo la carta era extremadamente escasa, sino que pedimos ensaladas, y nos las trajeron en bowl de plástico, como si las hubieran comprado en McDonald (LITERAL). entendemos que haya una convención, pero uno paga por un servicio 5 estrellas, y ese día no estaban a la altura.
Translated Overall Comment: We had a very pleasant stay. The only thing I didn't like was that there was a convention on Saturday, and when we went to have lunch at the restaurant, not only was the menu extremely limited, but we also asked for salads, and they brought them to us in plastic bowls, as if they had bought them at McDonald's (LITERALLY). We understand that there was a convention, but one pays for 5-star service, and that day they were not up to par.

Name: MICHELLE
Overall Comment:
Beautiful hotel in the heart of Buenos Aires... but my room wasn't cleaned as promised when I went out so I came back to a dirty room and grabbed my dirty towels to give to the maid down the hall ("oh sorry, we were told to clean another room") and came back to my key not working. Long story short, 3 trips back and forth to the front desk for new keys they finally sent maintenance who spent 45 minutes with a hallway of   employees and then said the battery was dead on my door and they would need to come back in an hour. I needed to shower, work and rest before my evening plans (tango lessons then tango dinner) so I asked them to change my room. While they worked on my door lock, there was 5   employees in my room and in the hall, I work in the legal field so I was unable to make the confidential phone calls needed for work in California. When I first asked for a manager at the beginning of this fiasco, I was told there wasn't one available and that there physically wasn't one at the hotel (?!?!).. only when my tour manager called and complained to them did they have a manager show up. He offered me lounge access for my trouble (I've now lost 3+ hours of work time).. I told him you can keep your lounge access, I need to work in the room. He apologized and admitted that "there were two managers behind this wall and the GM is upstairs and none of them like to deal with customers" so they did not respond when requested!!!!!

Are you kidding me? Another Gate One client Nishta was standing with me, glad I had a witness to this unbelievable statement by the Manager of Public Relations for   Buenos Aires hotel.

They finally give me a new room at my request, I move everything and spend the night in a sweat thinking I must be coming down with a fever. In the morning, I realize the AC doesn't work! I call the manager, who sends someone who confirms yes, it's broken.

I pack up and move rooms again, to my third room in the  . Settle in, unpack, begin working and then attempt to flush the toilet, which doesn't flush. I called and they sent someone to fix it.

I am in shock about this hotel and what garbage it is, and for a manager to tell me that the other managers don't want to deal with me so I wasted 3 hours dealing with being locked out of my room without management assistance- unbelievable.

I should mention, each time I moved rooms I was downgraded- the OPPOSITE of what should have happened!!!
I went from a room with a small view of the street, to a view of ac units outside with the USB plugs not working, to a tiny room with an uglier view. I have told my local friends who were going to come stay at the hotel not to spend a penny to stay here.

Here are photos from the three rooms as they went downhill quickly.

first room, which I was locked out of it and they couldn't fit the lock within the 3 hours:
unnamed (2).jpg
2nd room with broken AC, third small room w a garbage view as well:
405485171_10168652320850161_8279356624287710214_n (1).jpg401344836_10168654452630161_736445211010261528_n.jpg

Please let me know what   will do to make this up to me, this is unacceptable. I have traveled with Gate 1 many times over the years and have never experienced anything like this. In fact, in the 49 yrs of my life, traveling the world, I've never had a hotel manager tell me their other managers refused to deal with me because they don't like dealing with customers.
I will be awaiting your timely response.
Thank you,
Michelle Gredinberg 408-438-1636

Name: MARCELO
Overall Comment: Excelente atención. Muy lindas las habitaciones. Excelente desayuno
Translated Overall Comment: Excellent service. Very nice rooms. Excellent breakfast.

Name: JENNIFER
Overall Comment:
The room wasn’t ready when we arrived, wasn’t ready at 3:00, the check time. I was repeatedly told the room was clean, but needed to be inspected. Delay after delay. 
I asked to speak to the Manager. No Manager was on duty. The  front desk person said the Manager would contact me later that day or tomorrow morning. I was never contacted by the Manager. 
Overall, disappointing service. 

The room was nice once I was able to access it.
Reason for Brand Question Rating: Service should have been better. My room should have been ready at 3:00, the stated check in time.
Translated Overall Comment:
The room wasn’t ready when we arrived, wasn’t ready at 3:00, the check time. I was repeatedly told the room was clean, but needed to be inspected. Delay after delay. 
I asked to speak to the Manager. No Manager was on duty. The  front desk person said the Manager would contact me later that day or tomorrow morning. I was never contacted by the Manager. 
Overall, disappointing service. 

The room was nice once I was able to access it.

Name: ELIS
Overall Comment: Personal bien capacitado, educado y rápido. Esta vez me quedé en una habitación maravillosa, todo funciona muy bien y súper limpia. Buenas toallas y sábanas. El restaurante con comida deliciosa y las instalaciones de la piscina y el gimnasio también son maravillosas.
Translated Overall Comment: Well trained, polite and prompt staff. This time I stayed in a wonderful room, everything works great and super clean. Good towels and sheets. The restaurant with delicious food and the pool and gym facilities are also wonderful.

Overall Comment: Todo excelente

Overall Comment: Realmente un lujo, haber estado en ese bello hotel!!
Reason for Brand Question Rating: Uno de los mejores hoteles del mundo
Translated Overall Comment: It was truly a luxury to have stayed in that beautiful hotel!!

Name: ADAM
Overall Comment: Didn’t have a room at noon (yes, I know 3pm is the norm) and had a 1pm tour so, checked bags with bellman and went on tour. Were told they’d do their best to upgrade us. When we returned at 7ish, we were given a basic room for our four nights. The room and hotel in general was in serious need of a renovation, but at least it was in a very central location.
Reason for Brand Question Rating: About what I expect from this brand. Some of the lower cost brands within bonvoy usually better maintained than this.
Translated Overall Comment: Didn’t have a room at noon (yes, I know 3pm is the norm) and had a 1pm tour so, checked bags with bellman and went on tour. Were told they’d do their best to upgrade us. When we returned at 7ish, we were given a basic room for our four nights. The room and hotel in general was in serious need of a renovation, but at least it was in a very central location.

Name: ANDREA
Overall Comment: Lo primero que desde que llegas te atienden bien son muy amables , lo segundo muy cómodo y excelente que tengan plancha y mesa de planchar que muy difícilmente se encuentra ,lo tercero que nos dejaron bañarnos con ropa en la piscina fue único ,ya que en muchos lugares prohíben nos hicieron sentir muy bien.
Reason for Brand Question Rating:
Me encanto la atención, sobre todo que nadie tenia cara larga y disfrutaban atender a las personas , las chicas de servicio super amables , los de la terraza sin duda impecable me sentí como en casa.
Algo que mejorar al menos en mi País nos choca mucho , en el momento del desayuno cada rato venían a levantar los cubiertos , entiendo que debe ser costumbre tener siempre limpio la mesa , pero hay veces quieres hacer pausado el desayuno ,ya venia te preguntaba retiro y no aun estoy desayunando ,siempre super educados pero quedaba levántate ya .
El resto impecable .
Translated Overall Comment: The first thing is that they serve you well from the moment you arrive, they are very kind, the second is that it is very comfortable and excellent that they have an iron and ironing board, which is very difficult to find, the third is that they let us swim in the pool with clothes on, which was unique, since in many places they prohibit it, they made us feel very good.

Name: HORACIO
Overall Comment: The staff was amazing.  Hotel is close to most of the main attractions of BA.
Translated Overall Comment: The staff was amazing.  Hotel is close to most of the main attractions of BA.

Overall Comment:
Todo perfecto en la habitación 1106.

Gracias
Raúl Escobar
Reason for Brand Question Rating:
Todo es confortable, Muy bien mantenido. sugiero poner una botella de agua en el deposito del inodoro para ahorrar agua. No está claro que va en cada recipiente para reciclado que se encuentra en la habitacion.
Muchas gracias
Translated Overall Comment: Everything was perfect in room 1106. I suggest you look at the bidet system. Thanks Raúl Escobar

Name: MIKE
Overall Comment: Superb staff. Very helpful .
Translated Overall Comment: Superb staff. Very helpful .

Name: NIRAJ
Overall Comment:
I have stayed in various  -branded hotels in all over the world. The BA   was one of the worst experiences I have now. Moreover, I had convinced my other 2 friends also to book the same the BA   and they too got the same worst experiances and now I am totally embarrassed and lost the credibility.
My room # was 830 and my 2 friends got 6th and 10th floors.
The front of the hotel looks so outdated, not cleaned, broken ceiling lights, and homeless nest.
The front desk staff was not interactive, appears he just wanted to finish his duty. I had to ask questions to find out about the facilities like, what are available, wifi detail, operation time, etc.
Room # 830 was one of the worst rooms I have stayed so far in hotels. The linens were cloudly white (not crisp), wood floor was dirty with gaps, wallpapers were ripped off, bathroom door was patched after flood, etc. (too much to points here).  I took a few pictures as well to share with Expedia and   CEO.
I was with my 3 family friends on a Patagonia trip for 2 weeks. The BA   had ruined my last day of stay in BA. Other less-known hotels were much better than the BA  . I would definitely going to ask   CEO for a full refund to me and my friends.

Name: FERNANDO
Overall Comment:
Muy buen hotel, con algunos inconvenientes: estando ubicado en el edificio anexo, para ir al spa del piso 23 es necesario bajar y pasar por delante del lobbie.  Hay demora en la atencion en el front desk.  No pasan a cambiar toallas, secar baño y ordenar cama antes de la cena.
El restaurante es interno y oscuro.
Reason for Brand Question Rating: En resumen es un excelente hotel, con buenas comodidades y atencion.
Translated Overall Comment: Very good hotel, with some drawbacks: being located in the annex building, to go to the spa on the 23rd floor you have to go downstairs and pass in front of the lobby. There is a delay in service at the front desk. They do not come to change towels, dry the bathroom and make the bed before dinner. The restaurant is indoors and dark.

Name: JOHN
Overall Comment: The doorman/concierge was welcoming and helpful but the initial desk clerk did not provide a warm greeting, but having traveled across Argentina it seems to be a national trait to be miserable.   However, he was efficient as were the ladies on the desk when we needed help.  The hotel itself was clean but showed severe signs of wear and tear (ripped sofas that no one had attempted to repair).   The bar offered Mojitos but couldn't serve them for the entire stay because no one could be bothered to step outside and buy some limes.  The restaurant staff were poorly trained and more interested in talking to eachother than serving their guests.  The sausages you serve at breakfast were indescribably awful so I assume were genuine Argentine versions since all Argentine food (unless it's barbecued meat) is that bad - either flavourless or disgusting, or both.  The room was OK but showed signs of wear and tear and hot water was only hot in the morning and evening and we had to ask for the aircon to be enabled.
Reason for Brand Question Rating: See previous input. You need to invest in a) staff training b) better management and c) fixing things like torn sofas - it was more trailer park than trusted hotel.
Translated Overall Comment: The doorman/concierge was welcoming and helpful but the initial desk clerk did not provide a warm greeting, but having traveled across Argentina it seems to be a national trait to be miserable.   However, he was efficient as were the ladies on the desk when we needed help.  The hotel itself was clean but showed severe signs of wear and tear (ripped sofas that no one had attempted to repair).   The bar offered Mojitos but couldn't serve them for the entire stay because no one could be bothered to step outside and buy some limes.  The restaurant staff were poorly trained and more interested in talking to eachother than serving their guests.  The sausages you serve at breakfast were indescribably awful so I assume were genuine Argentine versions since all Argentine food (unless it's barbecued meat) is that bad - either flavourless or disgusting, or both.  The room was OK but showed signs of wear and tear and hot water was only hot in the morning and evening and we had to ask for the aircon to be enabled.

Name: MOSHE
Overall Comment:
Sehr schöne Zimmer,
Tolle Restaurant
Freundlichen Rezeption.
Vielen Dank
Translated Overall Comment: Very nice rooms, great restaurant, friendly reception. Thank you

Name: WALTER
Overall Comment: Excelente. Nada a reclamar.
Reason for Brand Question Rating: Equipe simpática, quartos ótimos, limpeza impecável.
Translated Overall Comment: Excellent. Nothing to complain about.

Name: GONZALO
Overall Comment:
El servicio fue muy malo.
Tenía 2 noches y pretendían que una de las noches la pasara en una habitación y la otra noche en otra.
Les dije que de ninguna manera y la opción que me plantearon fue que esperara 25 minutos que limpiaban una habitación y ahí si no había necesidad de cambiarme. Nosotros llegamos a las 19:20 aproximadamente y tuvimos que esperar casi media hora para que nos den la habitación cuando el chek in arranca a las 15.
Adicionalmente nos pasó que a la 1 y media de la mañana luego de salir deun evento empresarial en el propio hotel mi esposa se fue a la habitación y no le abría la puerta la tarjeta. Fue a la recepción y le dijeron que no podían darle otra tarjeta porque no sabían quien era!!! Al estar en un evento el el propio hotel ni esposa no tenía el documento, lo había dejado en l habitación. Finalmente luego que quejarse una persona la acompañó a la habitación y el problema se solución.En resumen fue una muy mala experiencia, con algunas personas totalmente carente de sentido común.
Reason for Brand Question Rating:
Además de la mala atención y servicio detallada anteriormente, se suma que uno de los ducheros, el que tiene mampara de vidrio no se podía entrar.
Estaba rota y trancada la puerta de vidrio.
No se si estaba clausurado por gusto o estaba roto, pero en cualquiera de los dos casos me parece un desastre para una habitación de un  . No es lo que uno espera.
Translated Overall Comment: The service was very bad. I had 2 nights and they wanted me to spend one night in one room and the other night in another. I told them no way and the option they suggested to me was to wait 25 minutes while they cleaned one room and then there was no need to change. We arrived at approximately 7:20 p.m. and had to wait almost half an hour for them to give us the room when check-in starts at 3 p.m. Additionally, at 1:30 in the morning after leaving a business event at the hotel, my wife went to the room and the card would not open the door for her. She went to the reception and they told her that they could not give her another card because they did not know who she was!!! Since she was at an event at the hotel, neither did my wife have the document, she had left it in the room. Finally, after complaining, a person accompanied her to the room and the problem was solved. In short, it was a very bad experience, with some people totally lacking common sense.

Name: LOIDA
Overall Comment: Muy comodo, acojedor.. muy hermoso lugar
Translated Overall Comment: Very comfortable, cozy... very beautiful place

Name: ALLEN
Overall Comment:
I thought service was good but there were some instances which made me believe it was not to   standards. 

For example the shower stall did not have a lock on the door so you’d have to hold it closed to shower. Moreover there was a ton of water leaking. We phoned reception to have it fixed and instead they gave us more bath mats. That’s pretty low standards to me and exemplifies not caring to make our experience good.
Reason for Brand Question Rating: As I mentioned earlier when I told reception that our shower door was broken and leaking tons of water, the response they gave me was to use more towels. I have pictures of the broken shower stall and the leak. It wasn’t a small leak but huge puddles of water.
Translated Overall Comment:
I thought service was good but there were some instances which made me believe it was not to   standards. 

For example the shower stall did not have a lock on the door so you’d have to hold it closed to shower. Moreover there was a ton of water leaking. We phoned reception to have it fixed and instead they gave us more bath mats. That’s pretty low standards to me and exemplifies not caring to make our experience good.

Name: CARLOS
Overall Comment: Horrible estadia. La peor de las que he tenido en este hotel. Me asignaron una habitación con 2 camas siendo que pedi una con 1 cama. Apenas pude dormir porque se escuchaban los ronquidos del pasajero de la habitación de al lado. Me deja pensando si voy a reservar nuevamente con ustedes
Translated Overall Comment: Horrible stay. The worst I've ever had at this hotel. I was assigned a room with 2 beds when I asked for one with 1 bed. I could barely sleep because I could hear the snoring of the passenger in the room next door. It leaves me wondering if I'll book with you again.

Name: HARRIET
Overall Comment: Great location! Very large room. Front desk staff was very nice and helpful.
Reason for Brand Question Rating: The shower was small and it shot water out of the shower onto floor if you turned on water before getting into the shower.

Overall Comment: Excellent stay ! Greats staff. Great Property. The breakfast in the lounge was limited and lacking. Other than that no issues

Name: RAINER
Overall Comment: Not   standard , poor service
Translated Overall Comment: Not   standard , poor service

Name: RICARDO
Overall Comment: Todo muy deteriorado, viejo y fuera del standard  : alfombra, respaldar, colchon de la cama, bañera en las habitaciones. Las toallas no eran suficientes para la demanda, manchadas, viejas
Reason for Brand Question Rating: Todo el mobiliario de las habitaciones deteriorado y viejo
Translated Overall Comment: Everything was very deteriorated, old and out of standard: carpet, backrest, bed mattress, bathtub in the rooms. The towels were not enough for the demand, stained, old.

Name: YUJIN
Overall Comment: Staff was very helpful and friendly. They were very accommodating. Service was excellent.
Reason for Brand Question Rating: Staff were very attentive and helpful. Concierge Lounge had excellent food and beverage options.  The location was perfect for our sightseeing plans.

Overall Comment: Esta vez fue muy placentera, aunque me entregaron la habitación 1 hora después de lo previsto lo que se debería ver, aun la persona que me atendió fue muy amable
Reason for Brand Question Rating: Le pondré una mejor calificación cuando no tenga que esperar para recibir la habitación.pero desde ya el servicio es muy bueno
Translated Overall Comment: This time it was very pleasant, although they gave me the room 1 hour later than expected, the person who attended me was still very kind.

Name: GARY
Overall Comment: Another wonderful stay at this hotel.  Camila greeted us at the front desk with a warm smile and made us feel very welcomed.  The room was perfect and the Bonvoy club lounge excellent.  Thank you
Reason for Brand Question Rating: They recognized me as a Bonvoy Elite member and rewarded me with a beautiful upgraded room

Name: JUDD
Overall Comment: Outstanding staff
Reason for Brand Question Rating: Buenos Aires is a shining example of what the   brand should be
Translated Overall Comment: Outstanding staff

Name: JULIANA
Overall Comment: Todo excelente, sobre todo la atención del personal.
Translated Overall Comment: Everything was excellent, especially the attention of the staff.

Name: HALEY
Overall Comment: Everything was wonderful! They upgraded my room upon arrival. Cami at the front desk was absolutely amazing! I left her a sweatshirt from the Taylor Swift eras tour concert. I really hope she got it! We will be visiting very soon again. Thank you again for everything.
Reason for Brand Question Rating: I was traveling without my husband to Argentina, and unfortunately I do not speak Spanish. The concierge reached out to me within minutes of booking as well as the day before and the day of arrival. They made sure everything went perfectly. It was one of the safest, nicest cleanest hotels I’ve ever experienced.
Translated Overall Comment: Everything was wonderful! They upgraded my room upon arrival. Cami at the front desk was absolutely amazing! I left her a sweatshirt from the Taylor Swift eras tour concert. I really hope she got it! We will be visiting very soon again. Thank you again for everything.

Name: LISANDRO
Overall Comment: Me dieron una habitación interconectada y el huésped aledaño se conectó a un zoom, hablaba inglés fuerte. No puede dormir desde 05:30hs. No andaba el jacuzzi y el revestimiento del baño estaba bastante deteriorado. El personal de recepción cuando le comenté el incidente del sueño, le dijo "disculpas", nada más.
Reason for Brand Question Rating: El hotel y el mobiliario es muy antiguo para el nivel q supone. Y no les interesa dejar conforme al huésped.
Translated Overall Comment: I was given a connecting room and the guest next door was connected to a zoom, speaking loud English. I couldn't sleep since 05:30. The jacuzzi didn't work and the bathroom tiles were quite worn. When I told the reception staff about the sleeping incident, they just said "sorry".

Name: DIANA
Overall Comment: Muy Buen servicio !!!!
Translated Overall Comment: Very good service !!!!

Name: CHRISTINA
Overall Comment:
After my debacle in Tupungato, almost anything would have been better. That said I was so wonderfully surprised by the smiles, and the level of service from both the front desk and the concierge lounge. This was truly the level of service I’ve come to expect over the years. Florencia Sananes was the bright star of each morning, and the front desk guy (I wrote down the name, but now can’t find it - Sandy blondish hair, beard always has the computer on the far right if you are facing the team) was so helpful and unnecessarily apologetic when he couldn’t upgraded me on my first stay. All and all an amazing stay.

My one piece of constructive feedback… on the night of November 8th, my friends and I were waiting in the lobby for the van to take us to La Ventana for the tango show (magnificent recommendation by Florencia). The security team member patrolling the lobby saw me sitting on the desk (not the couch) on the left side as you enter the lobby area from the street… came up to me… pointed and waved his walkie talkie at me… as if to say… “get off”. He didn’t come up and nicely ask me to move… if he had I would have explained that soft couches hurt my back and I had just walked 10 miles that day… but the pointing really bothered me. Just a little coaching…. It’s better to walk up and provide an explanation then to point like that.

Regardless, I look forward to recommending the hotel in my blog and suggesting to everyone they should stay here. 

Thank you for a great visit!
Translated Overall Comment:
After my debacle in Tupungato, almost anything would have been better. That said I was so wonderfully surprised by the smiles, and the level of service from both the front desk and the concierge lounge. This was truly the level of service I’ve come to expect over the years. All and all an amazing stay.

He didn’t come up and nicely ask me to move… if he had I would have explained that soft couches hurt my back and I had just walked 10 miles that day… but the pointing really bothered me. Just a little coaching…. It’s better to walk up and provide an explanation then to point like that.

Regardless, I look forward to recommending the hotel in my blog and suggesting to everyone they should stay here. 

Thank you for a great visit!

Name: PAMELA
Overall Comment: Hola yo deserve 5 habitaciones para pasar una noche con mi familia y una de ellas se inundó el baño y se corto la luz cuando mi prima con su hijo de 4 años estaban bañándose. El nene quedó traumado con el susto que se llevó. Mi prima, su esposo y el nene fueron movidos a otra habitación de menos calidad q la q fue originalmente reservada. Esta experiencia arruinó nuestra estadía y nos dejó un sabor amargo. Yo no veía a mi familia hace 10 años y esta situación fue terrible especialmente en el   hotel q es un hotel donde nunca he tenido ningún problema.
Translated Overall Comment: Hello, I needed 5 rooms to spend a night with my family and one of them had a flooded bathroom and the power went out when my cousin and her 4 year old son were taking a bath. The child was traumatized by the fright he got. My cousin, her husband and the child were moved to another room of lower quality than the one originally reserved. This experience ruined our stay and left us with a bitter taste. I had not seen my family for 10 years and this situation was terrible especially in the hotel which is a hotel where I have never had any problems.

Name: LARRY
Overall Comment:
The staff was great and very knowledgeable of the area. We really appreciated having an upgraded room and using the Club Lounge. 
Thanks!
Reason for Brand Question Rating: The staff was very friendly and knowledgeable. The room was very clean and the bedding was very comfortable.
Translated Overall Comment:
The staff was great and very knowledgeable of the area. We really appreciated having an upgraded room and using the Club Lounge. 
Thanks!

La atención es excelente así como los cuartos y los alimentos

En la recepción botines y personal de check in son geniales

Overall Comment: Primera vez en el hotel, increíblemente lindo! 💛 excelente atención, ubicación y servicio de primera.

Name: ANGELA
Overall Comment: The best part of the hotel was its convenience to the downtown area, the mall and eating places. But the rooms were dated (we were in the wing that wasn't renovated) and the breakfast buffet was awful. I was part of a tour group and the location was picked in large part because it offered breakfast. We were all very disappointed.

But the rooms were dated (we were in the wing that wasn't renovated) and the breakfast buffet was awful. I was part of a tour group and the location was picked in large part because it offered breakfast. We were all very disappointed.

Name: LUIGI
Overall Comment:
Tuve una duda y una pregunta sobre la facturación , escribí en la oficina para que me aclararan....y no tuve respuesta.....muy poco professional de una marca como  .....Pague' con mi tarjeta  americana , yo soy Italiano, la factura del hotel...me aplicaron la taza del día... y no el dollar blue....Porque?
saludos
Luigi Lucatello
Reason for Brand Question Rating:
.a mi llegada 8 pm no estaba un maletero disponible....a mi pregunta en reception me dijeron: " esta' comiendo!'...como si fuera lo mas normal del mundo. Nadie se disculpo'......
.es un hotel vendido a turistas de autobuses americano...con todo lo que esto trae de problemáticas ( desayuno en la mañana...etc)
. el mantenimiento da' pena....hay que invertir dinero! Ver baño Hab 2318 la puerta comida para la humedad .....bajo del lavamano papel decorativo da' pena....
. hice un error muy estupido y reserve' directamente con ustedes....resultado: mala habitación y poco seguimiento....imaginese si pudiera escribir todo esto en Booking .com! Pero viniendo de la hotelería por 20 anos tengo siempre a favorecer los hoteleros...
Me gustaría recibir una respuesta sobre todo a la pregunta sobre el pago....en caso no me crean sobre la habitación tengo fotos que puedo enseñar sin problemas... Cordialmente Luigi Lucatelllo
Translated Overall Comment: I had a doubt and a question about billing, I wrote to the office for clarification... and I got no answer... very unprofessional from a brand like... I paid with my American card, I am Italian, the hotel bill... they applied the rate of the day... and not the dollar blue... Why? Regards Luigi Lucatello

Name: LUIS
Overall Comment: Muy buena la recepción, muy atento, todo bien, habitación, cena y desayuno. Gracias

Name: GERARDODIEGO
Overall Comment: Highly overpriced.
Translated Overall Comment: Highly overpriced.

Name: MIN
Overall Comment: My room had rain leaking in through the window due to extreme rain but my biggest problem was not that but the customer service team that I reached out to where I was told many times that they were looking into helping me changing my room and will call me back as soon as a room is ready. I waited from 6:30pm till around 10:30pm and called back multiple times to the front desk asking for the status but was kept on told that they would call me back but they never did as things might have been busy there and I was completely forgotten maybe? After coming back from a long day of work/meetings, I just wanted to take a shower and rest but at the most crucial resting hours I was not able to and was kept on given the “well call you back as soon as a room is ready” and having multiple other staffs checking out my room for leak and some would say the hotel is 100% full, which as bs, as there were rooms available and they didn’t need to get it ready as it’s not like people were checking out of their rooms at like 8-9pm at night or cleaning people getting rooms ready at that time. It was a very disappointing customer service experience overall. Will not stay there again. Def not a good experience for the   brand either.
Reason for Brand Question Rating: Hotel was really old and not well maintained, I had rain water leaking into my room and requested for help and was told they will change my room but didn’t change my room until 3-4hours later.

It was a very disappointing customer service experience overall. Will not stay there again. Def not a good experience for the   brand either.

Name: ALISON
Overall Comment: Room very disappointing
Reason for Brand Question Rating: The room was a letdown. Towels poor and thin, some frayed. Polystyrene cups instead of china cups. Not sustainable. Did not replenish comp water daily. View from room awful. Only one chair, we were a couple. Could not comfortably watch TV as it was on the wall at right angles to the bed. Expected better considering the room rate for when we stayed was in excess of USD480 per night. I would not like to think we had been disadvantaged because we redeemed points.
Translated Overall Comment: Room very disappointing

Name: BARBARA
Overall Comment: Good rooms, good restaurant, great staff.
Translated Overall Comment: Good rooms, good restaurant, great staff.

Name: DANIEL
Overall Comment: Had a great stay. Camila at reception was nice enough to find me a nice room with a view. The pool, gym and sauna on the top floor was a great place to hang out as usual.
Translated Overall Comment: Had a great stay. Camila at reception was nice enough to find me a nice room with a view. The pool, gym and sauna on the top floor was a great place to hang out as usual.

Name: DAWN
Overall Comment: It was fantastic! From being greeted so warmly and professionally when I finally arrived on my delayed flight at 5am, to being upgraded to a beautiful suite, to the awesome Conference facilities that my group used, to the excellent food & beverages, it was All definitely 5-star! Particularly the kind, friendly and professional staff! Thank You all :)
Reason for Brand Question Rating: Please see my first text response

From being greeted so warmly and professionally when I finally arrived on my delayed flight at 5am, to being upgraded to a beautiful suite, to the awesome Conference facilities that my group used, to the excellent food & beverages, it was All definitely 5-star! Particularly the kind, friendly and professional staff! Thank You all :)

Name: SILVIA
Overall Comment: No me pareció apropiada la habitación. 4 to piso del lado de los equipos de aire acondicionado. No pude dormir a la noche por el ruido que hacen . O se colocan en el último piso o se recubren de tal manera que amortizan los ruidos . Increíble que los tengan de esa manera instalados. El baño muy dejado colgué la toalla y se cayó el perchero.
Reason for Brand Question Rating: El lugar donde almorzamos en el entrepiso estaba frisado no podíamos comer, pedimos inútilmente que lo apaguen y no nos escucharon. Como dije la habitación muy ruidosa. El last check out no se cobra en otro   acá una hora se paga .
Translated Overall Comment: I didn't find the room to be appropriate. 4th floor, next to the air conditioning units. I couldn't sleep at night because of the noise they make. Either they are placed on the top floor or they are covered in such a way that they cushion the noise. It's incredible that they have them installed like that. The bathroom is very untidy. I hung my towel and the coat rack fell down.

Name: MARY
Overall Comment: Excellent hotel. Breakfast was fantastic
Translated Overall Comment: Excellent hotel. Breakfast was fantastic

Name: ALINE
Overall Comment:
Maravilhoso!
Atendimento muito bom!
Simpáticos.
Limpeza impecável.
Translated Overall Comment: Wonderful! Very good service! Friendly. Impeccable cleanliness.

Name: BRUNO
Overall Comment:
El sector de pileta y gimnasio simplemente maravilloso ! El desayuno súper completo y la atención del personal muy cálida y profesional. 
Como punto bajo, en lo personal valoro que el sector de desayuno y restaurant tenga entrada de luz natural, ventilación, o contacto con vegetacion, para evitar sensación de encierro. 
Asimismo el balance de la estadía muy positivo !
Reason for Brand Question Rating: Disfruto de la hotelería, los días posteriores me alojé en el palacio duhau, también soy habitué de palacio Alvear, y otros hoteles de categoría en distintos puntos del país y extranjero. Mi estadía en   fue corta pero muy agradable, la cocina del restó fue buena, los tragos igual, solo mejoraría los jugos del desayuno ya que no son exprimidos naturales, y el sector se siente un poco encerrado ya que no hay entrada de luz natural.
Translated Overall Comment: The pool and gym area was simply wonderful! The breakfast was super complete and the staff was very warm and professional. On the downside, I personally value the fact that the breakfast and restaurant area has natural light, ventilation, or contact with vegetation, to avoid the feeling of confinement. Also, the balance of the stay was very positive!

Name: DEANNA
Overall Comment: I enjoyed the location, design and friendly staff.  The roof top pool, sauna and locker area are large areas where one can relax.  The breakfast buffet has an excellent variety to meet the needs of most guests.  I only wish one could use a book about the hotel ad environs and not the QR CODE.
Reason for Brand Question Rating: The staff was most attentive and fast to respond with ones needs.  I was missing towels and a call solved the problem.  A call to the front desk for help with the TV set-up, air/heat unit settings and dripping shower head was quickly solved.
Translated Overall Comment: I enjoyed the location, design and friendly staff.  The roof top pool, sauna and locker area are large areas where one can relax.  The breakfast buffet has an excellent variety to meet the needs of most guests.  I only wish one could use a book about the hotel ad environs and not the QR CODE.

Name: BARBARA
Overall Comment:
The Buenos Aires   is a very lovely, elegant hotel.  It was like stepping back in time to a grandiose hotel with marble, beautiful staircases and crown molding.
The Employees were all very professional and accommodating.  They went out of their way to ensure our needs were met.  
The Restaurant was upscale and delicious.
Reason for Brand Question Rating: This   Hotel is living up to the   name in all aspects.
Translated Overall Comment:
The Buenos Aires   is a very lovely, elegant hotel.  It was like stepping back in time to a grandiose hotel with marble, beautiful staircases and crown molding.
The Employees were all very professional and accommodating.  They went out of their way to ensure our needs were met.  
The Restaurant was upscale and delicious.

Name: JOHANNA
Overall Comment:
Instalaciones impecables
Amabilidad del personal
Compramos el paquete relax
Translated Overall Comment: Impeccable facilities Friendly staff We bought the relaxation package

Name: CINTHIA
Overall Comment: Todo superó nuestras expectativas
Translated Overall Comment: Everything exceeded our expectations

Name: ANDRES
Overall Comment: La estancia estuvo bien, pero como cliente regular, he solicitado estar en la torre renovada y no fue posible, esto se solicitó desde que se hizo la reserva, por lo que no entiendo porque no se puede lograr tener una habitación en la torre solicitada.
Translated Overall Comment: The stay was fine, but as a regular customer, I requested to be in the renovated tower and it was not possible. This was requested from the time the reservation was made, so I do not understand why it is not possible to have a room in the requested tower.

Name: SUDHIR
Overall Comment:
Rooms were in deplorable state for a  . Not even sure how it qualifies as a   property.
Staff was great
Translated Overall Comment:
Rooms were in deplorable state for a  . Not even sure how it qualifies as a   property.
Staff was great

Name: STONEY
Overall Comment: Good location but the hotel’s room is lack of proper maintenance and the sound proofing of the room is poor as we can hear the guest in next room talking.
Reason for Brand Question Rating:
The hotel looks lacking of maintenance compared with other   hotels I have stayed before. The wooden floor and furniture look old and the rooms are not sound proofing in particular as we can hear other guests talking clearly in next rooms. We can also hear guests walking in the corridors from our room.
As a Gold Elite member, I also couldn’t get a room upgrade during my stay and late check out.
Overall, my stay in this hotel was below my expectations compared with other   hotels of the same category that I stayed before.
Translated Overall Comment: Good location but the hotel’s room is lack of proper maintenance and the sound proofing of the room is poor as we can hear the guest in next room talking.

Name: MARIANA
Overall Comment:
No nos gusto, ya habíamos ido en otra ocasión y había estado bien. Pero esta vez la pileta climatizada estaba fría, sacamos un pack aniversario. No nos dejaron bajar a desayunar por que era más acotado el desayuno que nos correspondía. Lo
Cuál me parece descortés, cuánto más podíamos comer ? La cena que está incluida en el pack, las opciones eran bastante rebuscadas y muy muy acotada también
Reason for Brand Question Rating: Lo mismo que dije en el comentario anterior
Translated Overall Comment: We didn't like it, we had already gone there on another occasion and it had been good. But this time the heated pool was cold, we took out an anniversary package. They didn't let us go down to breakfast because the breakfast that we were entitled to was more limited. Which seems rude to me, how much more could we eat? The dinner that is included in the package, the options were quite far-fetched and very very limited as well.

Name: GUSTAVO
Overall Comment:
La atención del personal muy amable y atento
La habitación muy confortable y muy bueno el desayuno
Reason for Brand Question Rating: La situación económica genera mucha incertidumbre
Translated Overall Comment: The staff was very friendly and attentive. The room was very comfortable and the breakfast was very good.

Name: EZEQUIEL
Overall Comment: Excelente instalaciones y atención. 100% recomendable. sin dudas volveré a ir
Translated Overall Comment: Excellent facilities and service. 100% recommended. I will definitely go back.

Name: YURY
Overall Comment:
Excelente lugar y gran servicio.
No dudare en reservar en este hotel en mi proximo viaje a Argentina
Translated Overall Comment: Excellent place and great service. I will not hesitate to book at this hotel on my next trip to Argentina.

Name: RODRIGO
Overall Comment:
Todo fue una grata experiencia, no puse un 10 porque es importante que mantengan el edificio que se pueda ir remodelando.
Saludos
Reason for Brand Question Rating:
porque fue una experiencia muy buena en general, solo algunos detalles de mantencion del piso y habitaciones .
Saludos
Translated Overall Comment: Everything was a pleasant experience, I did not give it a 10 because it is important that they maintain the building so that it can be remodeled. Greetings

Name: ANDREA
Overall Comment:
Good location, fantastic roof top swimming pool and city view. 
First time for me so that I rejected a hotel room. Got an outdated room, two small beds instead of a king, dark carpet, unappealing interior, with a window view against a wall and a pipe opening to my window. 
BUT : The personal was very flexible, understanding  and friendly. They showed me two other rooms I could chose from. I was happy!!! 
Breakfast was good as well and lobby had a lot of different seating . And again the location was top: close to main attraction and not too far from the airport ( 20 min). 
I would recommend and also be open to come back!
Reason for Brand Question Rating: Not too thrilled about rooms but amazing roof top swimming pool and nice public area like lobby
Translated Overall Comment:
Good location, fantastic roof top swimming pool and city view. 
First time for me so that I rejected a hotel room. Got an outdated room, two small beds instead of a king, dark carpet, unappealing interior, with a window view against a wall and a pipe opening to my window. 
BUT : The personal was very flexible, understanding  and friendly. They showed me two other rooms I could chose from. I was happy!!! 
Breakfast was good as well and lobby had a lot of different seating . And again the location was top: close to main attraction and not too far from the airport ( 20 min). 
I would recommend and also be open to come back!

Name: AVRAM
Overall Comment: Hotel has a bit of a faded glory feel - suite was large but generally felt old. Location is also not great; didn't feel safe
Translated Overall Comment: Hotel has a bit of a faded glory feel - suite was large but generally felt old. Location is also not great; didn't feel safe

Name: DYLAN
Overall Comment: Muy buena atencion, hermoso el hotel, spa y pileta
Translated Overall Comment: Very good service, beautiful hotel, spa and pool

Name: EDWARD
Overall Comment: My stay at the  Buenos Aires   was exceptional.  My Spanish is not so good and everyone at the hotel was able to accommodate.
Translated Overall Comment: My stay at the  Buenos Aires   was exceptional.  My Spanish is not so good and everyone at the hotel was able to accommodate.

Name: JONATHAN
Overall Comment: The stay was great - beautiful room, great breakfast selections and great workout area.  Staff was very helpful and everything was wonderful.
Reason for Brand Question Rating: The stay was great - no surprises.
Translated Overall Comment: The stay was great - beautiful room, great breakfast selections and great workout area.  Staff was very helpful and everything was wonderful.

Name: SHAWN
Overall Comment: Wonderful hotel great location
Translated Overall Comment: Wonderful hotel great location

Name: ROGER
Overall Comment: Great service
Translated Overall Comment: Great service

Name: ALCIDES
Overall Comment: Muy lindo el hotel, cómodo, limpio, muy buen desayuno y excelente atención del personal. Todo lo que uno espera de un hotel de ésta categoría.
Reason for Brand Question Rating: Simplemente porque está a la altura de las circunstancias. Excelente todo.
Translated Overall Comment: The hotel is very nice, comfortable, clean, with a very good breakfast and excellent service from the staff. Everything you would expect from a hotel of this category.

Name: OLEG
Overall Comment:
I stayed in this hotel for many nights during this year and I absolutely love it. 
First I would like to admire the guys on the from desk. They are all very helpful, professional and kind. All my requests and problems during my stay were answered and given a quick response. 
Second. The pool. I absolutely love the pool. However the basin requires some cleaning. When you are in the pool and approach the edges You can see that tiles of the basin having a heavy black plaque. Also water taps in shower cabins in the pool are not in a good shape and it’s very hard to control the water. This actually brings me to third. 
Third. There is an overall issue of maintenance in the hotel. It seems that over time the natural wear of hotel appliances, furniture, and facilities haven’t been addressed properly. I have been in various rooms during my stays and in each and every room there were many small maintenance problems, which always left a little feeling of neglect. I haven’t always complained about it, because I don’t like to make a hassle from little things. but even my colleagues who stayed with me in this hotel said the same.
Going back to the positives, the M-Club is also nice and convenient and the guys working there a super kind and helpful. 
Overall I love the hotel and the stuff and I always happy to come back
Reason for Brand Question Rating: As I stated in the beginning, my only issue is maintenance
Translated Overall Comment:

Name: RICARDO
Overall Comment: El hotel es emblemático y reconocido, sin embargo la habitación que me toco, tiene detalles de mantenimiento. La rejilla extractora de aire dentro del baño se encuentra sucia, la cerámica del lavamanos se encuentra agrietada. Eso hace que lusca viejo y sin mantenimeinto.
Reason for Brand Question Rating: Una compañero me mando como cortesía una botella de vino, se suponía que debería estar a mi registro a mi llegada a la habitación y me lo mandaron a las 8 am del dia siguiente a mi llegada.
Translated Overall Comment: The hotel is emblematic and well-known, however the room I was assigned to has maintenance issues. The air extractor grille inside the bathroom is dirty, the ceramic sink is cracked. This makes it look old and unmaintained.

Name: FERNANDO
Overall Comment: Excellent
Translated Overall Comment: Excellent

Name: JAVIER
Overall Comment:
Todo muy lindo 
Personal amable 
Desayuno muy completo 
Bar espectacular
Habitaciones muy confortable 
Seguramente volveré !!
Translated Overall Comment: Everything was very nice. Friendly staff. Very complete breakfast. Spectacular bar. Very comfortable rooms. I will definitely be back!!

Name: JOSEPH
Overall Comment: Great location and great hotel
Translated Overall Comment: Great location and great hotel

Name: OSMAR
Overall Comment:
Nos gusto . Pendsmos volver pero el inconveniente fue la habitacion compartida por los gritos al hablar de la habitacion contigua.
En horas de descanso
Reason for Brand Question Rating: Por cada uno de los puntos evaluados con anterioridad
Translated Overall Comment: We liked it. We plan to return but the inconvenience was the shared room because of the shouting when talking about the adjoining room. During rest hours

Name: NICOLAS
Overall Comment: El hotel es de muy buena calidad y servicios. El personal es muy amable y atento. Recomendable 100%
Reason for Brand Question Rating: El resultado siempre fue de acuerdo a las expectativas.
Translated Overall Comment: The hotel is of very good quality and services. The staff is very friendly and attentive. 100% recommended.

Name: FRANCISCO
Overall Comment: Problema na ducha, tive que reclamar 3 vezes para consertarem
Translated Overall Comment: Problem with the shower, I had to complain 3 times to get it fixed

Name: JULIA
Overall Comment: The front desk staff were very friendly and helpful.
Reason for Brand Question Rating: Staff were helpful and provided useful information.
Translated Overall Comment: The front desk staff were very friendly and helpful.

Name: MIRTA
Overall Comment: fue muy breve, solo puedo comentar que es excelente la vista desde la piscina.
Reason for Brand Question Rating: el baño de la habitación tenía problemas en cañerías o desagote, el inodoro no cortaba la carga y tenía un ruido molesto.
Translated Overall Comment: It was very brief, I can only comment that the view from the pool is excellent.

Name: RAUL
Overall Comment: Fue muy correcto todo. Muy atento el servicio
Reason for Brand Question Rating: Porque comulga similar con otros   que he estado
Translated Overall Comment: Everything was very correct. Very attentive service.

Name: ELENA
Overall Comment: Good ubication. Breakfast with many options. Very professional staff.
Reason for Brand Question Rating: The hotel maintenance and the excellent treatment of its staff.
Translated Overall Comment: Good ubication. Breakfast with many options. Very professional staff.

Name: SEBASTIAN
Overall Comment: Todo excelente! Servicios, limpieza, atención al cliente
Translated Overall Comment: Everything was excellent! Services, cleanliness, customer service

Name: ADRIAN
Overall Comment:
Todo impecable como siempre 
Estaría bueno que el bar no cerrara la caja 00:30 y no despache más a esa hora
El hotel estaba lleno un fin de semana largo y estaría bueno estuviera abierto por lo menos haya las 2 am el fin de semana 
Lo otro es que el pub Irlandés que es una belleza , estaría muy bueno que abriera al público
La atención, las habitaciones , la comida , todo excelente 
Saludos
Translated Overall Comment: Everything impeccable as always. It would be nice if the bar didn't close the cash register at 00:30 and not serve more at that time. The hotel was full on a long weekend and it would be nice if it was open at least until 2 am on the weekend. The other thing is that the Irish pub, which is a beauty, would be great if it opened to the public. The service, the rooms, the food, everything was excellent. Regards.

Name: OSVALDO
Overall Comment: Estancia sumamente agradable. Excelente trato de parte de todo el personal, espacios comunes amplios y bien ambientados, habitación espaciosa y muy cómoda, desayuno muy variado y para todos los gustos
Reason for Brand Question Rating: Los servicios y la calidad de la atención es acorde a lo que se espera de un Hotel
Translated Overall Comment: Extremely pleasant stay. Excellent treatment from all the staff, spacious and well-decorated common areas, spacious and very comfortable room, very varied breakfast for all tastes.

Name: LEANDRO
Overall Comment: La verdad es que estuvo todo bastante bien, lo único para mejorar es el menú del resto (los platos eran incipidos sin gusto a nada) y lo peor el último día en la pileta tuvimos que salir ya que un huésped, suponemos un niño habia dejado excremento en la pileta, obviamente tuvimos que salir.
Translated Overall Comment: The truth is that everything was pretty good, the only thing that could be improved was the rest of the menu (the dishes were bland and had no flavor) and the worst thing was that on the last day we had to leave the pool because a guest, we assume a child, had left excrement in the pool, obviously we had to leave.

Name: ANIBAL
Overall Comment: Excelente atención.
Translated Overall Comment: Excellent service.

Name: EMILIANO
Overall Comment:
Fue una estadía muy plácida.

Nos sorprendió el tapeo
Un tanto escaso
"Tres empanadas para Dos personas"
Parece salido de esperando la carroza.

En el desayuno no nos deslumbraron las cosas dulces.
Calidad medio pelo.
Ambos días los huevos revueltos estaban fríos.

Y en la cena....todo muy rico
Salvó la entrada parmentier de calabaza....parecía comida de hospital .....sin gusto.

Y los postres tampoco nos sorprendieron.

Pero la atención muy buena y la calidad de disfrute en el piso 23 excelente.
Reason for Brand Question Rating:
Podría mejorarse el desayuno
El tapeo escaso

Y la cena de tres pasos no nos sorprendió.
Rico pero no de un 5 estrellas
Translated Overall Comment: It was a very pleasant stay. We were surprised by the tapas. A bit sparse "Three empanadas for two people" It seems to have come from waiting for the carriage. At breakfast we were not dazzled by the sweet things. Average quality. Both days the scrambled eggs were cold. And at dinner... everything was very good. Except for the pumpkin parmentier starter... it seemed like hospital food... tasteless. And the desserts did not surprise us either. But the service was very good and the quality of enjoyment on the 23rd floor was excellent.

Name: ANABELLA
Overall Comment: La amabilidad y agilidad con la que atienden los anfitriones
Translated Overall Comment: The kindness and agility with which the hosts serve

Name: BEATRIZ
Overall Comment:
Lo que no me gustó es que me retuvieran 30.000 pesos de la tarjeta sin darme previo aviso y aún no han reintegrado en la misma.
Pagué 84.459 pesos por una habitación y me llevé la sorpresa que no incluía desayuno. No entiendo porque no incluir el desayuno o pretender que un viajero se vaya del hotel sin desayunar.
La instalaciones que respectan a la pileta climatizada y gimnasio muy buenas y la atención de la misma también. Inclusive la carta de ese espacio es coherente y de buena calidad y variedad.
El servicio de recibimiento de maleteros es óptimo, muy educados.
Reason for Brand Question Rating:
Ya expliqué que no puede acceder al desayuno, fue muy desagradable que me frenaran al ingresar a desayunar. Estaba confiada que iba incluido en el precio, ni observé la opción ni me imaginé que hubiese un hotel que tenga la opción de no ofrecerlo.
En los años que llevo viajando y alojándome en jamás me pasó de irme sin desayunar.
Me retuvieron 30000 pesos, aparte de lo cobrado. de mi tarjeta y me enteré después de mi estadía. Me explicaron que se me devolvería y aún no tengo noticias de su devolución.
Translated Overall Comment: What I didn't like is that they withheld 30,000 pesos from my card without giving me prior notice and they still haven't refunded it. I paid 84,459 pesos for a room and I was surprised that breakfast wasn't included. I don't understand why they don't include breakfast or expect a traveler to leave the hotel without having breakfast. The facilities regarding the heated pool and gym are very good and the service there is also good. Even the menu in that space is coherent and of good quality and variety. The reception service of the porters is optimal, very polite.

Name: ALICIA
Overall Comment: Destaco muy especialmente la atención del personal del hotel, a saber: Personal de Recepción, Personal en el Hall de entrada y el Personal del Salón Desayunador.
Reason for Brand Question Rating: Durante nuestra estadía con mi esposo fuimos muy bien atendidos.
Translated Overall Comment: I would especially like to highlight the attention of the hotel staff, namely: Reception Staff, Entrance Hall Staff and Breakfast Room Staff.

Name: PEDRO
Overall Comment: Un lugar muy confortable, un servicio excelente, sus instalaciones muy limpias, un excelente lugar!
Reason for Brand Question Rating: La calidad de sus empleados es de muy alta, personas en general atentas, y siempre dispuestos. las instalaciones del piso 23 con una visa maravillosa donde puedes apreciar de manera única uno de los monumentos más antiguos de Buenos Aires como lo es el obelisco Balmaceda.
Translated Overall Comment: A very comfortable place, excellent service, very clean facilities, an excellent place!

Name: JULIO
Overall Comment:
Como siempre, personal muy amable y atento para resolver el mínimo problema, muy limpio en todas sus instalaciones. Desayuno impecable. Y cerca de todo. 
Tal vez lo único mejorable es la grifería del baño que denota el paso del tiempo.
Reason for Brand Question Rating: Lo fundamenté en la primera contestación
Translated Overall Comment: As always, very friendly and helpful staff to solve the slightest problem, very clean throughout the facilities. Impeccable breakfast. And close to everything. Perhaps the only thing that could be improved is the bathroom taps that show the passage of time.

Name: CARLOS
Overall Comment: Nos sentimos muy cómodos y bien atendido
Translated Overall Comment: We felt very comfortable and well taken care of.

Name: LUIS
Overall Comment: Todo el personal muy amable y con excelente disposición
Translated Overall Comment: All the staff are very friendly and have an excellent disposition.

Name: RAJAA
Overall Comment: super friendly, professional and helpful staff but hotel needs major updates especially in the rooms.
Translated Overall Comment: super friendly, professional and helpful staff but hotel needs major updates especially in the rooms.

Name: ADRIANA
Overall Comment: Excelente en todo sentido! Desde la infraestrucutura edifilicia del Hotel, hasta los servicios de sus instalaciones, servicio gastronómico, habitación, etc.
Reason for Brand Question Rating: Por la seguridad que ofrece por ejemplo.
Translated Overall Comment: Excellent in every way! From the hotel's building infrastructure to the services of its facilities, food service, room, etc.

Name: MANUEL
Overall Comment: Muy satisfecho, con la atención  y servicio por todo el personal.
Translated Overall Comment: Very satisfied with the attention and service provided by all the staff.

Name: RAFAEL
Overall Comment: Excellent facilities, extraordinary personnel and service! Room was impecable, cleaning and maintenance was spot on.
Reason for Brand Question Rating: Security and personal safety was of prime quality.
Translated Overall Comment: Excellent facilities, extraordinary personnel and service! Room was impecable, cleaning and maintenance was spot on.

Name: LORENA
Overall Comment: Todo excelente!
Translated Overall Comment: Everything is excellent!

Name: ANA
Overall Comment: Excelente
Translated Overall Comment: Excellent

Name: MARIO
Overall Comment: Vamos siempre, excelente todo hermoso hotel !!
Translated Overall Comment: We always go, excellent everything beautiful hotel!!

Name: DAISY
Overall Comment: Happy and enjoy our Stay. Thanks a lot.
Reason for Brand Question Rating:
I trusted   so many years now. So always trusted them when ever stay in the m
  hotel family.
Translated Overall Comment: Happy and enjoy our Stay. Thanks a lot.

Name: MEIR
Overall Comment:
Tuve una hermosa estadía en el
Hotel 
La gente es muy amable y el servicio muy bueno
Translated Overall Comment: I had a lovely stay at the hotel. The people are very friendly and the service is very good.

Name: MARIA
Overall Comment: Pésima porque me robaron dinero de la habitación. Hablé con uno de los gerentes: Roberto otarola y se desligó del problema. Realmente una vergüenza!
Reason for Brand Question Rating: Cómo dije anteriormente, me robaron Plata de la habitación y nadie se hizo cargo. Suficiente para desconfiar de este hotel
Translated Overall Comment: Terrible because they stole money from my room. I spoke to one of the managers: Roberto Otarola and he distanced himself from the problem. Really a disgrace!

Name: IAN
Overall Comment:
Amazing hotel, with great facilities and the locations couldn’t be better, literally right in front of the obelisk l, one of the postal cards of Buenos Aires.
Night shift impeccable, always available and looking to do their best for their guests. 

I was celebrating my engagement during my stay in Buenos Aires, and I had a reservation at a different hotel under the   flag, but unfortunately didn’t meet the requirements for a nice and comfortable stay, so having had great experiences before hand at the   hotels around the world, and specially coming from the hospitality industry, I was very disappointed when I got a card whishing me happy birthday.

And the most important of all, by the treatment I got from one of the front desk agents, Macarena was ABSOLUTELY rude over the phone, demanding and totally disrespectful towards myself, reaching the point to raise the voice to me.

I totally understand the responsibilities and what the procedures requires, but such a behavior was totally not acceptable and totally not what the brand represents and should present to their guests. 

Agustin on the other hand was so nice and had such a touch while dealing with situations and adversities that I faced during my stay, having issues with my bank, having to wait for almost an hour to get my card enabled to transactions abroad.

Him and the night shift employees must have my thank you for the great stay and all their efforts to make my engagement celebration the most memorable possible.
