Name: MARIA
Overall Comment:
Todo bien, las personas muy amables!! Las toallas podriam cambiarlas! se ven viejas y sucias!!
Fuera de eso todo muy bien
Translated Overall Comment: Everything was fine, the people were very friendly!! The towels could be changed! They look old and dirty!! Apart from that, everything was fine.

Name: MONICA
Overall Comment: Todo impecable!! El check in, la habitación, club  , excelente
Reason for Brand Question Rating:
Porque fue una muy buena experiencia.
En cambio tengo pésima experiencia con   Bonvoy, Reservas internacional y Element Times Square
Translated Overall Comment: Everything was impeccable!! The check in, the room, the club, excellent

Name: CAROLINA
Overall Comment: Excelente servicio de todos y cada uno de sus colaboradores. Muy lindas las instalaciones. Siempre que hemos ido a Buenos Aires nos hemos hospedado con ustedes y lo seguiremos haciendo.
Reason for Brand Question Rating: Es un lugar tranquilo, seguro y limpio. Con comodas instalaciones diferentes alternativas dentro del hotel lo que hace que sea un lugar muy confortable.
Translated Overall Comment: Excellent service from each and every one of your collaborators. Very nice facilities. Every time we have been to Buenos Aires we have stayed with you and we will continue to do so.

Name: CAROLINA
Overall Comment: todo impecable
Translated Overall Comment: everything impeccable

Name: FAUS
Overall Comment: Hemos tenido una estancia muy grata. El personal muy atento y servicial. El hotel muy agradable. Habitación cómoda. Seguramente en nuestro próximo viaje a Buenos Aires serán la primera opción.
Reason for Brand Question Rating: Trabajo en hoteleria y conozco algunos otros  , por lo que puedo decir que representa muy bien los standar de la marca.
Translated Overall Comment: We had a very pleasant stay. The staff was very attentive and helpful. The hotel was very nice. The room was comfortable. They will surely be our first choice on our next trip to Buenos Aires.

Name: NEVA
Overall Comment: Very nice and satisfactory
Reason for Brand Question Rating: Met all Our needs while traveling
Translated Overall Comment: Very nice and satisfactory

Name: LUCILA
Overall Comment:
Muy cálido todo el personal del hotel. La habitación completa y los servicios impecables. Al ingresar no contaba aún con la habitación por lo que me guardaron el equipaje y permitieron utilizar las instalaciones hasta contar con la habitación. Gimnasio, vestuarios y piscina muy bien presentados. 
El desayuno es lejos uno de los mejores desayunos,completo y variado de los conocidos personalmente. 
Muy recomendable el hotel. Gracias por realizar mi estadía tan comfortable
Reason for Brand Question Rating: Asistí a una reunión de trabajo en donde se utilizaron diversos servicios brindados por el hotel demostrando la experiencia y calidad de servicio del personal del hotel en este tipo de eventos
Translated Overall Comment: The entire hotel staff was very friendly. The room was complete and the services impeccable. When I checked in I didn't have a room yet so they kept my luggage and allowed me to use the facilities until I had a room. The gym, changing rooms and pool were very well presented. The breakfast is by far one of the best breakfasts, complete and varied of any I have personally seen. I highly recommend the hotel. Thank you for making my stay so comfortable.

Name: SONIA
Overall Comment: Boa. Quarto escuro e não muito grande
Translated Overall Comment: Good. Dark room and not very big.

Name: ANGELINA
Overall Comment: Foi boa, bom servico
Translated Overall Comment: It was good, good service

Name: DIDIER
Overall Comment: Hermoso como siempre
Translated Overall Comment: Beautiful as always

Name: FEDERICO
Overall Comment: Como poseedor de la membresia   Bonvoy me he alojado en los hoteles Sheraton/  en varias partes del mundo y siempre quedé satisfecho. Pero en esta ocasión, mi estadía se vió superada por la excelencia de este Hotel, por sus servicios, la calidez y simpatía de todos los empleados, la atención del Hotel para el día de mi cumpleaños 89, y la excelente gastronomía. Muchas gracias.
Reason for Brand Question Rating: Vuelvo a repetir, tanto en N.Y. como en Miami, Cataratas del Niágara/Canadá/Pilar/Arg., Montevideo, Rio de Janeiro, Sheraton Bs.As. siempre tuve buenas experiencias y la calidad hotelera pretendida por el huésped
Translated Overall Comment: As a Bonvoy member, I have stayed at Sheraton hotels in various parts of the world and have always been satisfied. But on this occasion, my stay was surpassed by the excellence of this hotel, its services, the warmth and friendliness of all the employees, the attention of the hotel on my 89th birthday, and the excellent cuisine. Thank you very much.

Name: MATIAS
Overall Comment: Hermosa vista, la pieza muy amplia y completa. La terraza es hermosa
Reason for Brand Question Rating: La atencion que recibo siempre es excelente
Translated Overall Comment: Beautiful view, the room is very spacious and complete. The terrace is beautiful.

Name: KEVIN
Overall Comment:
Previa la reserva de la habitación, pedí que sea en un nivel alto, me dieron un 5to piso con una viste no agradable. 
En la habitación no tenía wifi en la televisión en todo el día no me lo pudieron solucionar 
Fui a la pileta y cuando baje mi tarjeta no abría mi habitación y tuve que bajar a planta baja a buscar ayuda y se molestaron por estar en toalla.
Translated Overall Comment: Before booking the room, I asked for it to be on a high level, they gave me a 5th floor with an unpleasant view. In the room there was no wifi on the television all day long, they could not fix it for me. I went to the pool and when I lowered my card my room would not open and I had to go down to the ground floor to seek help and they got upset because I was in a towel.

Name: CLAUDIA
Overall Comment: Excelente atención
Translated Overall Comment: Excellent attention

Name: LISA
Overall Comment: The shower was too small
Translated Overall Comment: The shower was too small

Name: CAMPBELL
Overall Comment: Great room and location. Very friendly staff
Reason for Brand Question Rating: A great level of service and standard while I was in a new city for the first time
Translated Overall Comment: Great room and location. Very friendly staff

Name: ELEONORA
Overall Comment:
Muy bueno todo.
El único inconveniente fue que ya no dan las batas para circular desde la habitación hasta la piscina.
Uno se tiene que llevar la propia bata y genera aumento de equipaje.
Translated Overall Comment: Everything was great. The only drawback was that they no longer provide bathrobes to walk from the room to the pool. You have to bring your own bathrobe and it increases your luggage.

Name: JOSEPH
Overall Comment: Excellent accommodations and service. Especially our server in the restaurant. Excellent food and wine also.
Translated Overall Comment: Excellent accommodations and service. Especially our server in the restaurant. Excellent food and wine also.

Name: MACARENA
Overall Comment:
Piezas con mala mantención. Requieren una renovación general.
Lo peor, fue que la ventana del dormitorio estaba en mal estado, no cerraba porque le faltaba una pieza. Nunca resolvieron el tema  pesar de nuestra solicitud ni tampoco nos cambiaron de habitación.
Reason for Brand Question Rating: Deterioro general de la habitación. Ventana de la habitación que no cerraba. No resolvieron nuestro problema.
Translated Overall Comment: Rooms with poor maintenance. They require a general renovation. The worst thing was that the bedroom window was in bad condition, it did not close because it was missing a piece. They never resolved the issue despite our request, nor did they change our room.

Name: MARIA
Overall Comment: Todo muy bien, sin embargo al llegar el olor de la habitación no era el mejor, al ventilarla mejoró. Y las duchas se sale mucho el agua y suele empaparse afuera. Un cálculo a revisar con el lugar de la ducha y el vidrio.
Reason for Brand Question Rating: Falta algo de mantenimiento. Los extractores del baño tenía un ruido desproporcionado. Una de las duchas filtraba el agua por el techo, la otra estaba ok. Sin embargo, ambas botaban mucha agua fuera.
Translated Overall Comment: Everything was fine, however, when we arrived the smell in the room was not the best, but when we aired it out it improved. And the showers leak a lot of water and it tends to soak outside. A calculation to check with the location of the shower and the glass.

Name: JULIETA
Overall Comment:
Hice un pedido de batas, pantuflas y un toallon adicional y nunca llego, tuve que reclamarlo.
Hicimos escapada bs as, en la cena cambiaron el menu y no hay ninguna opcion de pescados.
Translated Overall Comment: I ordered bathrobes, slippers and an extra towel and they never arrived, I had to claim them. We went on a getaway to Buenos Aires, at dinner they changed the menu and there is no fish option.

Name: ALVARO
Overall Comment: Room was smelly (black waters type), window handle was broken so i could not close it, you could hear any noise coming from next door because the wall against the window is not sealed. Very bad experience
Translated Overall Comment: Room was smelly (black waters type), window handle was broken so i could not close it, you could hear any noise coming from next door because the wall against the window is not sealed. Very bad experience

Name: CARLOS
Overall Comment: Descansamos ,muy buena la atención, limpieza de 10, riquisima la cena y el desayuno,la parte del bar genial,lo pasamos excelente. Y pronto volveremos ,totalmente recomendable.Gracias.
Reason for Brand Question Rating: Es excelente el lugar en todo los sentidos, descansamos lo disfrutamos ,el spa ,la pileta y la vista es maravillosa.los empleados maravillosos, educados ,amables ,muy atentos.graciad
Translated Overall Comment: We had a great rest, the service was very good, the cleanliness was excellent, the dinner and breakfast were delicious, the bar area was great, we had a great time. And we will return soon, totally recommended. Thank you.

Name: VIVIANA
Overall Comment: Muy buena atención. Las instalaciones están muy bien sobre todo el Spa/piscina.
Translated Overall Comment: Very good service. The facilities are very good, especially the spa/pool.

Name: YING-HWA
Overall Comment: Strongly recommend!
Reason for Brand Question Rating: Buenos Aires   treats Bonvoy Elite member with high respect!
Translated Overall Comment: Strongly recommend!

Name: JESUS
Overall Comment: O hotel tem espaços coletivos muito legais, é ótimo para a realização de um Encontro científico, como o ENAPOL. Porém, os quartos deixam muiiiito a desejar. Sempre me colocam no 1009, sem vista (a janela da para um paredão), sem uma poltrona de apoio, sem um espaço decente para um trabalho escrito ou no computador. Além disso, nas últimas 2 x, a banheira represava água durante o banho. O chuveiro quase caindo do teto. Falta um espelho de corpo inteiro, indispensável para as mulheres e também faz muita falta um espelho com lente de aumento. Por outro lado, um elogiado para o pessoal que atende os quartos: são muito disponíveis.
Reason for Brand Question Rating: Expliquei no espaço precedente. 2023 e, antes, 2019 e 2015. Mesmo quarto. Mesma experiência.
Translated Overall Comment: The hotel has some really cool common areas, which are great for holding a scientific meeting, such as ENAPOL. However, the rooms leave a lot to be desired. They always put me in room 1009, which has no view (the window looks out onto a wall), no armchair, and no decent space for writing or using the computer. Furthermore, the last two times I stayed there, the bathtub was holding back water while I was taking a shower. The shower almost fell from the ceiling. There is no full-length mirror, which is essential for women, and there is also a great need for a mirror with a magnifying lens. On the other hand, I would like to compliment the staff who serve the rooms: they are very helpful.

Name: FERNANDO
Overall Comment: Fue buena la estancia. El desayuno podría mejorarse
Translated Overall Comment: The stay was good. Breakfast could be improved.

Name: GIOVANNA
Overall Comment: El hotel es bonito, pero el servicio es pésimo.  El personal es lento y grosero.
Reason for Brand Question Rating: La atención del personal es pésima, desde el front desk hasta las saloneras del restaurante.  Horrible trato al cliente.  Lentos y groseros.
Translated Overall Comment: The hotel is nice, but the service is terrible. The staff is slow and rude.

Name: JULIANA
Overall Comment:
Foi ótima. Café da manhã generoso. Chuveiro muito ruim.

Funcionários muito atenciosos, fomos muito bem recepcionados e atendidos.
Reason for Brand Question Rating: Nós fomos informados que mudariamos de quarto no meio da estadia. Deu trabalho arrumar tudo em outro quarto. Não gostamos disso.
Translated Overall Comment: It was great. Generous breakfast. Very bad shower. Very attentive staff, we were very well received and served.

Name: BERNARDINO
Overall Comment:
excelente 
un problema es la falta de donde agarrarse para la ducha en la bañadera. Es muy peligroso para la gente de edad como yo
Translated Overall Comment: Excellent, one problem is the lack of where to hold on to when showering in the bathtub. It is very dangerous for older people like me.

Name: HERNAN
Overall Comment: Ubicación inmejorable, limpieza total, atención de todo el personal muy agradable, excelente desayuno y un menú muy completo. Un lugar especial para disfrutar Buenos Aires. Altamente recomendable.
Reason for Brand Question Rating: Todo el personal está hasta en los detalles más pequeños.
Translated Overall Comment: Excellent location, total cleanliness, very friendly staff, excellent breakfast and a very complete menu. A special place to enjoy Buenos Aires. Highly recommended.

Name: CRISTIAN
Overall Comment: La estancia fue excelente. Las instalaciones, comodidades y desayuno sin discusiones.
Reason for Brand Question Rating: La gestión en que el visitante se sienta cómodo es excelente. Desde la recepción en la zona de estacionamiento, la mesa de ingresos, y los distintos empleados que acompañan.
Translated Overall Comment: The stay was excellent. The facilities, amenities and breakfast were beyond reproach.

Name: ADARSH
Overall Comment: Wonderful hotel
Reason for Brand Question Rating: Always use the   brand as service is always good
Translated Overall Comment: Wonderful hotel

Name: ADRIAN
Overall Comment: Excelente atención, cordialidad y la consideración de todo el personal a nuestros solicitudes, ya que me encontraba en el hotel, haciendo mi post operatorio.
Reason for Brand Question Rating: Por su servicio integral, a mi entender, de Excelencia. Gracias!.
Translated Overall Comment: Excellent service, cordiality and consideration of all the staff to our requests, since I was at the hotel, doing my post-operative.

Name: CAROLINA
Overall Comment: Excelente todo desde el servicio hasta sus empleados, altamente recomendable!
Translated Overall Comment: Excellent everything from the service to the employees, highly recommended!

Name: FERNANDO
Overall Comment: Muy buena la atención
Reason for Brand Question Rating: Me solucionaron un problema de habitación inmediatamente
Translated Overall Comment: Very good service

Name: CRISTIAN
Overall Comment: La estancia fue buena, solo algunos detalles con accesorios del baño
Reason for Brand Question Rating: El restaurante y servicio a la habitación son muy limitados en variedad
Translated Overall Comment: The stay was good, just a few details with bathroom accessories

Name: SULTAN
Overall Comment: They often miss cleaning my room. After long day of work, I come to my room around 6 pm find room not cleaned. I had to call to send some one to clean my room. First day the customer service man was very rude with me as I complained to him that my room is not cleaned yet. His respond was " don't complain it to me. It is not my job. If you want I can call some one to clean your room."
Reason for Brand Question Rating: I stayed for three week. very often they did not cleaned my room. I had to call and ask some one clean my room. Do not leave laundry bag, paper work for laundry, and bottle water. I had to ask for them.
Translated Overall Comment: They often miss cleaning my room. After long day of work, I come to my room around 6 pm find room not cleaned. I had to call to send some one to clean my room. First day the customer service man was very rude with me as I complained to him that my room is not cleaned yet. His respond was " don't complain it to me. It is not my job. If you want I can call some one to clean your room."

Name: ROHIT
Overall Comment:
Great location, good breakfast, and tasty lunch. Lots of varieties of salads, sauces, and other sides and condiments. 
Good and friendly service.
I wish bathrooms are more renovated and more hooks to hang clothes.
Translated Overall Comment:
Great location, good breakfast, and tasty lunch. Lots of varieties of salads, sauces, and other sides and condiments. 
Good and friendly service.
I wish bathrooms are more renovated and more hooks to hang clothes.

Name: HORACIO
Overall Comment: Muy bien todo   Excelente los empleados
Reason for Brand Question Rating: Puso todo a nuestra disposición.  Sobre todo en traslados desde y hacia exeiza
Translated Overall Comment: Very good everything. Excellent employees.

Name: JOSE
Overall Comment: Seleccioné este hotel por tu ubicación además porque amo hospedarme en   como marca. Todo estuvo excelente desde que llegamos se preocuparon por ayudarnos con la habitación, además me brindaron un excelente beneficio por mi membresía de un up grade. La habitación estuvo impecable, las áreas públicas utilicé el gimnasio y la piscina todo perfecto.
Reason for Brand Question Rating: Es un hotel que va más allá de lo que necesitamos, y todo el personal siempre está pendiente de nuestras necesidades por lo que estoy seguro que   Buenos Aires podrás satisfacer a cualquier tipo de huésped.
Translated Overall Comment: I chose this hotel for its location and because I love staying at this brand. Everything was excellent from the moment we arrived, they were very concerned about helping us with the room, and they also gave me an excellent benefit for my upgrade membership. The room was impeccable, the public areas, I used the gym and the pool, everything was perfect.

Name: MARIO
Overall Comment: Es la 2da vez que me alojo en este hotel, tanto el hotel, la ubicacion como el personal es execlente
Translated Overall Comment: This is the second time I have stayed at this hotel. The hotel, the location and the staff are excellent.

Name: FEDERICO
Overall Comment: Excelente
Translated Overall Comment: Excellent

Name: ELIZABETH
Overall Comment: This is a beautiful hotel, an oasis in the busy city. The room was spacious and graciously appointed with a comfortable bed and a nice range of amenities. The wifi was strong. The pleasant staff arranged for an airport taxi to pick us up at 3:30am so we could catch an early flight. I highly recommend this hotel.
Translated Overall Comment: This is a beautiful hotel, an oasis in the busy city. The room was spacious and graciously appointed with a comfortable bed and a nice range of amenities. The wifi was strong. The pleasant staff arranged for an airport taxi to pick us up at 3:30am so we could catch an early flight. I highly recommend this hotel.

Name: PABLO
Overall Comment: Excelente todo
Translated Overall Comment: Excellent everything

Name: NELSON
Overall Comment: Excelente experiência. Desde o check in até o check out
Translated Overall Comment: Excellent experience. From check in to check out

Name: SAMANTHA
Overall Comment: El hotel requiere renovación.
Translated Overall Comment: The hotel requires renovation.

Name: ARIADNA
Overall Comment: El servicio fue muy amable en general, y las instalaciones son muy lindas.
Translated Overall Comment: The service was very friendly overall, and the facilities are very nice.

Name: MIGUEL
Overall Comment: Excelente!!!!!
Translated Overall Comment: Excellent!!!!!

Name: EDUARDO
Overall Comment: Exelente todo , de mas esta decir lo comodo, los detalles y el personal de primera , pase 3 dias maravillosos, incluida la sorpresa que me brindo el staff por mi aniversario.
Reason for Brand Question Rating: Simplemente por que ofrecen lo mejor de lo que explican y yo al menos estuve feliz en el hotel, ya que mi primera experiencia en un hotel de tamaña talla .
Translated Overall Comment: Everything was excellent, needless to say, the comfort, the details and the first class staff. I spent 3 wonderful days, including the surprise the staff gave me for my anniversary.

Name: RAUL
Overall Comment: Excellent service outstanding customer support
Translated Overall Comment: Excellent service outstanding customer support

Name: PHILIP
Overall Comment:
Everything about the hotel and my stay were wonderful. From Check-in through check-out I thought the service was perfect and my room was very comfortable and clean. 
All of the employees with whom I interacted were professional, friendly and super helpful. I would especially like to acknowledge the following employees: 
Luciana (front desk/check-in) Thank you for the early check in and late check out and the other recommendations you made for me

Florenzia (M Club) - Thank you for helping start my day on the positive way with your friendly greetings and warm smile when I had breakfast in the M Club.  Also thank you for recommendations for places to visit around Buenos Aires

Nelson (M Club) Thank you for also helping start my day in a positive way  - always a friendly and warm greeting when I would go the M Club and wonderful all around service - even remembering what kind of omelet I wanted when I would order one.

Antonella (M Club) - Thank you for also starting or continuing my day in a positive warm way. Always friendly greetings and warm smile when I went to the M Club.  Also thank you for recommendations for places to visit around Buenos Aires

There was another young woman who worked in the evenings at the M Club and I apologize I don't have her name.  She was always friendly and helpful - warm smile and very kind. 

Juan Manuel (front desk a/check out)- Thank you for making a key so I could wait in the M Club after check out and while I waited for my car to the airport

To hotel management - you did a wonderful job in hiring these employees and I hope you value them.  All of them, especially those in the M Club made me feel at home - and that goes a long way for me being a stranger and first time visitor to Buenos Aires.   I look forward to may next visit and will definitely recommend the hotel.
Reason for Brand Question Rating: See my previous comment.  As a result of the excellent customer service I felt completely at home during my stay.
Translated Overall Comment:
Everything about the hotel and my stay were wonderful. From Check-in through check-out I thought the service was perfect and my room was very comfortable and clean. 
All of the employees with whom I interacted were professional, friendly and super helpful. I would especially like to acknowledge the following employees: 
Luciana (front desk/check-in) Thank you for the early check in and late check out and the other recommendations you made for me

Florenzia (M Club) - Thank you for helping start my day on the positive way with your friendly greetings and warm smile when I had breakfast in the M Club.  Also thank you for recommendations for places to visit around Buenos Aires

Nelson (M Club) Thank you for also helping start my day in a positive way  - always a friendly and warm greeting when I would go the M Club and wonderful all around service - even remembering what kind of omelet I wanted when I would order one.

Antonella (M Club) - Thank you for also starting or continuing my day in a positive warm way. Always friendly greetings and warm smile when I went to the M Club.  Also thank you for recommendations for places to visit around Buenos Aires

There was another young woman who worked in the evenings at the M Club and I apologize I don't have her name.  She was always friendly and helpful - warm smile and very kind. 

Juan Manuel (front desk a/check out)- Thank you for making a key so I could wait in the M Club after check out and while I waited for my car to the airport

To hotel management - you did a wonderful job in hiring these employees and I hope you value them.  All of them, especially those in the M Club made me feel at home - and that goes a long way for me being a stranger and first time visitor to Buenos Aires.   I look forward to may next visit and will definitely recommend the hotel.

Name: FABIANO
Overall Comment:
O hotel é bem localizado, mas falta em qualidade para se intitular 5 estrelas. O café da manhã é pouco variado, repetitivo, sem tortas doces e sem reposição a medida que vai chegando a hora do término. Portanto os hóspedes que vão tomar café 1h antes do término já não podem desfrutar de todos os itens que o hotel dispõe em seu café da manhã.  Além disso colocam os talheres direto sobre jogos americanos,  ao invés de disporem sobre guardanapos de tecido.  Um hotel 5 estrelas deveria abolir jogos americanos que não conseguem ser adequadamente limpos de um hospede para o outro e usar apenas toalhas e guardanapos limpos entre um hóspede e outro.
Outro ponto negativo para um hotel 5 estrelas foi o fato do hotel nao restringir pessoas em traje de banho durante o cafe da manhã. Em 2 manhãs havia um rapaz enrolado de toalha constrangendo a todos que estavam no café.
Reason for Brand Question Rating: Pelo relato que já que fiz anteriormente.
Translated Overall Comment: The hotel is well located, but lacks the quality to be considered a 5-star hotel. The breakfast has little variety, is repetitive, has no sweet pastries and is not replenished as breakfast approaches. Therefore, guests who go to breakfast 1 hour before it ends cannot enjoy all the items the hotel has for breakfast. Furthermore, they place the cutlery directly on placemats, instead of on cloth napkins. A 5-star hotel should do away with placemats that cannot be properly cleaned between guests and only use clean towels and napkins between guests. Another negative point for a 5-star hotel was the fact that the hotel did not restrict people in bathing suits during breakfast. On two mornings, there was a guy wrapped in a towel, embarrassing everyone at breakfast.

Name: PABLO
Overall Comment: Excelente todo
Reason for Brand Question Rating: La atención del personal es sobresaliente, hace la diferencia.
Translated Overall Comment: Excellent everything

Name: MARCELO
Overall Comment: Excellent job as always! Love this hotel and the staff is just superb!
Translated Overall Comment: Excellent job as always! Love this hotel and the staff is just superb!

Name: JAVIER
Overall Comment: El personal muy amable pero me siguen reteniendo un deposito en mi tarjeta, y me cobraron el doble por mi estancia. Después que les mande el correo corrigieron lo del cobro, pero llevo una semana y la retención continua en mi tarjeta.
Reason for Brand Question Rating: Como indique anteriormente, el personal muy amable, pero los errores de cobro que cometieron durante la estancia no son aceptables.
Translated Overall Comment: The staff was very friendly, but they kept holding a deposit on my card and charged me double for my stay. After I sent them an email, they corrected the charge, but it's been a week and the hold on my card continues.

Name: IGNACIO
Overall Comment:
El personal, excelente, y atiende muy bien, si se nota que el equipo (vestimenta) con la que cuentan es vieja y se encuentra gastada, recomiendo cambios.
El desayuno, bien, en terminos generales, pero las salchichas deben ser cambiadas, o llamadas chorizos.
Fatal el tema del problema electrico que existio el dia domingo.
Reason for Brand Question Rating: por la calidad de ciertos elementos que comente al principio
Translated Overall Comment: The staff is excellent and provides very good service. If you notice that the equipment (clothing) they have is old and worn out, I recommend changing it. Breakfast is good, in general terms, but the sausages should be changed, or called chorizos. The electrical problem that occurred on Sunday was terrible.

Name: ROBSON
Overall Comment: No geral foi bem confortável. E a equipe muito educada
Reason for Brand Question Rating: Eu não gosto de ter um chuveiro dentro da banheira. Acho perigoso por risco de escorregar. Também falta uma porta no box, pois molha todo o banheiro.
Translated Overall Comment: Overall it was very comfortable. And the staff was very polite.

Name: LUCIANO
Overall Comment: There was no available room with balcony. The pool closed 15 mins earlier. And i was charged over the rate that was listed in the   web page.
Translated Overall Comment: There was no available room with balcony. The pool closed 15 mins earlier. And i was charged over the rate that was listed in the   web page.

Name: LUCAS
Overall Comment: Muy conforme con la estadía en el hotel, súper comoda la habitación.
Translated Overall Comment: Very satisfied with the stay at the hotel, the room was super comfortable.

Name: MARIA
Overall Comment: Hola súper lindo el hotel la atención y todo lo único que el día domingo tuvimos que bajar 21 pisos por que se corto la luz y la verdad no estuvo bueno esa situación pero el resto súper todo
Translated Overall Comment: Hello, the hotel is super nice, the service and everything. The only thing is that on Sunday we had to go down 21 floors because the power went out and the truth is that the situation was not good, but the rest was super.

Name: FABIO
Overall Comment: Hotel molto pulito e ben tenuto. Personale molto cordiale e disponibile. Soggiorno molto piacevole.
Reason for Brand Question Rating: Servizio ottimo. Camere confortevoli. Pulizia ottima. Buon cibo e bevande.
Translated Overall Comment: Very clean and well maintained hotel. Very friendly and helpful staff. Very pleasant stay.

Name: SUSANA
Overall Comment: Todo fantastico. Solo no funcionaba el hidromasaje
Reason for Brand Question Rating: Su personal muy amable. Las vistas desde la pileta
Translated Overall Comment: Everything was fantastic. Only the whirlpool didn't work.

Name: ADRIAN
Overall Comment:
Se les corta la luz
Y cada vez que tengo que usar la tarjeta corporativa para pagar , es un problema nuevo
Reason for Brand Question Rating: It’s beyond me why the fuzz to use a corporate credit card that is already prepaid
Translated Overall Comment: The power goes out and every time I have to use the corporate card to pay, it's a new problem.

Name: DAVID
Overall Comment: El gimnasio estaba sucio.
Reason for Brand Question Rating: Tienen una oportunida de mejora con la limpieza en general.
Translated Overall Comment: The gym was dirty.

Name: MARIA
Overall Comment:
Excelente atención como siempre,desde el check in hasta el check out.
Hemos ido varias veces y sin dudas volveremos a ir.
La amabilidad del personal,la limpieza de todos los espacios,los servicios que ofrecen,la ubicación del hotel.Todo 10/10.
Aspecto destacado más aún es la piscina.
Muchas gracias por todo y esperamos volver pronto!!
Reason for Brand Question Rating:
Nunca decepciona,al contrario supera las expectativas.
Es un hotel de gran nivel que amamos visitar
Translated Overall Comment: Excellent service as always, from check in to check out. We have been there several times and will definitely be back. The friendliness of the staff, the cleanliness of all the spaces, the services they offer, the location of the hotel. Everything was 10/10. The pool is an even more outstanding feature. Thank you very much for everything and we hope to return soon!!

Name: CAROLINA
Overall Comment:
Chegamos mais cedo com um bebê de seis meses e nos pediram para pagar uma diária toda a mais, pelo horário. Ok. 

Nos colocaram em um quarto cujas janelas davam direto para outros quartos. O cliente paga a mais para ter um quarto lateral? Não faz sentido, mas ok. 

Além disso, alguns funcionários são muito mal treinados. Como a Romina, que, à solicitações simples respondia "não" e depois perguntava do que se tratava, tornando a estadia com o um bebê mais dificultosa. 

Pontos positivos para a Talita na recepção, Camila no restaurante e para os Srs. que acompanham os hospedes aos quartos. Muito cordiais, bem treinados e educados, sendo o motivo pelo qual indicaríamos, além da localização.

Vocês tem 5 estrelas por preencherem requisitos objetivos, mas não se compara com o atendimento do Palácio Duhal, do Hotel Alvear e outros também 5 estrelas. Vale rever.
Translated Overall Comment: We arrived early with a six-month-old baby and were asked to pay an extra night's rate, due to the time. Ok. They put us in a room with windows that looked directly onto other rooms. Does a guest pay extra to have a side room? It doesn't make sense, but ok. In addition, some of the staff are very poorly trained. Like Romina, who, when asked simple questions, would say "no" and then ask what it was about, making our stay with a baby more difficult. Positive points for Talita at the front desk, Camila at the restaurant and the gentlemen who accompany guests to their rooms. Very friendly, well-trained and polite, which is why we would recommend you, in addition to the location. You have 5 stars for meeting objective requirements, but you can't compare to the service at Palácio Duhal, Hotel Alvear and other 5-star hotels. It's worth checking out again.

Disseram depois de muito tempo que não viram nada, que as imagens das câmeras não mostravam nada e ficou por isso mesmo. Nao procuraram fazer absolutamente nada! Reason for Brand Question Rating: Fui Furtado dentro do hotel - levaram minha mochila enquanto tomava café da manhã no restaurante do hotel no dia 29/agosto/23. Translated Overall Comment: I was robbed inside the hotel - my backpack was stolen while I was having breakfast in the hotel restaurant on August 29, 2023. When I realized it had been stolen, I informed the hotel staff, who reacted indifferently. They said after a long time that they had seen nothing, that the images from the cameras showed nothing, and that was it. They did absolutely nothing! I suffered a loss of USD2,000, in addition to the loss of my passport, driver's license, and other personal belongings. I am completely disappointed with the situation - I will never stay at a hotel in this chain again, I will publicize the case widely, and my company will block the hotel from the chain. I was extremely harmed and poorly served.

Reason for Brand Question Rating: Me sorprendió que tuviera q subir vestida y cambiarme para ir a la pileta en vez de darme una bata para q pueda ir con malla desde la habitación.
Translated Overall Comment: Someone knocked on several doors at 12 o'clock at night, including mine. When I got a response from inside, this man would reply, "I thought nobody was home," and move on to the next room. It scared me quite a bit and I slept worried all night.

Overall Comment: We had an excellent time in Buenos Aires, and partly the reason was the hotel we chose. The Buenos Aires   is perfectly located, right in the city centre. The obelisk is just outside. The lavalle street is just a couple of minutes walk from the hotel, and is buzzing with activity late in the evening, with many restaurants. All in all, it is the location of the hotel which trumps everything else. The staff of course were very efficient, and friendly. The breakfast was good. The gluten-free selection was very impressive.Full marks.
Reason for Brand Question Rating: Very friendly staff. Ours was a very late night flight to Buenos Aires. We phoned the hotel and asked the staff to book a city tour for us. Guiliana, one of the front-desk staff went out of the way to help us make the booking.

Name: DIEGO
Overall Comment: En lineas generales bien. Me quedé una noche por negocios. Tengo reserva para una semana en octubre también, ya que mi empresa queda cerca. Estaba con un tema muscular. Agendé masajes y cuando llegó la hora, resultó que era un hombre el masajista, le expliqué que no lo tomara a mal, pero que prefería una profesional mujer, o en todo caso que me hubieran avisado. Me explicaron que la masajista ya se había retirado y solo estaba el señor. Creo que hubiera sido mejor avisarme antes para darme la opción de hacerme en el hotel o buscar en otro lugar. Al día siguiente no tenían agenda y al otro un evento, así que tampoco.
Translated Overall Comment: Overall, it was good. I stayed one night for business. I have a reservation for a week in October as well, since my company is close by. I was having a muscle problem. I scheduled massages and when the time came, it turned out that the masseuse was a man. I explained to him not to take it the wrong way, but that I preferred a female professional, or at least that they should have let me know. They explained to me that the masseuse had already left and only the man was there. I think it would have been better to let me know beforehand to give me the option of having it at the hotel or looking for another place. The next day they didn't have an appointment and the day after that there was an event, so that was fine too.

Regarding service, breakfast and other services were excellent.

Overall Comment: Mala experiencia, llegamos tarde, la habitación que habíamos elegido con vista al obelisco por agencia Expedia nunca tuvo vista al obelisco sino que a otra torre, cuando le hicimos saber esto a recepción nos enviaron a otra con vista a 9 de julio pero aún así no se veía el obelisco, por la cual nos subieron la tarifa. La televisión nunca funcionó, el servicio a la habitación malísimo, no tienen más que ensalada de lechuga, un sándwich de salmón ahumado que estaba muy añejo, $5000 pesos argentinos por un vino que en el supermercado cuenta $1500, frigobar pobre, dos aguas dos gaseosas, la puerta de la ducha no cerraba bien por lo que se inundaba completo al ducharte. Tuve muy mala experiencia. Por el valor que te cobran no cumple con lo que esperas de un hotel como  .
Reason for Brand Question Rating: Mala experiencia, mala comida a la habitación, televisión nunca funcionó, puerta de ducha en no cerraba se filtraba toda el agua. Habitación que te ofrecen con vista al obelisco nunca existió.
Translated Overall Comment: Bad experience, we arrived late, the room we had chosen with a view of the obelisk through the Expedia agency never had a view of the obelisk but of another tower, when we informed the reception about this they sent us to another one with a view of 9 de Julio but even so the obelisk was not visible, for which they raised our rate. The television never worked, the room service was terrible, they only have lettuce salad, a smoked salmon sandwich that was very old, $5000 Argentine pesos for a wine that in the supermarket costs $1500, poor minibar, two waters, two sodas, the shower door did not close well so it was completely flooded when you showered. I had a very bad experience. For the price they charge you, it does not meet what you expect from a hotel like this.

Name: TOMAS

Fue una buena estadia.  El personal muy atento en todo momento. 
Lo unico que me resulto negativo es que, una noche intente conectar mi celular al TV. Al no poder hacerlo me comunique con recepcion y quien me atendió me dijo que debia yo contar un dispositivo chromecast o una notebook mediante un cable HD. 
En ese instante no supe si me hablaba enserio. 
Pero la verdad muy atentos todos
Translated Overall Comment: It was a good stay. The staff was very attentive at all times. The only thing that was negative for me was that one night I tried to connect my cell phone to the TV. When I couldn't do it, I contacted the reception and the person who attended me told me that I had to have a Chromecast device or a notebook using an HD cable. At that moment I didn't know if he was serious. But the truth is that everyone was very attentive.

Name: MARCELO
Overall Comment: El check in bastante desprolijo y me entregaron la habitacion a las 15.30 en lugar del horario correcto. No me explicaron del desayuno ni nada. Soy socio   hace 10 años y no me dejaron usar el m club lounge cuando estaba en una hab deluxe. Ignacio me llevo las maletas y no sabia configurar ni los aires ni el wifi el hotel necesita muchas renovaciones hab 1025 la ducha es super chica e incomoda y el jacuzzi es bañera no andan los motores mucho para mejorar
Translated Overall Comment: The check-in was quite messy and they gave me the room at 3:30 pm instead of the correct time. They didn't explain to me about breakfast or anything. I've been a member for 10 years and they didn't let me use the m club lounge when I was in a deluxe room. Ignacio carried my bags and didn't know how to configure the air conditioning or the wifi. The hotel needs a lot of renovations. Room 1025 has a very small and uncomfortable shower and the jacuzzi is a bathtub. The motors don't work much and there's room for improvement.

The food was excellent, the experience was highly recommended as well.

Translated Overall Comment: Very good service. Very nice facilities, especially the Spa. Very good breakfast.

Name: ADRIAN
Overall Comment: Excelente atención y las instalaciones muy lindas y de calidad.
Reason for Brand Question Rating: Porque está todo de acuerdo a lo esperado. Sólo tengo que decir que el precio de los platos del restaurant, me parecieron algo elevados. Lo demás, todo muy bien.
Translated Overall Comment: Excellent service and very nice and quality facilities.

Name: MARIA
Overall Comment:
La estancia estuvo bien, lo mejor la atención en la piscina y el restaurante la luciérnaga ! El personal de estas zonas súper atentos 
En cuanto al personal de la recepción no puedo opinar lo mismo ya que no atendían bien la demanda
Reason for Brand Question Rating: No cumple con la excelencia en algunos aspectos
Translated Overall Comment: The stay was good, the best thing was the service at the pool and the restaurant La Luciérnaga! The staff in these areas were super attentive. As for the reception staff, I cannot say the same since they did not attend to the demand well.

Name: MARTIN
Overall Comment: Me hospedé con mi esposa e hijo (10 años). Eran dos camas. Nos resultaron pequeñas. Mi expectativa era o una cama grande (King size) y una pequeña (o sofá cama) o dos camas grandes.
Translated Overall Comment: I stayed with my wife and son (10 years old). There were two beds. They were small for us. My expectation was either one large bed (King size) and one small one (or sofa bed) or two large beds.

Name: MARIA
Overall Comment: Wonderful stay, excellent staff :)
Reason for Brand Question Rating: It was perhaps the one of the best   stays I experienced. The staff was incredibly welcoming. We arrived earlier than excepted and the team was able to accommodate us, including an upgrade in recognition of my status. The location and team together make for a memorable experience, I look forward to returning soon to Buenos Aires
Translated Overall Comment: Wonderful stay, excellent staff :)

Name: BEATRIZ
Overall Comment: muy buena
Reason for Brand Question Rating: Por todo lo que clasifique antes
Translated Overall Comment: very good

Name: LIZA
Overall Comment: The room was smaller than the other Sheraton in BA but the bed and bathroom were comfortable. Location was great for sightseeing.
Translated Overall Comment: The room was smaller than the other Sheraton in BA but the bed and bathroom were comfortable. Location was great for sightseeing.

Name: GALITHAREL
Overall Comment: Very good hotel. The location is good and the hotel itself was good. Good staff
Translated Overall Comment: Very good hotel. The location is good and the hotel itself was good. Good staff

Name: JOAO
Overall Comment: Unfortunately, at this time I didn't have a good experience. I had several problems with internet with cause problems with my work in an afternoon that I was stayed at hotel.

Overall Comment: The location of the hotel is perfect, Central, and close to most places of interest in the city.

Name: ALFREDO
Overall Comment: Excelente atención y cordialidad
Reason for Brand Question Rating:
Uno se identifica con la marca   por la excelente atención y amabilidad de su personal como el resto de las instalaciones. En particular fue mi primera visita a este Hotel y me sentí muy cómodo 
Gracias

Name: EVADIL

La amabilidad de su personal … la ubicación y sobre todo lo
Acogedor de las habitaciones

Name: ELIDIA
Overall Comment:
La situación del hotel era magnífica para estar en Buenos Aires.
Además destacar la predisposición y amabilidad del personal. 
Las camas muy cómodas.
Translated Overall Comment: The location of the hotel was great for a stay in Buenos Aires. I also want to highlight the helpfulness and friendliness of the staff. The beds were very comfortable.

Name: MARIA
Overall Comment:
Impecable, super cordiales.
Limpieza
Amabilidad
Gracias!

Name: DIEGO
Overall Comment: Muy bueno el servicio y atención de todo el personal, excelente el desayuno
Translated Overall Comment: Very good service and attention from all staff, excellent breakfast

Name: PAOLA
Overall Comment: Excellent service from the Restaurant, front desk,  everybody. Great customer service & we enjoyed our stay

Excellent service, we were delighted with the attention of the personal across the different areas of the hotel 
The staff made our stay very confortable.
Translated Overall Comment: Excellent service from the Restaurant, front desk,  everybody. Great customer service & we enjoyed our stay

Name: LAURA
Overall Comment:
Sin wifi disponible. Para trabajar tuve que hacerlo desde el lobby x imposibilidad de conexión desde habitación. 
En este momento tecnológico es bochornoso no ofrecer una conexión adecuada.
Reason for Brand Question Rating:
Ausencia de conexión wifi en habitaciones. 
Ante el reclamo, mencionaron en varias oportunidades que estaban en reparación. Pero nunca solucionaron el inconveniente. Lamentable.
Translated Overall Comment: No wifi available. I had to work from the lobby due to the impossibility of connecting from the room. In this technological age, it is embarrassing not to offer an adequate connection.

Name: THIERRY
Overall Comment: Check-in et check-out impeccables, bons services au bar et room service, par contre quelques problèmes de propreté, en particulier un linge de bain sale dans la chambre 1827 et des salles de bains en dessous du standard: prendre une douche dans la chambre 1626 est une inondation garantie de la salle de bain.
Reason for Brand Question Rating: C'est mon premier séjour dans un hotel  , et nous avons été globalement très satisfaits.
Translated Overall Comment: Impeccable check-in and check-out, good service at the bar and room service, on the other hand some cleanliness issues, in particular dirty bath linen in room 1827 and bathrooms below standard: taking a shower in room 1626 is a guaranteed flooding of the bathroom.

Name: RAUL
Overall Comment:
Siempre hago estadías cortas por negocios y las dos veces que me hospedé fueron muy satisfactoria, el personal muy atento y el servicio satisfactorio.
R.S
Reason for Brand Question Rating: Por lo antes mencionado, Atención del personal, higiene , servicios en general muy conforme
Translated Overall Comment: I always make short stays for business and the two times I stayed were very satisfactory, the staff was very attentive and the service was satisfactory. RS

Name: JOSE
Overall Comment: Muy confortable y excelente ubicación.
Reason for Brand Question Rating: Porque considero que cumple con su categoría de hotel dentro de la candena
Translated Overall Comment: Very comfortable and excellent location.

Name: ELEANOR
Overall Comment: The lobby is nice but this hotel is in need of some serious updating in terms of the rooms.  I could hear kids crying in other rooms due to the wood floors (also chairs and things being moved above me for the same reason). Also, while I as "Upgraded" to a nice sized suite - it was on the street side on 11th floor - so, street noise was terrible.  Getting service in the restaurants was slow and inattentive.  I did LOVE the very nice people in the executive suite and having breakfast available there was a nice treat.  Overall, just not my best   experience - front desk SO busy with tours that getting help was quite difficult as well.  When I did get there attention, though - very nice and helpful.  Thanks
Reason for Brand Question Rating: Have already stated my issues previously.   This is not the best example of   brand that I have experienced.  Thanks

I did LOVE the very nice people in the executive suite and having breakfast available there was a nice treat.  Overall, just not my best   experience - front desk SO busy with tours that getting help was quite difficult as well.  When I did get there attention, though - very nice and helpful.  Thanks

Name: FERNANDO

Reason for Brand Question Rating: Todo como lo imagine. Nada que cambiar

Name: MOHAMMED
Overall Comment: They give me for my first night a single size bed room while I reserved a double. After a long travel from NY to Bueno Aires I had a terrible night with a small and stinky bed.
Translated Overall Comment: They give me for my first night a single size bed room while I reserved a double. After a long travel from NY to Bueno Aires I had a terrible night with a small and stinky bed.

Name: ELIZABETH
Overall Comment: Todo estuvo muy bien.  A excepción de la Srita Luciana que es déspota y grosera. Agradezco especialmente al joven Juan Manuel Munari su amable y gran atención en la Recepción. Muy atento a todos los detalles, con una gran sonrisa y actitud de servicio para la satisfacción del cliente. Muchas Felicidades a Juan Manuel. Más jóvenes como Él se requieren en la Recepción.

I would especially like to thank young Juan Manuel Munari for his kindness and great attention at the Reception. He was very attentive to all the details, with a big smile and a service attitude for customer satisfaction. Congratulations to Juan Manuel. More young people like him are needed at the Reception.

Name: ROGELIO
Overall Comment: Todo excelente
Translated Overall Comment: Everything is excellent

Name: MARCOS
Overall Comment: Excelente ubicación, excelente servicio.
Translated Overall Comment: Excellent location, excellent service.

Name: JOHN
Overall Comment:
First of we didn’t get into our room until 7:00 pm because they have extended the previous guest hours. So instead of giving them another room, they put us in another room which we didn’t appreciate. If you do a booking here make sure you ask for the new side of the hotel. The old room are a 5 not a 10. Needs upgrades everywhere possible.
At the end we needed one of the room for late check out until 7:00 pm and they denied it ( even though the first day we had to wait until 7:00 pm to che into our!!!). They wanted to charge us for half of the price. Only gave us the room until 4:00 pm
I was not happy with the service regarding this specific issue.
Great location but over priced for the type of old rooms we got.
Reason for Brand Question Rating:
I already explained before my experience. Not good. Not only the wait but the rooms were old and outdated.
Beds not comfortable.

First of we didn’t get into our room until 7:00 pm because they have extended the previous guest hours. So instead of giving them another room, they put us in another room which we didn’t appreciate. If you do a booking here make sure you ask for the new side of the hotel. The old room are a 5 not a 10. Needs upgrades everywhere possible.

Overall Comment: Excellent customer service, dedicated to detail.

Name: STUARDO
Overall Comment: el internet en los cuartos era muy lento
Translated Overall Comment: The internet in the rooms was very slow

Name: SANDRA
Overall Comment: Nos entregaron la habitación casi las 20hrs desde las 13y30hrs que llegamos..alquilé habitación para 3 me dieron para 2personas tenia que compartir toallas ext..reclame un montón de veces y no tuve respuesta,el último día me entregaron 60 dolares que me pareció muy poca la diferencia,no me entregaron lo que pagué.. me vine muy angustiada ...!
Reason for Brand Question Rating: Buen día.. llegamos a las 13y30..hrs y nos entregaron la habitación 19y45hrs..pague una habitación para 3 perdonas,me dieron todo para 2personas..fuimos a desayunar y estaba agendada 2 personas''mal momento lal explicar''fui continuamente a reclamar otra habitación nunca tuvimos respuesta..llegamos a compartir toalla porque éramos 3 y todo teníamos de a 2..el último día me devuelve 60 dolares el hotel..creo que no fue correcto...pensé  en pasar unos días maravillosos y no lo logramos..una pena,pensé que esos días pasar divino,eligiendo un hotel a ese nivel y nunca imagine pasar así.. muchas gracias.!
Translated Overall Comment: They gave us the room at almost 8pm, since we arrived at 1:30pm... I rented a room for 3 people, they gave me one for 2 people, I had to share towels etc... I complained a ton of times and got no response, the last day they gave me 60 dollars which seemed like a very small difference, they didn't give me what I paid... I came back very distressed...!

Name: ROBERTO
Overall Comment: Great personnel and fantastic service

Name: MATIAS

Name: HASAN

Overall Comment:

Las instalaciones como siempre.

Translated Overall Comment: They gave us a very comfortable room. The facilities were as usual.

Name: MARIA
Overall Comment:
Buenas noches.
Tengo un par de criticas constructivas para hacerle al hotel.
primero que nada la temperatura del agua de la piscina dejaba mucho que desear estaba fría y a pesar de los constantes reclamos de nuestra parte en los 5 días nunca mejoro en lo mas mínimo se tuvieron en cuenta nuestros reclamos.
Y por otra parte nuestra "cama matrimonial" que no lo fue en toda la estadía estaba formada por dos partes de una plaza las cuales se separaban al acostarnos con mi marido.
Reason for Brand Question Rating: Se nota el esfuerzo pero algunos detalles se podrían mejorar y tener un poco mas en cuenta los comentarios de los huéspedes al estar en el hotel no después que se retiran con una encuesta.
Translated Overall Comment: Good evening. I have a couple of constructive criticisms to make about the hotel. First of all, the temperature of the pool water left a lot to be desired, it was cold and despite our constant complaints over the 5 days it never improved in the slightest, our complaints were not taken into account. On the other hand, our "double bed" which was not a double bed during the entire stay was made up of two single parts which separated when my husband and I went to bed.

Name: JAMES
Overall Comment: The staff was very friendly and took care of everything I needed!
Translated Overall Comment: The staff was very friendly and took care of everything I needed!

Name: AGUSTIN
Overall Comment: La atención fue siempre excelente por parte de todo el personal. Siempre dispuestos a ayudar y hacer la estancia los más agradable posible en el más mínimo detalle. Las instalaciones del hotel para el relax (pileta/gimnasio) se encuentran a mi parecer muy bien gestionadas. Solo como detalle: demasiado ruido proveniente tanto del pasillo como de otras habitaciones. Se debería revisar la insonorización de las habitaciones.
Reason for Brand Question Rating: Las instalaciones son adecuadas y el personal muy profesional y predispuesto.
Translated Overall Comment: The service was always excellent from all the staff. Always willing to help and make the stay as pleasant as possible down to the smallest detail. The hotel's facilities for relaxation (swimming pool/gym) are, in my opinion, very well managed. Just one detail: too much noise coming from both the hallway and other rooms. The soundproofing of the rooms should be checked.

Name: GONZALO
Overall Comment: A very nice and comfortable room.
Reason for Brand Question Rating: Kindness and courtesy of the staff. very comfortable room
Translated Overall Comment: A very nice and comfortable room.

Name: THAIS
Overall Comment: I was charged twice !!! One with the credit card i gave for the reservation and with the credit card i checked out !!!!!!!
Reason for Brand Question Rating: Não concordo. Pessima organização de checkin e checkout. Agendei taxi pro aeroporto quando desci ninguem havia chamado, esperei mais de 20 minutos pro motorista chegar e acabei pedindo uber senao ia perder o voo. Fora isso fui cobrada no cartao de credito que usei pra fazer checking (garantia) e fui cobrada de novo no cartao que usei pra fazer o checkout !!!!!!!!
Translated Overall Comment: I was charged twice !!! One with the credit card i gave for the reservation and with the credit card i checked out !!!!!!!

Name: FERNANDO
Overall Comment: Excelente el hotel, el desayuno y la cena. Puntos a mejorar las toallas y batas del Spa y la insonorización de la habitación por los aires acondicionados, estaba en la hab 911.
Reason for Brand Question Rating: Las instalaciones del hotel son excelentes al igual que la comida
Translated Overall Comment: Excellent hotel, breakfast and dinner. Points to improve are the towels and bathrobes in the Spa and the soundproofing of the room due to the air conditioning. I was in room 911.

Name: CAROLINA
Overall Comment: excelente todo
Translated Overall Comment: Excellent everything

Name: MARIA
Overall Comment:
Buenas tardes, gracias por contactarme y querer saber mi opinión.
La realidad es que fui con muchas expectativas y mucho entusiasmo pero volví bastante decepcionada. 
Llegue 15:45 hs aprox y me dicen que la habitación no estaba disponible. Consulto si el check in era 15 hs ya que creí que me había confundido y que había llegado antes, la persona que me atiende me indica que efectivamente es a las 15 hs pero que como contaban con mucha demanda todavía no estaba lista. Acepto ya que podía suceder. Me pide DNI de las personas que nos íbamos a hospedar, en este caso yo y mi hijo de 9 años. Me indica que debe tomar copias de nuestros DNI y quedárselas. Se los lleva y demora bastante en volver. Decido alejarme de la recepción y sentarme a esperar. Cuando regresa me dice que no puede cobrarme ni tomar la habitación ya que el sistema no se lo permitía. Acepto y le digo que espero. Luego de unos minutos sin explicarme nada me pide una tarjeta de crédito como garantía (lo normal de cualquier hotel) pero no me indica el valor por el que va a hacer la pre-autorización, ni me lo muestra, ni me dice que luego lo anularían ni nada, solo pasa la tarjeta y se queda con él voucher. Le explico que no prefería pagar mi estadía con esa tarjeta sino que voy a realizar el pago en efectivo. En ese momento queda disponible la habitación y puede tomarla. No me indica el tipo de cambio, solo me dice que son $90465.-, le doy $90500.- y me dice que no cuenta con cambio para darme el vuelto. Le digo que no hay problema, asumo que es un importe menor. Me dice que no me puede dar la factura, que me la va a enviar a la habitación, le digo que no hay problema sin embargo la factura jamás me llego. 
Me voy a la habitación, la asignada fue la Nro 1230, un tanto decepcionada por la mala impresión inicial.
Al día siguiente me retiro, la chica que me atiende no me presta demasiada atención. Le pido la factura indicándole que no me la habían dado ni enviado a la habitación. Me la pone en un sobre, me la entrega y se dirige a atender a otra persona. 
El día viernes 21 me contacta el banco emisor de mi tarjeta diciéndome que tenían pendiente un cobro de $120.000.- del día 18/07, les explico que seguramente había sido un bloqueo por parte del hotel y me indican que se encuentra pendiente de cobro que por favor me contacté con el hotel y revoquen ese voucher para que no se efectúe el cobro. La persona que me atiende por teléfono me dice que efectivamente fue una preutorizacion y no un cobro que ma va a enviar por mail la anulación de ese voucher y la factura que yo había abonado en efectivo. Recibí al mail el voucher que indicaba pre autorizacion. No estaba la factura que yo había abonado pero de todos modos yo la tenía física en papel.
Esperaba mucho más del hotel en cuanto a la atención, las instalaciones muy prolijas, todo muy limpio y ordenado, confortable y agradables los ambientes. 
Agradezco la cordialidad de tomarse su tiempo para leer mi experiencia.
Saludos.
Translated Overall Comment: Good afternoon, thank you for contacting me and wanting to know my opinion. The truth is that I went with high expectations and enthusiasm but I came back quite disappointed. I arrived at approximately 3:45 p.m. and they told me that the room was not available. I asked if check-in was at 3 p.m. since I thought I had made a mistake and that I had arrived earlier. The person who helped me told me that it was indeed at 3 p.m. but that since they were expecting a lot of demand, it was not ready yet. I accepted since it could happen. He asked me for the ID of the people who were going to stay, in this case me and my 9-year-old son. He told me that he should take copies of our IDs and keep them. He takes them and takes a long time to return. I decide to leave the reception and sit down to wait. When he returns he tells me that he cannot charge me or take the room since the system did not allow it. I accepted and told him that I would wait. After a few minutes without explaining anything, he asks me for a credit card as a guarantee (normal for any hotel) but he doesn't tell me the amount for which he is going to make the pre-authorization, nor does he show it to me, nor does he tell me that they would cancel it later or anything, he just swipes the card and keeps the voucher. I explain to him that I did not prefer to pay for my stay with that card but that I am going to make the payment in cash. At that moment the room becomes available and he can take it. He doesn't tell me the exchange rate, he only tells me that it is $90,465.-, I give him $90,500.- and he tells me that he doesn't have change to give me the change. I tell him that there is no problem, I assume that it is a smaller amount. He tells me that he cannot give me the invoice, that he will send it to the room, I tell him that there is no problem, however the invoice never arrived. I go to the room, the one assigned was number 1230, somewhat disappointed by the initial bad impression. The next day I checked out, and the girl who helped me didn't pay much attention to me. I asked for the invoice, telling her that it hadn't been given to me or sent to my room. She put it in an envelope, gave it to me, and went to help someone else. On Friday the 21st, the bank that issued my card contacted me telling me that they had a pending charge of $120,000.- from 07/18. I explained to them that it had probably been blocked by the hotel and they told me that it was pending collection and that I should please contact the hotel and revoke that voucher so that the charge wouldn't be made. The person who helped me on the phone told me that it was indeed a pre-authorization and not a charge and that she was going to send me by email the cancellation of that voucher and the invoice that I had paid in cash. I received the voucher that indicated pre-authorization by email. The invoice that I had paid wasn't there, but I had it in physical form on paper anyway. I expected much more from the hotel in terms of service, the facilities were very neat, everything was very clean and tidy, comfortable and the rooms were pleasant. I appreciate the kindness of taking the time to read my experience. Greetings.

Name: ELEONORA
Overall Comment:
Muy buena atención en todo el hotel.
Personal muy amable y dispuesto a colaborar y siempre con resoluciones certeras
Translated Overall Comment: Very good service throughout the hotel. Very friendly and helpful staff, always with accurate resolutions.

Name: VIANNEY
Overall Comment:
La cama super cómoda. El desayuno muy completo y rico. 
El cuarto muy amplio y bien equipado. La secadora de cabello podría ser mejor (la falta potencia).
Padrísima vista al obelisco desde la alberca.
Excelente ubicación.
Translated Overall Comment: The bed was super comfortable. The breakfast was very complete and delicious. The room was very spacious and well equipped. The hair dryer could be better (it lacks power). A great view of the obelisk from the pool. Excellent location.

Name: ROSSANA
Overall Comment: Nos gustó mucho el hotel. Excelente ubicación, limpieza y sobretodo el personal.
Reason for Brand Question Rating:
Elegimos   por conocer la marca y saber la calidad que vamos a encontrar.
Lo mejor del hotel es su personal. Todos muy amables y atenciosos. El precio está un poco por encima de lo esperado, pero el hotel es muy recomendable.
Translated Overall Comment: We really liked the hotel. Excellent location, cleanliness and especially the staff.

Name: FREDERICO
Overall Comment: Hotel’s in a great location and has a superb indoor rooftop pool. Rooms are spacious and staff are attentive. I did have problems with the Wi-Fi and very limited room service options, at some point they also did not allow charging my room. (Probably afraid I would not be able to pay.) My room had two TV and neither one had any available channels. Housekeeping was occasionally very late to make the room. I would come back mainly for the location but there’s many needs for improvements.
Reason for Brand Question Rating: I agree they have potential to be best hotel in Buenos Aires but there’s many things to be done. Also do not say my room was upgraded when it’s not. I don’t mind not being upgraded but when you tell me I was, I create an expectation.
Translated Overall Comment: Hotel’s in a great location and has a superb indoor rooftop pool. Rooms are spacious and staff are attentive. I did have problems with the Wi-Fi and very limited room service options, at some point they also did not allow charging my room. (Probably afraid I would not be able to pay.) My room had two TV and neither one had any available channels. Housekeeping was occasionally very late to make the room. I would come back mainly for the location but there’s many needs for improvements.

Name: MIGUEL
Overall Comment: Todo perfecto!!!!! Personal,piscina resto, atención, habitacion.....todo 10 puntos
Reason for Brand Question Rating: El compromiso que tienen con el huésped es de excelencia
Translated Overall Comment: Everything was perfect!!!!! Staff, pool, rest, service, room.....everything was 10 points

Name: CRISTIAN
Overall Comment:
La estancia fue regular, la habitación era std, nada para objetar. El descanso fue malo, era habitación con puerta hacia otra habitación y hubo ruidos todo el tiempo. También estaba frente al ascensor, lo que no ayudó.
A partir de ahora solicitaré habitación alejada del ascensor y sin puerta lateral ya que yo voy a trabajar y así no me sirve.
Reason for Brand Question Rating: Ya está en el otro comentario
Translated Overall Comment: The stay was average, the room was standard, nothing to complain about. The rest was bad, it was a room with a door to another room and there was noise all the time. It was also in front of the elevator, which didn't help. From now on I will request a room far from the elevator and without a side door since I am going to work and that is not good for me.

Name: ANA
Overall Comment:
Excelente el piso 23 y la propuesta desayuno.
Revisaría la calidad de las sábanas, son duras, ruidosas
Translated Overall Comment: The 23rd floor and the breakfast proposal are excellent. I would check the quality of the sheets, they are hard, noisy

Name: MARTIN
Overall Comment: Problemas con el horario del check in 5 horas de retraso en darnos una de las habitaciones , no funcionaba el hidromasaje de las bañeras .Los funcionarios muy amables,  y serviciales. Desayuno  muy completo
Translated Overall Comment: Problems with the check-in time. 5 hours delay in giving us one of the rooms. The whirlpool in the bathtubs did not work. The staff were very friendly and helpful. Very complete breakfast.

Name: JOSEPH
Overall Comment: Superior Service!! Beautiful rooms, & lobby! Breakfast was excellent!!
Translated Overall Comment: Superior Service!! Beautiful rooms, & lobby! Breakfast was excellent!!

Name: LILIAN
Overall Comment: Muy buena atención y la parte gastronómica. Falta mantenimiento en las habitaciones, no funcionaba la pava eléctrica. La cafetera regular. Funcionaba definitivamente. No pudieron darnos la salida a las 16 hs. Cómo promocionaba el paquete. Pero estaba sujeto a disponibilidad. Recuerdo el lugar de hace unos años y no tuve la misma experiencia. No todo lo que esperaba.
Reason for Brand Question Rating: Si bien en su mayoría cobrió las espectativas no lo hizo del todo. Uno espera que esté todo de 10 en un hotel de estás características, precio y más perteneciendo a la cadena
Translated Overall Comment: Very good service and the gastronomic part. The rooms lack maintenance, the electric kettle did not work. The coffee maker was average. It definitely worked. They could not let us check out at 4 pm. As the package was advertised. But it was subject to availability. I remember the place from a few years ago and I did not have the same experience. Not everything I expected.

Name: MARIBEL
Overall Comment:
Personal muy amable 
Súper céntrica ubicación 
Habitaciones muy limpias
Nos encantó
Reason for Brand Question Rating: Todo el proceso es muy seguro
Translated Overall Comment: Very friendly staff Super central location Very clean rooms We loved it

Name: FEDERICO
Overall Comment:
Excelente todo !!!
Y los tragos se Jesús son los mejores de todo Buenos Aires!!!
Translated Overall Comment: Everything is excellent!!! And Jesús' drinks are the best in all of Buenos Aires!!!

Name: WILLIAM
Overall Comment: Great stay - rapid check-in, great location, very nice M Lounge, easy check-out.  And good value for money.
Reason for Brand Question Rating: Good value for money.  Great stay overall.  Professionally trained staff.
Translated Overall Comment: Great stay - rapid check-in, great location, very nice M Lounge, easy check-out.  And good value for money.

Name: TREVOR
Overall Comment:
Elevator stopped midway through using it on about the 16th floor. Apparently the power went out. Was one of the most scary experiences in my life.  WOW.  BAD!

My room has a hole cut out in the corner of it where someone put the wall board back in its place.  Very odd and uncomfortable to be honest. 

Shower design is bad. Water flows almost to the toilet.
Translated Overall Comment:
Elevator stopped midway through using it on about the 16th floor. Apparently the power went out. Was one of the most scary experiences in my life.  WOW.  BAD!

Name: CARREEN
Overall Comment:
Si bien el hotel está bien localizado, la habitación, que tenía vista a un muro, estaba envejecida, con detalles tales como: 
- la puerta del baño no cerraba, es más se abría por rebote y quedaba completamente abierta 
- ducha no cerraba bien y el agua salía con poca presión 
- descarga del Inodoro con poquísima agua.
Fuera eso, el personal amable
Reason for Brand Question Rating: La condición de la habitación dejaba mucho que desear
Translated Overall Comment: Although the hotel is well located, the room, which had a view of a wall, was dated, with details such as: - the bathroom door did not close, in fact it bounced open and remained completely open - the shower did not close properly and the water came out with little pressure - the toilet flushed with very little water. Apart from that, the friendly staff

Name: SERGIO
Overall Comment: Excelent
Translated Overall Comment: Excellent

Name: TALITA
Overall Comment: Os funcionários são ótimos, bem treinado e sempre sorridentes. Porém  as instalações são um tanto quanto desatualizadas, me venderam uma cama King, chegando no quarto eram duas camas de solteiro unidas, o banheiro estava tinha a sua banheira com a pintura descascando.
Reason for Brand Question Rating: A conservação do quarto deixou a desejar muito, sobretudo quando se busca uma cama confortável, é frustrante ter que dormir com em uma cama onde se juntaram 2 de solteiro tendo o desconforto da união das camas
Translated Overall Comment: The staff are great, well trained and always smiling. However, the facilities are somewhat outdated. They sold me a king-size bed, but when I got to the room there were two single beds pushed together. The bathroom had peeling paint on the bathtub.

Name: DANIEL
Overall Comment:
El hotel en muy buenas condiciones. Lo más destacado y digno de destacar es la cordial atención de todo el personal. Destacable  la atención de la operadora y del room service, del bar, los que atienden en la puerta. Personal dispuestos a atender al pasajero,eso no es tan usual de encontrar.
Súper recomendable y volveremos pronto seguramente
Reason for Brand Question Rating: Ya aclare que la experiencia fue muy satisfactoria. Destacable la cordialidad y la buena disposición de todo el personal en atender al pasajero
Translated Overall Comment: The hotel is in very good condition. The most outstanding and worth mentioning is the friendly attention of all the staff. The attention of the operator and room service, the bar, and those who serve at the door are remarkable. Staff willing to serve the passenger, which is not so common to find. Highly recommended and we will surely return soon.

Name: MARTIN
Overall Comment:
La verdad es que no fue lo que esperaba o lo que uno ve en las redes o vive en los eventos ... 

Muy lindo el espacio de la cena y muy rica la comida.
El trago con el tapeo no existió.

La calefaccion en las habitaciones, y digo las habitaciones porque probe 2 no existio jamas ... por eso tuve que esperar 1 hora y media a la medianoche para que mi madre y yo podamos descansar en un cuarto decente y calentitos.

El desayuno muy rico y también muy bien atendido, la piscina maravillosa.

Gracias x la torta y el champagne por mi cumpleaños.
Reason for Brand Question Rating:
Para mi falta control ... el gerente turno noche me hizo esperar media hora en pijama en la recepcion para recibirme y darme solucion a mi problema desp de esperar 1 hora sentados en la cama porque los recepcionistas no sabian donde meternos con calefaccion que funcione.
El muchacho de mantenimiento nos dijo que la calefaccion ya hacia varios dias que no funciona ... Q a los brasileros no les molesta pero me parece que una cadena asi no deberia tener estos problemas por eso el SHERATON LIBERTADOR no obtuvo la calificacion ...
Translated Overall Comment: The truth is that it was not what I expected or what one sees on the networks or experiences at events... The dinner space was very nice and the food was delicious. The drink with the tapas was non-existent. The heating in the rooms, and I say the rooms because I tried 2, never existed... that's why I had to wait 1 hour and a half at midnight for my mother and I to be able to rest in a decent and warm room. The breakfast was very delicious and also very well attended, the pool was wonderful. Thank you for the cake and champagne for my birthday.

Name: CHARLES
Overall Comment: Excellent service and facilities
Reason for Brand Question Rating: I can rely on   to be a quality experience 90% of my stays
Translated Overall Comment: Excellent service and facilities

Name: ALEXANDRE
Overall Comment: Estadia excelente! Quarto estava ótimo, muito espaçoso, limpo e confortável! Pessoal sempre muito educado e gentil.
Reason for Brand Question Rating: O serviço é sempre muito bom e a estrutura excelente. Contudo, a oferta de alimentos poderia ser mais variada (é repetitiva). A piscina e a sauna poderiam ficar abertos por mais tempo (ou até mesmo 24h), pois são espaços bons.
Translated Overall Comment: Excellent stay! Room was great, very spacious, clean and comfortable! Staff were always very polite and kind.

Overall Comment: Las instalacion son muy buenas y la atencion del personal es excelente.
Reason for Brand Question Rating: Calidad en los servicios y excelencia en la atencion

Overall Comment: Muy buena estadía.

Overall Comment: Muy contento con la ATENCIÓN y HOSPITALIDAD profesional del equipo de hotel  .

Translated Overall Comment: Very happy with the ATTENTION and professional HOSPITALITY of the hotel team.

Name: RISHI
Overall Comment: Good hotel, but definitely needs to pay attention to detail on walls (peeling papers,etc). Great location though!
Translated Overall Comment: Good hotel, but definitely needs to pay attention to detail on walls (peeling papers,etc). Great location though!

Name: HENDRICUS
Overall Comment: Tudo bom , só o banheiro q a água derrama para todo o piso, o chão do banheiro vira uma piscina
Translated Overall Comment: Everything is fine, except for the bathroom where water spills all over the floor, the bathroom floor turns into a swimming pool.

Name: MARIA
Overall Comment:
Excelente todo, las instalaciones, la ubicación, la vista que tuvimos hacia la ciudad, el trato del personal. Realmente de excelencia. 
El único inconveniente que tuvimos fue que al recibir el Welcome Drink se nos ofreció maní apto para celiacos, japonés de soja, con el cual se me fracturó una muela de lo duro que eran. Quizás conviene, para evitar accidentes, como el mío, ofrecer un maní común sin TACC o bien otra cosa, dado la dureza del mismo. Esto fue lo único que dificulto la estadía.
Reason for Brand Question Rating: Todo lo que se ofreció en la experiencia fue cumplido, con el plus de ciertas cortesías que se nos ofrecieron.
Translated Overall Comment: Everything was excellent, the facilities, the location, the view we had of the city, the treatment of the staff. Truly excellent. The only problem we had was that when we received the Welcome Drink they offered us gluten-free peanuts, Japanese soy, which fractured a tooth because they were so hard. Perhaps it is advisable, to avoid accidents like mine, to offer regular gluten-free peanuts or something else, given their hardness. This was the only thing that made the stay difficult.

Name: DONALIN
Overall Comment: While the hotel was nice the staff does not understand the benefits of a   member. I am platinum elite and my travels was book through gate1. While I understand I would not get any points for the stay they told me I was not entitled to any of my status perks. When I called the member line the told me I should still have access to my platinum elite benefits.  This I know as I travel a lot for work and pleasure  and stay loyal to the   brand. Didn’t like how I was treated.
Reason for Brand Question Rating: See my response in the previous box

Translated Overall Comment: They were very polite. Although the hotel interior felt a little old, the staff were very polite and would even help before we asked. It's a little expensive, but it's also a good idea to ask the hotel to provide a shuttle from the airport. The Obelisk is right in front of the hotel, and the street with the souvenir shops is nearby. I was worried about the security, but I enjoyed it!

me dieron la elección de tomar desayuno en la habitación, por el paquete relax pero solo mandaron café con leche medialunas y jugo. me pareció demasiado básico para un hotel de esta categoría.

Name: JUAN
Overall Comment:
Lo único que encuentro para criticar es que la cama eran 2 colchones (con diferente estado de conservación) cubiertos con un pillow demasiado fino, lo cual hacía despareja la cama, algo que a mi parecer no debiera suceder en un hotel de esa categoría.
