Reason for Brand Question Rating: La cama eran 2 colchones, con distinto desgaste, unidos por un pillow muy fino. La cama tenía un notorio desnivel entre un lado y el otro.
Translated Overall Comment: The only thing I find to criticize is that the bed was made up of 2 mattresses (in different states of repair) covered with a pillow that was too thin, which made the bed uneven, something that in my opinion should not happen in a hotel of this category. Otherwise everything was very good and the staff was very polite.

Name: SHERRY
Overall Comment: Enjoyed the pool; breakfast good; room clean and comfortable
Translated Overall Comment: Enjoyed the pool; breakfast good; room clean and comfortable

Name: YUNES
Overall Comment: Nice hotel. Great customer service
Translated Overall Comment: Nice hotel. Great customer service

Name: DIEGO
Overall Comment: buena
Translated Overall Comment: good

Name: FRANCISCO
Overall Comment:
Fue una experiencia maravillosa. Nos encantó la habitación y lo mejor por lejos fue el spa del piso 23 y sus hermosas vistas!

Pero para que sigan subiendo en los ratings, si, debo mencionar algunas situaciones que podrían estar mejor manejadas:

1) A la hora de cenar quisimos ir al Celtic Bar. Preguntamos en la recepción donde quedaba. Nos indicaron. Fuimos hasta allí y se encontraba vacío y con unas sogas en la entrada. Volvimos a la recepción y les contamos lo que encontramos y recién ahí averiguaron y se enteraron que estaba cerrado. No deberían saber de antemano que restaurantes o bares se encuentran abiertos y funcionado??

2) Cenamos en La Luciérnaga. Allí tuvimos 2 inconvenientes. 
El primero, luego de ingresar al restaurante nos sentamos en una mesa. A la cual nos trajeron el menú, luego nos acercaron una silla extra para que colocáramos la cartera. Una vez que vino el mozo y ordenamos la cena el propio mozo nos pidió que por favor nos cambiáramos de mesa ya que el se encontraba atendiendo en las mesas que se encontraban 3 filas más atrás!! Eso me pareció muy mal. Tener que levantarnos y cambiar de mesa luego de ordenar??? Esa situación fue la primera vez para mi- y muy incómoda.
El segundo inconveniente surgió cuando mi marido pidió el ojo de bife estilo argentino en su punto jugoso. El bife lamentablemente lo trajeron cocido la primera vez y aún más cocido la segunda vez. A raíz de todo esto, mi marido debió pedirse un plato de pasta (que según el estuvo delicioso) pero la experiencia de cena fue tremendamente mala ya que mientras yo comía mi plato principal mi marido me tuvo que mirar (sin tener el su plato para cenar) y mientras el ceno yo lo mire comer ya que yo ya había terminado con mi plato. Cenamos a destiempo.
Translated Overall Comment: It was a wonderful experience. We loved the room and the best thing by far was the spa on the 23rd floor and its beautiful views! But to keep them going up in the ratings, yes, I must mention some situations that could be better handled: 1) At dinner time we wanted to go to the Celtic Bar. We asked at the reception where it was. They told us. We went there and it was empty and had ropes at the entrance. We went back to the reception and told them what we found and only then did they find out and find out that it was closed. Shouldn't they know in advance which restaurants or bars are open and functioning?? 2) We had dinner at La Luciérnaga. There we had 2 problems. The first, after entering the restaurant we sat at a table. They brought us the menu, then they brought us an extra chair so we could put our purse on it. Once the waiter came and we ordered dinner, the waiter himself asked us to please change tables since he was serving the tables that were 3 rows behind us!! I thought that was very bad. Having to get up and change tables after ordering??? That situation was a first for me - and very uncomfortable. The second inconvenience arose when my husband ordered the Argentinean-style rib eye, cooked to perfection. Unfortunately, the steak was cooked the first time and even more cooked the second time. As a result of all this, my husband had to order a pasta dish (which according to him was delicious) but the dinner experience was tremendously bad since while I was eating my main dish, my husband had to watch me (without having his dinner plate) and while he was eating dinner, I watched him eat since I had already finished my plate. We had dinner at the wrong time.

Name: CAMILA
Overall Comment: Es muy bueno, no tuvimos buena experiencia con el restaurant pero calculo que fue una cuestión ocasional.
Translated Overall Comment: It's very good, we didn't have a good experience with the restaurant but I guess it was an occasional issue.

Name: ANA
Overall Comment: Pésima experiencia, nos robaron dólares desde las valijas y mochilas el primer día y no respondieron! Lo peor que a otro pasajero también le robaron dinero. No nos dieron ninguna solución. Nosotros optamos por irnos por la falta de empatía y solución a sus huéspedes. Jamás volvería y tampoco lo recomendaría.
Reason for Brand Question Rating: Lo elegí por ser una cadena conocida en mi país, pero acá decepciona la poca seguridad y poca seriedad ante las necesidades de los huéspedes. Nos robaron dólares desde las maletas y mochilas y no recibimos ninguna ayuda
Translated Overall Comment: Terrible experience, they stole dollars from our suitcases and backpacks on the first day and they didn't respond! The worst thing is that they also stole money from another passenger. They didn't give us any solution. We decided to leave because of the lack of empathy and solution for their guests. I would never go back and I wouldn't recommend it either.

Name: WALTER
Overall Comment:
Excelente por donde se lo mire! Es la cuarta vez que nos alojamos y siempre con ganas de volve! 
Yo le agregaría aunque sea unas plantas verdes al patio contiguo a la piscina. Solárium. Ya que da una sensación de vacío cuando vas para ese lugar. Desde la piscina o caminando. Acotación muy fina porque el resto impecable!!!
Translated Overall Comment: Excellent from any angle! This is the fourth time we have stayed here and we always want to come back! I would add at least some green plants to the patio next to the pool. Solarium. Because it gives a feeling of emptiness when you go to that place. From the pool or walking. A very fine comment because the rest is impeccable!!!

Name: ADRIANA
Overall Comment: El hotel impecable, limpio, la atención de primera, excelente experiencia!
Translated Overall Comment: The hotel was impeccable, clean, the service was first class, an excellent experience!

Name: SILVINA
Overall Comment: Fue una excelente experiencia, excelente atención de todo el personal. Volveríamos sin duda!
Reason for Brand Question Rating: Es un hotel de gran nivel con excelente atención
Translated Overall Comment: It was an excellent experience, excellent service from all the staff. We would definitely come back!

Name: CARLOS
Overall Comment:
Muy buena atención!!!
Solicitamos una silla, solicitamos se revisara el aire acondicionado, todo fue atendido rápido y bien.
Nos pareció un poco chica la habitación, la próxima vez veremos de reservar una habitación mayor.
Reason for Brand Question Rating: La marca es bien reconocible, la decoración, el servicio, son de un estilo bien de hotel tipo USA.
Translated Overall Comment: Very good service!!! We asked for a chair, we asked for the air conditioning to be checked, everything was attended to quickly and well. The room seemed a little small to us, next time we will try to book a larger room.

Name: DIEGO
Overall Comment:
Encontramos una bebida en el frigobar vencida.
El hotel no posee hidromasaje en el spa.
El agua de la piscina fría.
Translated Overall Comment: We found an expired drink in the minibar. The hotel does not have a whirlpool in the spa. The pool water is cold.

Name: OSCAR
Overall Comment: location and staff
Translated Overall Comment: location and staff

Name: MARCEL
Overall Comment: Room service was late and cold, offered me ice cream as remedy. Not an acceptable offer in my opinion
Reason for Brand Question Rating: Late arriving, cold room service, no bottled water in   lounge. No extra water when requested
Translated Overall Comment: Room service was late and cold, offered me ice cream as remedy. Not an acceptable offer in my opinion

Name: JULIA
Overall Comment: Todo perfecto
Translated Overall Comment: Everything is perfect

Name: MARIA
Overall Comment: LA INFORMACION EN LA PAGINA WEB NO ES LO SUFICIENTEMENTE CLARA AL MOMENTO DE HACER UNA RESERVA
Reason for Brand Question Rating: Comparado con otros  s, la calidad del los desayunos y el estado de las instalaciones podrian mejorar
Translated Overall Comment: THE INFORMATION ON THE WEBSITE IS NOT CLEAR ENOUGH WHEN MAKING A RESERVATION

Name: GASTON
Overall Comment: Primera vez en el hotel. Todo muy lindo y muy cuidado. La piscina espectacular la mejor de las que he conocido en hoteles de buenos aires. La habitación familiar super amplia y confortable. El servicio de desayuno justo, pensé que por la calidad del hotel y el costo por noche de alojamiento el desayuno iba a ser sobresaliente pero fue normal e igual a hoteles de menor nivel
Reason for Brand Question Rating: El desayuno mejorable de acuerdo al nivel del hotel. Esperamos algo de mayor calidad y sobresaliente a los demás hoteles que visitamos en buenos aires
Translated Overall Comment: First time at the hotel. Everything was very nice and well kept. The pool was spectacular, the best I have seen in hotels in Buenos Aires. The family room was super spacious and comfortable. The breakfast service was fair. I thought that for the quality of the hotel and the cost per night of accommodation the breakfast would be outstanding, but it was average and the same as in lower level hotels.

Name: CARLOS
Overall Comment:
Todo impecable , habitación , limpieza , personal del hotel , desayuno , la verdad un hotel súper recomendable , volveremos sin dudarlo.
Gracias !
Reason for Brand Question Rating: Todo lo que leí y esperaba recibir fue tal cual así , por tanto todo lo que se menciona en su presentación se cumple en todas la medidas
Translated Overall Comment: Everything was impeccable, the room, cleanliness, hotel staff, breakfast, the truth is a highly recommended hotel, we will return without hesitation. Thank you!

Name: JAVIER
Overall Comment:
As a platinum , the stay was one of the best . The staff at the hotel is extremely professional and kind. 
Will be joining as a guest again hopefully soon.
Reason for Brand Question Rating: This was the best stay , compared to a US counterpart, the hote;'s customer service is so much better.
Translated Overall Comment:
As a platinum , the stay was one of the best . The staff at the hotel is extremely professional and kind. 
Will be joining as a guest again hopefully soon.

Name: SERGIO
Overall Comment:
Impecale el desayuno, muy variado y completo.
El restaurante tiene pocas opciones vegetarianas/veganas pero las que tiene son muy ricas.
El gimansio muy completo, la pileta climatizada es espectacular.
Reason for Brand Question Rating: La exerpiencia es muy buena de alojarse allí, faltan pulir detalles nomás para un 10
Translated Overall Comment: The breakfast was impeccable, very varied and complete. The restaurant has few vegetarian/vegan options but the ones it has are very tasty. The gym is very complete, the heated pool is spectacular.

Name: SERAME
Overall Comment:
My stay was really a good one only that my room for the number of days I was staying did not have a view. Hence the 7

The helpfulness of the staff was super
food was good
auditorium was good
Reason for Brand Question Rating: as indicated above - the room did not have a view based on the number of days I was standing in your hotel
Translated Overall Comment:
My stay was really a good one only that my room for the number of days I was staying did not have a view. Hence the 7

The helpfulness of the staff was super
food was good
auditorium was good

Name: ZACHARY
Overall Comment: Staff was great and very helpful. Room was clean
Reason for Brand Question Rating: Felt like a classic, downtown   property. Great staff, clean, multiple F&B venues. Was only there for a night, but enjoyed it
Translated Overall Comment: Staff was great and very helpful. Room was clean

Name: MARIANA
Overall Comment: Muy agradable, buena atencion desde la recepcion, incluido el restaurante, y el personal de limpieza muy atento.
Reason for Brand Question Rating: Todo estuvo bien, acorde a lo que esperaba en calidad de un hotel de esa categoria.
Translated Overall Comment: Very nice, good service from the reception, including the restaurant, and the cleaning staff was very attentive.

Name: MATTHEW
Overall Comment: M Club quality was quite low, room was not great and in somewhat dilapidated condition.  The Sheraton in BA is much better
Reason for Brand Question Rating: It's a fine hotel, just didnt live up to my expectations.
Translated Overall Comment: M Club quality was quite low, room was not great and in somewhat dilapidated condition.  The Sheraton in BA is much better

Name: EDUARDO
Overall Comment: Os quartos não possuim boa vedação nas portas, então toda a claridade do corredor deixa o quarto bem iluminado, o detector de fumaça pisca durante todo o tempo e o frigobar estava em mal funcionamento fazendo muito ruído.
Translated Overall Comment: The rooms do not have good seals on the doors, so all the light from the corridor leaves the room well lit, the smoke detector blinks all the time and the minibar was not working properly, making a lot of noise.

Name: MILENA
Overall Comment: Lo único que no recomendaría es el bar él servicios la tardanza en la entrega de las comidas y la comida .
Translated Overall Comment: The only thing I would not recommend is the bar, the services, the delay in the delivery of the meals and the food.

Name: VANESSALI
Overall Comment: Comoda, nada excepcional.
Reason for Brand Question Rating: A diferencia de otras ubicaciones, los cuartos son viejos y reducidos en tamaño. Solo es moderno en amenities pero no en las habitaciones
Translated Overall Comment: Comfortable, nothing exceptional.

Name: E
Overall Comment: Friendly professional staff and nice hotel.
Translated Overall Comment: Friendly professional staff and nice hotel.

Name: MARCOS
Overall Comment: Muy buena como simpre, voy todos los meses desde Uruguay y no los cambio. Muy buena la idea de colocar Jarras electricas! la verdad que por el momento son todas felicitaciones.
Translated Overall Comment: Very good as always, I go every month from Uruguay and I don't change them. The idea of installing electric jugs is very good! The truth is that for now it's all congratulations.

Name: ALFREDO
Overall Comment: Estuvimos con mi esposa un fin de semana. Muy agradable. Somos mayores. Disfrutamos la estadía. Nos sorprendió que no funcionara el yacuzzi.
Reason for Brand Question Rating: Todo bien. Nos sorprendió que no funcionara el yacuzzi
Translated Overall Comment: My wife and I stayed for a weekend. Very nice. We are older. We enjoyed the stay. We were surprised that the jacuzzi didn't work.

Name: ERNESTO
Overall Comment: Extremely happy and satisfied with my recent stay
Translated Overall Comment: Extremely happy and satisfied with my recent stay

Name: MARCOS
Overall Comment: Hay varias cosas que puede mejorar
Reason for Brand Question Rating: Encontré varios problemas de limpieza en la habitación. La tapa del tanque del WC estaba rota. Un día solo un ascensor funcionaba
Translated Overall Comment: There are several things that can be improved

Name: SETH
Overall Comment: Great experience! Friendly staff, clean facility!
Translated Overall Comment: Great experience! Friendly staff, clean facility!

Name: DIEGO
Overall Comment: Maravillosa !!!!
Translated Overall Comment: Wonderful!!!!

Name: THIAGO
Overall Comment: Estou com problema no depósito antecipado que ainda nao foi estornado para meu cartão de credito.
Reason for Brand Question Rating: Estou desconfortável por nao ter sido cancelada o deposito antecipado no meu cartão.
Translated Overall Comment: I have a problem with the advance deposit that has not yet been refunded to my credit card.

Name: OTTMAR
Overall Comment:
Alles war super der Direktor Herr 
Norberto war sehr zuvorkommend und  außergewöhnlich hilfsbereit! 
Ich kann nur sagen : 
Auf geht’s rein ins   ! 
Ich gehe Anfang nächsten Monat erneut für 10 Tage rein ! 
Das Schwimmbad ist super und der Blick über die Innenstadt von Buenos Aires ist ein Traum ! Von der Terrasse des Schwimmbades aus ist man fast auf gleicher Höhe mit dem Obelisken !!!
Reason for Brand Question Rating:
Sehr freundlich , Direktion super , Frühstück excelente , 
Alles bestens !!!
Translated Overall Comment: Everything was great, the director Mr. Norberto was very courteous and exceptionally helpful! All I can say is: let's go in! I'm going back at the beginning of next month for 10 days! The swimming pool is great and the view over downtown Buenos Aires is a dream! From the terrace of the swimming pool you are almost at the same height as the obelisk!!!

Name: MAURO
Overall Comment: Impecable, desde las habitaciones, las instalaciones en su conjunto y el trato del personal. De primera.
Reason for Brand Question Rating: Todo lo que uno espera encontrar en algo con esa ubicación y de 5 estrellas. Incluso muy sorprendido por las vistas desde el sector de la pileta, y las instalaciones
Translated Overall Comment: Impeccable, from the rooms, the facilities as a whole and the treatment of the staff. First class.

Name: ROMINA
Overall Comment: It was very frustrating from the beginning that we requested a room that had a bathroom with ventilation (air extractor, anything) every day I would be told that they were at capacity. I’ve stay for 7 nights. You would think that at some point they would save a room with the same qualities that had air extractor in the bathroom but no. It did not happened. I felt I was getting played. The manager would call me and said that he’d find a solution that day but nothing. The bathroom with air circulating, it was like a sauna and stayed like that for over 2 hours. All the vapor would come inside the bedroom. I told them that my dad was getting sick from it. No one care, they didn’t not do anything. They wanted to give me a smaller room with tiny twin beds but with the air extractor. How hard was to keep the same room but with the air extractor. I called at least 2, 3 times a day and nothing. Ridiculous, horrible customer service. The manager I believe was Roberto or Antonio said I could probably bring you a fan to the room. How cheap is that, awful suggestion. Well, they never changed my room so my dad and I are sick now. In addition, one night I showered with cold water, the heater was not working. The first night the sheets smelled dirty, I requested a changed. 2 nights after the sheets had stains. I asked for coffee to the room, it never showed up. They forgot it. I traveled all over and I never been in a situation were in 7 days can not fix a guest request. Nor try to accommodate the guest in some way maybe even after a day. They’d tell me oh by tomorrow and just like that they played me every day. I’d leave notes for the manager and nothing. It’s sad because it’s a beautiful hotel. The bell desk guys were lovely. But my room was a sauna and now me and my dad are sick

Name: DANIEL
Overall Comment: Pela localização e atendimento recomendo. Mas pela cobrança indevida duas vezes no meu cartão, não recomendo.
Reason for Brand Question Rating: Me decepcionei com a cobrança por duas vezes no meu cartão de crédito.
Translated Overall Comment: I recommend it for its location and service. However, I do not recommend it due to the fact that my card was charged twice, which was unduly charged.

Name: EDGARDO
Overall Comment:
Me hospedé varias veces, desde que era Intercontinental. 
 La habitación que me asignaron en el ala sur, muy moderna pero sin vistas. Siempre había ido a habitaciones al frente
Translated Overall Comment: I stayed here several times, since it was Intercontinental. The room I was assigned was in the south wing, very modern but without a view. I had always gone to rooms facing the front.

Name: GARY
Overall Comment: Staff was friendly and helpful.  Bernice accommodations.
Translated Overall Comment: Staff was friendly and helpful.  Bernice accommodations.

Name: CLAUDIA
Overall Comment: Espectacular, excelente servicio!!!!!
Translated Overall Comment: Spectacular, excellent service!!!!!

Name: NAILA
Overall Comment: Excelente. Muy buen trato. Desconfiados los empleados de la pileta porque preguntaron varias veces de que pieza éramos. El resto excelente
Translated Overall Comment: Excellent. Very good service. The pool employees were suspicious because they asked several times which room we were in. The rest was excellent.

Name: ADRIANA
Overall Comment: Muy buena atención, excelente servicio de habitación, lo único que fallo es que eramos 3 colegas y nos dijeron que no hay habitación triple,  pero así y todo excelente todo
Translated Overall Comment: Very good service, excellent room service, the only thing that was wrong was that we were 3 colleagues and they told us that there were no triple rooms, but even so, everything was excellent.

Name: MYRIAM
Overall Comment: Excelente atencion con todos los servicios
Translated Overall Comment: Excellent service with all services

Name: JOAO
Overall Comment:
No geral o hotel é muito bom, um dos melhores de Buenos Aires.
Só precisa melhorar um pouco a manutenção dos quartos.
Translated Overall Comment: Overall the hotel is very good, one of the best in Buenos Aires. It just needs to improve the maintenance of the rooms a little.

Name: MARIO
Overall Comment: fue muy buena, el personal del desayuno extraordinariamente atento, el check in y check out muy rapido y gente muy educada.... la habitacion muy buena ... el frigo bar con bebidas gratis fue muy bien recibido.... la mucama de nuestra habitacion (1123) de la torre norte muy afectuosa, diligente, profesional. Hotel muy bien ubicado! solo sugiero que el bar este abierto hasta mas tarde (entiendo que es hasta la 1AM... sugiero 2AM)
Reason for Brand Question Rating: ya la entregue en la 1ra pregunta
Translated Overall Comment: It was very good, the breakfast staff was extraordinarily attentive, check in and check out was very fast and the people were very polite.... the room was very good... the mini bar with free drinks was very well received.... the maid in our room (1123) in the north tower was very affectionate, diligent, professional. The hotel is very well located! I only suggest that the bar be open later (I understand that it is until 1 AM... I suggest 2 AM)

Name: LUIS
Overall Comment:
ESTIMADOS :  MI ESTADIA FUE MUY RECONFORTABLE 
MUY BUENA ATENCION
Reason for Brand Question Rating: MUY BUENA ATENCION Y CALIDEZ DE SU PERSONAL
Translated Overall Comment: DEAR: MY STAY WAS VERY COMFORTABLE, VERY GOOD SERVICE

Overall Comment: Placentera.
Reason for Brand Question Rating: Excelente nivel, acorde a la marca.
Translated Overall Comment: Pleasant.

Name: SERGIO
Overall Comment: Everything is perfect
Reason for Brand Question Rating: Perfect location ( I had tickets for the Colon Theatre ), excellent rooms, nice staff, 🤗
Translated Overall Comment: Everything is perfect

Overall Comment:
Estancia excelente.limpieza.atencion de los empleados.excelente desayuno
Muy satisfecha
Translated Overall Comment: Excellent stay. Cleanliness. Attention of the employees. Excellent breakfast. Very satisfied.

Name: VERONICA
Overall Comment: Excelente!!!!
Reason for Brand Question Rating: Una excelente atención, la limpieza supera cualquier hotel, el perfume en todo el hotel, la atención de toda su gente....volvería mil veces!!!
Translated Overall Comment: Excellent!!!!

Name: ANA
Overall Comment:
Hotel cómodo,  hermoso, bien ubicado,  el personal muy respetuoso. 
Excelente
Translated Overall Comment: Comfortable, beautiful hotel, well located, very respectful staff. Excellent

Name: GUIMPELEVIC
Overall Comment: Muy buena. Agradable. Excelente. Muy complacido.
Reason for Brand Question Rating: Porque fui excelentemente atendido. Todos los servicios funcionan.
Translated Overall Comment: Very good. Pleasant. Excellent. Very pleased.

Name: GABRIELA
Overall Comment: Excelente! Todo muy lindo! Mucha amabilidad. Realmente para disfrutar!!!
Reason for Brand Question Rating: Me sentí muy cómoda  ,pude disfrutar de mis amistades en un Congreso de formación y actualización  y a su vez descansar en silencio  y disfrutar de las áreas de relax.  Buenas instalaciones  y muy amable todo el personal
Translated Overall Comment: Excellent! Everything was very nice! Very friendly. Really worth enjoying!!!

Name: JUAN
Overall Comment: Simplemente excelente, el check-in 10 puntos , los trabajadores siempre atentos al requerimiento
Translated Overall Comment: Simply excellent, the check-in was 10 points, the workers were always attentive to the request.

Name: MARTIN
Overall Comment:
Muy Cómodo y bien atendido.
Para destacar el servicio de los chicos de Parking que son de gran calidez y hasta se acuerdan el nombre del cliente incluso desde la primer interacción.
Sólo una observación. Bajando a desayunar uno de los días me quedé encerrado en el ascensor, el cual me llevó a los saltos hasta el subsuelo (experiencia muy desagradable) y luego no me dejó salir. Solicité asistencia al intercomunicador y luego de un rato y alguna maniobra de  mantenimiento (supongo, ya que nadie se comunicó conmigo) el ascensor subió sólo hasta el piso 18 donde se abrieron las puertas, salí y bajé por la escalera de emergencia. Informé el hecho en recepción. Más allá del hecho que el ascensor puede tener un desperfecto entendible como cualquier máquina pasible de fallas, hubiera esperado algo de preocupación por saber si estaba bien, sin contar el perjuicio del tiempo que perdí en este incidente. El único comentario que recibí al reportar posteriormente el hecho fue: ok, vamos a avisar que saquen de circulación ese ascensor.
Translated Overall Comment: Very comfortable and well attended. I would like to highlight the service of the guys at the Parking area who are very friendly and even remember the name of the client even from the first interaction. Just one observation. Going down to breakfast one day I got stuck in the elevator, which took me jumping down to the basement (very unpleasant experience) and then it wouldn't let me out. I asked for assistance on the intercom and after a while and some maintenance work (I suppose, since no one contacted me) the elevator only went up to the 18th floor where the doors opened, I got out and went down the emergency stairs. I reported the incident at reception. Beyond the fact that the elevator may have an understandable defect like any machine that is susceptible to failure, I would have expected some concern to know if it was okay, not to mention the loss of time I lost in this incident. The only comment I received when I later reported the incident was: OK, we are going to notify them to take that elevator out of circulation.

Name: CODY
Overall Comment: We enjoyed our stay there and the staff was very friendly and welcoming.  The only negative issue I experienced was the very small amount of hot water I had for my shower.  Unfortunately as an elite member, I was not allowed a late check out BUT I totally understand because the hotel was quite full and the front desk did allow me to take a quick shower after checkout time.  Like I said, the staff was quite friendly and helpful.  They were the best part of the stay!
Reason for Brand Question Rating: They did not disappoint and I am happy we stayed at the   Buenos Aires
Translated Overall Comment: We enjoyed our stay there and the staff was very friendly and welcoming.  The only negative issue I experienced was the very small amount of hot water I had for my shower.  Unfortunately as an elite member, I was not allowed a late check out BUT I totally understand because the hotel was quite full and the front desk did allow me to take a quick shower after checkout time.  Like I said, the staff was quite friendly and helpful.  They were the best part of the stay!

Name: MARIA
Overall Comment: Service, cleanliness and experience good. The bed was old with a huge hole. I didn’t ask for a change given my short stay
Reason for Brand Question Rating: I thought that   was synonym of quality. Didn’t expect to have an old bed and even taking consideration my level. In the same trip I stayed in a Hyatt and even though is not my prefer brand, received better room, amenities, view, etc
Translated Overall Comment: Service, cleanliness and experience good. The bed was old with a huge hole. I didn’t ask for a change given my short stay

Name: MARIA
Overall Comment: Ambiente agradable, comodo, centrico, trato del personal cordial
Translated Overall Comment: Pleasant, comfortable, central environment, friendly staff

Name: MARIA
Overall Comment: Room was clean and bed was very comfortable.  All of the staff were very friendly and helpful. The food was very good the entire week, except the eggs and other food were cold each morning in the lobby restaurant. The front desk staff, especially Augustin, and all of the staff working in the M Lounge were very pleasant and very eager to serve our needs. The water pressure in the shower was great. The room needs some updating though and didn’t have a sofa as was pictured online.
Reason for Brand Question Rating: Rooms and hotel need to be updated. There was a musty smell in the hallways upstairs.
Translated Overall Comment: Room was clean and bed was very comfortable.  All of the staff were very friendly and helpful. The food was very good the entire week, except the eggs and other food were cold each morning in the lobby restaurant. The front desk staff, especially Augustin, and all of the staff working in the M Lounge were very pleasant and very eager to serve our needs. The water pressure in the shower was great. The room needs some updating though and didn’t have a sofa as was pictured online.

Overall Comment: The staff is very useful and friendly, the hotel is clean and it is located close to major attractions in BA.

Name: MARIA

Name: MARIA
Overall Comment: Estuvo todo muy bien. El desayuno, la atención del personal y la piscina del piso 23, excelente. Lo único que podría poner como contra son que las habitaciones, en su gran mayoría no tienen vista, o como en mi caso, tenía vista al edificio del lado

Todos muy amables , siempre a disposicion

volveremos en familia

Translated Overall Comment: Comfortable and convenient place. Excellent service, very friendly and attentive staff.

Name: MARIA
Overall Comment: La habitación estaba excelente. El restaurante y el club dejan mucho que desear, ya que son impersonales, con poca intimidad y con una oferta gastronómica reducida y de calidad media. Los camareros son muy atentos y serviciales.

Name: MARIA
Overall Comment:
Very friendly and professional staff.  Quick turnaround with questions or assistance I needed.  Excellent food and dining facilities.  Bar has the wide variety of treats.  Gorgeous view from the 23rd floor, decent swimming pool, good offer of treadmills equipment.

On the downside:  the room facilities require maintenance refresh/upgrade. Stucko cracks, windows not closing tight, etc. 

Gym equipment upstairs (power lifting room) has old equipment, it would be worth investing in a set of modern products like Technogym.

IT support: while staff is very friendly and eager to help, the equipment lags behind - guest WiFi hot spots work intermittently bad, I recommend to perform a wifi coverage survey and upgrade equipment accordingly.  Eventually I had to connect to the hotel IT department's wifi - which worked much more reliably.
Translated Overall Comment:
Very friendly and professional staff.  Quick turnaround with questions or assistance I needed.  Excellent food and dining facilities.  Bar has the wide variety of treats.  Gorgeous view from the 23rd floor, decent swimming pool, good offer of treadmills equipment.

On the downside:  the room facilities require maintenance refresh/upgrade. Stucko cracks, windows not closing tight, etc. 

Gym equipment upstairs (power lifting room) has old equipment, it would be worth investing in a set of modern products like Technogym.

IT support: while staff is very friendly and eager to help, the equipment lags behind - guest WiFi hot spots work intermittently bad, I recommend to perform a wifi coverage survey and upgrade equipment accordingly.  Eventually I had to connect to the hotel IT department's wifi - which worked much more reliably.

Name: MARIA
Overall Comment: Overall, I had a very nice stay at the Buenos Aires  .  I think, though, that it's time to refresh the guest rooms, they seem a bit outdated and tired.  In my room, 1214, the shower head placement was not good.  It directly in the middle of the tub which caused water to go all over the floor of the bathroom; also, if the water was to cold or too hot it meant stepping into the stream of water to adjust the controls.  This placement should be reconfigured.  Finally, I had European-style electrical plugs which didn't fit in the sockets in the room.  It would be nice to either upgrade the electrical sockets to universal-style (which allow multiple countries' plugs) or to have Argentina to European adapters available for guests to use.  I had to go and buy my own adapter (which, on a Sunday was quite a trek to find an open store).
Reason for Brand Question Rating: Overall, a very good and consistent stay at this hotel.
Translated Overall Comment: Overall, I had a very nice stay at the Buenos Aires  .  I think, though, that it's time to refresh the guest rooms, they seem a bit outdated and tired.  In my room, 1214, the shower head placement was not good.  It directly in the middle of the tub which caused water to go all over the floor of the bathroom; also, if the water was to cold or too hot it meant stepping into the stream of water to adjust the controls.  This placement should be reconfigured.  Finally, I had European-style electrical plugs which didn't fit in the sockets in the room.  It would be nice to either upgrade the electrical sockets to universal-style (which allow multiple countries' plugs) or to have Argentina to European adapters available for guests to use.  I had to go and buy my own adapter (which, on a Sunday was quite a trek to find an open store).

Name: MARIA
Overall Comment:
Es un gran hotel 5 estrellas ubicado en pleno centro de Buenos Aires frente al obelisco. El lobby es enorme y apto para reuniones en varios espacios con sillones. La recepción es pequeña, pero rápida con agua gratis para el pasajero y sillones cercanos. El restaurante está en el mismo lobby, al alcance.
Tiene 2 torres; la principal con 21 pisos y un Spa en el 23º. La atención a los pasajeros es cordial y rápida.
Las habitaciones son amplias, cuentan con escritorio y acceso a internet gratis. El baño es pequeño en las habitaciones standard. Cuenta con agua caliente con gran presión.
Los ascensores son rápidos.
El Spa está en el techo: cuenta con piscina con agua caliente y un pequeño espacio al aire libre en una terraza con gran vista a la ciudad. Desde los ventanales del Spa se ven imágenes de la ciudad imperdibles. El gimnasio está ubicado más arriba con excelentes vistas. Cuenta con sauna y espacios para masajes.
El desayuno está incluido en el restaurant del lobby; con muy buena oferta para iniciar el día.
Translated Overall Comment: This is a large 5-star hotel located in the heart of Buenos Aires, in front of the obelisk. The lobby is huge and suitable for meetings in various spaces with armchairs. The reception is small, but fast with free water for the passenger and armchairs nearby. The restaurant is in the same lobby, within reach. It has 2 towers; the main one with 21 floors and a Spa on the 23rd. Customer service is friendly and fast. The rooms are spacious, have a desk and free internet access. The bathroom is small in the standard rooms. It has hot water with great pressure. The elevators are fast. The Spa is on the roof: it has a pool with hot water and a small outdoor space on a terrace with a great view of the city. From the windows of the Spa you can see unmissable images of the city. The gym is located higher up with excellent views. It has a sauna and massage spaces. Breakfast is included in the lobby restaurant; with a very good offer to start the day.

Name: MARIA
Overall Comment:
Estimado Gerente

La estadía fue placentera pero tenemos algunas cuestiones
El sábado al arribar nos otorgan una habitación en el piso 7 que luego de desempacar y utilizar las instalaciones nos comunican que debemos cambiar, nos otorgan una mejor habitación y agradecemos la atención.
El domingo cuando nos dirigimos a desayunar nos encontramos que el desayuno no está incluído..... Nunca en la reserva que la realizó desde su página indica que no tenemos el servicio incluido... Lo cual procedemos abonar... Casi más caro que el costo de la habitación 😕.
Es una pena que ocurran estas cuestiones siempre he elegido el hotel para mis estadías y siempre he estado super super bien  recibida.
Atte
Natalia Gandini
Reason for Brand Question Rating: Por no indicar en la página que el desayuno no se encuentra incluído
Translated Overall Comment: Dear Manager The stay was pleasant but we have some issues On Saturday when we arrived they gave us a room on the 7th floor that after unpacking and using the facilities they told us that we had to change, they gave us a better room and we thanked them for the attention. On Sunday when we went to breakfast we found that breakfast was not included..... Never in the reservation that was made from your page does it indicate that we do not have the service included... Which we proceed to pay... Almost more expensive than the cost of the room 😕. It is a shame that these issues occur. I have always chosen the hotel for my stays and I have always been super super well received. Sincerely, Natalia Gandini

Name: MARIA
Overall Comment: The hotel was good and the service was decent. The room we had 831 was sub standard. There was no room in the bathroom to move, shower door did not lock, safe did not close. Nothing was done despite repeated requests
Translated Overall Comment: The hotel was good and the service was decent. The room we had 831 was sub standard. There was no room in the bathroom to move, shower door did not lock, safe did not close. Nothing was done despite repeated requests

Name: MARIA
Overall Comment:
Buenos días. 
Llegué temprano al hotel y mi habitación estaba lista, pero me comentaron que no podía entrar hasta las 14.00/15.00. 
Teniendo en cuenta que la habitación ya estaba lista y preparada, realmente no entendía por qué no podía pasar puesto que no suponía ningún esfuerzo adicional para el hotel. Soy miembro del club. 
En cualquier caso la persona que me atendió en recepción, a pesar de la sugerencia del pago consiguió que pudiese entrar sin gastos, lo cual agradecí muchísimo. Llegaba de un viaje largo y tenía una reunión importante y necesitaba por lo menos, descansar y prepararme para dicha reunión. La entrada a la habitación fueron unas 3 horas antes aprox de lo que hubiese sido la entrada habitual del check in. 

Con esto quiero decir, que es importante este tipo de servicio a los que optamos por alojarnos en   y quizás este tipo de detalles marcan la diferencia de elegir un hotel u otro. 

Estuve muy agradecida a la persona de recepción que me atendió. 
Por otro lado, quiero hacer una mención especial a Carlos que es la persona que está en la puerta (sr de pelo blanco con ojos claros) que ayuda con las maletas. 
Un sr educado, de buen humor siempre y dispuesto a ayudar. La vez anterior que estuve en su hotel, él mismo me atendió y le recordaba nítidamente. 

La actitud de esta persona: amigable, educado y sonriente también marca la diferencia en los hoteles. Al final el trato humano es necesario e imprescindible. 

Por último comentar que no soy una persona muy especialita con las habitaciones, pero sugiero que informen al personal de limpieza que los que están alojados en habitaciones pegadas al cuarto desde donde salen los carritos, tengan más cuidado con los ruidos. Estaba en la habitación 1826 y todos los días sobre las 6.30 a.m. se oían golpes de sacar el carro. Cada día era mi despertador. :(

Muchas gracias por permitirme la posibilidad de compartir mi experiencia en  . 

Sin duda, volveré a este hotel. 
Gracias y que tengan buen día. 
Sara Navarrete Trokenheim
Reason for Brand Question Rating:
Como indicado en mi primer comentario, al principio fue un poco complicado, pero finalmente se solucionó el inconveniente. 
Es cierto que las habitaciones (por lo menos la que yo tenía) estaba bastante antigua. Quizás una reforma de las habitaciones (si son todas como la que yo estaba) estaría bastante bien. Sobre todo por el concepto que tenemos de   hoteles.
Translated Overall Comment: Good morning. I arrived early at the hotel and my room was ready, but I was told that I could not check in until 2:00/3:00 p.m. Considering that the room was already ready and prepared, I really did not understand why I could not go in since it did not involve any additional effort for the hotel. I am a member of the club. In any case, the person who attended to me at reception, despite the suggestion of payment, managed to let me in without charge, which I greatly appreciated. I had arrived from a long trip and had an important meeting and needed at least to rest and prepare for said meeting. The entrance to the room was approximately 3 hours earlier than the usual check-in time. With this I mean that this type of service is important for those of us who choose to stay at and perhaps this type of detail makes the difference between choosing one hotel or another. I was very grateful to the person at reception who attended to me. On the other hand, I would like to make a special mention of Carlos, who is the person at the door (a white-haired gentleman with light eyes) who helps with the suitcases. He is a polite gentleman, always in a good mood and willing to help. The last time I was at his hotel, he himself attended to me and I clearly reminded him. The attitude of this person: friendly, polite and smiling also makes the difference in hotels. In the end, human treatment is necessary and essential. Finally, I would like to say that I am not a very particular person with rooms, but I suggest that they inform the cleaning staff that those who are staying in rooms next to the room from which the carts come out, should be more careful with noise. I was in room 1826 and every day at about 6.30 am you could hear the banging of the cart being taken out. Every day it was my alarm clock. :( Thank you very much for allowing me the opportunity to share my experience on . I will definitely return to this hotel. Thank you and have a nice day. Sara Navarrete Trokenheim

Name: MARIA
Overall Comment:
To whom it may concern,
 
Today, after four nights at Buenos Aires  , I did the checkout from room 1528 and made a complaint about the noise coming from room 1527 from 2:45 am to approximately 4:00am. The two rooms are connected by a closed door with two inches of air openings, so you are able to perfectly heard what is happening next door. At first, I recorded the "Karaoke session," extremely loud, and called the Front desk/security (2:45am.) The person from security came upstairs, stayed for 2 minutes, and left without any warnings to room 1527. Then, about 30 minutes later, there was a big argument on the 1527 room, and it became a kind of abusive sexual behavior. Once more, I reported the issues to front desk/security and I did not want to get involved. I do not want to present charges against to the police as I am not a party to the aggression. I just request as a   member/guest to please 1. improve safety protocol, this was an uncomfortable situation, and 2. please check if the woman is fine and healthy and proceed as such. If you provide me with a phone number or share drive, I could share the videos I obtained from my room.
 
Sincerely,
 
Guillermo
Member # 099654816

If you provide me with a phone number or share drive, I could share the videos I obtained from my room.
 
Sincerely,
 
Guillermo
Member # 099654816

Name: MARIA
Overall Comment: The staff was very professional and kind. Everyone that worked at IAH Buenos Aires was excellent.
Reason for Brand Question Rating:
I am a   Gold Member 135220905 and the staff was very helpful and professional. They were able to accommodate everything we asked for and the service was 5 Star. 

I do have to mention that the spa jets in the bathtub did not work. I had a romantic evening planned with my partner but we didn't realize that the spa jets in the bathtub didn't work until I had already put a lot of expensive bath salts and perfumes in the tub. I called maintenance to come fix it but they were not able too. Not that big of a deal, but I did it would have been fun to have the candle light/spa bath that night in our room.

However, everything was literally amazing!!!!! I cant wait to come back!!! Thank you all so much for everything. The trip was amazing!

Your Loyal   Gold Member 135220905,

James Allred

Name: MARIA
Overall Comment: Todo o staff foi sempre profissional, educado e atencioso. O quarto estava limpo e respeitaram minha opção de não ter mais limpezas durante a semana para evitar contaminação por Covid. No entanto, entrava muita luz à noite no quarto e isso prejudicou meu sono. Entrava luz pela lateral das cortinas e pela porta do quarto, tinha uma luz LED da televisão que não dava para apagar e o alarme de fumaça fica piscando o tempo todo. O ar condicionado do hotel era muito barulhento e entrava um pouco de som mesmo com as janelas fechadas. Encontrei manchas nas capas de almofadas na cama e me pergunto quando foram lavadas. Esses problemas que listei não condizem com um hotel que se diz 4.5 estrelas, por isso dou nota 7.
Reason for Brand Question Rating: Pelos motivos que listei antes, não parece estar de acordo com o padrão do   nos Estados Unidos, por exemplo. Almofadas sujas e muita luz à noite prejudicando o sono.
Translated Overall Comment: All staff have always been professional, polite and attentive. The room was clean and they respected my option of not having more cleaning during the week to avoid Covid contamination. However, a lot of light entered the room at night and this affected my sleep. Light came in through the side of the curtains and through the bedroom door, there was an LED light on the television that couldn't be turned off and the smoke alarm kept flashing all the time. The hotel's air conditioning was very noisy and some sound came in even with the windows closed. I found stains on the pillow covers on the bed and I wonder when they were washed. These problems I listed do not match a hotel that claims to be 4.5 stars, which is why I give it a 7.

Name: MARIA
Overall Comment:
Lastima del terrible recibimiento que tuve por parte del recepcionista, luego de hacer fila y esperar mi turno, llega otro huésped y se mete en mi turno, el recepcionista llamado Mathias, lo atiende, a lo que yo reclamo porque me estaban atendiendo a mi
El recepcionista en lugar de poner orden, defiende al otro huésped y lo sigue atendiendo, lo cual me irritó y reclame, pidiendo que llamara de inmediato al gerente de turno, el recepcionista dijo que no lo haría, seguí reclamando mientras era maltratado por el otro huésped y el recepcionista…. Llegó el manager, y trato de tranquilizar la situación
No es manera de tratar a un huésped, más si es que tiene nivel titanium, y que pasa cada año casi 100 noches en la cadena de hoteles
Más allá de eso? Se vengó el recepcionista, pudo mi check out a las 12, mientras ya lo había solicitado a las 4pm, así que me dejo sin acceso a la habitación, sin desayuno
El hotel por otro lado está viejo y descuidado, el gym es de hace 30 años, sin mantenimiento, con las bancas rotas por es desgaste y lleno de óxido
No puedo decir que los demás empleados del hotel fueran como el recepcionista grosero, fueron amables los demás siempre, especialmente en el lounge
No vale 300+ dólares la noche, por ese dinero buscar un hotel mejor
Reason for Brand Question Rating:
Lastima del terrible recibimiento que tuve por parte del recepcionista, luego de hacer fila y esperar mi turno, llega otro huésped y se mete en mi turno, el recepcionista llamado Mathias, lo atiende, a lo que yo reclamo porque me estaban atendiendo a mi
El recepcionista en lugar de poner orden, defiende al otro huésped y lo sigue atendiendo, lo cual me irritó y reclame, pidiendo que llamara de inmediato al gerente de turno, el recepcionista dijo que no lo haría, seguí reclamando mientras era maltratado por el otro huésped y el recepcionista…. Translated Overall Comment: What a shame about the terrible reception I received from the receptionist, after waiting in line and waiting for my turn, another guest arrived and cut in on my turn, the receptionist named Mathias, attended to him, to which I complained because they were attending to me. The receptionist, instead of putting things in order, defended the other guest and continued attending to him, which irritated me and I complained, asking him to immediately call the manager on duty, the receptionist said he would not do it, I continued to complain while I was mistreated by the other guest and the receptionist... The manager arrived and tried to calm the situation. This is no way to treat a guest, especially if they are at the titanium level, and spend almost 100 nights in the hotel chain each year. Beyond that? The receptionist took revenge, he was able to check me out at 12, when I had already requested it at 4pm, so he left me without access to the room, without breakfast. The hotel on the other hand is old and neglected, the gym is 30 years old, without maintenance, with the benches broken due to wear and tear and full of rust. I cannot say that the other hotel employees were like the rude receptionist, the others were always friendly, especially in the lounge. It is not worth 300+ dollars a night, for that money look for a better hotel.

The manager on Saturday, after several complaints, managed to identify herself and come closer to the solution finally provided at the time of check out.

Al llegar al hotel ya había realizado el Web check in a través de la aplicación lo cual fue totalmente inútil porque al llegar al front desk el personal no tenía ninguna información al respecto y tuve que hacer el proceso manual, invirtiendo el doble de tiempo.

I think it was a Maintainance room as a room for internal use that was given to me. Iron & board were missing from the room; on asking I was given a very old iron; wasn’t even a steam iron.

In short you lost a loyal   customer.  It's Hilton next time I am in BA.

Maybe due to lack of staff. The stay was excellent anyway, I would return. On the other hand, I would like them to send me the prices of the different rooms and the weekend packages to make gifts and because I am an event organizer and many times I need stays for clients, for this reason I stayed to get to know the facilities.

Name: MARIA
Overall Comment: We arrived in Buenos Aires after an overnight flight where we had not slept much.  I had received an email asking when we planned to check in...I responded 11am.  When we arrived, they indicated that the earliest the room would be available was 1pm.  Why offer 11am as an option if that wasn't possible? The front desk was kind enough to store our bags for us, so we had lunch in the restaurant while we waited.  Still no room, so we took a walk.  We returned from the walk, checked at the front desk and a room was available.  They said they'd send the bags up.  We went to the room and my wife immediately laid down for a nap.  I waited for the bags to be delivered.  After about 40 minutes, I went to the front desk and the bellman had no idea that we were waiting for bags or any idea as to where our bags were.  Luckily I was able to direct him to the room where they were stored and found our bags.
Translated Overall Comment: We arrived in Buenos Aires after an overnight flight where we had not slept much.  I had received an email asking when we planned to check in...I responded 11am.  When we arrived, they indicated that the earliest the room would be available was 1pm.  Why offer 11am as an option if that wasn't possible? The front desk was kind enough to store our bags for us, so we had lunch in the restaurant while we waited.  Still no room, so we took a walk.  We returned from the walk, checked at the front desk and a room was available.  They said they'd send the bags up.  We went to the room and my wife immediately laid down for a nap.  I waited for the bags to be delivered.  After about 40 minutes, I went to the front desk and the bellman had no idea that we were waiting for bags or any idea as to where our bags were.  Luckily I was able to direct him to the room where they were stored and found our bags.

Overall Comment: Siempre elijo ese  , la atencion es optima.    Solo dos amistosas sugerencias.  1 En las habitaciones deberia existir la posibilidad de enchufar con ficha Americana o ficha multiopcion, o sino que haya adaptadores como hay en otros hoteles e la cadena.  2 Tener la certeza que el taxi que consigan en el hotel, haga el viaje y no te deje a mitad de camino. En Diciembre pasado me llamaron un taxi en el Hotel y cuando ya ibamos tres cuadras, el chofer me dijo que no me podia llevar a Aeroparque porque habia una manifestacion, me dejó con las valijas a mitad de camino y me tuve que tomar un Uber corriendo. La sorpresa fue que no habia manifestacion alguna.   Saludos y volvere pronto.
Reason for Brand Question Rating: Uno se siente seguro en el Hotel sin importar lo que pasa afuera.
Translated Overall Comment: I always choose that one, the service is optimal. Just two friendly suggestions. 1. In the rooms there should be the possibility of plugging in with an American plug or a multi-option plug, or else there should be adapters like there are in other hotels in the chain. 2. Make sure that the taxi you get at the hotel makes the trip and doesn't leave you halfway. Last December they called me a taxi at the hotel and when we were already three blocks away, the driver told me that he couldn't take me to Aeroparque because there was a demonstration. He left me with my suitcases halfway and I had to take an Uber in a hurry. The surprise was that there was no demonstration at all. Greetings and I'll be back soon.

Name: MARIA
Overall Comment: We made reservations at the BA   several months ago as we were looking forward to a few extras days there after our cruise.  We got there early, checked out bags and went out for the day to explore BA.  Upon return to the hotel, we found that “a” room was ready, However, we had reserved a king room and that is not what we had.  We immediately went back to the front desk and at first we were told there were no more rooms……then a room was found in the other tower of the hotel.  As we were traveling with another couple who had a room next to us, we certainly were not pleased with this as our only option.  Due to the fact that we were delayed in getting to our room by having to go to front desk to resolve this and the fact that the room type we received was not available and we had to go to another tower, we asked for some type of accommodation for this inconvenience.  We are   Rewards members (Granted….not a high level), however we were not offered any discount on this room, or a credit towards future stays.   Disappointed in that.  Otherwise are stay was fine.

Name: MARIA
Overall Comment:
Pésima experiencia. Nosotros cometimos un error pensando que la reservación era en pesos mexicanos en lugar de dólares. Reconocemos eso. Pero el que nos atendió, Matías:

1) Le preguntamos cuánto nos cobraría de cargo extra por si había daños y no nos dijo.

2) No nos dijo por cuanto estábamos pasando la tarjeta, que eran más de 2 millones de pesos argentinos. Nosotros no preguntamos, pero veníamos de un vuelo de 14 horas.

3) Cancelamos las noches, salvo la primera que si tuvimos que pagar, que fueron alrededor de 1150 dólares, pero cuando le llamamos en la noche todos desesperados primero nos dijo que “si se podía pero qué tal vez nos iban a cobrar una multa”, le llamamos otra vez horas más tarde y ahí si nos dijo que no habría que pagar nada.

Pésima atención, muy ventajosos y JAMÁS los recomendaría. Incluso deberían de devolvernos algo, rateros.
Reason for Brand Question Rating: Ya lo expliqué antes. Púdranse y deberían devolverme algo.
Translated Overall Comment: Terrible experience. We made a mistake thinking that the reservation was in Mexican pesos instead of dollars. We recognize that. But the person who attended us, Matías: 1) We asked him how much he would charge us for an extra fee in case of damages and he didn’t tell us. 2) He didn’t tell us how much we were using the card for, which was more than 2 million Argentine pesos. We didn’t ask, but we were coming from a 14-hour flight. 3) We cancelled the nights, except for the first one that we did have to pay, which was around 1150 dollars, but when we called him at night, all desperate, he first told us that “yes it was possible but maybe they were going to charge us a fine”, we called him again hours later and then he told us that we wouldn’t have to pay anything. Terrible service, very advantageous and I would NEVER recommend them. They should even give us something back, thieves.

Name: MARIA
Overall Comment: Bedroom air conditioner never worked.  Complained 3 times to front desk.  In room coffee machine had no capsules, so we had to go to lobby café to get morning coffee.

Name: MARIA
Overall Comment:
ritengo che l'hotel non è all'altezza del rate pagato . benchè il personale sia gentile e comprensivo non è riuscito a risolvere nessuno dei problemi avuti durante il soggiono .
ho richiesto un adattatore per corrente che mi è stato promesso ma mai consegnat.
ho chiesto di cambiare stanza perchè troppo rumorosa a causa dei motori esterni dell'AC , mi sono state proposte altre due stanze ma tutte con lo stesso problema 
il giorno prima della mia partenza ho chiesto che mi fosse prenotato un Taxi per aeroporto ma poi ho scoperto che questo non er stato fatto.
La TV non ha funzionato per l'intero soggirno ( mi è stato detto che avevano un problema con il provider del servizio ).

Senza parlare delle ore che siamo stati senza corrente e quindi senza ascensore e senza aria cond e senza nessun tipo di informazione sui motivi e sui tempi di ripristino ,

infine sono stato informato che non avrei accumulato  punti per questo soggiorno in quanto non pagato direttamente da me ma attraverso la mia ditta .

sinceramente questa cosa mi giunge molto strana in quanto tutti le centinaia di migliaia di punti accumulati fino ad in piu di 10 anni di fedelta SPG e e poi BONVOY sono stai accumulati con la stessa modalità
Translated Overall Comment: I think the hotel is not up to the rate paid. Although the staff is kind and understanding, they were unable to solve any of the problems I had during my stay. I asked for a power adapter that was promised to me but never delivered. I asked to change rooms because it was too noisy due to the external AC motors. They offered me two other rooms but both had the same problem. The day before my departure, I asked for a taxi to be booked for me to the airport but then I discovered that this had not been done. The TV did not work for the entire stay (I was told that they had a problem with the service provider). Not to mention the hours we were without power and therefore without a lift and without air conditioning and without any type of information on the reasons and times for restoration. Finally, I was informed that I would not have accumulated points for this stay as it was not paid directly by me but through my company. honestly this thing seems very strange to me since all the hundreds of thousands of points accumulated up to more than 10 years of SPG and then BONVOY loyalty have been accumulated in the same way

Name: MARIA
Overall Comment: Our room rate was a package, that included early check-in (noon) and late check-out (18:00), champagne and petit-fours, breakfast for 2 and valet parking.  We arrived very early from our flight and knew our room would not be ready.  We were pleased we could wait in the lounge.  We were not able to get to our room until 1:30.  We asked the day before checkout it we could have a late checkout of 2 pm.  We were told that the hotel was fully booked and that was not possible.  We then asked for a 1 pm checkout and that was acceptable.  We were not offered any of the extras that were in the package.  We do not drink so we did not need the champagne, we didn’t have a car, and we were happy with the lounge breakfast but were disappointed it was not acknowledged that we had purchased this package. The petit-fours would have been nice to have.  We still have not received the bill by email 3 days after we had checked out.  We are accustomed to receiving it minutes after checkout. The room and location were great and the staff friendly
Reason for Brand Question Rating: See above details. We have experienced  s world wide and have expectations from those previous stays.

Name: MARIA
Overall Comment: The check-in process was terribly disorganized and false information was provided to me by the associates.  My sickly uncle and I had to sit in the lobby for 4 hours waiting on a room - all the way to 3 PM - not even one minute early - and I do NOT believe there was no room ready.  The safe in the room was not attached to anything, so I could not use it and had to lug all my items onto the crime-ridden streets.  Not enough towels were left in the bathroom.  Of course, no wash rags are provided in Argentina - so I had brought my own Vera Wang designer wash rag to use - and had placed it over the faucet to dry out and so it would not be confused with  's laundry.  THE MAID STOLE IT!  Fortunately, after calling downstairs, I was able to get it returned.  With so much potential, this place failed miserably.  The bright spots were the A/C was great and the restaurant was good as well.

We asked for a wake up call which we never got.  We were told we could have a late checkout and on checkout day we were told no one put it in the computer.  We ordered a taxi to go to the airport a day in advance and confirmed it again and when we went to depart no taxi came.  The bellman told us no one had ordered it.  There seems to be a very serious communication problem at your hotel.

Name: MARIA
Overall Comment: The room I had was one of the worst rooms I have ever had at a  , and I am a Bonvoy Lifetime Platinum member.  I asked the front desk if there were other rooms and she said they were 100% full.  In hindsight, I should have been asked to be moved to another hotel.  I was given a twin room (that's ok) that beds looked and felt like they were the fold up cots (not ok), put against a king headboard (that had foot print marks on the headboard wood).Not only that, there was no mattress pad on the shaky twin bed, it was one sheet and you could see the mattress decorations/seams through the sheet.  There were no blankets, just two sheets to cover with. The room looked like they threw a few pieces of furniture into an empty room.  I went down about 8pm and asked for a mattress pad for the bed and was told housekeeping would bring one up.  After an hour, I gave up and went to bed, we had been traveling all day and was exhausted.

Name: MARIA
Overall Comment:
Hello  -Team,

We have been looking forward to stay at this property but have been disappointed by the hotel on many occasions. Below you will find a list of objective items. Overall, a nice hotel, our room was very nice and most staff friendly. 

Check-in experience 
During check-in (first reservation from 24th to 26th of February), I was not specifically welcomed as a rewards member. I was also not informed during check-in that our rate includes a dinner at the hotel’s restaurant. Usually, hotels provide a welcome letter with all relevant details and benefits. However, we have been told that our room will be ready by around 12 am and that they will inform us using the   app chat functionality. My attempt to contact them by the chat functionality also did not result in a status update. Around 3:30 pm we went back to the reception to inquire the status of our room, which was ready by then. 

Items included in the rate not delivered 
Our second reservation for an upper suite from 26th to 27th of February also included a dinner and bottle of champagne (according to rate details). We did not receive a bottle of champagne. In addition, the pictures presented on the hotel website suggest that we would have flowers, some pastry and a wide choice of Nescafé in our room. This was not the case. 

Dinner arrangements 
I noticed myself on the 25th late evening when I rechecked the reservation for details on the price that a dinner was included. I asked at the Restaurant around 10 pm if it was possible to have a single dinner for three (including my wife’s sister)  on the 26th instead of two single dinners (for the first dinner it was too late anyway on the 25th). My request was rejected. The next day I asked at the reception if they could arrange for an exception. They told me to check with the manger and to get back to me. I also informed them that they never informed me about the dinner option included in the rate. They never informed us about any result and we hat to take dinner outside the hotel together with my sister in law. 

Forgotten Taxi reservation 
On the 26th we asked the front desk around 9 pm to make a reservation for a taxi to the airport next day at 10am. We have been waiting outside for a taxi that never arrived because the front desk forgot to reserve a taxi for us. I had to call a taxi myself and assist the taxi driver to put my luggage into the car. There was no attention by the hotel staff. 

In addition, we noticed the following:
Our bathroom light was flickering, they fixed it upon my request 
The pool was not meeting my expectations (I know the pool from before corona). Inside the water I saw a significant number of small particles floating. Some of the tiles were so dirty that people already wrote limpiame (clean me) on them. We only went once to the pool. I would have liked to spend more time at the pool, but given the water condition I rather avoided it. 
The breakfast is better in other hotels, at the  : poor quality, coffee comes only from a machine (where is the barista), fried eggs, Omelettes etc. have not been offered, the medialunas (Argentinian croissants) are much better in any random bakery outside the hotel. Consequently, we went only once for breakfast inside the hotel.
Reason for Brand Question Rating:
We have been looking forward to stay at this property but have been disappointed by the hotel on many occasions.

Check-in experience 
During check-in (first reservation from 24th to 26th of February), I was not specifically welcomed as a rewards member. I was also not informed during check-in that our rate includes a dinner at the hotel’s restaurant. Usually, hotels provide a welcome letter with all relevant details and benefits. However, we have been told that our room will be ready by around 12 am and that they will inform us using the   app chat functionality. My attempt to contact them by the chat functionality also did not result in a status update. Around 3:30 pm we went back to the reception to inquire the status of our room, which was ready by then. 

Items included in the rate not delivered 
Our second reservation for an upper suite from 26th to 27th of February also included a dinner and bottle of champagne (according to rate details). We did not receive a bottle of champagne. In addition, the pictures presented on the hotel website suggest that we would have flowers, some pastry and a wide choice of Nescafé in our room. This was not the case. 

Dinner arrangements 
I noticed myself on the 25th late evening when I rechecked the reservation for details on the price that a dinner was included. I asked at the Restaurant around 10 pm if it was possible to have a single dinner for three (including my wife’s sister)  on the 26th instead of two single dinners (for the first dinner it was too late anyway on the 25th). My request was rejected. The next day I asked at the reception if they could arrange for an exception. They told me to check with the manger and to get back to me. I also informed them that they never informed me about the dinner option included in the rate. They never informed us about any result and we hat to take dinner outside the hotel together with my sister in law. 

Forgotten Taxi reservation 
On the 26th we asked the front desk around 9 pm to make a reservation for a taxi to the airport next day at 10am. We have been waiting outside for a taxi that never arrived because the front desk forgot to reserve a taxi for us. I had to call a taxi myself and assist the taxi driver to put my luggage into the car. There was no attention by the hotel staff. 

In addition, we noticed the following:
Our bathroom light was flickering, they fixed it upon my request 
The pool was not meeting my expectations (I know the pool from before corona). Inside the water I saw a significant number of small particles floating. Some of the tiles were so dirty that people already wrote limpiame (clean me) on them. We only went once to the pool. I would have liked to spend more time at the pool, but given the water condition I rather avoided it. 
The breakfast is better in other hotels, at the  : poor quality, coffee comes only from a machine (where is the barista), fried eggs, Omelettes etc. have not been offered, the medialunas (Argentinian croissants) are much better in any random bakery outside the hotel. Consequently, we went only once for breakfast inside the hotel.

Name: MARIA
Overall Comment: Muy probable de recomendar el hotel. Destacable el trato del personal en todo momento, las instalaciones todas muy disfrutables y nos hicieron sentir cómodos desde que entramos hasta que nos fuimos. Impecable servicio. Apenas para mejorar a mi gusto, en un mínimo de detalles con el desayuno y las opciones del menú del restaurant, pero yo soy bastante exigente y aún así quedó entre mis mejores experiencias gastronómicas tanto el desayuno como la cena que probamos.
Reason for Brand Question Rating:
Al parecer, el sonido se escapa mucho entre habitaciones y a pesar que teníamos música con volumen bajo un Sábado a la noche, nos llamaron para avisar que a los huéspedes de las otras habitaciones les molestaba la música.
Obviamente apagamos inmediatamente la música, pero eso denota que las habitaciones no están insonorizadas correspondientemente al nivel que se espera de   Hotels, o al menos de un hotel 4 estrellas.
Sólo por eso mi respuesta anterior no llega al 10. El resto de mis expectativas fueron superadas ampliamente en los demás detalles y servicios.
Translated Overall Comment: I would highly recommend the hotel. The staff's service was outstanding at all times, the facilities were all very enjoyable and they made us feel comfortable from the moment we entered until we left. Impeccable service. I think there is only a few details to improve on with the breakfast and the menu options in the restaurant, but I am quite demanding and even so, both the breakfast and the dinner we tried were among my best gastronomic experiences.

Name: MARIA
Overall Comment:
Adoro o   Buenos Aires desde que era Hotel Panamericano, especialmente devido ao Spa e piscina no piso 23. 

No entanto, nas minhas ultimas estadas, sinto que sou praticamente um hospede incomodo, pois a clara prioridade de todo o staff está em atender os muitos grupos estrangeiros que estao preferindo o hotel neste momento. 

Em minhas ultimas 3 estadas, nos ultimos 2 meses, este é o unico hotel onde nao obtenho nenhum tipo de servico adicional por ser membro de Bonvoy. Tentei em diferentes ocasioes, possíveis upgrades ou late check-outs sem sucesso. 

Mesmo entendendo que estes benefícios sao vinculados a sua eventual disponibilidade, o que me incomoda é a falta de boa vontade por parte do staff em nem sequer tentar / averiguar a possibilidade e apenas responder que nao e que estao lotados. 

Como sempre em Argentina, me parece uma visao míope, preferindo atender de forma prioritaria ao turista ocasional, que atualmente vem a Argentina pela diferenca cambiaria, vs atender ao viajante corporativo que vai seguir visitando a Argentina em diferentes momentos do país. 

Seguirei considerando o   Buenos Aires dentro das minhas alternativas, mas no momento priorizarei o Sheraton ou outro hotel onde em geral sou melhor tratado.
Reason for Brand Question Rating:
É um bom hotel, em linha com a expectativa que se tem sobre um hotel da bandeira  . 

Nao posso dizer o mesmo sobre a expectativa que se tem de um servico especial aos sócios premium de Bonvoy, onde o staff do   Buenos Aires deixa a desejar.
Translated Overall Comment: I have loved Buenos Aires since it was the Hotel Panamericano, especially because of the spa and pool on the 23rd floor. However, in my last few stays, I feel like I am practically an inconvenient guest, since the clear priority of all the staff is to serve the many foreign groups that are choosing the hotel at this time. In my last 3 stays, in the last 2 months, this is the only hotel where I do not get any type of additional service for being a Bonvoy member. I have tried on different occasions, possible upgrades or late check-outs without success. Even though I understand that these benefits are linked to their eventual availability, what bothers me is the lack of goodwill on the part of the staff in not even trying / investigating the possibility and just responding that no and that they are full. As always in Argentina, this seems to me to be a short-sighted approach, preferring to prioritize the occasional tourist, who currently comes to Argentina because of the exchange rate difference, versus serving the corporate traveler who will continue to visit Argentina at different times in the country. I will continue to consider Buenos Aires among my alternatives, but for now I will prioritize the Sheraton or another hotel where I am generally treated better.

Name: MARIA
Overall Comment:
Favorable comments:  staff were pleasant and accommodated a room change while laundry was processing and laundered garments were correctly sent to the new room
Considerations for improvement:  Suggest upgrading in-room electrical sockets with international plug configurations, suggest upgrading in-room electrical sockets with USB charging, suggest adding face washing cloths/rags for personal hygiene to supplies provided in guest rooms, suggest adding facial tissue to supplies provided in guest rooms, suggest replacing working tables with hairy leather hide - it is difficult to write on papers or use computer mouse devices (recommend avoiding surfaces which are difficult to use computer mouse devices like glass)
Unfavorable service:  during my stay, there were two days where my initial room 1511 was inundated with a smoke smell and I requested to change with the telephone operator who said they would check and call back.  I NEVER received any call back about it either day.  On the first day (Saturday) I approached the front desk about changing rooms and was informed the hotel was full; unfavorable but expected during tourist season on the weekend.  On the following day I called again because the smoke smell persisted and again did not receive any response.  Fortunately front desk personnel were able to organize a different room for the remainder of my stay.

Overall Comment: Localização ótima, atendimento péssimo. Muito surpresa com o o péssimo atendimento. Simplesmente não existe atendimento Bonvoy. Em nenhum momento tivemos atendimento diferenciado por sermos Platinum. Tivemos que ficar na fila comum, tanto para o checkin, quanto para uma informação bem como, mais de 15 minutos para o check out. Nos deram um apartamento maior, porém de fundos e o pior, "arrumaram o quarto" mas não trocaram/lavaram os copos. Eu chegava a noite e lavava. Além disso, tiraram as toalhas e não repuseram. Tivemos que pedir e assim mesmo, ainda esqueceram o tapete do banheiro. A porta do banheiro completamente empenada. Precisamos pedir o roupão porque não tinha no apartamento. Café da manhã para membros, bem fraquinho e itens repetidos todos os 5 duas que estivemos la. Não há reposição dos itens. Tive que pedir. Ou seja, padrão   em decadência total. Uma pena!

Translated Overall Comment: Great location, terrible service. Very surprised by the terrible service. There is simply no Bonvoy service. At no time did we receive special service for being Platinum. We had to wait in the regular line, both for check-in and for information, and it took more than 15 minutes to check out. They gave us a larger apartment, but at the back, and worst of all, they "cleaned the room" but did not change/wash the glasses. I would arrive at night and wash them. In addition, they took away the towels and did not replace them. We had to ask for them, and even then, they forgot the bathroom mat. The bathroom door was completely warped. We had to ask for a bathrobe because there was none in the apartment. The breakfast for members was very poor and the items were repeated every 5 days we were there. There were no replacement items. I had to ask for them. In other words, the standard is in total decline. What a shame!

Name: MARIA
Overall Comment:
Price and location were very good. The hotel was clean and the breakfast excellent.
I had to wait for nearly 15 minutes in a line for both the check in and check out processes, which upset me. Employees, who were in general very kind, told me that the lines take place only during pick hours. So, if you have 4 desks to attend clients and only two staff members attending, why dont you send 2 more employees to attend clients during these short moments each day? 
The room I got was facing the inner part of teh block and near the elevators. After the check in we tried to take a nap, and had to ask the cleaning staff to stop speaking aloud near our door. Last, we only stayed one night. At 10 pm the cleaning service knock on our door. I was awake already, so it did no harm, but I wonder, if the know I am checking out, the breakfast time ends at 11, and the checkout time ends at noon, why would they knock my door, taking the risk of waking me up?
