Name: MARIA
Overall Comment: La estancia fue muy buena. Sin embargo hay algunos pequeños detalles a mejorar. El picaporte de entrada a la habitación no funcionaba bien, lo mismo que la caja fuerte. No pudimos hacerla funcionar, tampoco había un explicativo de como hacerla funcionar. La gente de servicio, en el piso donde estabamos, hablaba muy alto e incluso compartían videos a alto volumen, lo cual dificultaba descansar. En general el lugar es muy bonito. Pero se nota que falta un poco de organización general.
Reason for Brand Question Rating: Creo que podrían mejorar aun más el servicio y el mantenimiento de las instalaciones. Para ser 10 puntos les falta un poco.
Translated Overall Comment: The stay was very good. However, there are some small details that need improvement. The door handle at the entrance to the room did not work properly, as did the safe. We could not get it to work, nor was there an explanation of how to get it to work. The service people on the floor where we were staying spoke very loudly and even shared videos at high volume, which made it difficult to rest. In general, the place is very nice. But it is noticeable that there is a lack of general organization.

Name: MARIA
Overall Comment:
Your facility is beautiful and historic, but definitely a bit run down.  We had a leak in our room from the air conditioner, water gushing down when they opened up the ceiling...after two days of no air conditioning at all.  
As I was packing to check out, I discovered the screws from my in-room safe rolling around the closet and the safe was completely detached, basically making it useless.  Luckily, nothing was lost.

Your staff was absolutely wonderful, but inundated with lines and duties.  It was obvious that you were understaffed.  There was no concierge service, trying to reach the front desk was frustrating, because the two people there were handling long lines of guests.  
But make no mistake, they were professional, courteous, and extremely helpful.
Reason for Brand Question Rating: I am a Bonvoy   member because I know I will get the same excellent experience no matter where in the world I go.  This   needs support from your company.  Additional staff, additional services.

Name: MARIA
Overall Comment:
La habitación que nos asignaron tenía la loza de la cisterna rota. El aro de la tapa del water había perdido el esmalte, quedando el conglomerado al aire. La grifería no cerraba bien y era difícil tener agua tibia. El aislamiento acústico de la habitación era nulo, se escuchaba perfectamente el tráfico de la avenida y los compresores de aire condicionado. Desde la cama no había un interruptor conmutador que apagase las luces, con lo que tenías que levantarte hasta la puerta de la habitación para hacerlo. Sinceramente, muy lejos de un 5 estrellas. Hemos tenido que irnos a otro hotel en la misma avenida. 
Eso sí, las zonas comunes de primera categoría. Pero a la hora de descansar y dormir, mal, muy mal.
Translated Overall Comment: The room we were assigned had a broken cistern tile. The ring on the toilet lid had lost its enamel, leaving the conglomerate exposed. The taps did not close properly and it was difficult to get warm water. The room had zero sound insulation, you could hear the traffic on the avenue and the air conditioning compressors perfectly. There was no switch from the bed to turn off the lights, so you had to get up to the door of the room to do it. Honestly, very far from a 5 star hotel. We had to go to another hotel on the same avenue. Of course, the common areas were first class. But when it came to resting and sleeping, bad, very bad.

Name: MARIA
Overall Comment: Overall a nice stay at

Translated Overall Comment: Overall a nice stay at

Name: MARIA
Overall Comment:
This stay, both before and after a cruise to Antarctica on Celebrity, was both a joy with beautiful accommodations and now continuing to be a stress given new charges to our credit card after our final bill.  
This is not acceptable.  
Understandably rooms cannot be ready when one flies all night and arrives in the morning, but, since this is the case with most of those arriving from other continents, perhaps better planning and new systems could be put in place to accommodate them.
Reason for Brand Question Rating: Now with other charges showing up on our credit card after having checked out and getting our final bill is not acceptable.  Trust has been reduced in  .
Translated Overall Comment:
This stay, both before and after a cruise to Antarctica on Celebrity, was both a joy with beautiful accommodations and now continuing to be a stress given new charges to our credit card after our final bill.  
This is not acceptable.  
Understandably rooms cannot be ready when one flies all night and arrives in the morning, but, since this is the case with most of those arriving from other continents, perhaps better planning and new systems could be put in place to accommodate them.

Overall Comment: Everyone was very nice & hospitable here. Our safe did not work, so they came to fix it. Even though they replaced it, it still wouldn't lock, but appreciate them trying. Our waitress in the restaurant was absolutely amazing!! Ariana gave us exceptional service!!

Overall Comment: service was impeccable specially at the check in and checking out with Camila
Reason for Brand Question Rating: service was great thru the hotel except 2 night in a row at the lobby bar extremely poor service more than 30 minutes to get a drink either short of staff or waiter under qualify

Name: MARIA
Overall Comment:
La estancia en general estuvo bien. Con varios detalles que podrían mejorarse con poco esfuerzo. 

El staff de recepción fue increíblemente útil. El nivel de atención en el M Club tiene muchas áreas de oportunidad.
Reason for Brand Question Rating:
La experiencia es muy cambiante. Hay días en los que el staff del Restaurant o el bar del Lobby puede ser atenta y otros en los que toma más de 20 minutos recibir atención, se olvidan las ordenes, etc.

La calidad al recibir el servicio es excelente, pero si es extraño que haya tanta disparidad en el servicio o en los productos ofrecidos.

Un ejemplo de esto sería que estuvo un carrito de bebidas para ser restockeadas un par de horas afuera del M Club y no había bebidas de cierto tipo en el Club. El club estaba con staff suficiente para hacer el restocking, etc. pero no se percataban de que estaba el carrito afuera o tenían otras prioridades en ese momento. 

También hay casos en los que no retiran los cubiertos/comida de mesas que ya están sin clientes en el Club, esto a veces se extiende a horas en los que no se retiran restos de comida, etc.

Habiendo dejado eso en claro vuelvo a reiterar que el staff de recepción, el personal de limpieza y del área de Spa/Gimnasio es absolutamente perfecto.
Translated Overall Comment: The overall stay was fine. There were several details that could be improved with little effort. The reception staff was incredibly helpful. The level of service at the M Club has many areas of improvement.

Name: MARIA
Overall Comment:
Terrivel... uma das piores experiencias que tive em hoteis, especialmente em hoteis de "5 estrelas". 
O colchao tinha um buraco superior a um palmo, impressionante mesmo.
So tive agua quente, tive 1 hora a espera que me arranjassem a agua com a espuma da barba na cara, pois não tinha agua fria... tive que ligar varias vezes para virem... 
no pequeno almoço disseram que não tinha direito a pequeno almoço, até finalmente confirmarem que tinha... 
o check out demorou quase 30 mins na fila... Péssimo, a nunca voltar. Isto tudo numa estadia de um dia.
Translated Overall Comment: Terrible... one of the worst experiences I've had in hotels, especially in "5 star" hotels. The mattress had a hole bigger than a foot, really impressive. I only had hot water, I had to wait 1 hour for them to get the water with the beard foam on my face, as there was no cold water... I had to call several times for them to come... at breakfast they said I was not entitled to breakfast, until they finally confirmed that I had it... check out took almost 30 minutes in line... Terrible, never coming back. All this in a one day stay.

Name: MARIA
Overall Comment: Das Personal war sehr freundlich und hilfsbereit. Das Zimmer war ok, aber der Gang zum Zimmer abgewohnt. Die Aussicht aus dem Zimmer bestand aus 5 Meter Blick auf eine Hauswand, wo die Farbe abblätterte. Die Lage des Hotels ist sehr zentral, aber die Gegend ist nachts mit Vorsicht zu genießen. Ich gebe nur eine 7, weil ich keine zusätzlichen Handtücher erhalten habe und das Kopfkissen in der ersten Nacht in einem viel zu kleinen Bezug steckte. Ich musste mich diesbezüglich erst bei der Rezeption beschweren. Ich finde es etwas eklig, wenn das nackte Kissen 20cm aus dem Bezug schaut.
Translated Overall Comment: The staff was very friendly and helpful. The room was OK, but the corridor to the room was shabby. The view from the room was a 5 meter view of a building wall where the paint was peeling off. The hotel is very centrally located, but the area should be approached with caution at night. I'm only giving it a 7 because I didn't get any extra towels and the pillow was in a cover that was far too small on the first night. I had to complain about this to reception. I find it a bit disgusting when the bare pillow sticks out 20cm from the cover.

Name: MARIA
Overall Comment: Customer service is excellent.
Translated Overall Comment: Customer service is excellent.

Name: MARIA
Overall Comment:
Our first stay was great! 
We returned from a cruise and we have chosen again this lovely hotel. 
Great location, great service from the Front Desk where Sebastian and Macarena welcomed us with a smile and the check-in went smoothly. We received all the information we need for an enjoyable stay. 
The rooms are nice and spacious, I have allergies problems so we received a room with wooden floor.
 Nice breakfast and Nivel 23 Spa with swimming pool, massages and nice panoramic view.
Sleep quality is the best, very comfortable mattress and pillows, the housekeeping staff is very discreet and quite in the morning. 
We will stay here for 5 more nights so I will post another review with more impressions. 
Thank you to all the Team members of this very nice hotel for making our stay in Buenos Aires just great!

We will stay here for 5 more nights so I will post another review with more impressions. 
Thank you to all the Team members of this very nice hotel for making our stay in Buenos Aires just great!

Airport shuttle listed on web site was just the bellman calling for a taxi. Breakfast was great. Incredible Argentinian restaurant just around the corner’Estancia’. Towels very minimal-1 hand towel, 2 bath towels.
Television complicated to operate- no instructions or channel guide

Pool staff too busy socializing to take drink and food orders - gin and tonic poured from a can- no ice or lime or stirrer. Premade cold sandwich was briefly toasted then served uncut.

Name: MARIA
Overall Comment: The reception staff was very helpful from check in to check out.  They helped with making sure the room assigned was the very best it could be.  They offered guidance on how to exchange money.  They made a reservation for the four of us in a "hard to get in" steakhouse. They helped arrange a taxi back to airport.  The housekeeping staff was wonderful and very flexible with our schedule.  They brought us extra towels and supplies when ever we needed them.  Security team, although silent, were constantly present  making us feel safe.
Reason for Brand Question Rating: We have stayed at   Hotels all over the world and found the Buenos Aires   to be in the top 3 in terms of service, décor, and accommodations.
Translated Overall Comment: The reception staff was very helpful from check in to check out.  They helped with making sure the room assigned was the very best it could be.  They offered guidance on how to exchange money.  They made a reservation for the four of us in a "hard to get in" steakhouse. They helped arrange a taxi back to airport.  The housekeeping staff was wonderful and very flexible with our schedule.  They brought us extra towels and supplies when ever we needed them.  Security team, although silent, were constantly present  making us feel safe.

Name: MARIA
Overall Comment: I stayed in three different rooms in February: 2/1 #1221, 2/2 #803, and 2/5 #612. In #1221, the toilet was not bolted to the floor and maintenance was unable to repair it. Also, the shower flooded onto the floor. In #803, the shower shot water both downward and upward, necessitating using the bath for hygiene. In #612, only hot water ran out of all the taps in the sink and shower. Maintenance temporarily repaired it, but by the morning, only scalding water would come out of the taps.
Reason for Brand Question Rating: Three different plumbing problems in three different rooms makes it difficult to believe any attention is being paid to maintenance. Also, although the staff was apologetic, there was little offered to correct the situation, and nothing offered in compensation for my trouble.
Translated Overall Comment: I stayed in three different rooms in February: 2/1 #1221, 2/2 #803, and 2/5 #612. In #1221, the toilet was not bolted to the floor and maintenance was unable to repair it. Also, the shower flooded onto the floor. In #803, the shower shot water both downward and upward, necessitating using the bath for hygiene. In #612, only hot water ran out of all the taps in the sink and shower. Maintenance temporarily repaired it, but by the morning, only scalding water would come out of the taps.

Not to mention the cosmetic issues of wallpaper peeling from water running behind it.

Excelente servicio, un equipo fantástico con la mejor disposición. 
Mi única objeción es el mal funcionamiento del aire acondicionado en la zona de restaurante, que hizo muy incómodo el desayuno. 
Recomendaría invertir en mejorar el equipamiento del gimnasio (sector complementos), que si bien es muy completo presenta el desgaste de varios años sin renovación.
Reason for Brand Question Rating: Calidad internacional y un staff impecable.
Translated Overall Comment: Excellent service, a fantastic team with the best disposition. My only objection is the poor functioning of the air conditioning in the restaurant area, which made breakfast very uncomfortable. I would recommend investing in improving the equipment in the gym (accessories section), which although very complete, shows signs of wear and tear from several years without renovation.

Name: MARIA
Overall Comment: The  hotel stay was good however, we had a very poor checking in experience. we arrived early and did not expect our room to be ready. However, when i returned at 4pm I was first offered a standard room instead of the suite that had been confirmed with my suite points. Then told housekeeping had still not cleaned the room. At 4.45pm was told still not ready was then offered an upper suite only to find that I could not enter the room because it was already occupied. I then spoke to the Manager and finally got a room at 5pm  at our third attempt. This was a very disappointing first impression, especially as we were happy with the stay after that and so I have reduced my score accordingly.

Name: MARIA
Overall Comment:
Booked for a pre-cruise stay in Buenos Aires. Picked this hotel for the reviews, great central location and price. 

The hotel is an older hotel with impressive lobby but the aircon is a little sporadic. Was initially given the wrong room type of two single beds  (to the one I’d booked - two double beds ). The initial room allocated was worn and a little shabby but the room we were swiftly reallocated after I queried at the front desk was as I expected ie well sized, clean, comfortable, powerful shower with plenty of hot water and aircon all in excellent working order with albeit a little sign of wear around the edges. 

Overall it represented good value and was a comfortable clean place to stay. The location was great for exploring the city both by foot and good choice of restaurants and shopping. L’Estancia steak house just a few minutes around the corner is a great  choice for a good steak.
Reason for Brand Question Rating: Great location, very friendly and helpful staff, good value for money. A little worn around the edges in places in terms of upkeep of some rooms.
Translated Overall Comment:

Name: MARIA
Overall Comment: Our initial impression of the hotel was nice because even if we arrived early and was unable to check in the lobby has enough couches where we can snooze. The front desk were nice also. However, there was unfortunate turn of events when we got up and found that our first room (1014) only had scalding hot water flowing from the faucets. We told the front desk around midnight since we just got back from a tango show but the technician could not fix it. We had to change room at almost 2 am. Then the person put us in the smallest room (1414) which is not good when there are 2 people sharing a room. The supposed closet is so tiny it can only fot 2 shirts since half of it is taken up by the ironing board and the small round table is covered by the coffee maker. They finally gave us a better room in 1031 on our last day. We are again staying there on our way home and I hope it is a better experience. Location wise, it is good since it is in the middle of everything so you can walk pretty much everywhere.

Name: MARIA
Overall Comment:
Buenos dìas, nada que decir...o mejor dicho fueron unos dìas hermosos en la que nos sentimos muy còmodos y super atendidos.
Tengo que mencionar que soy celìaca, y encontre variedad en el restaurant, ususlamente a los celìacos nos dan fruta...pero en èsta no fuè asì! Agradezco que ademàs de ofrecerme variedad tambièn tenìan conocimiento del tema de la celiaquìa y de la contaminaciòn cruzada. Hago incapìe en lo de la celiaquìa, ya que debido a èsta condicion no fruecuento muchos hoteles porque no me dan seguridad. Pero en   fuè un paraìso desde los cuidados por mi alimentaciòn como con la habitaciòn que estuvimos (limpia y còmoda) y el trato del personal (desde las personas de recepciòn hasta el muchacho que nos entregaba el auto cada vez que lo necesitamos...todos fueron atentos, simpàticos y  cordiales. 
Muchas gracias  !!! Seguramente volveremos!!!!
Translated Overall Comment: Good morning, nothing to say...or rather, they were some beautiful days in which we felt very comfortable and well taken care of. I have to mention that I am celiac, and I found variety in the restaurant. Usually, celiacs are given fruit...but this time it was not like that! I appreciate that in addition to offering me variety, they also had knowledge of the subject of celiac disease and cross contamination. I emphasize the celiac disease, since due to this condition I do not frequent many hotels because they do not give me security. But it was a paradise from the care given to my food to the room we stayed in (clean and comfortable) and the treatment of the staff (from the people at reception to the boy who delivered the car to us every time we needed it... everyone was attentive, friendly and cordial. Thank you very much!!! We will surely return!!!!

When I checked out the fare on my bill $227!  I was told the company added a 50% upcharge because it was a holiday!  I will have a hard time recommending   to my friends when I get surprises like that.  I feel the hotel should have made some kind of middle ground compensation for this “surprise charge” to my bill. sorry but this is how I felt, especially when I decided to spoile my wife with a "good hotel".  and join the envoy club...

Name: MARIA
Overall Comment: Location was amazing, easy access to all landmarks and restaurants, shops. staff were so kind and helpful. felt safe. clean and spacious room. incredible pool and view.
Translated Overall Comment: Location was amazing, easy access to all landmarks and restaurants, shops. staff were so kind and helpful. felt safe. clean and spacious room. incredible pool and view.

Name: MARIA
Overall Comment: Receptionist was really rude, disrespectful, bad mannered and extremely arrogant. He should be ashamed of himself to brush off any complaints. He gave us a room which was unclean. The bathroom flooded every time we took shower. So we had to be cautious to use the toilet after shower to prevent falls since bathroom stayed wet whole night. At 7.30 we woke up with construction noise. Someone was banging next door. When we complained he said he can’t do anything about it and he is not aware of the noise. He refused to change the room. There were 2 towels for 3 nights. When we asked for extra towel it took them 2 hours to bring a towel. Extremely disappointing. We traveled through South America and Europe this year. That was such an unpleasant stay in Argentina. Only thing we loved is the location. Would never recommend that hotel.

La maquina de cafe del desayuno no funcionaba correctamente.

I had a problem with the hot water in the room (they changed my room), which was temporarily repeated in the other one. I highlight the kindness of all the staff.

Name: MARIA

Translated Overall Comment: The location of the hotel is spectacular. The reception at the front desk was very friendly and professional. The room was big enough. Criticism: the bathroom was very old and the building was very thinly soundproof, I could constantly hear my neighbors.

Overall Comment: Beautiful lobby and entry to Hotel, yet the Rooms need some TLC (tender loving care).  One envelope of 2 or 3 Kleenex!  Had to have the toilet fixed, almost overflowed.  Not enough English TV programs. No Charging stations by the bed, either side or in the lamps. Fairly noisy room from inside hotel hallway and surrounding rooms. But not all bad, just needs some fixing up!
Reason for Brand Question Rating: On thing is trying to get up to the Registration desks, each time that is needed to check in/out and to ask any questions. Seems each person/couple that got up to the Desks, either had a lot of problems or it just takes way to long to check in/out.

Overall Comment: Great hotel.  Thank you.  I stayed there with my daughter Isobel for 5 nights from 29 December to 3 January.  Really enjoyed it. We are going back to the same hotel on 5 January for three more nights, and we are looking forward to it very much.

Reason for Brand Question Rating: Porque realmente no solo la relación precio calidad me pareció excelente, sino que además pasé la cena de fin de año ahí. La comida abundante y exquisita, con excepción de la mesa dulce de postres que no estaba a la altura del resto del menú. Realmente pasé un fin de año inolvidable.

Name: MARIA
Overall Comment: Es evidente que falta personal en recepción y más en conserjería. Ama de llaves no es la excepción, pedimos toallas extra y demoraron unas tres horas. Ahora para retirar el desayuno puntualmente a la hora señalada no faltó personal en el comedor. Conociendo el hotel desde hace muchos años se nota solamente que   hizo algo en el cambio de lugar de la recepción que no aporta demasiado y en los baños de planta baja. No puedo creer que   no esté cuidando más esos detalles. La habitación que me tocó no daba para separar las camas, como estaba lleno el hotel no pude pedir cambio, igual no lo hubiera hecho para que me demoren como lo hicieron con las toallas, que por cierto, tuve que bajar a pedir porque nadie atendía el teléfono. Espero que   pueda mejorar las instalaciones, el hotel muestra muchos signos del paso del tiempo.
Reason for Brand Question Rating: Tienen que mejorar muchas cosas. Más personal, mantenimiento y servicio acorde.
Translated Overall Comment: It is obvious that there is a lack of staff at reception and even more so at the concierge desk. The housekeeper is no exception. We asked for extra towels and they took about three hours. Now, when it came to clearing the breakfast punctually at the appointed time, there was no shortage of staff in the dining room. Having known the hotel for many years, it is only noticeable that they did something about changing the location of the reception desk, which does not contribute much, and in the bathrooms on the ground floor. I cannot believe that they are not taking more care of these details. The room I was given did not have enough space to separate the beds. As the hotel was full, I could not ask for a change. I would not have done so to make them delay me as they did with the towels. By the way, I had to go down to ask for them because no one answered the phone. I hope that they can improve the facilities, the hotel shows many signs of the passage of time.

Name: MARIA
Overall Comment:
Unfortunately we did not have a good experience. I don’t believe this is the standard of a   hotel. When we arrived at 19h the pool was closed and only opened at 11h the next day (one of the reasons why I picked this hotel was because of the pool). We ordered room service and the food was terrible - no flavor and my salad had some rotten lettuce.  The next morning I asked the front desk if there was a place near by that they recommended for breakfast or if they knew if the San Telmo market was open and they told me I should google it. We came back to the hotel in the afternoon and ended up eating the buffet lunch(which was closing in 15 min). When we agreed to sit there they told us it was 1500 arp per person, I repeated 1500 arp and they said yes. When I went to pay the bill it was 9500 arp per person.  I would not have paid that much for mediocre food. 
Lastly we left a bag with my sons soccer jersey and a plaque behind at the buffet lunch. The next day I called the hotel and asked if they had found something and they couldn’t help me and told me to send an email to which I have not received a response. 
Having gone to multiple  ’s in my lifetime this is not the experience I expected and will make me question if I should ever stay in one again.

Name: MARIA
Overall Comment:
Chegamos dia 26/12 as 2AM, cansados. A recepcionista só achava a reserva de um quarto. Tive que pegar o meu comprovante de reserva para passar para ela. Pedi quartos próximos porque meus filhos iam ficar nele: eles foram para o 16o andar e eu e meu marido para o 12o. Em nenhum momento ela se desculpou ou se responsabilizou…disse que era o sistema. Depois de 10 minutos no quarto ela ligou dizendo que conseguiu um quarto ao lado do meu. Meus filhos foram para o 1228. De acordo com eles o quarto e banheiro eram piores. Meu banheiro estava com o papel de parede descascando, assim como a banheira e o teto mofado. 
O bar da piscina abria as 12h mas em dois dias não abriu antes das 13.15, momento em que saímos para almoçar
Reason for Brand Question Rating: As fotos não são a realidade.
Translated Overall Comment: We arrived on 12/26 at 2 AM, tired. The receptionist could only find a reservation for one room. I had to get my reservation receipt to give it to her. I asked for rooms next to each other because my children were going to stay there: they were on the 16th floor and my husband and I were on the 12th. At no point did she apologize or take responsibility… she said it was the system. After 10 minutes in the room she called to say she had found a room next to mine. My children were given 1228. According to them, the room and bathroom were worse. The wallpaper in my bathroom was peeling, as was the bathtub and the ceiling was moldy. The pool bar opened at 12 PM but on two days it didn't open until 1:15 PM, when we went out for lunch.

Everything was really wonderful. The staff was excellent. But everything was really excellent. I would really come back, and it will be like that. Thank you for having a beautiful and dreamy stay.

Name: MARIA
Overall Comment: Estamos muy decepcionados de que, a pesar de pagar más por la mejora de la habitación y el acceso al salón que ascendió a $ 200, nos cobraron $ 100 por extender el tiempo de salida de nuestra habitación porque nuestro vuelo salía a medianoche. Teníamos más de 50.000 puntos en nuestra cuenta   Bonvoy y no estabas dispuesto a respetar que éramos socios oro. Le solicitamos su consideración porque nuestros dos amigos eran miembros Platumium y podrían usar nuestros puntos Bonvoy, pero dijeron que no podemos ir en contra de nuestras políticas. Basura ! He trabajado en el Banco Mundial con Políticas y Procedimientos y puedes modificarlos a la medida de los clientes porque ellos son lo primero. pidió hablar con el gerente, dijeron que estaba ocupada y que se comunicaría con nosotros. Pero no hay respuesta. El peor Hotel. Esta es la última vez que nos quedaremos en  .
Translated Overall Comment: We are very disappointed that despite paying extra for room upgrade and lounge access which amounted to $200, we were charged $100 for extending our room check out time because our flight was leaving at midnight. We had over 50,000 points in our Bonvoy account and you were not willing to respect that we were gold members. We asked for your consideration because our two friends were platinumium members and could use our Bonvoy points but you said we can't go against our policies. Garbage ! I have worked at the World Bank with Policies and Procedures and you can bend them to suit the customers because they come first. asked to speak to the manager, they said she was busy and would get back to us. But no response. Worst Hotel. This is the last time we will stay at .

Overall Comment: Hotel location was good and room was fine, but hotel services were disappointing. Guests suffer from lack of Concierge desk, and unreliable guest service from front desk. Name: MARIA
Overall Comment: We needed an emergency stay due to a late-night cancelation of a flight. This was the first hotel that looked appropriate in the   app, so there wasn't much effort put into searching. The hotel was welcoming and inviting, but the room was dated and lacked quality. It was clean, but nothing in the room felt modern or premium for the price of the room - for reference we stayed at another hotel for the initial holiday at a lower price but with substantially elevated rooms. We were not offered an upgrade due to status though it was mentioned on the invoice and I did request it. Late-night checkout was granted but was not equally granted to other people on the flight, so it appears it was who you checked in with vs offering by a policy that is frustrating to the average user. Consistency in messaging is key. Overall, the stay was acceptable for a flight cancellation but I wouldn't rush to stay at Buenos Aires   again.
Reason for Brand Question Rating: For the majority, we haven't experienced anything less than wonderful with  . There have been some misses though, which is the reason for the 8 vs a 10.
Translated Overall Comment: We needed an emergency stay due to a late-night cancelation of a flight. This was the first hotel that looked appropriate in the   app, so there wasn't much effort put into searching. The hotel was welcoming and inviting, but the room was dated and lacked quality. It was clean, but nothing in the room felt modern or premium for the price of the room - for reference we stayed at another hotel for the initial holiday at a lower price but with substantially elevated rooms. We were not offered an upgrade due to status though it was mentioned on the invoice and I did request it. Late-night checkout was granted but was not equally granted to other people on the flight, so it appears it was who you checked in with vs offering by a policy that is frustrating to the average user. Consistency in messaging is key. Overall, the stay was acceptable for a flight cancellation but I wouldn't rush to stay at Buenos Aires   again.

Name: MARIA
Overall Comment: Un desastre la entrega de la habitación, teníamos check in a las 12 hs. Junto a otro matrimonio. Nos dieron una de las habitaciónes casi a las 19 hs. Sumado a que la última de ellas hubo q cambiarla porque estaba sucia. La gerenta del día sábado nos dijo desde las 13:30 q en unos minutos estaba lista la habitación, varias veces durante la tarde nos mintió y no hizo absolutamente nada por nosotros. El gerente del domingo Marcelo sí entendió la situación y fue muy amable. Pero la realidad e q pasamos el día sábado y mitad del domingo teniendo q pedir y quejarnos. No era el día romántico esperado. Luciana de recepcionista y Marcia del Bar dos genias, al igual q Carlos del restaurante.
Reason for Brand Question Rating: La gerenta del sábado q nos mentía y no respetó el horario de chekin
Translated Overall Comment: The room was a disaster, we had to check in at 12 noon with another couple. They gave us one of the rooms at almost 7 pm. In addition, the last one had to be changed because it was dirty. The manager on Saturday told us from 1:30 pm that the room would be ready in a few minutes, she lied to us several times during the afternoon and did absolutely nothing for us. The manager on Sunday, Marcelo, did understand the situation and was very kind. But the reality is that we spent Saturday and half of Sunday having to ask and complain. It was not the romantic day we expected. Luciana at the receptionist and Marcia at the Bar were two geniuses, as was Carlos at the restaurant.

Name: MARIA
Overall Comment:

Translated Overall Comment: Somewhat unusual features in a hotel of this category (windows facing a wall, rooms quite noisy). All this was compensated by the excellent treatment of the hotel reception staff (very good will, always available, etc.).

Name: MARIA
Overall Comment: I'm giving a low rating because when we tried to get late check-out and pay for the late check-out, we were denied due the hotel being fully booked. I believe this type of business behavior is very unethical and not good business practice.
Reason for Brand Question Rating: As mentioned earlier, I do not appreciate the manner on how we were dealt to get a "paid" late check-out especially giving us the excuse that the hotel is fully booked when in fact, the website had numerous available rooms.  Very bad business etiquette.

Lamentable se lo dije a la chica de la recepción en varias oportunidades y la respuesta fue lo lamento. Claro pero al momento de cobrar se cobró el paquete sin problema ni un vaso de agua de cortesía por el mal momento lamentable la verdad no lo recomiendo me hicieron sentir mal no voy a volver una pena.
Reason for Brand Question Rating: Porq mi estadía fue muy mala me hicieron perder tiempo y pasear por el hotel para solucionar lo que ellos no sabían qué el paquete incluía y lo peor es que lo compre en la página del hotel un desastre
Translated Overall Comment: I bought a night to relax, I entered without problems but when it was time to have tea that was included they made me wait almost 30 minutes because according to them it was not my turn until they found out (meaning they do not even know what the package includes) that was not all when I went up to reserve the massages and enter the pool they made me go back down because it was supposedly not my turn either, meaning that of my stay they made me lose more than 1 hour between one thing and another because for everything you have to go to the reception and wait in line 🤦‍♀️. Regrettable I told the girl at the reception on several occasions and the response was I'm sorry. Of course but at the time of collecting the package was charged without problem not even a complimentary glass of water for the bad time regrettable the truth is I do not recommend it they made me feel bad I will not return a shame.

Name: MARIA
Overall Comment:
WE appreciate the excellent help and attention of the staff in all its areas, very friendly and willing to assist .

One night we felt a lot of noise coming from above our room ( 2122 ) and we had to call the front desk to complaint and they apologize , they were working repairing the pool above us, the work initiated again around 6:00 am, we complained aging and it did stop.

The bathroom shower door is damaged and the main door does not lock properly.

We moved for one free night ( points ) to 603 and here the internet is poor, you have to come to the main door to connect.

Twice I ask for more towels via my BonVoy app and they never brought  them, my wife called for feather pillows and they never arrived  all for room 2123. 

Location wise is excellent , but the whole area has deteriorated .

Looking forward for my next stay in Nov 2023 , perhaps at the Sheraton San Martin or your future location in Puerto Madero.

Regards

Arfilio 
152397386

Name: MARIA
Overall Comment: Very disappointed with my experience especially as a platinum lifelong   member. It started with a terrible check in experience and 30 minute wait while they had the wrong room, then said there were no rooms in the entire hotel that fit 3 guests which is not true. Had to wait over an hour for the room to be ready. The power went out in the room twice. Every night the hot food was cold in the M lounge. Stay was so bad my guests moved to the Hilton for the reminder of the stay. I will not be staying at this hotel again nor recommend to friends. Hotel also did not have a concierge which is concerning as limited people spoke English in the hotel.

Name: MARIA
Overall Comment:
My room was not up to the standard   is known for.  Shower leaked into the bathroom floor, toilet flush valve didn’t always catch causing the water to run, no bathroom counter to lay out personal toiletries, bathroom exhaust fan had a loud bearing, no full length mirror, limited closet space for a week stay, I heard what I believe were mice at night running in the wall.  The next two experiences were really the worst. 1) Every door to the rooms on the 15th floor with the automatic closer SLAMMED shut every night. The door in the adjacent room slammed so hard it shook the bed and bedside table causing my phone to fall on the floor.  It sound like a bomb going off and was very disorienting.  At 3am, is not a restful sleep. Each of the door closers need to be adjusted or replaced with silencers. 2) the smoke detector above the bed flashed constantly illuminating the room at night.  At some point each night the signal would make the light burn brightly solid and right into my eye. Not very restful. 

As you exit the elevator on the 15th floor, you have a trip hazard where the finished floor doesn’t match the elevator opening as was sloped to meet. Morning coffee machines didn’t always work and are too close to several patron tables. Poor circulation at the coffee station. 

The good things. All the staff were super friendly. Fresh breakfast offered with a nice selection. Great baggage storage system. The car service was great. Beautiful pool (even though a little small). Loved all the comfortable available seating in the lobby. Clean public bathrooms on the main floor.
Reason for Brand Question Rating: Detailed comments provided in other section.

The hotel is clean and comfortable. The staff are very helpful. The pool is clean with wonderful views. The room was kept beautifully. The breakfasts were excellent although due to a high turnover, the staff were a little over eager to tidy up. I often got myself a coffee only to find the rest of my breakfast had been cleared away before I'd finished it. However, all in all I loved staying here.
A small point is that when I arrived there were only 2 staff dealing with a lot of new guests and I noticed that often new guests were waiting in queues to book in and a little frustrated at the wait.
Reason for Brand Question Rating: I have not stayed in another   hotel so I don't know this chain

Name: MARIA
Overall Comment: Al inicio tuve problemas con mi reserva ya que soy miembro de Bonvoy y al consultar sobre mi reserva en el hotel una semana antes de mi arribo con el area correspondiente se me indico que podia hacer un cambio sin costo alguno (de habitacion con cama queen a habitacion con 2 camas twin); sin embargo esto no fue asi y al final tuve que asumir costos adicionales que si hubiesen sido mencionados en la consulta no hubiera realizado ningun cambio. El hotel esta a la altura. Siempre hay cosas que mejorar, por ejemplo yo no tome el servicio de buffet por mi estadia y durante horas de la tarde era complicado lograr que nos atienda un mozo ya que todos se encontraban en dicha area. Tal vez mejorar la comunicacion del jefe de sala al momento de brindar informacion. Yo me acerque un par de oportunidades durante las horas de atencion del buffet a solicitarle me mandara un mozo para tomar mi orden en el area del lobby bar y fue algo tosca su comunicacion, entiendo que hay varias personas y es hora punta de atencion; pero yo tambien soy huesped del hotel y merezco la misma atencion y disposicion que el resto de huespedes. Pequeños detalles en los ascensores, por lo demas me senti muy comodo y tuve una muy buena estadia.
Translated Overall Comment: At the beginning I had problems with my reservation since I am a Bonvoy member and when I inquired about my reservation at the hotel a week before my arrival with the corresponding area, I was told that I could make a change at no cost (from a room with a queen bed to a room with 2 twin beds); however, this was not the case and in the end I had to assume additional costs that if they had been mentioned in the inquiry I would not have made any change. The hotel is up to par. There are always things to improve, for example I did not take the buffet service for my stay and during the afternoon hours it was difficult to get a waiter to serve us since everyone was in that area. Perhaps the head waiter's communication could be improved when providing information. I approached him a couple of times during buffet service hours to ask him to send a waiter to take my order in the lobby bar area and his communication was somewhat rough, I understand that there are several people and it is peak service time; But I am also a guest at the hotel and I deserve the same attention and care as the rest of the guests. Small details in the elevators, but otherwise I felt very comfortable and had a very good stay.

Name: MARIA
Overall Comment:
Decepcionante. Y siempre con la esperanza de que de alguna manera compensaran tantas carencias …. Pero no ocurrió 
Lo primero que solicitamos fue la reparación del sistema de ventilación ya que el ruido que hacía, no nos permitía dormir. Tema que supusimos ya conocían porque el panel del techo no estaba correctamente fijado. 
El día siguiente cuando hicieron la habitación no habían dejado toallas !! Y dejaron una usada que estaba para cambiar. ( evidentemente usada)
En la mesa de luz “dejaron olvidado” un aromatizador de ambiente ( dispensador). 
Hicimos los reclamos correspondientes. Cuando llevaron las toallas, una de las toallas de rostro tenía una mancha, de tinta, de maquillaje o sangre. Evidentemente el lavado no fue suficiente. …
En la noche, reclamamos el secador de pelo que despedía olor a quemado ya que estaba con los cables al aire. Por lo tanto no lo pudimos usar por el riesgo que eso conlleva.
Al otro día, reclamamos 4 veces el cambio del secador y cada vez que llamábamos a recepción, parecía que no estaban al tanto de lo solicitado. 
Nos llamó la atención que en ningún momento no se presentara alguien que nos diera algún tipo de explicación y disculpas. 
Hoteles de la cadena  , no puede tener estas carencias!!!
Reason for Brand Question Rating: Lo que se espera de   Hotels no es acorde a lo que ofrece
Translated Overall Comment: Disappointing. And always hoping that they would somehow compensate for so many shortcomings… But it didn’t happen. The first thing we requested was the repair of the ventilation system since the noise it made prevented us from sleeping. We assumed that they already knew about this because the ceiling panel was not properly fixed. The next day when they cleaned the room, they had not left any towels!! And they left a used one that needed to be changed. (obviously used). They “forgotten” an air freshener (dispenser) on the nightstand. We made the corresponding complaints. When they brought the towels, one of the face towels had a stain, either ink, makeup or blood. Obviously, the washing was not enough. … At night, we complained about the hair dryer that gave off a burning smell since the wires were exposed. Therefore, we could not use it due to the risk that this entails. The next day, we complained 4 times about the hair dryer being changed and every time we called reception, it seemed that they were not aware of what we had requested. We were surprised that at no time did anyone come to give us some kind of explanation or apology. Hotels in the chain cannot have these shortcomings!!!

Name: MARIA
Overall Comment: Hotel ben strutturato e in posizione ideale. Molto confusionari nella gestione dei check in e check out
Translated Overall Comment: Well structured hotel and in an ideal location. Very confusing in the management of check in and check out

Name: MARIA
Overall Comment: El staff del spa fue muy atento y amable, excelente trato.
Translated Overall Comment: The spa staff was very attentive and friendly, excellent treatment.

Name: MARIA
Overall Comment:
Several weeks ago, I booked three rooms for the Buenos Aires   for myself and two friends. I used four suite nights to upgrade my room since I would be staying at the hotel for several days and was hoping for a spacious room with a decent view. Within two days of my trip, I received a confirmation that my upgrade request had been accepted for a deluxe city view suite with a sitting area.

We were scheduled to arrive at the hotel after midnight on Friday, November 4 so I contacted the hotel to make them aware of this on Thursday and again on Friday. They confirmed that they made a note of my reservation and that our three rooms would be available when we arrived. 

When we arrived at check-in we were presented paperwork to sign for our rooms and get our keys. I reminded them that I was Platinum elite and my room had been upgraded. They told me room 1626 was the upgraded room. When I went to my room, it was not only small and cramped, it was next to the service area and the elevators. The detached shower head did not work properly and there was water all over the floor after a less than 5 minute shower. The television in my room did not work, I played with the cords but could not get it a signal. The safe also did not work. I requested three times for someone to come fix it.

Later that day, I went to see my two friends’ rooms and both were nearly twice the square footage and had lovely city views. Immediately, I went downstairs with my Spanish-speaking friend to see where the mix up occurred. At the front desk, they told me that nothing else was available. We even asked if they was a standard room, which would have been larger than mine, and they claimed they would try to see what they could do. 

After speaking with several front desk staff during our stay, they never accommodated me as a Platinum, soon to be Titanium, elite member. Instead, I spent four night in a cramped room with a broken television, poor views and had to endure listening to the repeated chiming of the elevators, as well as hearing the housekeeping carts and other staff come in and out of the area next to my room.

As a 1.) platinum elite member, soon to be titanium, 2.) owner of a   timeshare and 3.)   cardholder of 10+ years who has spent tens of thousands of dollars this year, I expect to receive better treatment and service. The poor experience and mediocre customer service definitely left a sour taste in my mouth.

This message is going to the hotel and   corporate. I have also sent a message on Twitter.
Translated Overall Comment:

Translated Overall Comment: Excellent location and structure

Name: MARIA
Overall Comment: The room was pretty nice, though im not sure why it had two showers. It was a king bed with a couch but no real reason needed for two showers even if you had more than two people. View from the room was another building. The rooftop pool had a good view and the staff was nice.  I spent more money on a taxi to the airport then i should have because one of the bellman set it up for me and told me it was a flat rate of 8000 pesos. I should have just gotten one myself because they are normally 4-5000 pesos so make sure you double check what the price is before you have them call a taxi for you. I didnt think about it until i was halfway there and my friend that lives there told me that was too expensive and so did the uber app which tells approximately what they will cost for taxis. It would have been cheaper if i walked outside and waved one down myself.  So lesson learned and double check the prices before you get in a taxi especially if they tell you a flat rate
Reason for Brand Question Rating: It wasnt always easy to get help from a Bellman and when i actually did use them, they gave me a inflated price. Not sure if they made money off that but I am a Bellman at a very nice place and I give better service than they did by a long shot

The doormen were very helpful but they were the only ones!

The hotel team moved my things to another room without telling me then they wanted me go get my belongings back.  They said that had made a mistake in giving the room… then they asked me to get out.

Name: MARIA
Overall Comment: Our room (2022) was nice; the renovated bathroom exceeded our expectations. The location of the hotel was not ideal -- not in the best neighborhood. We stayed there because we were attending a meeting at the hotel. We would have preferred the neighborhoods of the Alvear Palace or the Four Seasons Hotel. Furthermore, the breakfasts were not very good. The eggs were cold every day and the selection of foods was not to our liking. The people / staff at the hotel were amazingly friendly, however, and professional in every way -- from the front desk to the housekeeping people to the room service delivery people. All were friendly and couldn't do enough to please the guests.

Name: MARIA
Overall Comment:
Varios inconvenientes:
Desde un principio se hizo especial aclaración que el pago lo realizaría la Cía. y como no garantizaban la reserva se dejó una Tarjeta de Crédito personal . No obstante, al ingreso del pasajero, le solicitan la TC o el pago de la reserva, un papelón… lo termina pagando un particular. Dos días despues reclaman el pago a la Cia.,  se realiza, informan q se duplicó el pago y que el saldo quedará a favor… Al reclamar la devolución me la realizarán a tres días de recibido el pago duplicado…
Amén de todos estos inconvenientes los pasajeros informaron que el servicio no fue bueno (hablamos de una habitación Deluxe c/vistas):
-Ingresaron el sábado pero el servicio de habitación (limpieza-cambio de toallas-etc) se realizó el día lunes a pedido del huésped.
-Solicitaron una ensalada aclarando q la querían sin pollo -por ser vegetariana- y vino llena de pollo.
-Papas fritas “saladas” 
-Habitación de ese costo con el sanitario con falta de revoque en pared.
Lo único a favor que recalcaron fue la atención del personal del spa y piscina y el desayuno pero la verdad es que sobran motivos para no volver a tomar una reserva con vuestro hotel.
Translated Overall Comment: Several inconveniences: From the beginning it was made clear that the payment would be made by the company and since they did not guarantee the reservation, a personal credit card was left. However, when the passenger entered, they asked for the credit card or the payment for the reservation, a huge piece of paper… it ended up being paid by a private individual. Two days later they demanded payment from the company, it was made, they informed me that the payment was duplicated and that the balance would be in their favor… When I claimed the refund, they would make it three days after receiving the duplicate payment… In addition to all these inconveniences, the passengers reported that the service was not good (we are talking about a Deluxe room with a view): -They checked in on Saturday but the room service (cleaning-towel change-etc.) was done on Monday at the guest's request. -They requested a salad clarifying that they wanted it without chicken -because it was vegetarian- and it came full of chicken. -Salty French fries -Room of that price with the toilet with missing plaster on the wall. The only positive thing they highlighted was the attention of the spa and pool staff and the breakfast, but the truth is that there are more than enough reasons not to make a reservation with your hotel again.

Overall Comment: Muy lindo el hotel y spa pero encontre detalles no acordes a la categoría (no secador de pelo,pedi 1 en 2 ocasiones con esperas de 30 min y telefonicame nte me dijeron que había pocos. El enchufe del baño no andaba avise y siguio sin arreglarse
Reason for Brand Question Rating: Todo ok pero hayq reveer lo q les puse antes

The bathroom plug did not work, I notified them and they still did not fix it.

Name: MARIA
Overall Comment: The room product is very inconstant.  All depends what rooms you get and on what floor.  I would live to book the hotel for my customers but can not take a chance.
Reason for Brand Question Rating:
I stayed 3 different nights (total of 4 nights, 2 rooms).  The only room type you can book on points is standard.  I would spend more rooms to book higher category.  Upon arrival I was told I was upgraded. I received rooms 1129 and 1622.
1129 was a disgrace.  Many items broken, very old room, not clean.  I did not change room as it was for one night.
Upon my return 2 night later, I was given two very nice room 1421 and 1422.  Upon check out as I was returning two days later I asked for the dame rooms.  
When I came back I was told they were pre-booked for me by related as the hotel is sold out.  I was offered rooms on the 10th floor which I refused.  After 20 minutes I got two rooms 1406 and 14o7 which were nice except one of them should had two beds.  We are too tired to continue and look for rooms and decided to take them.
Translated Overall Comment: The room product is very inconstant.  All depends what rooms you get and on what floor.  I would live to book the hotel for my customers but can not take a chance.

Overall Comment: Única muy buena

Name: MARIA
Overall Comment:
La verdad fue una decepción. Llegamos para el check in a las 15 hrs como estaba previsto y recién nos dieron la habitación a las 18:30 y luego de insistir. 
Hicimos tiempo en el área de la psicina y nos dieron mal una llave del locker y el chico que la fue a cambiar demoraba, entonces sale mi novio a ver que pasaba y estaba charlando con otra empleada en las escaleras, y la respuesta fue "me entretuve charlando, perdón".
El servicio del bar no es acorde a un hotel de está categoría. Los vasos de plástico para servirse los diversos jugos que ofrecen, restan muchísima categoría. La carta de tragos es muy limitada y los mismos también se sirven en vasos de plástico duro. No tengo problema en pagar un trago carisimo como pagué este, pero lo mínimo que uno espera es que esté bien presentado, con vajilla, tamaño y acorde a lo que uno está pagando.
Casi todo el personal que nos atendio, muy floja la atención, con la excepción de la Sra Fernanda Ayala que nos atendió sumamente bien durante el desayuno. 
Desde ya que no nos compensaron con un late check out, luego de las más de 3 horas de demora que tuvimos para ingresar a la habitación. 
Fue una invitación sorpresa que le hice a mi novio por su cumpleaños y la verdad, no resultó buena. No volvería.
Translated Overall Comment: The truth is that it was a disappointment. We arrived for check in at 3pm as planned and they only gave us the room at 6:30pm after insisting. We wasted time in the pool area and they gave us the wrong locker key and the guy who went to change it was late, so my boyfriend came out to see what was going on and was chatting with another employee on the stairs, and the answer was "I was busy chatting, sorry." The bar service is not in line with a hotel of this category. The plastic cups to serve the various juices they offer, take away a lot of class. The drinks menu is very limited and they are also served in hard plastic cups. I have no problem paying for an expensive drink like this one, but the least one expects is that it is well presented, with tableware, size and according to what one is paying. Almost all the staff that served us, very weak attention, with the exception of Mrs. Fernanda Ayala who served us extremely well during breakfast. Of course, they didn't compensate us with a late check out, after the more than 3-hour delay we had to get into the room. It was a surprise invitation I made to my boyfriend for his birthday and the truth is, it didn't turn out well. I wouldn't go back.

 La comida exquisita. Realmente una experiencia hermosa.

Había contratado con acceso a pileta x booking.. ( no había restricciones).  Pero cuando llegamos al hotel nos dijeron que había un evento. Por lo que se pudo utilizar por menos de una hora ya que el personal estaba organizando el evento y molestaba la tranquilidad del espacio de la pileta.
Los bordes de la pileta. En donde está la línea de agua hay grasa pegada. Falta limpieza constante . Verifiquen lo que digo x favor.
Al otro dia.. quisimos utilizarla nuevamente a las 9 am y el agua estaba fría. No pudiendo estar el tiempo para disfrutarlo.
Reason for Brand Question Rating:
La pileta ya lk explique..bordes sucios del mosaico dámero. 
Habitación 928 ha ya mancha grande de humedad en pared..horrible.
Vidrios divisores de pileta..sarro.. 
Primer día no kos dieron ni bata mi pantuflas.
Translated Overall Comment: I had booked with pool access via booking.. (there were no restrictions). But when we arrived at the hotel they told us there was an event. So it could be used for less than an hour since the staff was organizing the event and it disturbed the tranquility of the pool area. The edges of the pool. Where the water line is, there is grease stuck. Constant cleaning is lacking. Please verify what I say. The next day.. we wanted to use it again at 9 am and the water was cold. We couldn't spend time enjoying it.

Como resarcimiento me prometieron una cena 3 pasos que nunca llego, y tampoco la iba a aceptar. Mi dignidad no es un sándwich de milanesa. Seguro no les interesará pero tampoco volvería.

I'm sure they won't be interested, but I wouldn't go back either. Thank you.

Overall Comment:
Locación inmejorable.

Reason for Brand Question Rating:
El personal es muy amable y las instalaciones agradables.
Sin embargo, es incomprensible que siendo un hotel 5 estrellas las amenities más básicas como cepillos de dientes, pantuflas, albornoz, secador de pelo, NO están incluidas desde el principio en la habitación.
El personal se esforzó en traernos las amenities a medida que las pedimos, pero es incómodo tanto para nosotros para ellos como para nosotros tener que llamar para pedir cada una de las cosas. Incluso hubo la graciosa anécdota que pedimos cepillos de dientes y los funcionarios nos trajeron cepillos para la cabeza (peines).
Por lo anterior, no doy más de un 7 como puntuación
Translated Overall Comment: Unbeatable location. Rooftop area/pool the most memorable aspect of our stay

Name: MARIA
Overall Comment: The rooms need an upgrade. I stayed on the left side facing an alley with a bunch of engines that ran nonstop. You could hear them throughout the night. Either stop using those rooms facing the alley or change the windows to soundproof.  The wifi went off at the rooms and no one notified us. I had to go work from a coffee shop! Finally, I left an item in the room after checking out and when I reached out to inquire about it I was told they did not find anything. I made my way into the airport to catch my flight and not even 20 minutes later the hotel reached out to tell me they did find the item. I asked them to please ship it to my US address as I was already at the airport, explained that had they checked properly when I asked the first time I could’ve stopped by the hotel on my way to the airport. The hotel response was that they could not bring it to me to the airport (which I did not ask for) or ship it, but that they could keep it for me so I could pick it next time I came to Buenos Aires. Are you kidding me? Very disappointed to say the least, regretted using my   points for this.
Reason for Brand Question Rating: Please read previous comments regarding poor wifi, facilities in need of upgrade, sound proof windows for rooms facing alley with a bunch of running engines, and terrible customer service when staff refused to ship an item I left behind
Translated Overall Comment: The rooms need an upgrade. I stayed on the left side facing an alley with a bunch of engines that ran nonstop. You could hear them throughout the night. Finally, I left an item in the room after checking out and when I reached out to inquire about it I was told they did not find anything. I made my way into the airport to catch my flight and not even 20 minutes later the hotel reached out to tell me they did find the item. Overall Comment: Buen hotel, céntrico, pero ruidoso, tanto externa como internamente. La renovación llevada a cabo por   no abarca parte del mobiliario (el armario no está a la altura de  , por ejemplo).

Parte del mobiliario del antiguo Panamericano debería ser renovado (ejemplo: armario, área de la piscina...). La zona del desayuno no es particularmente confortable.
Translated Overall Comment: Nice hotel, centrally located, but noisy, both externally and internally. The renovation carried out by does not include some of the furniture (the wardrobe is not up to par, for example).

Name: MARIA
Overall Comment:
En general, la estancia estuvo cómoda, agradable, con algunos comentarios:

1. House-keeping demorado en hacer la habitación;
2. Hice una reserva por una habitación sin desayuno y al parecer fue cobrada con desayuno. Reserva N°97841617 
Agradeceré confirmar cuál fue el valor cobrado. 
En este mismo sentido, dejé una garantía en dolar, y agradeceré confirmar si fue o no anulada.
3. Recepción - Restaurant - SPA : excelente cordialidad y magníficos servicios/productos.

A pesar de lo anterior, no los cambio como Hotel. 
Pero me parece importante, comunicar estos detalles, como oportunidades de mejora. 

De hecho, debo hacer una nueva reserva para los días 24 al 28 octubre próximos.
Reason for Brand Question Rating: De acuerdo a los comentarios entregados al inicio de esta encuesta. Gracias por preguntar.
Translated Overall Comment: Overall, the stay was comfortable and pleasant, with a few comments: 1. Housekeeping was late in making the room; 2. I made a reservation for a room without breakfast and it seems that it was charged with breakfast. Reservation No. 97841617 I would appreciate confirming what the amount charged was. In this same sense, I left a guarantee in dollars, and I would appreciate confirming whether or not it was cancelled. 3. Reception - Restaurant - SPA: excellent friendliness and magnificent services/products. Despite the above, I would not change them as a Hotel. But I think it is important to communicate these details as opportunities for improvement. In fact, I must make a new reservation for October 24 to 28.

Name: MARIA
Overall Comment:
El hotel es elegante buenos espacios , si en los baños cuando se lava las manos suena en el escurridero la trampa de de descarga está mal colocada 
Si destacar el trato de la recepcionista Viviana que en varias ocaciones interrumpió la atención que hacía el recepcionista cundo me estaba registrando en una actitud peyorativa y grosera manifestaba que la habitación inferior que me estaban otorgando es la que me correspondía por los 57.720 pesos , por qué yo le solicitaba al dependiente que me diera la habitación con vista a la calle , además fueron tres ocaciones que interrumpió , por que yo no tenía reservación y ella decía que si ti tenía lo requerido , que no me arriende la habitación , después pedía garantía de una tarjeta ya habiéndole pagado en efectivo , para lo cual le manifesté que no tenía en el momento y está Sra groseramente manifestaba que entonces nos retiráramos 
el funcionario tomó la alternativa de pedirme 70 usd en garantía , yo le pase 80 , en vista de las reiteradas y negativas interrupciones la increpé diciéndole que deje de hacerlo y me respondió en tono golpeado que su compañero de recepción era nuevo , pero no es la forma 
Le falta educación y mejor trato 
Nosotros los consumidores merecemos buena atención
esta persona piensa erróneamente en su aptitud hostil
Reason for Brand Question Rating: Bueno , nos sentimos discriminados con mi familia por la actitud de Viviana
Translated Overall Comment: The hotel is elegant, good spaces, if in the bathrooms when you wash your hands it makes a sound in the drain, the discharge trap is poorly placed. If I highlight the treatment of the receptionist Viviana who on several occasions interrupted the attention that the receptionist was doing when I was registering in a pejorative and rude attitude, she stated that the lower room that they were giving me was the one that corresponded to me for the 57,720 pesos, because I asked the clerk to give me the room with a view of the street, in addition there were three occasions that she interrupted, because I did not have a reservation and she said that if you had what was required, do not rent the room to me, then she asked for a guarantee of a card having already paid her in cash, for which I told her that I did not have it at the time and this lady rudely stated that then we should withdraw, the official took the alternative of asking me for 70 usd as a guarantee, I gave her 80, in view of the repeated and negative interruptions I reprimanded her telling her to stop doing it and she responded in a harsh tone that her receptionist was new, but that is not the way. She lacks education and better treatment. We consumers deserve good attention. This person thinks wrongly about her hostile attitude.

Name: MARIA
Overall Comment:
I enjoyed the stay at the  . The service was excellent both at the front desk as well as in the restaurant and cleaning staff.
     The one issue I had was with the maintenance of the rooms. The cleanliness was excellent, but the room looked as though it had been flooded multiple times. Wallpaper was peeling, missing grout, rotting baseboards, and water stains were all over the bathroom. The chairs in the main room were peeling, Iron had burnt crap on it that stained my shirt. I have made four business trips to Buenos Aires in four different hotels, most of which were at the significantly cheaper end of the spectrum than a  . This was clearly at the bottom in terms of room condition and quality.
Reason for Brand Question Rating: I have only been a member of Bonvoy for about a year and most of my time has been spent in Houston at what appeared to be a very new hotel. It was perfect. Maintenance is an issue at the Buenos Aires hotel. Also on longer stays in Houston, I was provided MClub access. In Buenos Aires, my status was not really acknowledged. Pretty inconsistent, but it is only a comparison of two hotels.
Translated Overall Comment:

Un hotel de primera. Como en casa, muy buena atención, muy buena cocina, y un lugar excelente para relajar.

Reason for Brand Question Rating: Porque no hubo nada para objetar. Muy conforme con las instalaciones y el personal muy amable
Translated Overall Comment: A first class hotel. Like home, very good service, very good cuisine, and an excellent place to relax. I would like to be able to play better music in the gym since the music system does not have Bluetooth. But that is just to give a minimal constructive criticism. Very satisfied.

Name: MARIA
Overall Comment: Estancia muy confortable, excelente trato de todo el personal, mi puntuación no llego al 10 por el hecho de no haber podido disfrutar de habitación y comodidades adaptadas para personas con discapacidad, el resto insisto personal excelente, comunicación con todo el personal en sus diferentes cargos jerárquicos impecable, espero el comentario sobre disconformidad ayude a sumar facilidades para las personas con limitaciones motoras especialmente, les dejo cordial saludo
Reason for Brand Question Rating: Ya exprese comentario al respecto en mi exposición inicial
Translated Overall Comment: Very comfortable stay, excellent treatment from all staff, my score did not reach 10 due to the fact that I was not able to enjoy a room and amenities adapted for people with disabilities, the rest I insist excellent staff, communication with all staff in their different hierarchical positions impeccable, I hope the comment on disagreement helps to add facilities for people with motor limitations especially, I send you my cordial greeting

Name: MARIA
Overall Comment: É a terceira vez que me hospedo no   Buenos Aires e é a terceira experiência positiva que tenho do hotel. Todo o cuidado e carinho dos atendentes nos faz sentir em casa.

Name: MARIA

Name: MARIA
Overall Comment:
Buena experiencia pero lamentablemente mi hija se contagio una otitis externa aguda supurada por la pileta lo cual habla de una higiene deficiente con contaminacion, inadmisible en un hotel de esta categoria ( soy médica ).
Por lo que me cobraron el desayuno esperaba algo mejor.
Las instalaciones  nos gustaron mucho y el espacio de la pileta tambien. Buena atencion del personal salvo de una masajista que fue grosera al pedirnos silencio en el vestuario porque hacia masajes cosa que no sabiamos y no hay carteles.
Gracias
Translated Overall Comment: Good experience but unfortunately my daughter got acute otitis externa from the pool, which shows poor hygiene and contamination, which is unacceptable in a hotel of this category (I am a doctor). Given the amount they charged me for breakfast, I expected something better. We really liked the facilities and the pool area as well. The staff was very attentive, except for one masseuse who was rude when she asked us to be quiet in the locker room because she did massages, which we didn't know about and there are no signs. Thank you.

Name: MARIA
Overall Comment: habitación con puerta comunicante que no tiene aislación acústica de la habitación contigua. Curiosamente una gran pantalla de televisión en una ubicación lateral a la cama. El sistema de climatización poco efectiva. Almohadas y cama ok. Iluminación deficiente. Vista a terraza de guarda de desechos.
Reason for Brand Question Rating: en mi caso la habitación no condice con la calidad del hotel. del personal nocturno la señorita atenta , el caballero no tanto
Translated Overall Comment: Room with connecting door that has no sound insulation from the adjoining room. Curiously, a large television screen in a position to the side of the bed. The air conditioning system is not very effective. Pillows and bed are ok. Poor lighting. View of the terrace of the waste storage area.

Name: MARIA
Overall Comment: Un día , por trabajo , faltó un buen precio de un auto remis para llevarme a aerop Ezeiza, todo lo demás excelente
Translated Overall Comment: One day, for work, there was not a good price for a taxi to take me to Ezeiza airport, everything else was excellent.

Name: MARIA
Overall Comment:
Das Hotel ist sehr schön und gut gelegen. Das Personal ist super nett.

Die Betten waren allerdings nicht so toll wie andere   Betten. Außerdem war das Zimmer viel zu hellhörig. Man hat jedes Wort vom Telefonat des Nachbarn gehört.

Mein Sohn hat eine schwarze Adidas Training Jacke vergessen, ich hätte gerne, dass sie mir nachgeschickt wird, kann mich aber mit dem Hotel nicht kontaktieren.

Bitte schicken Sie mir eine E-Mail an Guido.Frank@gmail.com

Vielen Dank und beste Grüße
Guido Frank
Reason for Brand Question Rating: Ich fand es nicht gut, kein Zimmerupgrade zu bekommen, und dafür ein sehr lautes Zimmer zu bekommen
Translated Overall Comment: The hotel is very nice and well located. The staff is super nice. The beds were not as great as other beds, however. The room was also far too thinly soundproof. You could hear every word of the neighbor's phone call. My son forgot a black Adidas training jacket, I would like it to be sent to me, but I cannot contact the hotel. Please send me an email to Guido.Frank@gmail.com Many thanks and best regards, Guido Frank

Name: MARIA
Overall Comment:
I enjoyed my stay. Excellent location, good food, helpful and friendly staff, beautiful lobby and common areas. The rooms are comfortable. 
Issues: - no hair dryer in the room, - no instructions how to operate the AC, I did not realize it was off, it showed “24”, but it was getting hot, I figured out how to operate by pushing the buttons; roof top closes too early, have yo go thru the pool and water on the floor up get to the rooftop view to enjoy the view. 
Breakfast is amazing, excellent variety, I did not realize the eggs can be made to order (I saw a waiter bringing eggs sunny side up for the guest).
Translated Overall Comment:
I enjoyed my stay. Excellent location, good food, helpful and friendly staff, beautiful lobby and common areas. The rooms are comfortable. 
Issues: - no hair dryer in the room, - no instructions how to operate the AC, I did not realize it was off, it showed “24”, but it was getting hot, I figured out how to operate by pushing the buttons; roof top closes too early, have yo go thru the pool and water on the floor up get to the rooftop view to enjoy the view. 
Breakfast is amazing, excellent variety, I did not realize the eggs can be made to order (I saw a waiter bringing eggs sunny side up for the guest).

Name: MARIA
Overall Comment: I had a wonderful stay of seven nights over a period of 10 days.  My rooms were nicely appointed, extremely clean, and had wonderful beds/linens.  Most importantly, at least for me, was the quality of the hotel staff.  They made me truly feel “at home”.
Reason for Brand Question Rating: I’ve stayed any many   Hotels over the years and this was an excellent experience.  I know that this property has not been a   for a long period of time, and there are still some issues, but the staff was just so outstanding and hospitable that I felt truly appreciated as a   Elite Member.
Translated Overall Comment: I had a wonderful stay of seven nights over a period of 10 days.  My rooms were nicely appointed, extremely clean, and had wonderful beds/linens.  Most importantly, at least for me, was the quality of the hotel staff.  They made me truly feel “at home”.

Name: MARIA
Overall Comment: La estancia fue buena. Lo que no fue bueno es el servicio de gastronomia.
Reason for Brand Question Rating: Tienen una gran estructura. Pero el.servicio gastrononomico no estuvo a la altura.
Translated Overall Comment: The stay was good. What was not good was the food service.

Name: MARIA
Overall Comment: Alojamos por un día en una habitación classic en la habitación 1823, en general todo bien, unos desperfectos como que en la habitación del baño está salido el enchufe. La piscina y las instalaciones comunes son el punto alto debido a la preciosa vista desde el obelisco y las completas instalaciones. El punto bajo es que en la habitación existe una puerta que colinda con otra habitación, el cual no tiene aislación de sonido, escuchando a nuestro vecino conversar hasta las 2 de la mañana por telefono, lo que no corresponde con la calidad del hotel y el precio pagado para una estancia tranquila, además se debería incluir una carta en la habitación para indicar los valores de los consumibles en el frigobar, ya que en otros hoteles de 5 estrellas (fuera de la argentina, este fue nuestro primer hotel en buenos aires) las bebidas, café y demasés que se incorporan dentro de la habitación son cortesía del hotel. En nuestra opinión, recomendariamos el pago de los programas por un día, pero no las habitaciones classics.
Reason for Brand Question Rating: Entre los servicios utilizados, la piscina maravillosa, el sauna es bueno, el desayuno muy completo, pero la incomodidad de no tener un buen aislamiento y escuchar a los vecinos conversando toda la noche, no fueron una buena experiencia con respecto a la comidad de la habitación.
Translated Overall Comment: We stayed for one day in a classic room in room 1823. In general everything was fine, except for a few minor flaws, such as the plug in the bathroom coming out. The pool and the common facilities are the high point due to the beautiful view from the obelisk and the complete facilities. The low point is that in the room there is a door that adjoins another room, which has no sound insulation, so we could hear our neighbor talking until 2 in the morning on the phone, which does not correspond to the quality of the hotel and the price paid for a quiet stay. In addition, a letter should be included in the room to indicate the prices of the consumables in the minibar, since in other 5-star hotels (outside Argentina, this was our first hotel in Buenos Aires) the drinks, coffee and other things that are included in the room are courtesy of the hotel. In our opinion, we would recommend paying for the programs for one day, but not the classic rooms.

Name: MARIA
Overall Comment: Really bad experience with customer service provided by the front y desk personnel. I had to change rooms because my room door became dysfunctional. I was then changed to a room that the shower had a bad water leak.

The Buenos Aires   is a beautiful hotel. The location is great.
I found the price a little expensive compared to other similar hotels.
The room temperature was hard to adjust and the room was often too warm. We did not have robes in our room, this made it difficult to go to the pool as it was the other tower. We also did not have a hair dryer, I had to ask for one.
Reason for Brand Question Rating: We were unable to obtain a room with a street view. The room temperature was too hot and hard to change it. Our room was missing robes and a hairdryer.

Name: MARIA
Overall Comment: This hotel is perfectly located on Avenida 9 de Julio, steps away from one of the main city attractions the Obelisco and easy access to other key streets like Avenida Corrientes, Cordoba, Carlos Pellegrini. Its just opposite the Porteño Tango theatre and the Teatro Colon.  Very nearby, walking distance you can get to the other main attractions like the Plaza de Mayo, Casa Rosada, el Cabildo and the Cathedral. The rooms are well appointed and maintained. Ours featured a sitting area at the entrance, a generous closet with a safe, large toilet & bath/shower area and comfortable king bed, with our window looking right out onto the avenue and the Obelisco.  In general staff were helpful and courteous, got us reservations popular restaurants and gave great tips for things to do and places to see.
Reason for Brand Question Rating: I’ve stayed at many   chain hotels and the service and quality her are very comparable.

Very nearby, walking distance you can get to the other main attractions like the Plaza de Mayo, Casa Rosada, el Cabildo and the Cathedral. The rooms are well appointed and maintained. Ours featured a sitting area at the entrance, a generous closet with a safe, large toilet & bath/shower area and comfortable king bed, with our window looking right out onto the avenue and the Obelisco.  In general staff were helpful and courteous, got us reservations popular restaurants and gave great tips for things to do and places to see.

La habitación era pequeña y no tenía nada de cortesía ni si quiera una cápsula de café ni agua. La tv No era smart así  que no se podía usar más que para ver unos canales de aire.
