Name: MARTIN
Overall Comment:
Muy bueno el hotel, en cuanto al servicio algunos detalles a mejorar...
en el sector de la piscina no había batas, nos dijeron que nos traían y nunca llegaron en 3 hs....  luego cuando un empleado subió con 2 batas para otros huéspedes, una empleada le dijo, no mejor no las entregues porque te van a empezar a pedir todos.... y a medida que entraba gente nueva a la zona ingresaban con batas, o sea, que en algún lado tenían, pero no las querían entregar allí mismo..... me pareció pésima la actitud de la empleada.
El servicio del bar del piso 23 demoró mucho, por 2 tortas y 2 cafés ... primero trajeron las tortas y más de 10 minutos después los cafés .... 
Al momento del check out, se ve que la empleada era nueva y no sabía cómo emitir una factura A .... la iba guiando otra empleada...

Muy bueno el servicio del restaurant y buena carta.

Resumen, muy buena la estadía, pero el servicio puede mejorar...
Reason for Brand Question Rating: ver primer comentario donde se explican los motivos
Translated Overall Comment: The hotel was very good, as for the service, there were some details to improve... in the pool area there were no robes, they told us they would bring them to us and they never arrived in 3 hours... then when an employee came up with 2 robes for other guests, an employee told him, no, it's better not to give them because everyone will start asking for them... and as new people entered the area, they entered with robes, that is, they had them somewhere, but they didn't want to give them there... I thought the employee's attitude was terrible. The service at the bar on the 23rd floor took a long time, for 2 cakes and 2 coffees... first they brought the cakes and more than 10 minutes later the coffees... At check out, it seems that the employee was new and did not know how to issue an A invoice... another employee was guiding her... The restaurant service was very good and good menu. Summary, very good stay, but the service can improve...

He requested, empathetic, and lent me his cell phone so I could call another hotel since Reception did not solve the problem. Absent guest relation.

En un bar o restorán de primera linea cuesta un tercio o a lo sumo la mitad.
Translated Overall Comment: The experience is positive, the location and service are first class. But the truth is that I think there are rooms that need maintenance and improvements in many details. Additionally, there are things that I think are very excessively priced, for example an Aperol or a Gin Tonic at 2000 pesos is excessive. In a first class bar or restaurant it costs a third or at most half.

Name: MACARENA
Overall Comment: Muy lindo todo, quizás mejoraría el área de la pileta ya que no había sillones suficientes, y el color del agua medio turbia. Riquísimo y abundante el desayuno, así como la cena!
Translated Overall Comment: Everything was very nice, perhaps the pool area could be improved as there were not enough chairs and the water was a bit cloudy. The breakfast was delicious and plentiful, as was the dinner!

Name: HECTOR
Overall Comment: Excelente la ubicación del hotel asi como sus servicios, todo muy bien
Translated Overall Comment: Excellent location of the hotel as well as its services, everything very good

Name: ANIBAL
Overall Comment:
Tuvimos una experiencia muy positiva en el hotel; destacamos la calidad de la habitación y la muy buena atención y propuestas recibidas en el desayuno y restaurante, así como la excelente disposición del personal de asistencia con el equipaje. Celebramos las mejoras en el gimnasio, aunque consideramos que aún deben hacerse inversiones en puesta a punto del equipamiento. La única debilidad a mencionar es la prologada demora en el servicio de habitación, tanto para proveernos de elementos de uso (toallas, secador de pelo), como para los pedidos de comida.
Sin dudas volveremos al hotel a la brevedad.
Reason for Brand Question Rating: Se percibe un esfuerzo continuo en mejorar las instalaciones y el servicio, y el esmero del personal en brindar una atención adecuada. Es entendible que una infraestructura tan grande requiera grandes inversiones de mantenimiento y mejora, que seguramente se continuarán en forma gradual.
Translated Overall Comment: We had a very positive experience at the hotel. We highlight the quality of the room and the excellent service and suggestions received at breakfast and restaurant, as well as the excellent disposition of the staff assisting with luggage. We welcome the improvements in the gym, although we consider that investments still need to be made in updating the equipment. The only weakness to mention is the long delay in room service, both in providing us with items of use (towels, hair dryer), and for food orders. We will definitely return to the hotel soon.

Name: TANIA
Overall Comment: En principio, en la primera habitación (2123) que me aloje estuvo muy linda, toda la comodidad salvo que entran los que trabajan ahí sin permiso a revisar el minibar, me pasó que me tocaba la puerta y yo no atendía porque me estaba duchando y cuando salgo oigo que alguien entra a mi habitación y le dije que me estaba cambiando y se fue, quería revisar el minibar, lo comenté pero no hicieron nada. En segundo lugar, yo había agregado una noche pero lamentablemente no me podía quedar en la misma habitación porque ya estaba reservada y me llegan a la habitación 1023 y no fue lindo la verdad: la bañera no tenía vidrio, por tanto, toda el agua se salía para afuera; la cortina tenía sangre, la sabana había pelos, la verdad que se notaba que la estaban arreglando y me mandaron a mi ahí. La verdad que estuvo muy lindo hasta que me enviaron a la habitación 1023 y hasta que el empleado se metió en mi habitación sin mi consentimiento.
Translated Overall Comment: At first, the first room I stayed in (2123) was very nice, very comfortable except for the fact that the people who work there come in without permission to check the minibar. I had a knock on the door and I didn't answer because I was taking a shower. When I came out, I heard someone come into my room and I told them I was changing and they left. I wanted to check the minibar. I mentioned it but they didn't do anything. Secondly, I had added a night but unfortunately I couldn't stay in the same room because it was already reserved and they put me in room 1023 and it wasn't nice, to be honest: the bathtub didn't have glass, so all the water came out; the curtain had blood on it, the sheet had hair on it, the truth is that it was noticeable that they were fixing it and they sent me there. The truth is that it was very nice until they sent me to room 1023 and until the employee came into my room without my consent.

Name: PETER
Overall Comment: Sehr freundlicher Empfang. An der Rezeption war Viviana eine große Hilfe - sie war sehr hilfsbereit und freundlich. Hervorragende Lage. Sehr schönes Schwimmbad im 23. Stock. Enttäuschendes Frühstück. Teilweise sind Renovierungen unbedingt notwendig, etwa im Badezimmer. Zimmer sauber, aber relativ einfach
Translated Overall Comment: Very friendly welcome. Viviana was a great help at the reception - she was very helpful and friendly. Excellent location. Very nice swimming pool on the 23rd floor. Disappointing breakfast. Some renovations are absolutely necessary, for example in the bathroom. Rooms clean but relatively basic

Name: JOYCE
Overall Comment: Reception either needs help or more people taking notes .. is not possible to ask for somethjng 5 times in 2 weeks and never get it
Translated Overall Comment: Reception either needs help or more people taking notes .. is not possible to ask for somethjng 5 times in 2 weeks and never get it

Name: ARNT-PHILIPP
Overall Comment: Very friendly staff members organized soccer tickets, made early check-in possible, helped with many questions. All members are competent and helpful.
Translated Overall Comment: Very friendly staff members organized soccer tickets, made early check-in possible, helped with many questions. All members are competent and helpful.

Name: GERARDO
Overall Comment:
El trato es amable. Pero se nota el deterioro o l baja de calidad. La habitación con la ducha (el cabezal) todo tapado salía agua literal por 5 chorritos. Pelos de mala limpieza. Un frigobar que no funcionó en 4 días de estadía… si una piscina fantástica que hace soportable las inconsistencias del alojamiento. Si bien cierra muy temprano se disfruta. 
En cuanto al check out me pareció raro no tener ningún comprobante de la cancelación del voucher en garantía porque supuestamente se hace por mail… (en todos los hotels es un simple proceso online y demora 2 minutos) 
En fin. Queriendo ser más que solo una ubicación y una pileta. Pero aún lo veo lejos.
Translated Overall Comment: The service is friendly. But the deterioration or drop in quality is noticeable. The room with the shower (the shower head) was completely clogged and water literally came out in 5 streams. Hairs from poor cleaning. A minibar that didn't work for 4 days of stay... yes, a fantastic pool that makes the inconsistencies of the accommodation bearable. Although it closes very early, it is enjoyable. As for check out, it seemed strange to me not to have any proof of the cancellation of the voucher as a guarantee because it is supposedly done by email... (in all hotels it is a simple online process and takes 2 minutes). Anyway. Wanting to be more than just a location and a pool. But I still see it far away.

Name: ROMINA
Overall Comment: Excelente experiencia. Muy buena atención de todo el personal en general, buen desayuno y buena opción gastronómica. Repetiremos seguramente.
Translated Overall Comment: Excellent experience. Very good service from all staff in general, good breakfast and good gastronomic options. We will definitely repeat.

Name: MARCELO
Overall Comment: Estuve un par de días participando de un evento de empresa.- Todo lo relativo al alojamiento y evento estuvo muy bien en todo sentido.-
Translated Overall Comment: I spent a couple of days participating in a company event. - Everything related to the accommodation and event was very good in every way. -

Name: ROSANA
Overall Comment: Excelente!!
Translated Overall Comment: Excellent!!

Name: LAURA
Overall Comment: Excelente atención! Mejoraría conexión a internet
Translated Overall Comment: Excellent service! I would improve the internet connection

Name: MARIA
Overall Comment: Cálida, confortable y super recomendable
Reason for Brand Question Rating: Porque mi estadía fue super confortable en todos los aspectos que uno necesita cuando está de viaje
Translated Overall Comment: Warm, comfortable and highly recommended

Name: PABLO
Overall Comment: La atención del personal es excelente. La ubicación y las vistas del P23 increible. Puntos en contra: la bañera de la habitación no tiene jaccuzi, la pileta del spa tampoco tiene jacuzzi,  ni cuello de cisne. Son cosas muy básicas para un spa y considero que deberian incorporar pronto.
Translated Overall Comment: The staff is excellent. The location and views from P23 are incredible. The downsides: the bathtub in the room does not have a jacuzzi, the spa pool does not have a jacuzzi or a swan neck. These are very basic things for a spa and I think they should be incorporated soon.

Name: SILVINA
Overall Comment: buenos dias...cuando reserve me dijeron que la habitacion tenia bañera lo cual no fue asi.  pedi otra frazada y no tenian.  el desayuno no era muy variado. gracias.
Translated Overall Comment: Good morning...When I booked, they told me that the room had a bathtub, which it didn't. I asked for another blanket and they didn't have one. The breakfast wasn't very varied. Thank you.

Name: SEBASTIAN
Overall Comment:
la estancia fue muy agradable, el hotel muy limpio.
tuve un inconveniente que me costó muy caro, ya que tuve que pagar una multa de transito porque apagaron las luces de mi coche en el parking y yo estoy acostumbrado a que siempre estén encendidas. Lo triste de esta situación fue que yo personalmente le pedí que no las apagaran porque siempre doy por hecho que están encendidas y mi coche no lo indica en el tablero. ..en fin un detalle que me costó caro pero que no opacó lo bien que pasamos en sus instalaciones.
Translated Overall Comment: The stay was very pleasant, the hotel was very clean. I had a problem that cost me dearly, as I had to pay a traffic fine because they turned off my car lights in the parking lot and I am used to them always being on. The sad thing about this situation was that I personally asked them not to turn them off because I always assume that they are on and my car does not indicate this on the dashboard. .. in short, a detail that cost me dearly but that did not overshadow the good time we had in their facilities.

Name: BETTINA
Overall Comment: Muy buena
Translated Overall Comment: Very good

Name: DARREN
Overall Comment: Great location & very friendly staff. The lobby, elevators or restaurants were not real busy, yet no room upgrade was available for Bonvoy Gold Elite status. Disappointing. Also, no USB ports in the entire room. View from rooftop pool is fantastic!
Reason for Brand Question Rating: Each room should have USB ports. Also, the cappuccino machine in the room had no pods to make a morning drink. Was I supposed to bring my own?
Translated Overall Comment: Great location & very friendly staff. The lobby, elevators or restaurants were not real busy, yet no room upgrade was available for Bonvoy Gold Elite status. Disappointing. Also, no USB ports in the entire room. View from rooftop pool is fantastic!

Name: ANDE
Overall Comment: Tivemos um pequeno contra-tempo em nossa reserva, mas o gerente Norberto foi extremante cordial e de bom censo, garantindo uma estadia e uma experiência a altura do hotel.
Reason for Brand Question Rating: Localiza, qualidade do serviço e atitude de pensar no cliente, de parte da gerência.
Translated Overall Comment: We had a small setback with our reservation, but the manager Norberto was extremely friendly and good-natured, ensuring a stay and an experience worthy of the hotel.

Name: CARLOS
Overall Comment: Hermoso hotel y servicio excelente.
Reason for Brand Question Rating: Nos ha dado una experiencia inolvidable.
Translated Overall Comment: Beautiful hotel and excellent service.

Name: AGUSTINA
Overall Comment:
La verdad que con mi flia nos quedamos muy contentos, la atención del personal es excelente. El hotel es muy lindo, disfrutamos mucho la pileta y la amabilidad de todo el personal. 
Lo único a detallar, que un día llame para pedir si podían secar el baño y cambiar las toallas porque mi bebe había prendido el agua del bidet (dije que nos íbamos a cenar, que podían pasar cuando puedan) y no vinieron. Después llegue de cenar y llame para reclamar pero les dije que no pasaran porque ya era muy tarde. Pero todo lo demás super recomendable
Reason for Brand Question Rating: Muy satisfechos con nuestra experiencia. Todo hermoso. Habíamos ido en mendoza a un hotel by    y nada que ver, le faltaba mucho mantenimiento en las áreas comunes, había sacado fotos para mandarles pero al final no lo hice.
Translated Overall Comment: The truth is that my family and I were very happy, the attention of the staff is excellent. The hotel is very nice, we really enjoyed the pool and the kindness of all the staff. The only thing to mention is that one day I called to ask if they could dry the bathroom and change the towels because my baby had turned on the water in the bidet (I said that we were going to dinner, that they could come when they could) and they didn't come. Then I came back from dinner and called to complain but I told them not to come because it was too late. But everything else is highly recommended.

Name: OMAR
Overall Comment:
Fue una estancia agradable, todos los servicios comprometidos fueron cumplidos y todos de excelente calidad.
Es para recomendar y volver a vivir la experiencia
Translated Overall Comment: It was a pleasant stay, all the promised services were fulfilled and all of excellent quality. It is to be recommended and to live the experience again.

Name: MARIA
Overall Comment: Fuimos a festejar nuestro compromiso ya que nos casamos en octubre. Todo impecable, desde la habitacion hasta la cena. Volveremos!
Translated Overall Comment: We went to celebrate our engagement since we got married in October. Everything was impeccable, from the room to the dinner. We will return!

Name: GABRIELA
Overall Comment: Hermoso hotel, instalaciones increíbles. Todos los detalles cuidados! El restaurante y los bares son de lujo
Translated Overall Comment: Beautiful hotel, amazing facilities. Every detail is taken care of! The restaurant and bars are luxurious.

Name: JAIME
Overall Comment: Es la tercera vez que me quedo en este hotel. Lo escojo por su buena ubicación y por la piscina que me encanta
Translated Overall Comment: This is my third time staying at this hotel. I chose it for its good location and the pool which I love.

Name: RODOLFO
Overall Comment: Todo impecable, excelente atencion
Translated Overall Comment: Everything impeccable, excellent service

Name: VANESA
Overall Comment: Fue un viaje en familia, la estancia fue súper hermosa, las instalaciones excelentes y la atención Excelente también!!!
Reason for Brand Question Rating: Me esperaba que sea un hotel de 1ra categoría y cumplió con las expectativas.
Translated Overall Comment: It was a family trip, the stay was super beautiful, the facilities were excellent and the service was excellent too!!!

Name: NATALIA
Overall Comment:
Todo muy bien, nos dieron una habitación con vista excelente!
La piscina muy linda!
El desayuno muy completo
Translated Overall Comment: Everything was great, they gave us a room with an excellent view! The pool was very nice! The breakfast was very complete.

Name: ROBERTO
Overall Comment: La habitación con detalles de uso, el jugo de naranja no es exprimido natural y la verdad que son las únicas cosas que realmente me gustaría que mejoren, lo demás 10 puntos
Translated Overall Comment: The room is out of use, the orange juice is not freshly squeezed and the truth is that these are the only things that I would really like to see improved, the rest 10 points

Name: PAUL
Overall Comment: The staff was friendly, especially the bell hops.  It is annoying that the hotel doesn't have its own airport shuttle service.  It was also annoying that the hotel doesn't offer a blue market money exchange service.  I understand that this must be a corporate policy decision but in a country where this practice is ubiquitous, it seems silly to send guests out into the sketchy alley next to the hotel to change money when there is a perfectly safe hotel to do it in.
Reason for Brand Question Rating: because it does what i you described in the question
Translated Overall Comment: The staff was friendly, especially the bell hops.  It is annoying that the hotel doesn't have its own airport shuttle service.  It was also annoying that the hotel doesn't offer a blue market money exchange service.  I understand that this must be a corporate policy decision but in a country where this practice is ubiquitous, it seems silly to send guests out into the sketchy alley next to the hotel to change money when there is a perfectly safe hotel to do it in.

Name: ALICIA
Overall Comment: Muy buena atención del personal
Reason for Brand Question Rating: Por que no tuve ningún inconveniente en todos los servicios que utilicé
Translated Overall Comment: Very good attention from the staff

Name: LAURA
Overall Comment: Todo excelente
Translated Overall Comment: Everything is excellent

Name: RICARDO
Overall Comment: Una estancia Excelente!
Translated Overall Comment: An excellent stay!

Name: NORELIS
Overall Comment:
Muy buena, como oportunidades de mejora: 

1. Se me hizo cobro posterior a mi salida de 10 usd sin avisar y sin comentar al hacer check out ya que se habia dejado todo pagado. 

2. Al entrar a la habitación estaba muy calurosa.

3. Se pidió un secador para el cabello y se entregó sin cabezal

4. La puerta del closet no cerraba correctamente por lo que quedaba encendida la luz.
Translated Overall Comment: Very good, as for improvement: 1. I was charged 10 USD after my departure without warning and without mentioning it when checking out since everything had been paid for. 2. When entering the room it was very hot. 3. A hair dryer was requested and it was delivered without a head. 4. The closet door did not close properly so the light remained on.

Name: CLAUS
Overall Comment: Alte, abgewohnte Zimmer. Die Haustechnik ist sehr laut (Zimmer 2127). Die Wassertemperatur lässt sich nicht regulieren (Zimmer 1010 und 2127). Es wird vom Hotel versucht Getränke auf die Rechnung zu setzen die bar in der Bar bezahlt wurden. Wenn man sich vom Hotel ein Taxi rufen lässt, werden unverschämte Aufschläge verlangt. Spricht man das Personal darauf an, bekommt man nur freche Antworten, oder die Kenntnisse der englischen Sprache gehen sofort verloren.
Reason for Brand Question Rating: Man kommt sich als Gast nicht willkommen vor. Es wird nur versucht Geld zu machen (Taxis, bar bezahlte Getränke werden auf die Rechnung gesetzt). Vor allem von dem jungen Hausdiener, der am 30.07. Vormittag Dienst hatte wurde man auf Spanisch beleidigt, weil man monierte, dass der Preis für das Taxi innerhalb von 5' um 20% stieg.
Translated Overall Comment: Old, worn rooms. The building technology is very loud (room 2127). The water temperature cannot be regulated (rooms 1010 and 2127). The hotel tries to add drinks that were paid for in cash at the bar to the bill. If you ask the hotel to call a taxi, they charge an outrageous surcharge. If you ask the staff about this, you only get cheeky answers, or your knowledge of English is immediately lost.

Name: MARIA
Overall Comment: Belén en recepción muy amable, nos dio una habitación con una vista inmejorable, había algunos detalles a mejorar pero fueron subsanados con otros detalles de buen gusto los que hicieron que mi festejo de cumpleaños fuera especial.
Reason for Brand Question Rating: Porque se puede mejorar aun mas el servicio sobre todo en el aerea de calidad de productos de desayuno, servicio de bebidas en piscina, elección de mejor vajilla en el aerea de spa.
Translated Overall Comment: Belén at reception was very friendly, she gave us a room with an unbeatable view, there were some details that needed improvement but they were corrected with other tasteful details that made my birthday celebration special.

Name: CRISTIAN
Overall Comment: Tranquila, la única molestia es que estaba en la torre donde no está la pileta y es Na complicado volver
Translated Overall Comment: Don't worry, the only problem is that I was in the tower where the pool is not and it is difficult to get back.

Name: JOSE
Overall Comment: Atención
Translated Overall Comment: Attention

Name: MARCELO
Overall Comment: Excellent property very well Located in Buenos Aires. Staff is extremely kind and professional. Status was very well acknowledged. The Pool on the 23rd floor (excellent views) is very enjoyable. The M-Club is awesome, special Shout-out to Patricio and Cecilia who where extremely accommodating as usual.
Reason for Brand Question Rating: Excellent property very well Located in Buenos Aires. Staff is extremely kind and professional. Status was very well acknowledged. The Pool on the 23rd floor (excellent views) is very enjoyable. The M-Club is awesome, special Shout-out to Patricio and Cecilia who were extremely accommodating as usual.
Translated Overall Comment: Excellent property very well Located in Buenos Aires. Staff is extremely kind and professional. Status was very well acknowledged. The Pool on the 23rd floor (excellent views) is very enjoyable. The M-Club is awesome, special Shout-out to Patricio and Cecilia who where extremely accommodating as usual.

Name: MARINA
Overall Comment: El hotel es precioso y la atención excelente. Lo único que cuando llegamos nos dijeron q el agua era de cortesía y después nos la cobraron. Es solkbun detalle, realmente volvería.
Translated Overall Comment: The hotel is beautiful and the service is excellent. The only thing is that when we arrived they told us that the water was complimentary and then they charged us for it. It's a very nice detail, I would really go back.

Name: NICOLAS
Overall Comment: Muy lindas instalaciones, pileta y desayuno. Como algo a mejorar: faltaban batas para la pileta. Y hay que solicitar aparte el secador de pelo.
Translated Overall Comment: Very nice facilities, pool and breakfast. Something to improve: they were missing bathrobes for the pool. And you have to request the hair dryer separately.

Name: ALEJANDRA
Overall Comment: Fui un día de relax con una amiga, y súpero nuestras expectativas. El plan incluía merienda súper completa y rica, la noche en el hotel, desayuno, un masaje y el acceso a la pileta, sauna y gym. Pero pareció súper completo el plan para darse un gusto con una amiga.
Translated Overall Comment: I went on a relaxing day with a friend, and it exceeded our expectations. The plan included a super complete and delicious snack, a night at the hotel, breakfast, a massage and access to the pool, sauna and gym. But the plan to treat yourself with a friend seemed super complete.

Name: ZORAIDA
Overall Comment: Cómoda, expedita atención, cordialidad de todo el Equipo de todas las áreas que interactué.
Reason for Brand Question Rating: La confianza en elegir a este Hotel, no sólo se sustenta en la calidad de todos sus servicios, sino también en la seguridad de estar en un ambiente "cuidado y resguardado".
Translated Overall Comment: Comfortable, prompt service, cordiality of the entire Team in all the areas with which I interacted.

Name: FABRIZIO
Overall Comment: Excelente todo, tanto la atención de la gente que trabaja ahí como el lugar.
Translated Overall Comment: Everything was excellent, both the attention of the people who work there and the place.

Name: DIEGO
Overall Comment: Confortable, muy buenas las instalaciones y la atención del servicio.
Translated Overall Comment: Comfortable, very good facilities and service attention.

Name: RUBEN
Overall Comment: NEED TO IMPROVE INTERNET CONNECTION. Not good for business stay!!
Translated Overall Comment: NEED TO IMPROVE INTERNET CONNECTION. Not good for business stay!!

Name: RUBEN
Overall Comment: excelente lugar , muy buena ubicacion instalaciones realmente comodas
Reason for Brand Question Rating: el servicio de consergeria deja mucho que desear es lo unico una noche estuve llamanda a recepcion para averiguar el numero de room service y no me dio , me dijo que me iban a llamar del room service espere 15 no me llamaron reclame y tuve que salir del hotel para conseguir algo para comer
Translated Overall Comment: Excellent place, very good location, really comfortable facilities

Name: OSCAR
Overall Comment:
Se puede describir como muy satisfactoria, la atención de todo el personal ha sido excepcional, en todas las áreas, restaurant, el club para Club Lounge con atención personalizada. 
Nuestra Asesora Nazarena Descotte destacada atención y nivel de servicio
Reason for Brand Question Rating: El servicio ha sido excepcional, calidez y servicio.
Translated Overall Comment: It can be described as very satisfactory, the attention of all the staff has been exceptional, in all areas, restaurant, the club for the Club Lounge with personalized attention. Our Advisor Nazarena Descotte highlighted attention and level of service.

Name: JESSICA
Overall Comment: Feel very welcome and supported. Only lack on free transportation logistics convenience during early morning to airport-hotel and hotel-airport
Translated Overall Comment: Feel very welcome and supported. Only lack on free transportation logistics convenience during early morning to airport-hotel and hotel-airport

Name: ROGER
Overall Comment: Great stay - central location to center of BA  - clean rooms with good showers.  Staff very pleasant and knowledgeable
Translated Overall Comment: Great stay - central location to center of BA  - clean rooms with good showers.  Staff very pleasant and knowledgeable

Name: JULIAN
Overall Comment: Maravilloso todo, volvería a ir y lo súper recomendaría
Translated Overall Comment: Everything was wonderful, I would go back and I would highly recommend it.

Name: JORGE
Overall Comment: Excelente
Reason for Brand Question Rating: Por que me brinda una experiencia de habitat confortable segura brindandome todas las nesecidades que requiere una estadia en un hotel de calidad de la categoria del    Hoteles.
Translated Overall Comment: Excellent

Name: FACUNDO
Overall Comment: Todo excelente. La decoración, limpieza, servicios. El personal es lo mas
Reason for Brand Question Rating: Le faltaría una remodelación a las habitaciones y aromas ricos en la sala de masaje y sauna
Translated Overall Comment: Everything was excellent. The decoration, cleanliness, services. The staff is the best.

Name: DIEGO
Overall Comment: Muy buenas comodidades. A mejorar que llegamos 18 hs y una de las habitaciones no estaba pronta. Al otro dia, el servicio de la habitación fue a una hora similar
Translated Overall Comment: Very good amenities. It should be improved that we arrived at 6 pm and one of the rooms was not ready. The next day, room service was at a similar time.

Name: DIEGO
Overall Comment:
Excelente Hotel, tiene mucha calidad de servicios.
Lo mejor fue la pileta climatizada, la atención y buena predisposición de todo el personal del hotel desde la recepción, el ballet parking, los mozos y el personal de limpieza y demás servicios.

Muy buenas las habitaciones, los sommier, el televisor y los baños. 

El desayuno es excelente y de muy buena calidad.
Esta muy buen ubicado. Todo impecable. 
Lo recomiendo para parejas o familia de cuatro personas.
Translated Overall Comment: Excellent hotel, with very high quality services. The best thing was the heated pool, the attention and good disposition of all the hotel staff from the reception, the ballet parking, the waiters and the cleaning staff and other services. The rooms were very good, the box springs, the television and the bathrooms. The breakfast is excellent and of very good quality. It is very well located. Everything is impeccable. I recommend it for couples or a family of four.

Name: ANA
Overall Comment:
Levaram horas para liberar o quarto que deveria ser feito às 14:00 foi entregue às 17:30.
Quando entrei no quarto o banheiro que pedi com acessibilidade é barras no box. Não tinha nada. 
Me disseram que tinha outro com o meu pedido só no dia seguinte. 
No dia seguinte só me deram o tal quarto a noite e quando fui ver era pior que o outro. 
Voltei para o anterior. 
Além disso me cobraram mais caro do que estava no hotéis.com.
Eu tinha avisado que ia pagar cash e na hora da saída Além do preço mais caro me cobraram mais 20% pois estava pagando cash. Uma loucura.
Reason for Brand Question Rating:
Já expliquei no início. 
Tudo problema.
Translated Overall Comment: It took them hours to release the room, which was supposed to be done at 2:00 pm, but was delivered at 5:30 pm. When I entered the room, the bathroom I requested was accessible and had bars in the shower. There was nothing there. They told me that they would only have another one with my request the next day. The next day they only gave me the room at night, and when I went to see it, it was worse than the other one. I went back to the previous one. In addition, they charged me more than what was on hotels.com. I had said that I would pay cash, and when I was checking out, in addition to the more expensive price, they charged me an extra 20% because I was paying cash. It was crazy.

Name: LUCIANA
Overall Comment: La estancia excelente. Lo único deben solucionar el baño que se tapa permanentemente y ya es vergonzoso tener q pedir por mantenimiento. Es lo único para mencionar.
Translated Overall Comment: The stay was excellent. The only thing they need to fix is the bathroom, which is constantly clogged and it is embarrassing to have to ask for maintenance. That is the only thing worth mentioning.

Name: SIGRID
Overall Comment: Fui solo una noche, y me gusto mucho el hotel. La única critica fue en el bar , el pollo frito que pedi para mi hija era horrible, y la poca ayuda al entrar y salir con las valijas por parte el personal que se encuentra alli, no nos ayudaron. Después el hotel precioso!!
Translated Overall Comment: I was there for just one night and I really liked the hotel. The only criticism was about the bar, the fried chicken I ordered for my daughter was horrible, and the lack of help when entering and leaving with our suitcases from the staff there, they didn't help us. After that, the hotel was beautiful!!

Name: JAVIER
Overall Comment: Todo bien exelente lugar
Translated Overall Comment: All good, excellent place

Name: GERARDO
Overall Comment: Todo estuvo muy bien, el desayuno es excelente. En ocasiones faltaba un poco de personal para atender el restaurante con mayor agilidad, pero nuestra estadía fue en todo momento óptima.
Reason for Brand Question Rating: Estadía excelente. En la habitación hay pocos enchufes de dos patas redondas, eso dificultó un poco la carga de aparatos. Sería deseable poder proyectar contenido visual del celular a la TV, no solo música.
Translated Overall Comment: Everything was great, the breakfast was excellent. Sometimes there was a lack of staff to serve the restaurant more quickly, but our stay was always optimal.

Name: DANIEL
Overall Comment: Okay
Translated Overall Comment: Okay

Name: WALTER
Overall Comment: Muy buena la habitación y el hotel en general, lo que les puedo decir que el desayudo es muy caro .
Reason for Brand Question Rating: Todo muy bien solo el desayuno muy caro
Translated Overall Comment: The room and the hotel in general were very good, what I can tell you is that the breakfast is very expensive.

Name: ROMINA
Overall Comment: Nuestra estancia fue buena aunque hubo bastantes detalles por ser un hotel 5 estrellas. Tales como aperturas en el locker del spa, falta de batas y toallas, amenities pobres, falta de herrajes de apertura de mobiliario de la habitación.  Pero lo más incordioso fue que cuando quisieron sacar el auto del parking rompieron la caja de cambios por lo cual ya hace dos días que estoy esperando que se hagan cargo de la rotura y hasta ahora me ofrecen una estadía ,como si eso fuera un justo resarcimiento. No sólo arruinaron nuestra estadía sino el regalo que de cumpleaños para mi esposo que era disfrutar de vuestro hotel. Espero que la empresa sea lo suficientemente seria para resolver lo que ocurrió o tomaré otras medidas.  No lo recomiendo.
Reason for Brand Question Rating: Rompieron la caja de cambios de mi vehículo en el parking.
Translated Overall Comment: Our stay was good although there were quite a few details for a 5 star hotel. Such as openings in the spa locker, lack of robes and towels, poor amenities, lack of opening hardware for the furniture in the room. But the most annoying thing was that when they tried to take the car out of the parking lot they broke the gearbox, so I have been waiting for two days for them to take charge of the breakage and until now they are offering me a stay, as if that were fair compensation. Not only did they ruin our stay but also my husband's birthday present which was to enjoy your hotel. I hope the company is serious enough to resolve what happened or I will take other measures. I do not recommend it.

Name: MARIA
Overall Comment: Todo excele te salvo el detalle de que no hay secador de pelo en el baño, hay que pedirlo y nunca llego... Solo un detalle..
Reason for Brand Question Rating: Bajo un punto simplemente por lo que comente anteriormente
Translated Overall Comment: Everything was excellent except for the detail that there is no hair dryer in the bathroom, you have to ask for it and it never arrives... Just one detail...

Name: NATALIA
Overall Comment: El hotel es increíble, nos encantó relajarnos el finde.
Translated Overall Comment: The hotel is amazing, we loved relaxing there over the weekend.

Name: OSCAR
Overall Comment: excelente
Translated Overall Comment: excellent

Name: CARLA
Overall Comment: El lugar es muy cómodo, relación precio calidad muy bueno. El precio del desayuno por persona muy caro. Más teniendo tantos lugares cerca por precios más bajos. Se podría mejorar la vereda con más limpieza plantas. Lo que se ve de afuera no representa lo que es el hotel por dentro. Espero les sirva. Yo estoy contenta con mi estadía saludos
Reason for Brand Question Rating: Porq si bien son muy buenos, les falta cosas por mejorar
Translated Overall Comment: The place is very comfortable, the price-quality ratio is very good. The price of breakfast per person is very expensive. Especially when there are so many places nearby for lower prices. The sidewalk could be improved with cleaner plants. What you see from the outside does not represent what the hotel is like inside. I hope it helps. I am happy with my stay. Regards.

Name: ALEJANDRO
Overall Comment: Mucha mucha gente en todos los lugares del hotel lo que dificulta el servicio; no pude dormir apenas me acosté sino hasta una hora y media después la música de la habitación pegada batucada a la 01y30 am tremendo. La habitación cálida cómoda pero faltaron toallas que vinieron recién al día siguiente y no estaba el agua de cortesía que nunca vino. No funcionaba el aire y había mal olor en el baño  saludos y gracias igual me gusta es mi hotel pero tuvimos muchos inconvenientes tal es así a las 10 salimos de la 2124 por el olor y a las 10 los de al lado 2123 se pusieron d nuevo con la música fuerte
Reason for Brand Question Rating: ya lo dije antes mucha gente no daban respuesta acorde a nada quedaba pendiente y no solucionaron ni baño ni aire ni ruidos desde las 00 hs hasta 1y30
Translated Overall Comment: Lots of people in all areas of the hotel which makes service difficult; I couldn't sleep as soon as I went to bed but until an hour and a half later the music in the room was loud and the drumming was on at 1:30 am. The room was warm and comfortable but there were no towels that came the next day and there was no complimentary water that never came. The air conditioning didn't work and there was a bad smell in the bathroom. Regards and thanks. I like it anyway, it's my hotel but we had many problems. So at 10 we left room 2124 because of the smell and at 10 the people next door 2123 started playing loud music again.

Name: VANESA
Overall Comment: el ingreso estaba tapado, tuve que dejar a mi hijo arriba del auto sobre la vereda/ingreso cochera, nadie salió a recibirme, tuve que bajar el equipaje sola. La puerta de la habitación faltaba medio metro la parte de arriba para cerrar. Dos días no dejaron la cantidad de toallas correspondientes. La recepcionista quería cobrarme por unas cápsulas de café que no tomé.
Reason for Brand Question Rating: porque pagué 35000 x noche para no descansar bien (demasiado ruidoso), tuve que pedir toallones , no me recibieron al ingreso, pretendían cobrarme algo que no había consumido......
Translated Overall Comment: The entrance was blocked, I had to leave my son in the car on the sidewalk/garage entrance, no one came to greet me, I had to take my luggage down by myself. The door to the room was missing half a meter from the top to close. They did not leave the corresponding amount of towels for two days. The receptionist wanted to charge me for some coffee capsules that I did not drink.

Name: HYEONG
Overall Comment:
This stay was my fourth experience in Pan Americana Hotel.
I feel comfortable there as it's getting familiar with. 
But sometimes I think I would find another hotel if I visit B/A with my family because    is too old fashioned hotel.
Especially bathroom is not a convenient style. 
Washstand is too small to wash face. 
Bad is good and the room is spacious enough. and the cleaning is 
always excellent. Frankly,  I don't care so much about TV monitor.
Anyway, this is just my personal opinion. Thank you
Reason for Brand Question Rating:
not so quick Check-in and out.
Welcome drinks are not necessary if Check-in is fast.
Translated Overall Comment:
This stay was my fourth experience in Pan Americana Hotel.
I feel comfortable there as it's getting familiar with. 
But sometimes I think I would find another hotel if I visit B/A with my family because    is too old fashioned hotel.
Especially bathroom is not a convenient style. 
Washstand is too small to wash face. 
Bad is good and the room is spacious enough. and the cleaning is 
always excellent. Frankly,  I don't care so much about TV monitor.
Anyway, this is just my personal opinion. Thank you

Name: VALERIA
Overall Comment:
Excelente 
Deberían mejorar el ambiente climatizado en zona pileta
Y opción de salón kinder ej Sheraton    Mar del Plata
Translated Overall Comment: Excellent They should improve the air conditioning in the pool area and the option of a kindergarten room, for example, at the Sheraton Mar del Plata

Name: CAMILO
Overall Comment: El Hotel no me gusto No parece un hotel de calidad
Reason for Brand Question Rating: La Habitacion y la cama muy  Pequeñas ,el desayuno no de muy Buena cálidad
Translated Overall Comment: I didn't like the hotel. It doesn't seem like a quality hotel.

Name: RAFAEL
Overall Comment: O hotel está bem localizado, limpo e com equipe atenciosa. Esperava mais investimento da    para atender a um hotel tão bem localizado, como renovação dos quartos.
Translated Overall Comment: The hotel is well located, clean and has attentive staff. I expected more investment to serve such a well located hotel, such as renovation of the rooms.

Name: MAURICIO
Overall Comment: Excelente hotel, personal sumamente atento y amable
Translated Overall Comment: Excellent hotel, extremely attentive and friendly staff

Name: ANA
Overall Comment:
Todo acorde...
Solo sumaria bancos dentro de la pileta para sentarse y relajarse dentro del agua
Translated Overall Comment: Everything is in order... I would only add benches inside the pool to sit and relax in the water.

Name: JOAO
Overall Comment: Very good experience
Reason for Brand Question Rating: Even though I spent only one night it was a very good experience
Translated Overall Comment: Very good experience

Name: JOSE
Overall Comment:
You charged me breakfast when it was included on my rate.
I called the front desk and promised to correct that but I am still waiting.
Reason for Brand Question Rating:
Deben ser más cuidadosos con los cargos en la habitación.
Reclame que mi desayuno estaba incluido y aún así me hicieron un escándalo para cobrármelo.
Translated Overall Comment:
You charged me breakfast when it was included on my rate.
I called the front desk and promised to correct that but I am still waiting.

Name: ELLIOTT
Overall Comment: Por motivos de trabajo en Buenos Aires, me hospede en el Buenos Aires   . Todo su personal se comporto de manera muy educada y atenta. Destacando la milla extra puedo hablar muy bien de Cecilia, quien busco todas las formas posibles para hacernos sentir bien atendidos e importantes.
Reason for Brand Question Rating: La gran categoria que se muestra en cada una las atenciones del personal, las facilidades en general, no merecen menos de un nueve (9).
Translated Overall Comment: For work reasons in Buenos Aires, I stayed at the Buenos Aires. All the staff was very polite and attentive. Highlighting the extra mile, I can speak highly of Cecilia, who looked for every possible way to make us feel well taken care of and important.

Name: CRISTIN
Overall Comment:
Todo estuvo bien. 

Me habían dicho que podría hacer un check in temprano, y esto no fue posible. Fueron amables para tratar de superar esta dificultad.
Translated Overall Comment: Everything was fine. I had been told that I could check in early, but this was not possible. They were kind enough to try to overcome this difficulty.

Name: ELSA
Overall Comment: Todo correcto.
Translated Overall Comment: All correct.

Name: MADAY
Overall Comment: Muy caro para los servicios que presenta
Translated Overall Comment: Very expensive for the services it offers

Name: MEHMET
Overall Comment:
Five-star location, comfort, breakfast, reception Four-star pool, Two-star amenities and room size
8.0

Liked  · The location of    is perfect. Walking distance (10-15 minutes) to fancy Recoleta, to Plaza Mayo and Puerto Madero close by, Tango show across the street (Avenida 9 de Julio), to Buquebus ferry (to Colonia de Sacramento),100 meters to Calle Corrientes and 50 meters to the "Cambio, Cambio" places. "Cambio, cambio", i.e., the blue dollar market, is the current reality of Buenos Aires (BA). The street value of USD is almost double the value of the official price. Therefore exchanging USD on the street doubles (more or less) the life standard of the Tourists. This was the first time I didn't pay the hotel with my credit card. Rather I exchanged the USD with Blue Dollar rate and paid the hotel with cash. Of course I was anxious. "I don't know the currency, how can I be sure that I am not given fake money", "Largest bill is 1000 Pezos which is more or less 3.5 USD so even for one night I have to give 30-40 bills so for a week long stay a huge pile of money I have to give to the reception", etc. made me anxious. So I decided to pay in installments. Reception was very welcoming. I exchanged 100 USD in a Cambio place, paid it to the Hotel. This ensured me that the pezos I receive were not fake. Two-three days later I paid another installment to the hotel with the bills I received from the same Cambio place. Ana two-three days later I paid the final installment. That's it! Yes when you pay with cash there is +%21 more, however the exchange rate is double so it is still better option for me. The rooftop pool was also very nice. Weekends and late evening on weekdays it was relatively crowded, however other times it was very quiet and enough to enjoy swimming. There is also Sauna as well as gym that one can use. The bed and the pillows were perfect for us. I enjoy hard pillows, my wife enjoys soft and we had both in the room. :)

Disliked  · We chose the cheapest and the smallest room in the facility. It was really very small. The bathroom was large, however the bedroom was very small. Only bed and a small table fitted to the available space. I guess I would have chosen a larger room if I returned back to BA. On the other hand, there were no toothbrush, shaving kits provided in the bathroom. Nor daily drinking water (only two bottles of water when we arrived). I believe the situation in Argentina is kind of dire due to the economical instability and this influenced the service provided by the hotel to the guests. I would expect more from a five-star hotel in that sense. Hairdryer was not available in the bathroom so we had to ask for one. In five minutes they brought it, however, as I have said, in a five star hotel I wouldn't expect such a thing...LAST BUT NOT LEAST: The pictures provided in the website is misleading for Classic Room!
Reason for Brand Question Rating:
Five-star location, comfort, breakfast, reception Four-star pool, Two-star amenities and room size
8.0
