Name: ROCIO
Overall Comment:
El orden y la limpieza impecables. Nos encanto el tipo de habitacion superior con vista al obelisco. Y el baño integrado. El desayuno super completo y rico. Mucha variedad. La cena en la luciernaga tambien un lujo! Quisimos hacernos masajes pero creemos que estaba un poco caro el precio por eso no nos lo hicimos. 
Y para terminar, el dia domingo 17 habia una convención y se lleno de policías y detectores y nos pareció muy incomodo que nos revisaran de arriba abajo cada vez que entrabamos si salíamos siendo huéspedes. Hubiese estado bueno que controlen a los que iban a la convención unicamente.
Reason for Brand Question Rating: Desde el minuto cero que nos hicieron sentir como huespedes vip. Fue una gran experiencia!
Translated Overall Comment: The order and cleanliness were impeccable. We loved the superior room type with a view of the obelisk. And the en-suite bathroom. The breakfast was super complete and delicious. Lots of variety. Dinner at La Luciernaga was also a luxury! We wanted to get massages but we thought the price was a bit expensive so we didn't. And finally, on Sunday the 17th there was a convention and it was full of police and detectors and we found it very uncomfortable that they searched us from top to bottom every time we entered if we left as guests. It would have been nice if they controlled only those who were going to the convention.

Name: RICHARD
Overall Comment: Federico at concierge was incredible help. Love the beds.  Great quality breakfast
Translated Overall Comment: Federico at concierge was incredible help. Love the beds.  Great quality breakfast

Name: ALICIO
Overall Comment: Muy buena
Translated Overall Comment: Very good

Name: MARIA
Overall Comment: Muy buena
Reason for Brand Question Rating:
No me repusieron las toallas de mano
Los amenities son escasos.(ni papel tissue.algo sumamente economico)el champú y crema de enjuague de muy mala calidad
No hay bata la solicite y nunca me la trajeron
Translated Overall Comment: Very good

Name: MARIA
Overall Comment: Excelente!!! Lastima que el hidromasaje de la pieza no andaba
Reason for Brand Question Rating:
Tuvimos mucha demora para que nos traigan pantuflas , dos batas de baño, la cual solo pudieron traer una. Y un secador de pelo que nunca trajeron. 
También necesitamos que venga mantenimiento a ver el aire porque no funcionaba bien la calefacción. Y el hidromasaje de la habitación no funcionaba aunque nos dijeron que no andan en todo el hotel
Translated Overall Comment: Excellent!!! Too bad the hydromassage in the room didn't work

Name: JOSE
Overall Comment: Hotel muy bien ubicado, cuartos amplios amplios, personal amable en todos los departamentos.
Reason for Brand Question Rating: Hicieron que visita de negocios sea agradable y prestaron ayuda en todas las oportunidades que fueron requeridas.
Translated Overall Comment: Very well located hotel, spacious rooms, friendly staff in all departments.

Name: SVEN
Overall Comment: The room was too noisy, I could practically hear the neighbors blink, and the view wasn't nice either. The staff at the reception were ok, but they could have been nicer. The cleaning service and the restaurant staff were great, and the spa and pool staff were outstanding, always sweet and happy to help.
Reason for Brand Question Rating: The staff at the reception did not look happy to have us, they were efficient, but not nice. The room had a door that connected the room to the next one: it would be wise to cover it, because not only made the room noisy, also uncomfortable, not easy to relax. The rest of the experience was excellent.
Translated Overall Comment: The room was too noisy, I could practically hear the neighbors blink, and the view wasn't nice either. The staff at the reception were ok, but they could have been nicer. The cleaning service and the restaurant staff were great, and the spa and pool staff were outstanding, always sweet and happy to help.

Name: DIEGO
Overall Comment: EXELENTE
Translated Overall Comment: EXCELLENT

Name: MARIA
Overall Comment: habitaciones cómodas y limpias. Faltó secador de pelo en la habitación (tuve que pedirlo 3 veces). Muy buen desayuno.
Translated Overall Comment: Comfortable and clean rooms. There was no hair dryer in the room (I had to ask for it 3 times). Very good breakfast.

Name: MAURICIO
Overall Comment: Increíble experiencia, un servicio de alta calidad.
Translated Overall Comment: Incredible experience, high quality service.

Name: ANDREA
Overall Comment: Hola el hotel es hermoso, ya lo conocía por los congresos y he ido en otra oportunidad. Mejoraría la cantidad de reposeras en la pileta y en la habitación el tema de tener que pedir plancha, secador de pelo etc me parece que ya debería estar en la habitación. El personal muy amable y el desayuno excelente. Podrían tener algún plan de pagos con tarjeta como el Sheraton para los argentinos. Gracias
Translated Overall Comment: Hello, the hotel is beautiful, I already knew it from the congresses and I have been there on another occasion. The number of sun loungers at the pool and in the room would be improved. The issue of having to ask for an iron, hair dryer, etc. seems to me that it should already be in the room. The staff is very friendly and the breakfast is excellent. They could have a card payment plan like the Sheraton for Argentines. Thank you.

Name: VERONICA
Overall Comment: Excelente atención. Nazario yCecilia nos resolvieron distintas situaciones en las que necesitamos de su ayuda. Volveremos sin dudas
Translated Overall Comment: Excellent service. Nazario and Cecilia helped us with different situations in which we needed their help. We will definitely be back.

Name: ALEJANDRO
Overall Comment: Todo muy bien !!
Translated Overall Comment: All very well!!

Name: ELIZIO
Overall Comment:
Viajamos para Buenos Aires e estávamos esperando uma experiência 5 estrelas, mas apesar da excelente localização, conforto dos quartos e comodidades do hotel, infelizmente o serviço deixou muito a desejar. 
Me senti, muitas vezes, limitado à má prestação de serviços e péssimo atendimento dos funcionários.
Reason for Brand Question Rating:
Atendimento precário, má distribuição dos quartos em grupo (andares diferentes e diferentes padrões de suítes).
Atendimento ruim da recepção.
Não houve sequer serviço de carregamento de malas - nem no check in, nem no check out.
Dificuldade e demora no atendimento a solicitações para o quarto.
E muita displicência no primeiro contato: check in do grupo.
Translated Overall Comment: We traveled to Buenos Aires and were expecting a 5-star experience, but despite the excellent location, comfort of the rooms and hotel amenities, unfortunately the service left a lot to be desired. I often felt limited by poor service delivery and poor customer service from employees.

Name: EZEQUIEL
Overall Comment: Excelente
Translated Overall Comment: Excellent

Name: MARIO
Overall Comment: Excelente lugar, en lo sucesivo me gustaria volver a parar en este hotel.
Translated Overall Comment: Excellent place, I would like to stay at this hotel again in the future.

Name: MARIA
Overall Comment: Fue muy buena mi estadía . Atención muy buena .
Translated Overall Comment: My stay was very good. Very good service.

Name: HUGO
Overall Comment: Muy agradable, ambientes amplios, desayuno completo
Translated Overall Comment: Very nice, spacious rooms, full breakfast

Name: LAURA
Overall Comment: Nuestra estadía fue muy buena, lastima que fue muy breve. Una sugerencia seria que el horario de ingreso sea un poco mas temprano, y otra seria que se pueda llevar la bata a la habitación ya que es molesto tener que volver a vestirse con el cabello mojado, sobre todo en épocas de invierno
Reason for Brand Question Rating: Todo el hotel brillaba hasta los uniformes de la gente que trabaja en el mismo
Translated Overall Comment: Our stay was very good, it's a pity that it was very short. One suggestion would be to check in a little earlier, and another would be to be able to take a robe to the room since it is annoying to have to get dressed again with wet hair, especially in winter.

Name: FERNANDO
Overall Comment: Todo maravilloso!
Translated Overall Comment: Everything is wonderful!

Name: LEOPOLDO
Overall Comment: Agradable, amable y simpática
Translated Overall Comment: Nice, friendly and nice

Name: GUILLERMO
Overall Comment: Fue una buena experiencia. Lo único que me dejo mal sabor de boca fue el check out donde no me pudieron hacer un late checkout a las 2pm.
Reason for Brand Question Rating: Me incomodó el que no me dejaran hacer late checkout
Translated Overall Comment: It was a good experience. The only thing that left a bad taste in my mouth was the check out where they couldn't give me a late checkout at 2pm.

Name: MARC
Overall Comment:
Très content du séjour.
Personnel très accueillant et professionnel.
Translated Overall Comment: Very happy with the stay. Very welcoming and professional staff.

Name: MIGUEL
Overall Comment: My stay was for almost 3 months.  During that time the staff got to know me and treated me as a valued guest.  Staff went out of there way to make my stay as pleasant as possible.
Reason for Brand Question Rating: I always felt that the staff met my expectations. I never felt that I had to everything in the safe when I left my room.  I left two luggage bags for several days with the concierge and never worried about the contents.
Translated Overall Comment: My stay was for almost 3 months.  During that time the staff got to know me and treated me as a valued guest.  Staff went out of there way to make my stay as pleasant as possible.

Name: NICOLAS
Overall Comment: mUY CALIDA Y CONFORTABLE
Translated Overall Comment: VERY WARM AND COMFORTABLE

Name: MARIA
Overall Comment:
Fue muy buena la estadia, los empleados muy atentos y amables.
el sector de pileta sauna, y los masajes muy bueno todo.

La unica critica, es que en la habitacion, habia una mesa de luz que tiene rota la cajonera , el espejo rajado.
La canilla de la tina de baño para el agua fria o caliente, se sale se le queda a uno en la mano.
Y en la ducha se esta descascarando en el techo de la lluvia , porque el agua sale mal y pega directamente en el cielo raso, es una lastima.

Por todo lo demas excelente , muybuen desayuno y el te que tomamos.
Gracias
Translated Overall Comment: The stay was very good, the staff were very attentive and friendly. The pool, sauna and massage area were all very good. The only criticism is that in the room there was a nightstand with a broken drawer and a cracked mirror. The faucet in the bathtub for hot or cold water comes out and stays in your hand. And in the shower the rain is peeling off the ceiling because the water comes out badly and hits the ceiling directly, it's a shame. For everything else, excellent, very good breakfast and the tea we had. Thank you.

Name: JUAN
Overall Comment: No ha habido manera de recibir mi factura.
Translated Overall Comment: There has been no way to receive my invoice.

Name: MARCELO
Overall Comment: todo muy bien
Translated Overall Comment: all very well

Name: MARCOS
Overall Comment:
TODO MUY BUENO, SALVO QUE NOS DIERON LA HABITACION (CHECK IN) ALGO TARDE.

LA PILETA CLIMATIZADA Y EL GIMNASIO ESPECTACULAR.

LAS VISTAS DESDE EL ULTIMO PISO MUY BUENAS.
Translated Overall Comment: EVERYTHING WAS VERY GOOD, EXCEPT THAT THEY GIVEN US THE ROOM (CHECK IN) A LITTLE LATE. THE HEATED POOL AND THE GYM WERE SPECTACULAR. THE VIEWS FROM THE TOP FLOOR WERE VERY GOOD.

Name: MARIA
Overall Comment: Excelente estadía, pasamos dos días maravillosos, la atención de toda la gente que nos asistió fue excelente, el respeto, la amabilidad y calidad humana, siempre al servicio de sus huéspedes. Superó nuestras expectativas. Gastronomía y bares de muy buen nivel , instalaciones, limpieza  y servicios todo para recomendar. Volveríamos una y mil veces.
Translated Overall Comment: Excellent stay, we spent two wonderful days, the attention of all the people who assisted us was excellent, the respect, kindness and human quality, always at the service of their guests. It exceeded our expectations. Gastronomy and bars of very good level, facilities, cleanliness and services all to recommend. We would return a thousand times.

Name: MAURICIO
Overall Comment: The hotel location is very convenient. Very good breakfast and comfortable accomodations, although bathrooms need renovation.
Translated Overall Comment: The hotel location is very convenient. Very good breakfast and comfortable accomodations, although bathrooms need renovation.

Name: PABLO
Overall Comment: Lo que modificaría es restringir el acceso de menores a la piscina a partir de una determinada hora, por ejemplo 17:00. Cosa de poder estar tranquilos y no con viendo niños que se zambullen y salpican al resto.
Translated Overall Comment: What I would change is to restrict access to the pool for minors after a certain time, for example 5:00 p.m. So that we can be calm and not see children diving in and splashing others.

Name: MARIA
Overall Comment: La atención fue excelente en las diferentes areas que accedi, en la recepción, restaurante, arreglo habitaciones y servicio a la habitación.
Translated Overall Comment: The service was excellent in the different areas I accessed, at the reception, restaurant, room arrangement and room service.

Name: JAY
Overall Comment: We were under the weather during the trip, but the hotel staff took great care of us.  Thank you for the hospitality.  It was a wonderful home away from home experience.
Translated Overall Comment: We were under the weather during the trip, but the hotel staff took great care of us.  Thank you for the hospitality.  It was a wonderful home away from home experience.

Name: GABRIEL
Overall Comment: fue increíble
Translated Overall Comment: It was amazing

Name: CATALINA
Overall Comment: Buena atención, todo muy bien. El único detalle fué la presión del agua en mi habitación, costó para que pudiera salir agua caliente, el servicio de aseo se llevó mi tarjeta para ingresar a la habitación uno de los días. Pero ningún otro inconveniente, muy buen servicio
Translated Overall Comment: Good service, everything was fine. The only detail was the water pressure in my room, it was hard to get hot water, the cleaning service took my card to enter the room one day. But no other inconvenience, very good service.

Name: PATRICIA
Overall Comment:
The room was not ready at 5 pm. The beds are small. The blankets old.  No hair dryer. Poor courtesy products in the bath. 
Nice the lobby.  Kind the front desk persons.
Translated Overall Comment:
The room was not ready at 5 pm. The beds are small. The blankets old.  No hair dryer. Poor courtesy products in the bath. 
Nice the lobby.  Kind the front desk persons.

Name: MARINA
Overall Comment: Excelente atención. Personal muy atento y preparado. Las habitaciones muy amplias
Translated Overall Comment: Excellent service. Very attentive and prepared staff. Very spacious rooms.

Name: LUIS
Overall Comment: Fue una estancia espectacular en la comodidad de los servicios, en la atención del personal y de la magnífica ubicación.
Translated Overall Comment: It was a spectacular stay in terms of the comfort of the services, the attention of the staff and the magnificent location.

Name: JUAN
Overall Comment: Excelente! Volveria 1000 veces.
Translated Overall Comment: Excellent! I would go back 1000 times.

Name: LUIS
Overall Comment: estancia sumamente agradable para todo el grupo familiar, de lo mejor la pileta del spa y la atención de los empleados del sector, la limpieza de las habitaciones y el desayuno, lo único a remarcar es la poca luminosidad de la habitación (que en plan de pareja no seria un incoveniente) pero con 2 nenas chicas necesitábamos mas luz, lo cual es un pequeño detalle fue un fin de semana maravilloso, el hotel esta a la altura de la cadena internacional que es, y volveremos seguramente!
Translated Overall Comment: An extremely pleasant stay for the entire family group. The best part was the spa pool and the service provided by the employees, the cleanliness of the rooms and the breakfast. The only thing to note is the lack of light in the room (which would not be a problem for a couple) but with 2 little girls we needed more light, which is a small detail. It was a wonderful weekend. The hotel is on par with the international chain that it is, and we will surely return!

Name: FABIANA
Overall Comment: Gostamos muito, já haviamos nos hospedado neste hotel e é uma ótima experiência, ao entrar um cheiro maravilhoso, funcionários muito gentis, piscina aquecida linda e muito gostosa, café da manhã sem exageros mas com tudo delicioso e quarto muito agradável e confortável, voltaremos com certeza!
Translated Overall Comment: We really liked it, we had already stayed at this hotel and it was a great experience, when you enter you smell wonderful, the staff are very friendly, the heated pool is beautiful and very nice, the breakfast is not overdone but everything is delicious and the room is very nice and comfortable, we will definitely be back!

Name: MARIA
Overall Comment: great location, nice remodeled rooms and common areas.
Translated Overall Comment: great location, nice remodeled rooms and common areas.

Name: JAIME
Overall Comment:
Todo  muy. bien.  El 
Desayuno un poco flojo, se puede mejorar .
Translated Overall Comment: Everything was very good. The breakfast was a bit weak, it could be improved.

Name: CHRISTINA
Overall Comment: Very nice facility and friendly staff. I already recommended our relatives to your hotel next months. Love the pool, gym, massage service on rooftop!
Translated Overall Comment: Very nice facility and friendly staff. I already recommended our relatives to your hotel next months. Love the pool, gym, massage service on rooftop!

Name: LUIS
Overall Comment:
Muy buena atención y excelente predisposición de su personal
El único punto negro fue que estuvieran fuera de servicio 2 ascensores al mismo tiempo
Translated Overall Comment: Very good service and excellent predisposition of its staff. The only negative point was that 2 elevators were out of service at the same time.

Name: GABRIEL
Overall Comment: falta de control en el ingreso al hotel. Cualquier persona ingresa sin que nadie se serciore si está alojado o no en ese lugar. Muy poca seguridad.
Translated Overall Comment: Lack of control at the entrance to the hotel. Anyone can enter without anyone checking whether they are staying there or not. Very little security.

Name: SOLEDAD
Overall Comment:
Reservamos habitaciones comunicadas (excluyente) y al llegar no fue así. Eran continuas (una junto a la otra, pero no se comunicaban internamente) por suerte nuestras hijas se animaron a dormir.
Les agradezco que nos olvidamos un cuaderno de pintura que muy amablemente buscaron y guardaron hasta que enviamos una mensajería a buscarlo. 
Gracias por todo, por el resto excelente atención.
Translated Overall Comment: We booked connecting rooms (exclusive) and when we arrived we didn't have one. They were adjoining (one next to the other, but they didn't communicate internally) luckily our daughters decided to sleep. I thank them for the fact that we forgot a painting notebook, which they very kindly looked for and kept until we sent a courier to pick it up. Thank you for everything, for the rest, excellent service.

Name: ALBERTO
Overall Comment: Excellent, from your Front Desk to “M” Club and amenities, we had a great stay, friendly service.
Translated Overall Comment: Excellent, from your Front Desk to “M” Club and amenities, we had a great stay, friendly service.

Name: ROBERT
Overall Comment: Excelente!
Translated Overall Comment: Excellent!

Name: MARIA
Overall Comment: Excelente, el personal súper atento
Translated Overall Comment: Excellent, the staff is super attentive

Name: PABLO
Overall Comment: pongo 10 en la puntuación, por el conjunto de cosas que hacen al hotel espectacular, como la atención de su personal, las vistas y comodidades que posee, y por sobre todo la ubicación para disfrutar los teatros.
Translated Overall Comment: I give it a 10 for the set of things that make the hotel spectacular, such as the attention of its staff, the views and amenities it has, and above all the location to enjoy the theaters.

Name: MICHELLE
Overall Comment: Un sueño el hotel,la atención excelente! Muy atentos! Todos los servicios estaban disponibles,terrible todo!!! Recomendadisimoo
Translated Overall Comment: A dream hotel, excellent service! Very attentive! All services were available, everything was terrible!!! Highly recommended!

Name: JORGE
Overall Comment:
La
Verdad q me
Gusto mucho me pareció un poco caro pero el resto muy lindo
Translated Overall Comment: The truth is that I really liked it. I thought it was a little expensive, but the rest was very nice.

Name: SUSANA
Overall Comment: Apasible! excelente el desayuno y la suite con vista a la ciudad impecable. Volveremos. saludos
Translated Overall Comment: Peaceful! Excellent breakfast and impeccable suite with city view. We will return. Greetings

Name: JOSE
Overall Comment: Everything was excellent. only the breakfast that did not match    standards
Translated Overall Comment: Everything was excellent. only the breakfast that did not match    standards

Name: SERGIO
Overall Comment:
La estadía estuvo bastante alejada de lo que esperabamos recibir.
Desde el comienzo las cosas no salieron bien, llegamos 15:15hs del 18/06 al hotel, cuando el horario de checkin pactado era a las 15hs y la habitación aun no estaba lista, a lo que el personal de recepción nos dijo: "Esperen en el lobby y utilicen su trago de bienvenida" situación que conllevó mas de una hora de espera hasta poder tomar la habitación y los servicios del hotel.
La mayor parte del personal del hotel (porque decir todos seria injusto) no es informativa ni cordial con los clientes; nadie nos recibió el equipaje ni nos guió a la habitación, no nos explicaron nunca como utilizar los servicios, siempre tuvimos que preguntar como hacer las cosas. Una de las consultas nos tuvo esperando en el teléfono de la habitación por minutos hasta que nos atendió personal de recepción. 
El SPA deja mucho que desear, las toallas y batas que ofrecen están rotas de lo viejas que son, nunca pudimos obtener las pantuflas para ingresar al spa. El ambiente no se condice con el de un SPA donde uno espera relajarse, es mas bien una piscina de recreación donde hay niños y adultos gritando y zambulléndose en el agua, sin perjuicio de que las indicaciones de la piscina indican lo contrario.
La habitación cuenta con hidromasaje que es solo un lindo adorno, ya que no puede utilizarse según la respuesta del personal para no generar ruidos molestos, cuando es habitual escuchar música de otras habitaciones. A ello debemos adicionar el ruido que generó un evento el domingo por la noche en uno de los salones del hotel. Las aberturas que dan a la calle tienen muy mala aislación acústica e incluso en el caso de nuestra habitación -una de las mas costosas en el piso 21- los burletes viejos dejaban ingresar una ventisca y provocaban silbidos molestos. El empapelado de la pared estaba desgastado y había marcas de malas reparaciones en el techo de la habitación, a uno de los placares le faltaba la manija para abrir la puerta, entre otros detalles. Es dable destacar nuevamente que era la habitación 2121 denominada "de lujo con vista a la ciudad".
Para concluir, a la hora del checkout habían cargado a nuestra habitación gastos que no correspondían cuya constatación demoró ampliamente la salida.
Esto no es solo una critica pretenciosa, se trata de un hotel de categoría internacional con una tarifa que resulta ser carísima respecto del servicio que se recibe a cambio. 
Lo único destacable de la atención brindada por vuestro hotel, fue la amabilidad y predisposición del Sr. Gustavo, quien se encontraba trabajando en el restaurante de planta baja y se encargó de servirnos la cena incluida en el paquete contratado y un almuerzo que abonamos debido a la espera causada por la imposibilidad de acceder a la habitación en el horario pactado.
Translated Overall Comment: The stay was quite far from what we expected to receive. From the beginning things did not go well, we arrived at the hotel at 3:15 pm on June 18, when the agreed check-in time was at 3 pm and the room was not yet ready, to which the reception staff told us: "Wait in the lobby and use your welcome drink" situation that led to more than an hour of waiting until we could take the room and the hotel services. Most of the hotel staff (because saying all would be unfair) is not informative or friendly with the clients; no one received our luggage or guided us to the room, they never explained to us how to use the services, we always had to ask how to do things. One of the queries had us waiting on the phone in the room for minutes until the reception staff attended to us. The SPA leaves a lot to be desired, the towels and robes they offer are broken from how old they are, we were never able to get the slippers to enter the spa. The atmosphere is not that of a spa where one expects to relax, it is more like a recreational pool where there are children and adults shouting and diving into the water, despite the fact that the pool signs indicate otherwise. The room has a whirlpool, which is just a nice decoration, since it cannot be used according to the staff's response in order not to generate annoying noises, when it is common to hear music from other rooms. To this we must add the noise generated by an event on Sunday night in one of the hotel's rooms. The openings that face the street have very poor acoustic insulation and even in the case of our room - one of the most expensive on the 21st floor - the old weather stripping let in a blizzard and caused annoying whistling. The wallpaper on the wall was worn and there were marks of poor repairs on the ceiling of the room, one of the closets was missing the handle to open the door, among other details. It is worth noting again that it was room 2121 called "deluxe with city view". Finally, at checkout they had charged our room for expenses that were not appropriate, and the verification of which greatly delayed our departure. This is not just a pretentious criticism, this is an international class hotel with a rate that turns out to be very expensive compared to the service received in return. The only thing worth mentioning about the service provided by your hotel was the kindness and willingness of Mr. Gustavo, who was working in the restaurant on the ground floor and was in charge of serving us the dinner included in the package contracted and a lunch that we paid for due to the wait caused by the impossibility of accessing the room at the agreed time.

Name: MARIANA
Overall Comment: Muy buena. Exelente atención. Recomendaría reforzar alimentación para celíacos, con carteles e identificación ya que no lo poseían en las mesas, al igual que en la carta del restaurante. El stock se alimentos apto para celiacos fue poco y consumido seguramente por personas no celíacas ya que no estaba el cartel de referencia. De la categoría exelente del hotel, un poco desprolijo pedir algo unas galletas y que digan que no había más.
Translated Overall Comment: Very good. Excellent service. I would recommend reinforcing food for celiacs, with signs and identification since they did not have it on the tables, as well as on the restaurant menu. The stock of food suitable for celiacs was small and surely consumed by non-celiac people since the reference sign was not there. From the excellent category of the hotel, a bit messy to ask for something like some cookies and be told that there were no more.

Name: NESTOR
Overall Comment: Exelente unica observacion un dia pusieron toalla para un pasajero y eramos dos
Translated Overall Comment: Excellent, only observation: one day they put a towel for a passenger and there were two of us.

Name: TOMAS
Overall Comment: Muy recomendable, todos una atención excelente! Las habitaciones un lujo, la comida 10 puntos!
Translated Overall Comment: Highly recommended, all excellent service! The rooms are luxurious, the food 10 points!

Name: ROCIO
Overall Comment: Quienes trabajan en el hotel son muy amables y atentos al bienestar de los huéspedes
Translated Overall Comment: Those who work at the hotel are very friendly and attentive to the well-being of the guests.

Name: ALBERTO
Overall Comment: Todo muy tranquilo y dentro de las expectativas. Buena atención del personal.
Translated Overall Comment: Everything was very quiet and within expectations. The staff was very attentive.

Name: CECILIA
Overall Comment:
No fue satisfactoria porque la habitación era muy fea, estaba mal iluminada y le faltaba una bombita.  El baño tenia el yacuzzi roto, la ducha chica, la puerta no cerraba, se mojo todo el baño y el agua salía horrible, para cualquier lado, la grifería no funcionaba bien.-
Debo decir que una empleada ofreció cambiarme de habitación pero en una estadía de un día eso es difícil, ya que cuando descubrí todos los desperfectos ya era tarde.-
Realmente sentí que me dieron la peor habitación del hotel.-
Todos los empleados me atendieron correctamente, excepto un chico rubio, usaba una escarapela redonda, no recuerdo el nombre, que la verdad me dio la sensación que le molestaba atenderme, por teléfono le pedí un secador de pelo y no me lo enviaron, lo tuve que reclamar personalmente, también le pedí un auto particular e insistía con un taxi, no se que le pasaba.-
La verdad es que una habitación simple en su hotel es demasiado cara para la clase de servicio que dan, he ido a otros 5 estrellas mucho mejores e incluso a 4 estrellas con habitaciones mas lindas.-
Es una pena porque realmente no me dan ganas de volver e hicieron que mi viaje no fue del todo agradable, los elegí por que iba a ver Opera al Teatro Colón, me quedaba cómodo, sólo cruzar la calle, en mi próximo viaje optaré por otros hoteles cercanos.-
Saludos,
Cecilia Giordano
Translated Overall Comment: It was not satisfactory because the room was very ugly, poorly lit and was missing a light bulb. The bathroom had a broken jacuzzi, a small shower, the door did not close, the whole bathroom got wet and the water came out horribly, in all directions, the faucet did not work well. - I must say that an employee offered to change my room but during a one-day stay that is difficult, since when I discovered all the defects it was too late. - I really felt that they gave me the worst room in the hotel. - All the employees treated me correctly, except for a blond guy, he wore a round rosette, I do not remember his name, who honestly gave me the feeling that he was annoyed to serve me, on the phone I asked him for a hair dryer and they did not send it to me, I had to complain personally, I also asked for a private car and he insisted on a taxi, I do not know what was wrong with him. - The truth is that a simple room in your hotel is too expensive for the kind of service you give, I have been to other 5 star hotels that are much better and even to 4 stars with nicer rooms. - It is a shame because I really do not want to go back and they made my trip not be of the best. Everything was nice. I chose them because I was going to see the opera at the Teatro Colón. It was convenient, just across the street. On my next trip I will choose other nearby hotels. Regards, Cecilia Giordano

Name: LORENZO
Overall Comment: Me quedé encerrado en el ascensor durante 20 minutos y nadie respondió a la alarma. El proceso de reconvención a un buen hotel no se ha dado y en general no responde a una categoría 5 estrellas
Translated Overall Comment: I was stuck in the elevator for 20 minutes and no one responded to the alarm. The process of reconvening a good hotel has not been carried out and in general it does not correspond to a 5 star category.

Name: MARIANO
Overall Comment: Excelente en todo
Translated Overall Comment: Excellent in everything

Name: LUIS
Overall Comment: barbaro
Translated Overall Comment: a draw

Name: GERMAINE
Overall Comment: The staff at the desk and entrance were warm, welcoming and accommodating.   There was a protest on our departure day and Carlos Dota walked my 81-year old mother, our 2 large suitcases and myself over 2 miles to meet our cousin with his car.   He used his personal phone to coordinate as more and more roads were closed down to traffic.   This was above and beyond and we were extremely appreciative of both Carlos and the staff at the hotel who insisted he accompany us.
Translated Overall Comment: The staff at the desk and entrance were warm, welcoming and accommodating.   There was a protest on our departure day and Carlos Dota walked my 81-year old mother, our 2 large suitcases and myself over 2 miles to meet our cousin with his car.   He used his personal phone to coordinate as more and more roads were closed down to traffic.   This was above and beyond and we were extremely appreciative of both Carlos and the staff at the hotel who insisted he accompany us.

Name: SHADI
Overall Comment:
I inquired at front desk about possibility of purchasing the pillow that is in the room and I spoke with.2 different employees at front desk both of whom told me to leave and that they would get back to me before I check out.
I didn’t hear from anyone despite multiple follow ups and eventually when I checked out I inquire again and I was told that no one knew anything about my inquiry. And at the end I wasn’t able to purchase the pillow or even know if that option is available.

This lack of customer service does not leave a great impression
Translated Overall Comment:
I inquired at front desk about possibility of purchasing the pillow that is in the room and I spoke with.2 different employees at front desk both of whom told me to leave and that they would get back to me before I check out.
I didn’t hear from anyone despite multiple follow ups and eventually when I checked out I inquire again and I was told that no one knew anything about my inquiry. And at the end I wasn’t able to purchase the pillow or even know if that option is available.

This lack of customer service does not leave a great impression

Name: JORGE
Overall Comment:
Todo muy bueno. 
Definitivamente lo mejor fue la atención del personal, tanto de restaurants, barras como los de la piscina y spa.
Todo era posible, todas nuestras solicitudes fueron atendidas de manera cordial. 
felicitaciones!
Translated Overall Comment: Everything was very good. The best thing was definitely the attention of the staff, both in the restaurants, bars and at the pool and spa. Everything was possible, all our requests were attended to in a friendly manner. Congratulations!

Name: NORMA
Overall Comment: El lugar es muy lindo, super amables el personal, solo una observación, la presión de la regadera no estaba muy buena.
Translated Overall Comment: The place is very nice, the staff is super friendly, just one observation, the shower pressure was not very good.

Name: ILAN
Overall Comment: I want to thank all the staff for making my stay pleasant. I enjoyed the pool with friendly personnel there, fruits and juice and awesome views. In the lobby I want to thank Cecilia for her appreciation of my music at your piano <it can use tuning>. The restaurante, the M club specially Florencia helped making that muy living room. Even when paying desk staff were helpful in translating prices in pesos which were more convenient for me this time. Even helped counting the bills. Thanks
Translated Overall Comment: I want to thank all the staff for making my stay pleasant. I enjoyed the pool with friendly personnel there, fruits and juice and awesome views. In the lobby I want to thank Cecilia for her appreciation of my music at your piano <it can use tuning>. The restaurante, the M club specially Florencia helped making that muy living room. Even when paying desk staff were helpful in translating prices in pesos which were more convenient for me this time. Even helped counting the bills. Thanks

Name: DIEGO
Overall Comment:
Todo muy bien. Los servicios estaban disponibles. Buena vista, balcon y un baño muy lindo y nuevo en la room 1403. Buena ropa de cama y cama amplia.  Muy buen desayuno y las atenciones del hotel como los alfajores y el café en capsulas.
Empleados respetuosos y predispuestos.
Uso de la tech para abrir la puerta. 

El aire acondicionado quizá no sea suficiente en días de mucho frio!!
El gimnasio debería cerrarse para que no suba el calor y la humedad de la piscina.
El espumante para la noche de bodas debería ser Nature.
Translated Overall Comment: Everything was great. The services were available. Good view, balcony and a very nice and new bathroom in room 1403. Good bedding and a large bed. Very good breakfast and the hotel's attentions such as alfajores and coffee in capsules. Respectful and helpful employees. Use of the tech to open the door. The air conditioning may not be sufficient on very cold days!! The gym should be closed so that the heat and humidity of the pool do not rise. The sparkling wine for the wedding night should be Nature.

Name: RAMIRO
Overall Comment: Sinceramente, el servicio muy por debajo de nuestras expectativas. Poco foco en el cliente.
Translated Overall Comment: Honestly, the service was way below our expectations. Little focus on the customer.

Name: EWA
Overall Comment:
The initial room I received had a number of problems, for example the lights didn't work in the bathroom, pillows were dirty. However, once I asked to change the room, the front desk staff was very helpful and made it happen right away, so I definitely would recommend this hotel based on the way they handled the problem.

Thank you,
Ewa
Translated Overall Comment:
The initial room I received had a number of problems, for example the lights didn't work in the bathroom, pillows were dirty. However, once I asked to change the room, the front desk staff was very helpful and made it happen right away, so I definitely would recommend this hotel based on the way they handled the problem.

Thank you,
Ewa

Name: RICARDO
Overall Comment: Gracias Gustavo en el restaurante/lobby bar ya Melina que trabaja como una loca, demasiado por lo que vi de lejos atiende el telefono, cobra, trae vinos, sirve y le preguntan de todo, no paro en el rato que estuve por ahi.
Translated Overall Comment: Thank you Gustavo in the restaurant/lobby bar and Melina who works like crazy, too much from what I saw from afar, answering the phone, collecting, bringing wine, serving and you ask her everything, she didn't stop the time I was there.

Name: JUTTA
Overall Comment:
Die Lage des Hotels ist zentral, ich fühlte mich sicher und gut aufgehoben. Vieles ist fußläufig zu erreichen.
Das Haus wird gut geführt: das Personal ist kompetent und hilfsbereit. 
Das Zimmer war sauber, könnte jedoch durch eine Renovierung den Standards dieser Kategorie angepasst werden. So vermisste ich einen Föhn, der durch das Housekeeping gebracht würde.
Translated Overall Comment: The hotel is centrally located, I felt safe and well looked after. Many things are within walking distance. The hotel is well run: the staff is competent and helpful. The room was clean, but could be renovated to meet the standards of this category. I missed a hairdryer, which was provided by housekeeping.

Name: VALERIA
Overall Comment:
Habitaciones muy ruidosas 
Menú del restaurante muy básico
Translated Overall Comment: Very noisy rooms Very basic restaurant menu

Name: DANIELE
Overall Comment:
Nunca deixe para pagar no hotel! Eles superfaturam o valor contratado pelo site Hotéis.com
Sem falar que o quarto estava bem ruinzinho. Velho, precisando urgente de reforma. Box de ducha  que molhava todo o espaço do banheiro. Completamente diferente do exposto na foto do hotéis com
Translated Overall Comment: Never leave to pay at the hotel! They overprice the amount contracted on the Hotéis.com website. Not to mention that the room was really bad. Old, in urgent need of renovation. Shower box that wet the entire bathroom space. Completely different from what is shown in the photo of the hotels with

Name: SUSAN
Overall Comment: Staff was extremely helpful. Sheets were changed daily. Great location for tourism.
Translated Overall Comment: Staff was extremely helpful. Sheets were changed daily. Great location for tourism.

Name: RAUL
Overall Comment:
Increíble el lugar, me sorprendió gratamente ! La pileta es increíble! 
La comida un 10 ! Lo recomiendo … 100% . Muy amable el personal . 
En mi opinión lo único a mejorar es que no hay secador de pelo en la habitación y hubo que pedirlo, así también como las batas y en ambas ocaciones demoraron bastante en traerlos . 
Todo el resto un 10 !
Translated Overall Comment: The place is amazing, I was pleasantly surprised! The pool is incredible! The food is a 10! I recommend it… 100%. The staff is very friendly. In my opinion, the only thing that needs improvement is that there is no hair dryer in the room and you had to ask for one, as well as the bathrobes and on both occasions it took a long time to bring them. Everything else is a 10!

Name: ALEJANDRA

Cuando hicimos la reserva la piscina estaba en mantenimiento, cuando llegamos ya no, pero nunca nos avisaron  ni vía mail ni al hacer el check in y nos enteramos el día que nos ibamos porque vimos a unos huespedes de bata. Incluso en la TV de la habitación decía que seguía en mantenimiento.
Nos dejaron 2 toallas un días y 3 al siguiente y eramos 4, y no nos repusieron shampoo y demás en la segunda noche
Translated Overall Comment: When we made the reservation, the pool was under maintenance. When we arrived, it was no longer there. But they never notified us, either by email or when we checked in. We found out the day we were leaving because we saw some guests in bathrobes. Even the TV in the room said it was still under maintenance. They gave us 2 towels one day and 3 the next, and there were 4 of us. They didn't replace shampoo and other items on the second night.

Recomendable al 100%.

Good food, the best thing was the attentive and friendly staff who provided first class service. The rooms are spacious, comfortable and the bed is very comfortable. 100% recommended.

Overall Comment: Great hotel and location; really enjopyed our stay here!

Name: MARIO
Overall Comment: Muy buena atencion del personal. La habitación estaba muy bien. El desayuno fue muy bueno. Las veces que almorzamos en el buffet era bueno pero un poco desparejo. No era lo deslumbrante que uno espera de la comida en Buenos Aires
Translated Overall Comment: Very good service from the staff. The room was very nice. The breakfast was very good. The times we had lunch at the buffet it was good but a bit uneven. It was not the dazzling food one expects from Buenos Aires.

Name: CARLOS
Overall Comment:
Excelente!! Limpieza atención ubicación 
Para regresar en breve 👏🏼
Translated Overall Comment: Excellent!! Cleanliness, attention, location. I'll be back soon 👏🏼

Name: ADRIANA
Overall Comment:
Ich würde komplett ignoriert, könnte ich durch das Hotel rundlauifen ohne das jemanden mich aufgehalten hätte.
 Ich habe ein kaltes Zimmer bekommen. Die Tür war nicht dich, kam kalte Luft zwischen Tür und Rahme. Das Licht der Kleiderschrank war immer an, auch nicht dicht und konnte man die ganze Nacht das Licht sehen. Die zwischen Tür , mit Zimmer 204, war auch nicht dicht, konnte man das Zimmer daneben anschauen und umgekehrt.
Heizung funktionierte auch nicht. Extra dünnere Glasfenster, da kann auch kälte.
Armes Buffet, viel Brot, kalte und rohr Rühreier. Nur Käse und Schinken, Schlechter Kaffee.
Es hat mich echt enttäuscht. 
Das Hotel in Buenos Aires hat nicht das Niveau von andere   -Hotel.
Translated Overall Comment: I was completely ignored; I could walk around the hotel without anyone stopping me. I was given a cold room. The door wasn't tight, cold air came between the door and the frame. The wardrobe light was always on, it wasn't tight either, and you could see the light all night long. The door between room 204 and the room was not tight either, you could see the room next door and vice versa. The heating didn't work either. The glass windows are extra thin, so it can get cold. Poor buffet, lots of bread, cold and raw scrambled eggs. Just cheese and ham, bad coffee. I was really disappointed. The hotel in Buenos Aires is not on the same level as other hotels.

Name: CRAIG
Overall Comment: All the staff were excellent and made me feel very welcome.
Translated Overall Comment: All the staff were excellent and made me feel very welcome.

Name: LEONARDO
Overall Comment: La estancia muy buena, como cualquier estancia en   , solo dos observaciones: La para de la silla del escritorio estaba rajada, se que el mobiliario es antiguo pero a tener cuidado con eso, lo segundo es que cuando regrese por la noche, después de haber salido toda la tarde, encontré la puerta de la habitación (2130) semi abierta, revise y afortunadamente todo completo, ahora no se si es porque las puertas son de difícil maniobra o alguien estaba husmeando las habitaciones.
Translated Overall Comment: The stay was very good, like any stay in , just two observations: The back of the desk chair was cracked, I know the furniture is old but be careful with that, the second thing is that when I returned at night, after having been out all afternoon, I found the door to the room (2130) half open, I checked and fortunately everything was complete, now I don't know if it's because the doors are difficult to maneuver or someone was snooping around the rooms.

Name: FERNANDO
Overall Comment: El balance general es bueno, me encontré con la sorpresa desagradable de tener que pagar por el desayuno (que entendí estaba incluido en la tarifa) y que la bañera de las habitaciones no tiene motor pero pudimos ingresar temprano y eso fue muy bueno.
Translated Overall Comment: The overall balance is good, I had the unpleasant surprise of having to pay for breakfast (which I understood was included in the rate) and that the bathtub in the rooms does not have a motor, but we were able to check in early and that was very good.

Translated Overall Comment: Unfortunately, from the website where I booked, I thought they were going to charge me in pesos and they ended up charging me in dollars. I paid much more than I expected to pay. The website is Hotels.com.

Overall Comment: Buena en términos generales, considero que las habitaciones podrían renovarse un poco, en particular los baños. Por mi trabajo tuve que realizar registro de entrada 3 veces durante una semana y repetir el proceso detallado cada vez, el uso de alguna solución de TI ayudaría a tener una mejor experiencia
Translated Overall Comment: Overall good, I think the rooms could use a bit of updating, especially the bathrooms. Due to my job I had to check in 3 times during a week and repeat the detailed process each time, the use of some IT solution would help to have a better experience.

Name: JUAN
Overall Comment: Amazing experience, the food, the staff, the environment. Everything was in perfect conditions and excellent. Congrats to the leadership team on making a successful stay for every customer
Translated Overall Comment: Amazing experience, the food, the staff, the environment. Everything was in perfect conditions and excellent. Congrats to the leadership team on making a successful stay for every customer

Name: YAUHEN
Overall Comment: Nice place, professional and helping staff.
Translated Overall Comment: Nice place, professional and helping staff.

Name: MICHELLE
Overall Comment:
En una palabra: Horrible estancia, horrible atención de los de operadora que niñas en decir hola al momento de contestar el teléfono cuando uno llama para atención médica. Hotel viejo que se inunda, quema y se queda sin agua caliente: 

1. la ventana del cuarto 2123 está rota, le hace falta una manecilla. 
2. El agua caliente se arruinó a la mitad de la estancia, parecía que era un problema a nivel de todas las habitaciones según lo que me contaban los reparadores que trataron de ayudarme (fueron más de 3)
3. Por causa de que la ventana no cerraba completamente, el día del diluvio, el cuarto se inundó bastante y no me ofrecieron otra habitación. La lluvia fue del 26 al 27 de abril. Y hay récord de la llamada que tuve que hacer a las 3 am del 27 para que vinieran a ayudarme a limpiar la habitación.
4.  Por esa misma ventana rota y lluvia supongo que se infiltró un bicho que me causó muchas visitas al hospital y hasta una noche que tuvieron que llegar los doctores a la habitación a inyectarme (también hay récord de la llamada a los paramédicos el 28 de abril por la noche, Justo un día después de la tormenta e inundación). Los doctores de guardia del hospital británico dijeron que eso solo podía ser un bicho, y probablemente que estaba en la cama donde yo dormía ya que la infección empezó a las 3 am del jueves 28 de abril. Un total de más de 500 USD pagados en medicinas, inyecciones y doctores, que el hotel no se dignó en compensar de ninguna manera. Pero eso si.. si me cobraron el café de la habitación. 
5. Un puerto usb para cargar los teléfonos se quemó una noche donde se llenó de humo mi habitación (el 6 de mayo de 2022, donde también hay récord de la llamada de las 10 pm). 
7. Por último, llevo un mes pidiendo que me acrediten mis noches y puntos a mi cuenta de    Bonvoy pero aún no lo hacen. Fueron 24 noches del 16 de abril al 10 de mayo de 2022, y con la promoción de doble noche deberían de haber sido más de 30 noches y más de 2000 puntos extra que aún no recibo.

Todo esto: infecciones, inundaciones, pagos de hospital, fuegos en la habitación lo tengo documentado en fotos y bills si desean verlo.

Porfavor ayuden a agilizar el punto 7 que ya llevan mes entero.
Translated Overall Comment: In a word: Horrible stay, horrible service from the operators who are girls who say hello when answering the phone when you call for medical attention. Old hotel that floods, burns and runs out of hot water: 1. The window in room 2123 is broken, it needs a handle. 2. The hot water was ruined halfway through the stay, it seemed like it was a problem at the level of all the rooms according to what the repairmen who tried to help me told me (there were more than 3) 3. Because the window did not close completely, the day of the flood, the room flooded quite a bit and they did not offer me another room. The rain was from April 26 to 27. And there is a record of the call I had to make at 3 am on the 27th to get them to come help me clean the room. 4. Because of that same broken window and rain, I suppose a bug infiltrated, which caused me many visits to the hospital and even one night when the doctors had to come to the room to inject me (there is also a record of the call to the paramedics on April 28 at night, just one day after the storm and flood). The doctors on duty at the British hospital said that it could only be a bug, and probably that it was in the bed where I slept since the infection started at 3 am on Thursday, April 28. A total of more than 500 USD paid for medicines, injections and doctors, which the hotel did not deign to compensate in any way. But yes... they did charge me for the coffee in the room. 5. A USB port to charge the phones burned one night when my room was filled with smoke (on May 6, 2022, where there is also a record of the 10 pm call). 7. Finally, I have been asking for a month to have my nights and points credited to my Bonvoy account but they still haven't done it. It was 24 nights from April 16 to May 10, 2022, and with the double night promotion it should have been more than 30 nights and more than 2000 extra points that I have not yet received. All of this: infections, floods, hospital payments, fires in the room, I have documented in photos and bills if you want to see it. Please help expedite point 7, which has already been going on for a whole month.

Name: ALEJANDRO
Overall Comment: Atención del personal en recepción y botones excelente . Las habitaciones había que pedir todos los días para que la limpien, xq aún dejando el cartel de limpieza no lo hacían. El aire acondicionado  no funcionaba reclamamos en más de tres ocasiones y no lo solucionaron. Los amenities eran solo para una persona y éramos dos, una sola bata, una sola pantufla. El agua fría salía caliente, quemaba. Ofrecían servicio de tabla de planchar y plancha, el cual tampoco estaba en la habitación.
Translated Overall Comment: The attention of the staff at reception and bellboys was excellent. The rooms had to be cleaned every day because even when leaving the cleaning sign they did not do it. The air conditioning did not work, we complained on more than three occasions and they did not fix it. The amenities were only for one person and there were two of us, only one robe, only one slipper. The cold water came out hot, it burned. They offered an ironing board and iron service, which was also not in the room.

Name: MICAELA
Overall Comment: Muy agradable
Translated Overall Comment: Very nice

Name: DANIEL
Overall Comment: Ótimo hotel. Quarto confortável e silencioso! Café da manhã excelente.
Translated Overall Comment: Great hotel. Comfortable and quiet room! Excellent breakfast.

Name: ALFRED
Overall Comment: the hotel manager went out of her way to accommodate a suite upgrade for me as a titanium member elite status. the hotel made my stay very warm and wonderful i would like to thank the hotel staff and especially the manager on fantastic stay and service. everyone at the hotel treated me like i was a special guess and went above and beyond the call of duty to make my stay memorable thank you.
Translated Overall Comment: the hotel manager went out of her way to accommodate a suite upgrade for me as a titanium member elite status. the hotel made my stay very warm and wonderful i would like to thank the hotel staff and especially the manager on fantastic stay and service. everyone at the hotel treated me like i was a special guess and went above and beyond the call of duty to make my stay memorable thank you.

Name: DANIEL
Overall Comment: Excelente
Translated Overall Comment: Excellent

Name: JOSEPH

Translated Overall Comment: The furniture is a bit worn, but the customer service is great.

Name: MARIELA
Overall Comment:
Creo que no hay relacion precio servicio.
Tendrian q haber avisado q la pileta no estaba disponible. No hay ni un saquito de té de cortesia. Cobran hasta las capsulas de cafe  Un hotel solo para alojarse. Valor abusivo del desayuno. Lo unico acorde es la estadia para estacionar. No volveria nunca más.
Translated Overall Comment: I think there is no relation between price and service. They should have warned that the pool was not available. There is not even a complimentary tea bag. They even charge for coffee capsules. A hotel just for staying. Excessive breakfast prices. The only thing that is appropriate is the cost of parking. I would never go back.

Name: ANDREAS
Overall Comment: Short stay but staff friendly, knowledgable and helpful. Central location and good amenities. A shame that the pool repairs are taking much longer than planned because it is one of the show off spaces of this hotel
Translated Overall Comment: Short stay but staff friendly, knowledgable and helpful. Central location and good amenities. A shame that the pool repairs are taking much longer than planned because it is one of the show off spaces of this hotel

Translated Overall Comment: I liked the service from the staff. Location. The first room I stayed in was very noisy and the air conditioning was not working well. We changed rooms and everything was ok.

Name: DIEGO
Overall Comment: Placentera cómoda muy amigable el lugar comida excelente
Translated Overall Comment: Pleasant, comfortable, very friendly place, excellent food

Name: DELIA
Overall Comment: Reserve la habitación con hidromasaje y no funcionaba.. quise usar la piscina del piso 23 y estaba cerrada... La ventana del balcón de habitación 1721 no cerraba correctamente y entraba frío.. creo que le falta mantenimiento al hotel, esas cosas no pueden pasar en un hotel supuestamente de alta categoría..por ese motivo no creo recomendar el hotel a otra persona, hay muchísima oferta hotelera en BA, seguramente tomaré otra alternativa al momento de alojarme
Translated Overall Comment: I booked the room with a whirlpool and it didn't work... I wanted to use the pool on the 23rd floor and it was closed... The balcony window in room 1721 didn't close properly and it was cold... I think the hotel needs maintenance, these things can't happen in a supposedly high-class hotel... for that reason I don't think I would recommend the hotel to anyone else, there are a lot of hotel options in BA, I will surely take another alternative when it comes to staying.

Name: JOSE
Overall Comment: La atención del personal muy esmerada . Las habitaciones muy confortables y los servicios de alta calidad en general.
Translated Overall Comment: The staff was very attentive. The rooms were very comfortable and the services were of high quality in general.

Name: BRUNO
Overall Comment: Se me molesto en el medio del desayuno por una confusión (si estaba o no incluido), que claramente si lo tenia incluido en los servicios.  Mal momento para consultar, o lo hace antes o lo hace despues, pero no en medio del desayuno...
Translated Overall Comment: I was bothered in the middle of breakfast by a confusion (whether it was included or not), which was clearly included in the services. Bad time to ask, either you do it before or after, but not in the middle of breakfast...

Name: PABLO
Overall Comment: Buenas instalaciones. Muy buena actitud de todo el personal. Ruidosa la habitación (ruidos de la calle, pasillo, habitación contigua)
Translated Overall Comment: Good facilities. Very good attitude from all the staff. Noisy room (noise from the street, hallway, adjoining room)

Name: MARIEODILE
Overall Comment: Oui j ai bcp apprécié l hôtel mais si j avais su que la piscine et le spa étaient fermés je serais allée ailleurs..le reste était très bien.
Translated Overall Comment: Yes I really liked the hotel but if I had known that the swimming pool and the spa were closed I would have gone elsewhere...the rest was very good.

Name: JULIANA
Overall Comment: Foi maravilhosa! Staff incrível, altamente receptivo e amável. Atendimento e recepção impecáveis, assim como o quarto. Eu e meu namorado estamos ansioso para voltar, fizeram nossa experiência ser mágica!
Translated Overall Comment: It was wonderful! Amazing staff, very welcoming and friendly. Impeccable service and reception, as well as the room. My boyfriend and I are looking forward to returning, they made our experience magical!

Name: MAURICE
Overall Comment: Buena disposicion del personal
Translated Overall Comment: Good disposition of the staff

Name: MAYTE
Overall Comment: I am glad there is a    now in Buenos Aires, this hotel is very nice and perfectly located
Translated Overall Comment: I am glad there is a    now in Buenos Aires, this hotel is very nice and perfectly located

Name: CASSIO
Overall Comment: As instalações do banehiro não me agradaram muito. Box pequeno
Translated Overall Comment: I didn't like the bathroom facilities very much. Small shower stall

Name: UGUR
Overall Comment: Hotel needs to solve the taxi, or travel company issue. Currently it is not reliable at all, the taxi we booked from the night before did not show up at the time. We were going to miss our flight.
Translated Overall Comment: Hotel needs to solve the taxi, or travel company issue. Currently it is not reliable at all, the taxi we booked from the night before did not show up at the time. We were going to miss our flight.

Translated Overall Comment: High price for the type of service. The small room lacked a hair dryer. You had to go to the trouble of asking for one. The cold water didn't work in the sink and the rate didn't include breakfast despite the high price.

Name: CHRISTIAN

Name: CHARIN

Name: ALI
Overall Comment: My stay was an excellent experience. Considering that the property was in process of major renovation, I was concern about my choice of the hotel and contact them in advance regarding my concerns. However, the hotel manager and afternoon manager (Manuel) contacted me via email in advance of my arrival and arrange proper upgrade. During my stay all of the staff were very professional, welcoming and gracious. In particular, I like to thank Manuel (PM Manager), Nicholas (Hotel Security), Belu and Macarena (Front Desk) and Patricio, Cecilia, Scarlet and Matias (Hosts in    Club) for their professionalism and welcoming attitude. They all made our stay very enjoyable and memorable experience.
Translated Overall Comment: My stay was an excellent experience. Considering that the property was in process of major renovation, I was concern about my choice of the hotel and contact them in advance regarding my concerns. Overall Comment: Location was great; roof top pool was under renovation but I think that's a major draw. The rooms were nice but could hear guests walking around late at night. Overall Comment: The checkin process took a very long time for no reason. Multiple trips to the back with our passports and no explanation why it all took more than a solid 15 minutes.
Translated Overall Comment: The checkin process took a very long time for no reason. Multiple trips to the back with our passports and no explanation why it all took more than a solid 15 minutes.

Name: JAIME
Overall Comment:
No fue agradable
Hice una reserva y lo q me cobraron era diferente
En algún momento de la noche o madrugada se encendió el televisor y se bloqueó mi puerta estando yo adentro. Fue necesario llamar alguien para q pasara mi tarjeta y abriera. Si hay una emergencia no hubiera podido salir
Translated Overall Comment: It was not pleasant. I made a reservation and the amount they charged me was different. At some point during the night or early morning the TV came on and my door was locked while I was inside. It was necessary to call someone to swipe my card and open it. If there was an emergency I would not have been able to get out.

Name: ERIK
Overall Comment: While the refurbished room I was in was very nice there were some huge shortcomings, the biggest was that the wifi was very poor at the desk and that half of the room. The other issues were more minor, the nespresso machine hadn't been used in so long it required a an extremely manual process to get it to work and the lighting in the bathroom by the mirror was very low even with all lights on.
Translated Overall Comment: While the refurbished room I was in was very nice there were some huge shortcomings, the biggest was that the wifi was very poor at the desk and that half of the room. Name: LUIS
Overall Comment: Todavia no recibi mi factura y de esa forma no puedo pedir mi reembolso en lá empresa

Name: NANCY
Overall Comment: The associates at this    are extremely friendly and anticipate our needs. It is greatly appreciated.

Hotel maravilhoso!
Quarto confortável

Overall Comment: Muy buena, muy bien atendidos y siempre dispuesto todo el personal

Name: DENNIS
Overall Comment: While I was VERY disappointed that the rooftop pool was closed, the Customer Service provided by Front Desk agents Camila and Luciaana was awesome, and doorman Federico was great. Name: RENE
Overall Comment: A

Name: CHRISTIAN
Overall Comment: For $240 I was highly disappointed, dated rooms, limited amenities, our king bed was two singles pushed together. We were disturbed at 9:50am to check the mini bar.. after requesting late check out. It was only soft drinks in the mini bar. To reiterate I paid $240 for one night.

Name: KARLA
Overall Comment: Good stay. Great location.
Translated Overall Comment: Good stay. Great location.

Name: ALEJANDRO
Overall Comment:
I couldn't check in until 5:30 pm... I waited and insisted many times from 2 :30 pm but no solution was given to me for 2:30 hours.
The hotel gave me the configuration of 2 king size bed for the two rooms I booked. However, I requested 1 king size in one room and 2 singles in the other room.
There was a problem with the door of the bathroom and the wardrobe. It did not close fully. 
The coffee capsules were not replaced daily.
Translated Overall Comment:
I couldn't check in until 5:30 pm... I waited and insisted many times from 2 :30 pm but no solution was given to me for 2:30 hours.

There was a problem with the door of the bathroom and the wardrobe. It did not close fully.

Overall Comment: No había agua caliente en la regadera, y a pesar del estar en el piso 17 el ruido de la avenida es fuerte.
Translated Overall Comment: There was no hot water in the shower, and despite being on the 17th floor the noise from the avenue is loud.

Name: VINCENT
Overall Comment: The staff was incredible at this location. I believe this is among some of the best customer service i’ve ever received, especially as an international client. I felt my needs were always met, the staff made me feel welcomed, and the members club amenities of free food around the clock and a happy hour are unbeatable. I would absolutely stay again!
Translated Overall Comment: The staff was incredible at this location. I believe this is among some of the best customer service i’ve ever received, especially as an international client. I felt my needs were always met, the staff made me feel welcomed, and the members club amenities of free food around the clock and a happy hour are unbeatable. I would absolutely stay again!

Name: SEBASTIAN
Overall Comment: Excelente. La habitación hermosa, una limpieza muy buena, y el personal 100 puntos.
Translated Overall Comment: Excellent. The room was beautiful, the cleaning was very good, and the staff was 100 points.

Name: ANTONELLA
Overall Comment: El lugar muy agradable y cómodo,  en especial su ubicación, pero se escuchaban muchos ruidos de construcción
Translated Overall Comment: The place was very nice and comfortable, especially its location, but there was a lot of construction noise.

Name: NICOLE
Overall Comment: Overall our stay was pleasant. The staff are polite and helpful. The hairdryers are old and need to be replaced.
Translated Overall Comment: Overall our stay was pleasant. The staff are polite and helpful. The hairdryers are old and need to be replaced.

Name: MARK
Overall Comment:
Cecilia was fantastic, helping me with printing my travel COVID test results, helping mail postcards after I found stamps, and assisting me in buying a bus ticket to the airport. Fantastic service!

Also, the maintenance department failed to fix the broken safe in my room all three times I asked during my stay. It was never fixed.
Translated Overall Comment:
Cecilia was fantastic, helping me with printing my travel COVID test results, helping mail postcards after I found stamps, and assisting me in buying a bus ticket to the airport. Fantastic service!

Also, the maintenance department failed to fix the broken safe in my room all three times I asked during my stay. It was never fixed.

Name: EDUARDO
Overall Comment:
Bien ubicado, habitación muy cómoda  
Desayuno no acorde a hotel
Translated Overall Comment: Well located, very comfortable room. Breakfast not in line with the hotel.

Name: DEMETRIO
Overall Comment: My first room was comfortable but there was no cold water for at least 24 hours.  The sockets in the bathroom were coming out of the wall.  On the second room, was also comfortable but again the room facilities, hardware, doors are old and not very well kept.  The doors could do with a good clean.  In fact, one of the days, the toilet was dirty after having been cleaned. The beds in both rooms were very comfortable, same for the pillows.  The lounge was very nice but very dated and the attendant was only available during specific hours.  I was helped once but i appreciated the local knowledge.  The gym was very dated and in repairs so limited access to facilities. Visiting aging    properties in Latam is not unusual, in Mexico City and Sao Paulo is normal but they are always kept immaculately clean and electricity ports fully attached to the wall.
Translated Overall Comment: My first room was comfortable but there was no cold water for at least 24 hours.  The sockets in the bathroom were coming out of the wall.  On the second room, was also comfortable but again the room facilities, hardware, doors are old and not very well kept.  The doors could do with a good clean.  In fact, one of the days, the toilet was dirty after having been cleaned. The beds in both rooms were very comfortable, same for the pillows.  The lounge was very nice but very dated and the attendant was only available during specific hours.  I was helped once but i appreciated the local knowledge.  The gym was very dated and in repairs so limited access to facilities. Visiting aging    properties in Latam is not unusual, in Mexico City and Sao Paulo is normal but they are always kept immaculately clean and electricity ports fully attached to the wall.

Name: BRAULIO
Overall Comment: Booking.com cerré trato en 104000 pesos mas impuestos y en el hotel me cobraron 1:34000  y eso no está bien me cobraron 9000 pesos mas , reclamando no me reconocieron
Translated Overall Comment: Booking.com closed the deal for 104,000 pesos plus taxes and at the hotel they charged me 1:34,000 and that is not right, they charged me 9,000 pesos more, when I complained they did not recognize me

Name: FABIAN
Overall Comment:
Estimados, tuve una muy placentera estadia
Todos los años festejamos en otra cadena de Hotel nuestro aniversario.
Este año decidimos cambiar, y me sorprendio los detalles que tuvieron al mejorarnos la habitacion.
Sin saber nos asignaron la habitacion 1403 , y nos sorprendio que justamente es  nuestro dia de aniversario 14 de marzo.
Y resulto ser una habitacion con una  vista inmejorable.
La atencion de los mozos, el valet, y la recepcion fue excelente.
No quiero dejar de mencionar el nivel de calidad del menu en el Restaurante La luciernaga fue muy bueno.
En general la experiencia fue de lo mejor, esperamos volver el proximo año.
Gracias a todos por su profesionalismo.
Saludos
Lic. Fabian D'Andrea
Translated Overall Comment: Dear Sirs, I had a very pleasant stay. Every year we celebrate our anniversary at another hotel chain. This year we decided to change, and I was surprised by the details they had in upgrading our room. Without knowing it, they assigned us room 1403, and we were surprised that it was precisely our anniversary day, March 14th. And it turned out to be a room with an unbeatable view. The service of the waiters, the valet, and the reception was excellent. I do not want to forget to mention the quality level of the menu at the La Luciernaga Restaurant, which was very good. In general, the experience was the best, we hope to return next year. Thank you all for your professionalism. Greetings Lic. Fabian D'Andrea

Name: ALEJANDRO
Overall Comment: Agradable
Translated Overall Comment: Pleasant

Name: JESUS
Overall Comment: Estuve 6 noches con ustedes, las primeras 3 no fueron nada agradables, la torre vieja de su hotel está en malas condiciones , se escucha todo de los cuartos vecinos, mi vecino fumaba en su habitación, tuve un problema con el sanitario, a lo cual agradezco que me hayan cambiado de habitación a la otra torre que es un mundo de diferencia, el personal es “maravilloso” desde recepción, hasta el Staff de limpieza a la habitación , felicidades en eso !!!!
Translated Overall Comment: I stayed with you for 6 nights, the first 3 were not at all pleasant, the old tower of your hotel is in poor condition, you can hear everything from the neighboring rooms, my neighbor smoked in his room, I had a problem with the toilet, for which I am grateful that you changed my room to the other tower which is a world of difference, the staff is "wonderful" from reception to the cleaning staff to the room, congratulations on that!!!!

Name: MACERLO
Overall Comment:
Muy poca empatia por el cliente. Super estructurados los empleados, sin sentido de la atención. 
Llegue con un grupo temprano, no tuvieron mi habitación hasta la hora de ingreso, mientras otras habitaciones durante todo el día iban ingresando. Fuimos a un evento el cual la mayoría de los huéspedes del hotel ingresaron y salieron los mismos días.  Con un simple clic podían asignarme otra habitación, misma categoría, misma fecha. 
Pero la rigidez y falta de entendimiento no los deja pensar.
No lo recomiendo para nada.
Translated Overall Comment: Very little empathy for the customer. The employees are super structured, with no sense of attention. I arrived with a group early, they didn't have my room until check-in time, while other rooms were being checked in throughout the day. We went to an event where most of the hotel guests checked in and out on the same days. With a simple click they could assign me another room, same category, same date. But the rigidity and lack of understanding doesn't let them think. I don't recommend it at all.

Name: CARINA
Overall Comment: Estancia excelente! Lo único que no me gustó es que no hayan respetado el precio arreglado con booking
