The minibar was inside the closet on some unstable wood that every time the door was opened it became unbalanced and fell. The overall experience was good, but not a 10.

Name: KRISTINA
Overall Comment: Очень комфортно, в номере есть минибар, но не было белых халатов и тапочек, нам с дороги это было прям необходимо. В остальном- прекрасный номер, великолепный персонал, отличная цена, удачное расположение отеля
Translated Overall Comment: Very comfortable, there is a minibar in the room, but there were no white robes and slippers, we really needed it after the road. Otherwise - a wonderful room, great staff, great price, good location of the hotel

Name: MAURO
Overall Comment: Quarto amplo, porém como mofo e papel de parede estufado e soltando. Café da manhã poderia ser melhor.
Translated Overall Comment: Large room, but moldy and the wallpaper was swollen and coming off. Breakfast could be better.

Name: EDUARDO
Overall Comment: Excelente estadía,  muy buena atención y muy lindo el Hotel
Translated Overall Comment: Excellent stay, very good service and a very nice hotel.

Name: DELLY
Overall Comment: Excelente servicio, comodidad, muy seguro y ameno
Translated Overall Comment: Excellent service, comfort, very safe and pleasant

Name: CHRIS
Overall Comment: The staff was incredible, understanding, and super helpful; it was a real joy
Translated Overall Comment: The staff was incredible, understanding, and super helpful; it was a real joy

Name: ADRIANA
Overall Comment:
no estaba el bar abierto. no tenìa restaurante. 
no habìa vino. solo por copa. 
me quedè encerrada en la habitaciòn. no funcionaba bien la cerradura. 
si yo sabìa que no estaba el bar y el resto (no lo decìa la pàgina) no iba.
pagué algo que no pude disfrutar.
Translated Overall Comment: The bar wasn't open. There was no restaurant. There was no wine. Only by the glass. I was locked in the room. The lock didn't work properly. If I knew that the bar and the rest (the website didn't say so) weren't there, I wouldn't have gone. I paid for something I couldn't enjoy.

Name: MARIO
Overall Comment: Buenas tardes.  Un placer. Muy agradable.  Sin Palabra.
Translated Overall Comment: Good afternoon. A pleasure. Very pleasant. No words left.

Name: TITO
Overall Comment: Lugar muy confortable, muy buena atención , buen servicio de desayuno , almuerzos y cenas …! Personal muy idóneo..!!
Translated Overall Comment: Very comfortable place, very good service, good breakfast, lunch and dinner service...! Very suitable staff..!!

Name: IRIS
Overall Comment:
The walks were so thin that unheard the neighbours next door and above me.
The furnishings are already shabby and the wallpaper in the bathroom is peeling.
The hotel is ftom the 1980‘s and it needs renovations desperately.
The telephone in the room was useless - couldn’t reach reception or housekeeping . I could have collapsed in the room and no one would have known!
Translated Overall Comment:
The walks were so thin that unheard the neighbours next door and above me.
The furnishings are already shabby and the wallpaper in the bathroom is peeling.
The hotel is ftom the 1980‘s and it needs renovations desperately.
The telephone in the room was useless - couldn’t reach reception or housekeeping . I could have collapsed in the room and no one would have known!

Name: FERNANDO
Overall Comment:
Primero llegamos a las 23:45 pm y solo había una persona atendiendo los check in, cuando la cola de pasajeros era de unas 5 personas, por lo que recién a las 1 am pude subir a la habitación.

Luego en la habitación el agua del escusado no se iba y pedí lo revisen y se demoraron dos días en hacerlo, por lo que ni siquiera pude utilizar el escusado mas de una vez por obvias razones, un verdadero desastre el servicio de mantenimiento del hotel
Translated Overall Comment: First, we arrived at 11:45 pm and there was only one person checking in, when the queue of passengers was about 5 people long, so I was only able to go up to the room at 1 am. Then, in the room, the water in the toilet wouldn't go out and I asked them to check it and it took them two days to do so, so I couldn't even use the toilet more than once for obvious reasons. The hotel's maintenance service is a real disaster.

Name: RODRIGO
Overall Comment: Luego de estar dos hiras esperando para que la habitación asignada  correspondiese a la qie contrate . Proceso que fue exitoso pero extremadamente largo la estadía fue perfecta . Buena atención , instalaciones de gran calidad muy bien desayuno
Translated Overall Comment: After waiting two hours for the assigned room to correspond to the one I had booked. A process that was successful but extremely long, the stay was perfect. Good service, high quality facilities, very good breakfast.

Name: MARIA
Overall Comment: Great option for Buenos Aires! Nice hotel with great hospitality
Translated Overall Comment: Great option for Buenos Aires! Nice hotel with great hospitality

Name: MARCELO
Overall Comment: Muy cómoda estancia
Translated Overall Comment: Very comfortable stay

Name: IGNACIO
Overall Comment: Mi experiencia fue regular. El spa estaba cerrado. Tampoco funcionaba el hidromasaje. Me olvide una campera y tuve que llamar 2 veces para insistiendo para que se fijaran y me la pudieran hallar. El baño se inundaba. Sinceramente , no corresponde la categoría ni el costo que cobran. Slds
Translated Overall Comment: My experience was average. The spa was closed. The whirlpool didn't work either. I forgot a jacket and had to call twice to insist that they take care of it and find it for me. The bathroom was flooded. Honestly, it doesn't correspond to the category or the price they charge. Regards

Name: ANA
Overall Comment: The staff was extremely professional and welcoming.
Translated Overall Comment: The staff was extremely professional and welcoming.

Name: WAIFRE
Overall Comment:
Excellent séjour. Le personnel est extrêmement serviable et aimable.
Jolie chambre, spacieuse et très confortable.
Des vraies installations sportives.
Seul bémol : une chambre avec porte communicante sur une autre chambre et des voisins bruyants très tôt.
Dans l’ensemble un séjour très agréable. Je recommande vivement cet hôtel.
Translated Overall Comment: Excellent stay. The staff is extremely helpful and friendly. Nice room, spacious and very comfortable. Real sports facilities. Only downside: a room with a connecting door to another room and noisy neighbors very early. Overall a very pleasant stay. I highly recommend this hotel.

Name: VICTORIA
Overall Comment: The hotel was comfortable, great bed.towels weren’t replaced consistently and the pool deck was closed. But location was great. Wish that the lobby bar was more lively.
Translated Overall Comment: The hotel was comfortable, great bed.towels weren’t replaced consistently and the pool deck was closed. But location was great. Wish that the lobby bar was more lively.

Name: PATRICIA
Overall Comment: I’m a    member and the front desk was very confused. My points was not credit yet. I hope the hotel fix it faster. My rewards number is 242662379.
Translated Overall Comment: I’m a    member and the front desk was very confused. My points was not credit yet. I hope the hotel fix it faster. My rewards number is 242662379.

Name: JORGE
Overall Comment: Personal muy atento ,
Translated Overall Comment: Very attentive staff,

Name: DONALDGLEN
Overall Comment: The hotel was very nice and the staff was very helpful.
Translated Overall Comment: The hotel was very nice and the staff was very helpful.

Name: ALAN
Overall Comment: I was happy with the accomodations but not happy that I was charged a day that I didn't stay at the hotel due to my flight being changed by the airline.
Translated Overall Comment: I was happy with the accomodations but not happy that I was charged a day that I didn't stay at the hotel due to my flight being changed by the airline.

Name: MONICA
Overall Comment: Excelente edificio y servicio, amabilidad del personal y limpieza. Buena ubicación
Translated Overall Comment: Excellent building and service, friendly staff and cleanliness. Good location

Name: JUSTIN
Overall Comment: The staff was amazing!
Translated Overall Comment: The staff was amazing!

Name: JAVIER
Overall Comment:
Pésima la atención.llegue al hotel 15hs  Solicite habitación para 4 personas dos adultos dos niños me dieron una habitación a las 20hs con dos camas de una plaza una vergüenza me dieron dos toallones para los 4 reclamé 4 veces q me den dos toallones más me los llevaron a las 23hs realmente patetico . Di aviso que Tenía que retirarme del hotel a las 8 porque tenía vuelo a las 9:45. Tenía mi vehículo atrás de 3 autos .
Los cuales no estaban las llaves los tuve que empujar para poder salir . TENGO LA PEOR DEIS EXPERIENCIA EN SU HOTEL
Translated Overall Comment: Terrible service. I arrived at the hotel at 3pm. I requested a room for 4 people, two adults and two children. They gave me a room at 8pm with two single beds. It's a disgrace. They gave me two towels for the 4 of us. I asked 4 times for them to give me two more towels. They brought them to me at 11pm. Really pathetic. I gave notice that I had to leave the hotel at 8am because I had a flight at 9:45am. I had my vehicle behind 3 cars. The keys were not there. I had to push them to get out. I HAVE THE WORST EXPERIENCE IN YOUR HOTEL.

Name: ANTONIO
Overall Comment: staff extremely polite and helpful. apartments outdated - cold water system not working properly.
Translated Overall Comment: staff extremely polite and helpful. apartments outdated - cold water system not working properly.

Name: ANTONIO
Overall Comment: muy confortable , excelente personal en el hotel
Translated Overall Comment: Very comfortable, excellent staff at the hotel

Name: LADISLAO
Overall Comment:
Todo muy mal, empezando por el personal y su manera de solucionar:
llegue y caia agua por los focos!!! como es posible que salga agua de los focos!!! uno se puede morir asi! y no fueron capaces de hacer nada, exijo la devolucion de mi dinero...un desastre el    de CABA
Translated Overall Comment: Everything was very bad, starting with the staff and their way of dealing with the situation: I arrived and water was falling through the lights!!! How is it possible that water comes out of the lights!!! You could die like that! And they were not able to do anything, I demand my money back... what a disaster in CABA

Name: ALEJANDRO
Overall Comment: habitacion  bien , pero el proceso de check out bastante malo una sola persona atendiendo
Translated Overall Comment: Room was fine, but the check-out process was quite bad, only one person was attending.

Name: ALFREDO
Overall Comment: Muy lindo lugar. Confortable. Limpio. Los detalles de accesorios de la habitación.
Translated Overall Comment: Very nice place. Comfortable. Clean. The details of the room accessories.

Name: VICENTE
Overall Comment: Muy amplias y cómodas las habitaciones
Translated Overall Comment: Very spacious and comfortable rooms

Name: PAOLA
Overall Comment: La comida exquisita, el servicio excelente ❤️
Translated Overall Comment: Exquisite food, excellent service ❤️

Name: GUSTAVO
Overall Comment: mucha  demora en el check in y el check out.   al no haber disponible el  servicio de Concierge por lo menos visible
Translated Overall Comment: Long delays in check in and check out. There was no visible Concierge service available.

Name: LUCIANO
Overall Comment:
La pasé muy bien, las instalaciones están muy bien mantenidas. Excelente el gimnasio y el desayuno.
Como negativo comentó que la pileta y el spa están en refacción desde hace más de un año, deberían darle más prioridad dado que es algo importante para un hotel de este nivel
Translated Overall Comment: I had a great time, the facilities are very well maintained. The gym and breakfast were excellent. On the negative side, I would say that the pool and spa have been under renovation for over a year, they should give it more priority since it is something important for a hotel of this level.

Name: LUCRECIA
Overall Comment: Hace 5 día que realice el check out y todavía no me enviaron la factura. Llame dos veces para reclamar y me indicaron que se estaban demorando por que el hotel estaba lleno. Una vergüenza, necesito con urgencia la factura de mi estadía ya que la tengo que presentar en mi trabajo.
Translated Overall Comment: I checked out 5 days ago and they still haven't sent me the invoice. I called twice to complain and they told me that they were taking a while because the hotel was full. It's a shame, I urgently need the invoice for my stay since I have to present it at work.

Name: CARLOSALBERTO
Overall Comment: En mi habitación nro 627 no andaba el aire acondicionado. Recién me lo reconocieron el 3er día de los 4 que estuve alojado.... cuando me quejé ( el 1r día informé que no andaba y pedí lo vieran y lo único que hicieron fue explicarme cómo funcionaba... algo que nunca ocurrió).  El 2do día al salir les dije tenían todo el día para verlo.... y el tercero me quejé ya que esa situación no concuerda con un hotel con precio y pretensiones de 5 estrellas.... muy lejos de esa posición.
Translated Overall Comment: In my room #627 the air conditioning was not working. They only acknowledged it on the 3rd day of the 4 I was staying there... when I complained (on the 1st day I reported that it was not working and asked them to look at it and all they did was explain to me how it worked... something that never happened). On the 2nd day when I left I told them they had all day to look at it... and on the third day I complained because that situation is not consistent with a hotel with a 5 star price and pretensions... very far from that position.

Name: FRANCIS
Overall Comment: Hace falta modernizar más el hotel, las habitaciones están algo deterioradas
Translated Overall Comment: The hotel needs to be modernised further, the rooms are somewhat run down.

Name: MIGUEL
Overall Comment: El hotel está siendo renovado y tiene muchas de sus áreas fuera de servicio (pileta, spa, bar y restaurante) . Adicionalmente, las habitaciones no se acorde al nivel esperado para un hotel de su categoría. Le hace falta mantenimiento.
Translated Overall Comment: The hotel is undergoing renovation and many of its areas are out of order (pool, spa, bar and restaurant). Additionally, the rooms are not up to the standard expected for a hotel of its category. It needs maintenance.

Name: EDUARDO
Overall Comment: promocionan cosas que no ofrecen en realidad. No hay terracitas donde tomar algo, ni restaurante con vistas, etc. Para colmo me cobraron 10 mil pesos mas de lo que decía mi reserva de booking. Un espanto mi estadía
Translated Overall Comment: They promote things that they don't really offer. There are no terraces where you can have a drink, no restaurant with a view, etc. To top it off, they charged me 10 thousand pesos more than what my booking reservation said. My stay was horrible.

Name: MANUEL
Overall Comment: to be honest, i was never so dissapointed from a hotel like this one. the price was anourmas and the service was horrible. both showers in my room was not working and just boiling water came out, i even burned my hand . the reception was incompetent and also treat my girlfriend and me really horrible. i will never come back there and also try to avoid    in the future. usually i expect as an titanium elitr member that i get treat better but it dont seem so
Translated Overall Comment: to be honest, i was never so dissapointed from a hotel like this one. the price was anourmas and the service was horrible. both showers in my room was not working and just boiling water came out, i even burned my hand . the reception was incompetent and also treat my girlfriend and me really horrible. i will never come back there and also try to avoid    in the future. usually i expect as an titanium elitr member that i get treat better but it dont seem so

Name: MANUEL
Overall Comment: No estaba disponible la piscina ni el sauna, y jamás se me informó de ello, sino hasta contratar.
Translated Overall Comment: The pool and sauna were not available, and I was never informed of this until I booked.

Name: HENRY
Overall Comment: Fue muy agradable, como siempre.  Por motivos de trabajo debo estar visitando Buenos Aires con frecuiencia y la ubuicacion del hotel es perfecta para mis necesidades.  El personal del hotel es muy atento
Translated Overall Comment: It was very nice, as always. For work reasons I have to visit Buenos Aires frequently and the location of the hotel is perfect for my needs. The hotel staff is very attentive.

Name: JAN
Overall Comment: We found the    Buenos Aires slightly outdated but very comfortable, and we had a nice stay. Recommended.
Translated Overall Comment: We found the    Buenos Aires slightly outdated but very comfortable, and we had a nice stay. Recommended.

Name: FELIPE
Overall Comment: El hotel es algo viejo, si bien la habitación es muy cómoda ya todo se nota viejo (baño, muebles). Aparte el desayuno estaba muy regular
Translated Overall Comment: The hotel is a bit old, although the room is very comfortable, everything is already old (bathroom, furniture). Apart from that, the breakfast was very average.

Name: PAULO
Overall Comment: It is not    standard, very poor service, not worth what you pay.
Translated Overall Comment: It is not    standard, very poor service, not worth what you pay.

Name: JAI
Overall Comment: Muy agradable, como siempre
Translated Overall Comment: Very nice, as always

Name: DIEGO
Overall Comment: El spa y pileta estaban cerrados por mantenimiento. Check-in experience could have been better for a hotel of this category
Translated Overall Comment: The spa and pool were closed for maintenance. Check-in experience could have been better for a hotel of this category

Name: CARLOS
Overall Comment: Hotel que era antiguo y lo han refaccionado pero muy mal con muchos problemas para una categoria de   no es a la altura de un hotel mal reciclado con muchas fallas de detalles
Translated Overall Comment: Hotel that was old and has been renovated but very poorly with many problems for a category of not being up to par with a poorly renovated hotel with many flaws in details

Name: JAN
Overall Comment: Great location. Clean and nice rooms. However the room had a slight sewage smell I noticed. Nice gym on top of the building with a great view.
Translated Overall Comment: Great location. Clean and nice rooms. However the room had a slight sewage smell I noticed. Nice gym on top of the building with a great view.

Name: MARIA
Overall Comment: It was really good
Translated Overall Comment: It was really good

Name: JOSE
Overall Comment: Excelente
Translated Overall Comment: Excellent

Name: ANNE
Overall Comment: Friendly and accommodating staff. Great location.
Translated Overall Comment: Friendly and accommodating staff. Great location.

Name: ROBERT
Overall Comment: Terrible room service.
Translated Overall Comment: Terrible room service.

Name: GASTON
Overall Comment: Top notch customer service. Coffee area seemed to be under construction but this was a very minor inconvenience for my trip.
Translated Overall Comment: Top notch customer service. Coffee area seemed to be under construction but this was a very minor inconvenience for my trip.

Name: FERNANDO
Overall Comment: Agradezco el recebimento desde el recepcionista  Noturno hasta el señor que me llevo  a la habitaciona..El te q me sirvieron por mi  estado en que llegue. Agradesco a todos.Gracias.
Translated Overall Comment: I appreciate the welcome from the receptionist at night to the gentleman who took me to my room. The tea that was served to me due to the state in which I arrived. I thank everyone. Thank you.

Name: THEODORE
Overall Comment:
Manuel at the front desk was very helpful!  This was a last minute reservation and he was very accommodating. 
Federico was also extremely helpful with taking care of our luggage
Translated Overall Comment:
Manuel at the front desk was very helpful!  This was a last minute reservation and he was very accommodating. 
Federico was also extremely helpful with taking care of our luggage

Name: LEONARDO
Overall Comment:
La atención al cliente es perfecta y a uno le conforta mucho el trato que le dan a uno.
Las habitaciones muy comodas, el registro es rápido, el.desayuno completo y fresco.
Los servicios de restaurantes muy buenos y de calidad.
Y siempre la gentileza de todo el personal es magnífico.
Translated Overall Comment: Customer service is perfect and one feels very comforted by the way they treat one. The rooms are very comfortable, check-in is quick, the breakfast is complete and fresh. The restaurant services are very good and of high quality. And the kindness of all the staff is always magnificent.

Name: MATIAS
Overall Comment: La habitación no estaba del todo limpia. No tenía secador de pelo ni cafetera o te de cortesía. La piscina y el spa no funcionaban. Al igual q el celtic bar. Una lástima. Muy buena ubicación pero un poco caro para los servicios prestados. Ya que no incluía ni el desayuno que tuve q pagar aparte
Translated Overall Comment: The room was not very clean. There was no hairdryer or coffee maker or complimentary tea. The pool and spa were not working. As was the Celtic bar. A pity. Very good location but a bit expensive for the services provided. Since it did not even include breakfast, which I had to pay for separately.

Name: GONZALO
Overall Comment:
Este hotel es mi preferido en Buenos Aires desde hace años.  La estancia me resultó muy agradable. Entiendo que estan en reformas aún pero seria bueno que los televisores tenga disponibles el uso de aplicaciones. En el desayuno agregaria algo más de pastelería. El servicio de room service me pareció excelente tanto en los platos como en los tiempos.
Espero pronto volver y disfrutar de la piscina. Va a estar habilitada para niños?.
Translated Overall Comment: This hotel has been my favorite in Buenos Aires for years. I found my stay very pleasant. I understand that they are still undergoing renovations but it would be nice if the televisions had the ability to use apps. I would add some more pastries for breakfast. The room service seemed excellent to me both in terms of the dishes and the times. I hope to return soon and enjoy the pool. Will it be available for children?

Name: OSVALDO
Overall Comment: Fantastico hotel y muy buen servicio
Translated Overall Comment: Fantastic hotel and very good service

Name: MARTIN
Overall Comment: Estuve una sola noche por tema de trabajo. Debía salir muy temprano en la mañana al otro día. Pero bueno el hotel y el servicio es espectacular desde el trato de los recepcionistas hasta la calidad de la habitación y las características propias del hotel. El desayuno 10 puntos. Al irme olvide un portavalores , llame para avisar y cuando regrese me lo dieron y todo estaba impecable. Lo único que mejoraría sería el servicio de barra . Ya que un hotel de dicha envergadura tiene que tener whiskies variados a disposición siempre. Por lo demás , un placer. Cordial saludo.
Translated Overall Comment: I stayed just one night for work. I had to leave very early the next morning. But the hotel and the service are spectacular, from the receptionists' treatment to the quality of the room and the hotel's own characteristics. The breakfast is 10 points. When I left, I forgot a money box, I called to let them know and when I returned they gave it to me and everything was impeccable. The only thing I would improve would be the bar service, since a hotel of this size has to have a variety of whiskeys available at all times. For the rest, a pleasure. Kind regards.

Name: RICHARD
Overall Comment: Nice room, excellent staff
Translated Overall Comment: Nice room, excellent staff

Name: HUMBERTO
Overall Comment: Muy buena estadía. Muy buena habitación. Destacamos la atención de Manuel en la recepción en todo y ya que festejamos aniversario, nos hizo llegar un presente. Excelente gesto. Destacamos también la atención de Leandro en La Luciérnaga en la cena.
Translated Overall Comment: Very good stay. Very good room. We highlight Manuel's attention at the reception in everything and since we were celebrating our anniversary, he sent us a present. Excellent gesture. We also highlight Leandro's attention at La Luciérnaga at dinner.

Name: JUAN
Overall Comment: Seleccionamos    para nuestro 10 aniversario de bodas, para pasar la tarde e n la pileta y el spa, contratamos por Almundo por sobre otras opciones como Pestana, Madero o Melia por que conocemos que tienen la mejor vista y pileta, pero al llegar recibimos la noticia que estaba cerrada por refacciones con lo cual se trastocaron todos los planes y la experiencia ya no fue lo esperabamos. En Almundo nada decia que la pileta estaba cerrada, hecho el reclamo con ellos lo desestimaron y en el hotel ese día tampoco existio una propuesta de compensación acorde. La realidad es que  no volveria a elegir por la desconfianza generada en el mal manejo de una información clave sobre el servicio.
Translated Overall Comment: We chose Almundo for our 10th wedding anniversary to spend the afternoon at the pool and spa. We booked Almundo over other options like Pestana, Madero or Melia because we know they have the best view and pool. However, when we arrived we received the news that it was closed for renovations, which upset all our plans and the experience was no longer what we expected. Almundo did not say that the pool was closed. When we made a complaint to them, they dismissed it and the hotel that day did not offer any appropriate compensation. The truth is that I would not choose Almundo again because of the mistrust generated by the poor handling of key information about the service.

Name: MARIO
Overall Comment: Muy buena estadía!
Translated Overall Comment: Very good stay!

Name: MATIAS
Overall Comment: Todo muy agradable y el personal muy atento. Muchas gracias y nos velveremos a ver.
Translated Overall Comment: Everything was very nice and the staff was very attentive. Thank you very much and we will see each other again.

Name: PAK
Overall Comment: Having been in many hotels, I was very impressed with your great staff. In particular, a gentleman by the name of Patricio, and a women (Florencia?) who manage the executive lounge were both very sincerely courteous and attentive to the guests. They made my stay all the more enjoyable.
Translated Overall Comment: Having been in many hotels, I was very impressed with your great staff. In particular, a gentleman by the name of Patricio, and a women (Florencia?) who manage the executive lounge were both very sincerely courteous and attentive to the guests. They made my stay all the more enjoyable.

Name: EVELIA
Overall Comment: Todo el personal muy agradable y  muy cerca de todo
Translated Overall Comment: All the staff very nice and very close to everything

Name: PABLO
Overall Comment: El hotel y las instalaciones son excelentes como ya he comentado en mis estancias anteriores, solo que en esta oportunidad me toco perder mas de una hora por un error de parte de ustedes en la reserva de la habitación ya que no contaban a la hora de mi llegada con la que había reservado con 5 días de anticipación, la bañera no funciono el sistema de cierre (tapón) y no pudimos hacer uso de la misma. por lo demás el personal excelente.
Translated Overall Comment: The hotel and the facilities are excellent as I have already mentioned in my previous stays, except that on this occasion I had to lose more than an hour due to an error on your part in the room reservation, since you did not have the room I had booked 5 days in advance at the time of my arrival. The bathtub did not have the closing system (plug) and we could not use it. Otherwise, the staff was excellent.

Name: YORAM
Overall Comment:
1. Concerning breakfast’s buffet:
1.1 Bread offered, is never fresh.
1.2 The variety of offered food can be increased.  Maybe more vegetables, and white cheeses.
1.3 Served cornflakes should be crispy. Maybe kept closed, in dry environment. 
Served scrambled egg, is cold.
2. No minibar in the room.
3. The safe in the room in not physically attached to the wall of the room. “This is like this in all rooms” the receptionist told me.
4. None, whatsoever, any document in the room about the hotel’s facilities. 
5. No writing pen or paper to write on.
6. if you are offering your guest, an out of the hotel services, like PCR Testings, please see your duty to support him, till his fully satisfaction.
7. The dining room is nice and kept well.
8. Very clean and beautiful decorated lobby and hotel.
9. The stuff is kind and very helpful.
10. The room is kept clean.
11. The picture on all TV channels was unstable and bouncy.
Translated Overall Comment:
1. Concerning breakfast’s buffet:
1.1 Bread offered, is never fresh.
1.2 The variety of offered food can be increased.  Maybe more vegetables, and white cheeses.
1.3 Served cornflakes should be crispy. Maybe kept closed, in dry environment. 
Served scrambled egg, is cold.
2. No minibar in the room.
3. The safe in the room in not physically attached to the wall of the room. “This is like this in all rooms” the receptionist told me.
4. None, whatsoever, any document in the room about the hotel’s facilities. 
5. No writing pen or paper to write on.
6. if you are offering your guest, an out of the hotel services, like PCR Testings, please see your duty to support him, till his fully satisfaction.
7. The dining room is nice and kept well.
8. Very clean and beautiful decorated lobby and hotel.
9. The stuff is kind and very helpful.
10. The room is kept clean.
11. The picture on all TV channels was unstable and bouncy.

Name: DANIE
Overall Comment: La atención de recepción es excelente por parte del personal general, no así de quién pareciera ser supervisor o decisor. Me ocurrió en 2 oportunidades que quien debía responder o definir fue poco cordial mientras que el personal general (sin jerarquía) fue muy amable y expeditivo
Translated Overall Comment: The reception service is excellent from the general staff, but not from the person who seems to be the supervisor or decision-maker. On two occasions, it happened to me that the person who was supposed to respond or define was unfriendly, while the general staff (without hierarchy) was very kind and expeditious.

Name: VERONICA
Overall Comment:
Muy lindo lobby, habitaciones confortables, rica comida del restaurant.
Los desayunos muy básicos, pocas opciones para los que no comemos harinas. Algo importante mi habitación 4 días seguidos olía a cañería, un olor realmente intenso (habitación 1426), tener en cuenta esto, solicité cambio y no me lo dieron. El personal muy a amable.
Translated Overall Comment: Very nice lobby, comfortable rooms, delicious food in the restaurant. Very basic breakfasts, few options for those of us who don't eat flour. Something important: my room smelled like a sewer for 4 days in a row, a really intense smell (room 1426). Keep this in mind, I asked for a change and they didn't give it to me. The staff was very friendly.

Name: VALENTINA
Overall Comment: Mala experiencia. Muy mal manejo de las reservas, parte del staff es incompetente. La piscina está sin funcionar y no ofrecen soluciones lógicas para las limitaciones que presenta el hotel.
Translated Overall Comment: Bad experience. Very poor handling of reservations, part of the staff is incompetent. The pool is not working and they do not offer logical solutions for the limitations that the hotel presents.

Name: JUAN
Overall Comment: Nos encanto el hotel. El trato del personal es muy amable y el servicio para los platinum de bonvoy extraordinario
Translated Overall Comment: We loved the hotel. The staff was very friendly and the service for bonvoy platinum members was extraordinary.

Name: EDGARDO
Overall Comment: Muy buena
Translated Overall Comment: Very good

Name: ELIO
Overall Comment: All perfect
Translated Overall Comment: All perfect

Name: ROLANDO
Overall Comment: El hotel esta bien ubicado sin embargo el cobro del estacionamiento asi como la falta de amenidades como cafe en la habitacion demeritan el valor.
Translated Overall Comment: The hotel is well located, however the parking fee and the lack of amenities such as coffee in the room detract from the value.

Name: JORGE
Overall Comment: Wish it had a coffee maker and iron in the room.
Translated Overall Comment: Wish it had a coffee maker and iron in the room.

Name: MARIO
Overall Comment:
Good service, good employees, good facilities.
Bad tv infrastructure, expected to have at least at evening some days with different and special food in the lounge. Suppose to fill daily tea and coffee in the room.
Translated Overall Comment:
Good service, good employees, good facilities.
Bad tv infrastructure, expected to have at least at evening some days with different and special food in the lounge. Suppose to fill daily tea and coffee in the room.

Name: ZORAIDA
Overall Comment: Es muy importante llegar a un Hotel, con estándares de calidad en los servicios ofrecidos, excelencia en la limpieza y seguridad de habitación, en estos tiempos de alta incertidumbre. Muchas gracias, por ofrecer este servicio. No esperaba menos, y no los cambio por otra cadena de hotel.
Translated Overall Comment: It is very important to arrive at a hotel with quality standards in the services offered, excellence in room cleanliness and security, in these times of high uncertainty. Thank you very much for offering this service. I expected nothing less, and I would not change you for another hotel chain.

Name: DOMINGO
Overall Comment: I had booked an offer for argentinian residents that included a welcome drink (which they did not offer) an upgrade (which they did not give me) and late checkout at 16 pm and even though I arrived after 12 am, I was told they could give me a check out at 13 pm max. Also, the room I was assigned was old and needed update, not very clean and I didn’t even had a bottle of water there (considering that at the time of my arrival the hotel doesn’t have room service either).
Translated Overall Comment: I had booked an offer for argentinian residents that included a welcome drink (which they did not offer) an upgrade (which they did not give me) and late checkout at 16 pm and even though I arrived after 12 am, I was told they could give me a check out at 13 pm max. Also, the room I was assigned was old and needed update, not very clean and I didn’t even had a bottle of water there (considering that at the time of my arrival the hotel doesn’t have room service either).

Name: PATRICIA
Overall Comment: Hotel muito bonito, mas café da manhã sem muitas opções.
Translated Overall Comment: Very nice hotel, but breakfast doesn't have many options.

Name: ROBERT
Overall Comment: When I booked my stay at the    Buenos aries it’s never mentioned that the pool or spa are being renovated.  The    website, app snd all the websites including booking.com feature the pool.  Very disappointed when I received an email after I booked on the    app. I felt by not posting the pool and spa were closed were very misleading  The room was nice as well as the staff.  I was charged for breakfast for two people which was to be a a concession for not having a pool or spa.  The food in the hotel need improving.  The breakfast was good but the hotel restaurants Not edible.
Translated Overall Comment: When I booked my stay at the    Buenos aries it’s never mentioned that the pool or spa are being renovated.  The    website, app snd all the websites including booking.com feature the pool.  Very disappointed when I received an email after I booked on the    app. I felt by not posting the pool and spa were closed were very misleading  The room was nice as well as the staff.  I was charged for breakfast for two people which was to be a a concession for not having a pool or spa.  The food in the hotel need improving.  The breakfast was good but the hotel restaurants Not edible.

Name: SELMA
Overall Comment: Being surrounded and assisted  by kind, efficient and friendly personnel, in a perfectly located hotel, was a special gift to me...just after having endured particular hard times along with the whole world!
Translated Overall Comment: Being surrounded and assisted  by kind, efficient and friendly personnel, in a perfectly located hotel, was a special gift to me...just after having endured particular hard times along with the whole world!

Name: BRIAN
Overall Comment: Wonderful as always.... truly enjoy   . Had a little trouble at front desk I was placed in a standard room as a gold elite usually get an upgrade.... spoke to the desk and they made the necessary changes immediately. Will 100% stay there again when I am back in BA
Translated Overall Comment: Wonderful as always.... truly enjoy   . Had a little trouble at front desk I was placed in a standard room as a gold elite usually get an upgrade.... spoke to the desk and they made the necessary changes immediately. Will 100% stay there again when I am back in BA

Name: ELIZABETH
Overall Comment:
Realice la reserva a través de booking, y no figuraba que la piscina estaba en reparación, ni tampoco me lo mencionaron cuando hice el check in en recepción.
Por otro lado, es la primera vez que en un hotel de categoría me dicen que no está incluido el desayuno. Nuevamente reitero no estaba visible en la página de alojamiento sino claramente hubiese optado por otra opción, ni tampoco lo mencionan en recepción.
Por último, me olvide el cargador del celular y nadie se ha comunicado conmigo aun para coordinar el retiro del mismo.

Me parece el servicio deplorable.
Translated Overall Comment: I made the reservation through booking, and it did not appear that the pool was under repair, nor did they mention it to me when I checked in at reception. On the other hand, it is the first time that in a high-end hotel I have been told that breakfast is not included. Again, I repeat, it was not visible on the accommodation page otherwise I would have clearly opted for another option, nor is it mentioned at reception. Lastly, I forgot my cell phone charger and no one has contacted me yet to coordinate its removal. I find the service deplorable.

Name: FERNANDO
Overall Comment: La habitación, no tenía un bolígrafo, papes de notas, vasos, secador de cabello, pantuflas, pava eléctrica. Frigobar vacío.
Translated Overall Comment: The room did not have a pen, note papers, glasses, hair dryer, slippers, electric kettle. Empty minibar.

Name: WILLIAM
Overall Comment: Excellent service amd staff. Great central location.
Translated Overall Comment: Excellent service amd staff. Great central location.

Name: JORGE
Overall Comment: Fantastic. Exceeded expectation!!
Translated Overall Comment: Fantastic. Exceeded expectation!!

Name: FRANCISCO
Overall Comment: Ser platinum elite es un compromiso de vida con una marca que se renueva con cada estancia en cada nuevo país y que se afianza o se destruye con cada nuevo encuentro, hasta ahora    como marca supera con creces las otras marcadas asociadas.  Siempre los recomendare y estaré feliz de volver a estar con ustedes.
Translated Overall Comment: Being Platinum Elite is a lifelong commitment to a brand that is renewed with each stay in each new country and that is strengthened or destroyed with each new encounter. So far, as a brand, it far surpasses the other associated brands. I will always recommend you and I will be happy to be with you again.

Name: RICHARD
Overall Comment: Nice location with a friendly and helpful staff.
Translated Overall Comment: Nice location with a friendly and helpful staff.

Name: SRAVAN
Overall Comment: Nice and clean, great and helpful staff. Great location.
Translated Overall Comment: Nice and clean, great and helpful staff. Great location.

Name: KENDRA
Overall Comment: Very lovely hotel and accommodating. It was a little difficult to get small hand towels to wash our bodies
Translated Overall Comment: Very lovely hotel and accommodating. It was a little difficult to get small hand towels to wash our bodies

Name: EMILIANO
Overall Comment: El personal del hotel fue muy amable, el room service pronto y completo. Estaba avisado de las reparaciones del health club y la piscina. Me hubiera gustado más oferta de restaurantes para almuerzo y cena. El desayuno en la habitación fue una muy buena experiencia.
Translated Overall Comment: The hotel staff was very friendly, room service prompt and complete. I was informed of the repairs to the health club and the pool. I would have liked more restaurant options for lunch and dinner. Breakfast in the room was a very good experience.

Name: JOSIAH
Overall Comment: Outstanding service, very responsive and professional!
Translated Overall Comment: Outstanding service, very responsive and professional!

Name: JULIO
Overall Comment:
Me pareció un hotel muy antiguo, con detalles de mantenimientos a realizar. Restorante vacío, con todo lo que ello conlleva.
Cochera tipo laberinto, donde vi como a otro huésped le costó mucho salir.
Translated Overall Comment: It seemed to me to be a very old hotel, with some maintenance to be done. The restaurant was empty, with all that that entails. The garage was like a labyrinth, where I saw another guest having a hard time getting out.

Name: ELOLA
Overall Comment:
Al llegar me entero que no había pileta disponible cuando fue uno de los filtros utilizados en Booking.com 
No tenían cochera disponible y debí abonar eso aparte. 
La tarifa no incluía desayuno ??? No conozco hotel 5 estrellas que trabaje así en el mundo … 

Al llegar la habitación no estaba lista … tres horas los técnicos queriendo hacer funcionar el tv … 

Realmente impresentable!!!
Translated Overall Comment: Upon arrival I found out that there was no pool available, which was one of the filters used on Booking.com. They did not have a garage available and I had to pay for that separately. The rate did not include breakfast??? I don't know of any 5 star hotel in the world that works like that... When I arrived the room was not ready... three hours of technicians trying to get the TV to work... Really unacceptable!!!

Name: LUIS
Overall Comment: La experiencia fue buena. No me dí cuenta cuando hice la reserva de que la misma contara con desayuno (era algo que era obvio que la tarifa lo incluyera). Las instalaciones, excelentes. Hay pequeñas cosas que deberían contar con un grado de detalle, que realce el tipo de hotel. Por ejemplo, en el baño de mi habitación, había manchas de pintura blanca en los azulejos. La tapa del inodoro no tenía todas las gomas que hacen de apoyo. Parte del zócalo de madera del marco de la puerta del baño, estaba podrido. La luz del placard, está prendida constantemente. Las luces solamente se apagan de la llave que está en la puerta. Si uno se acuesta, se tiene que levantar. Un velador, la lámpara que tenía, era prácticamente una vela porque no iluminaba nada. Para acceder al baño del entrepiso, desde el comedor de PB hay que hacer un curso (y más de noche) porque no se ven bien dónde se encuentran... Son pequeñas cosas que vi, de un molesto que quiere la excelencia, para un hotel de estas características. No obstante lo indicado, siempre pensé, viéndolo de afuera, que no tenía el nivel que tiene. Otra cosa, entiendo que no es la función del hotel, brindar estacionamiento, pero teniendo en cuenta que estaba prácticamente vacío (o por lo menos con poca gente), el costo es alto. Pero quizás es una apreciación que tuve. Excelente el televisor. Buena la atención. No sé que más agregar...
Translated Overall Comment: The experience was good. I didn't realize when I made the reservation that it included breakfast (it was something that was obvious that the rate included it). The facilities were excellent. There are small things that should be given a level of detail, which would enhance the type of hotel. For example, in the bathroom of my room, there were white paint stains on the tiles. The toilet lid did not have all the rubber that supports it. Part of the wooden baseboard of the bathroom door frame was rotten. The closet light is constantly on. The lights only turn off with the key that is in the door. If you go to bed, you have to get up. A nightstand, the lamp that it had, was practically a candle because it did not illuminate anything. To access the bathroom on the mezzanine, from the dining room on the ground floor, you have to take a course (and more so at night) because you cannot see well where they are... These are small things that I saw, from an annoying person who wants excellence, for a hotel of these characteristics. Despite what I have said, I always thought, looking at it from the outside, that it was not as good as it is. Another thing, I understand that it is not the hotel's function to provide parking, but taking into account that it was practically empty (or at least with few people), the cost is high. But perhaps it is an appreciation that I had. The television was excellent. The service was good. I don't know what else to add...

Name: CARLOS
Overall Comment: I had the most pleasant experience when front desk agent Alejandro Medina checked me in. My 2 adjoining rooms were ready early and the process was seamless, quick and easy after a very long flight the night before. He truly went above and beyond the call of duty and I wanted to personally commend him for a job well done
Translated Overall Comment: I had the most pleasant experience when front desk agent Alejandro Medina checked me in. My 2 adjoining rooms were ready early and the process was seamless, quick and easy after a very long flight the night before. He truly went above and beyond the call of duty and I wanted to personally commend him for a job well done

Name: BARBARA
Overall Comment:
I was extremely impressed with this property in every way! 
We spent the first let of our trip at the Park Tower and found this location better in every way, location, staff, etc...
Translated Overall Comment:
I was extremely impressed with this property in every way! 
We spent the first let of our trip at the Park Tower and found this location better in every way, location, staff, etc...

Name: PABLO
Overall Comment:
Si bien ya hemos estado en el Hotel. siempre es un placer descansar y disfrutar unos días de Buenos Aires, quedándose en el mismo.
Lamentablemente en esta oportunidad no pudimos disfrutar de la hermosa piscina que posee, y es uno de los motivos para elegirlos.
excepcional la atención de Quique.
Translated Overall Comment: Although we have already stayed at the hotel, it is always a pleasure to rest and enjoy a few days in Buenos Aires, staying there. Unfortunately, on this occasion we were unable to enjoy the beautiful pool that it has, and it is one of the reasons for choosing them. The attention of Quique was exceptional.

Name: DANIEL
Overall Comment: Really nice hotel and great staff. My only observation would be the swimming pool. Why would you close the swimming pool for renovation in the middle of the summer?
Translated Overall Comment: Really nice hotel and great staff. My only observation would be the swimming pool. Why would you close the swimming pool for renovation in the middle of the summer?

Name: MYRIAM
Overall Comment:
Hello
Great Location
Excelent front desk service.
Perfect treatment in both of your retaurants
 seeing you next time.

rami Heimberg
Translated Overall Comment:
Hello
Great Location
Excelent front desk service.
Perfect treatment in both of your retaurants
 seeing you next time.

rami Heimberg

Name: SIMON
Overall Comment:
Worn, old nothing working, one of my rooms flooded. 
No complimentary water in the rooms, no coffee making facilities
Translated Overall Comment:
Worn, old nothing working, one of my rooms flooded. 
No complimentary water in the rooms, no coffee making facilities

Name: JUDITH
Overall Comment: There was a lot of staff who were sick with Covid so the restaurant was not operating with a full menu.  My husband and I both contracted Covid so we were sequestered in adjoining rooms.  We appreciated the room service option and help from the front desk.  There was a few English problems and the food brought to us was sometimes not quite what we ordered, but we were grateful to be in  the   . The only issue in my room was that the shower flowed when I was only trying to take bath.
Translated Overall Comment: There was a lot of staff who were sick with Covid so the restaurant was not operating with a full menu.  My husband and I both contracted Covid so we were sequestered in adjoining rooms.  We appreciated the room service option and help from the front desk.  There was a few English problems and the food brought to us was sometimes not quite what we ordered, but we were grateful to be in  the   . The only issue in my room was that the shower flowed when I was only trying to take bath.

Name: JEANNE
Overall Comment: The staff was great.  Not giving a new bottle of water daily when guests stay a whole week is not fair.  We are taking this hotel off of the recommended list for our company as it is not in the best area, costs are very high and it is far from our office.
Translated Overall Comment: The staff was great.  Not giving a new bottle of water daily when guests stay a whole week is not fair.  We are taking this hotel off of the recommended list for our company as it is not in the best area, costs are very high and it is far from our office.

Name: ALEJANDRO
Overall Comment: Al reservar en booking solicité un alojamiento con piscina, cuando llegue al hotel me informan que no estaba disponible hasta marzo
Translated Overall Comment: When I booked on booking I requested accommodation with a pool, when I arrived at the hotel they informed me that it was not available until March.

Name: GANG
Overall Comment: The services were exceptional.  We like it a lot.  However, the facility is old and not very well maintained which the reason I can only give a score 7 (and not 8 or 9).
Translated Overall Comment: The services were exceptional.  We like it a lot.  However, the facility is old and not very well maintained which the reason I can only give a score 7 (and not 8 or 9).

Name: PETER
Overall Comment:
I rarely write negative reviews as honestly it is a rarity that I ever have anything negative to say about    hotels but I feel I need to provide some rather specific concerning the Buenos Aires    hotel.

Actually, this was, without a doubt the worst    hotel I have stayed in. Some examples:

- I experienced flooding issues everyday in the room (toilet leaked all over the floor everyday)

- My room card was deactivated every single day to the point that I simply requested a new card everyday, having to wait upwards of 30 minutes at the front desk as there was only ever one person working (occasionally two but a rarity).

- I ordered room service via the app (which is advertised in the hotel to 'use the app') only to have to call the front desk one hour later to ask where the food was. I was then told, "oh, the app doesn't work, you have to call guest services" - which I then did, only for the food to arrive one hour later! Basically I had to wait over two hours for room service.

- No cold water one day which obviously creates a problem . . .

- No water pressure whatsoever one day, making the shower unusable. 

- Ordering a taxi to take me to the airport literally took 90 minutes at the front desk to achieve.

- It took an hour to check out and the billing is completely incorrect - my colleagues and I actually owe you for a total of six additional nights and despite many attempts at trying to get this resolved, is still not done so.

- My    account has incorrectly been credited in terms of nights stayed (two nights less than it should be) and this is still not resolved. 

As you can see, a less than ideal situation. Very, very disappointing.
Translated Overall Comment:
I rarely write negative reviews as honestly it is a rarity that I ever have anything negative to say about    hotels but I feel I need to provide some rather specific concerning the Buenos Aires    hotel.

Actually, this was, without a doubt the worst    hotel I have stayed in. Some examples:

- I ordered room service via the app (which is advertised in the hotel to 'use the app') only to have to call the front desk one hour later to ask where the food was. I was then told, "oh, the app doesn't work, you have to call guest services" - which I then did, only for the food to arrive one hour later! Basically I had to wait over two hours for room service.

- My    account has incorrectly been credited in terms of nights stayed (two nights less than it should be) and this is still not resolved. 

As you can see, a less than ideal situation. Very, very disappointing.

Name: CESAR
Overall Comment: Hotel viejo. parece una hogar de dia para personas de la tercera edad. Pedi al centro de atencion que me confiermen la pileta, la misma estaba cerrada por reformas en plena temporada de verano, e incluso tratan de justificar lo mismo por el covid. ME FUI AL FAENA donde funcionaba todo. este hotel nunca mas en mi vida
Translated Overall Comment: Old hotel. It looks like a day care home for seniors. I asked the customer service center to confirm the pool, it was closed for renovations in the middle of the summer season, and they even tried to justify the same thing because of covid. I WENT TO FAENA where everything worked. Never again in my life will I return to this hotel.

Name: PATRICIO
Overall Comment:
Unfortunately,  I caught Covid-19 so I was in isolation in your hotel.
The food was very limited but the people working at the hotel were wonderful!
Translated Overall Comment:
Unfortunately,  I caught Covid-19 so I was in isolation in your hotel.
The food was very limited but the people working at the hotel were wonderful!

Name: PAULOCESAR
Overall Comment: Cama ruim (cheia de irregularidades), vazamento na pia do banheiro, quarto de aspecto velho e descuidado, café sofrível para um 5 estrelas, restaurante sem alimentação adequada
Translated Overall Comment: Bad bed (full of irregularities), leak in the bathroom sink, old and unkempt looking room, poor coffee for a 5 star hotel, restaurant without adequate food

Name: KIMBERLY
Overall Comment: I'd gladly give all the employees at this location a rating of 10. The location of this hotel is excellent as it the price. The building is absolutely beautiful. In-room amenities could be improved upon. I believe after renovations, this location will become a premier    property. I would stay here again and look forward to the improvements.
Translated Overall Comment: I'd gladly give all the employees at this location a rating of 10. The location of this hotel is excellent as it the price. The building is absolutely beautiful. In-room amenities could be improved upon. I believe after renovations, this location will become a premier    property. I would stay here again and look forward to the improvements.

Name: RONALD
Overall Comment: Muy buena tranquilo limpio e higiénico . Muy Servando de todo restauran y OF
Translated Overall Comment: Very good, quiet, clean and hygienic. Very helpful in everything, restaurants and OF

Name: JOHN
Overall Comment: Excellent, professional Service from Alejandro at the front desk!
Translated Overall Comment: Excellent, professional Service from Alejandro at the front desk!

Name: IGOR
Overall Comment: Довольно старые номера со старой сантехникой , в лобби оказался неплохой бар , где можно посидеть и выпить пива , так же неплохое расположение отеля .
Translated Overall Comment: Quite old rooms with old plumbing, in the lobby there was a good bar where you can sit and drink beer, also the location of the hotel is good.

Name: DAVID
Overall Comment: My stay at the hotel was perfect, the staff from the check-in to the house keeping were perfect
Translated Overall Comment: My stay at the hotel was perfect, the staff from the check-in to the house keeping were perfect

Name: WILLIAM
Overall Comment: All the staff were very friendly and accommodating. The general manager, Daniel, was excellent. He is a perfect candidate to help grow the brand in this newly acquired    hotel. I look forward to coming back soon to see how far the renovations have gone.
Translated Overall Comment: All the staff were very friendly and accommodating. The general manager, Daniel, was excellent. He is a perfect candidate to help grow the brand in this newly acquired    hotel. I look forward to coming back soon to see how far the renovations have gone.

Name: PRAVEEN
Overall Comment: Excellent location, lounge and great service oriented staff!
Translated Overall Comment: Excellent location, lounge and great service oriented staff!

Name: MARIA
Overall Comment: Très bonne impression
Translated Overall Comment: Very good impression

Name: JAMES
Overall Comment:
Great staff, nicely renovated, room had nice furnishings and finishes.
Bedding was second rate — no fitted sheets and no mattress pads.
Translated Overall Comment:
Great staff, nicely renovated, room had nice furnishings and finishes.
Bedding was second rate — no fitted sheets and no mattress pads.

Name: CATALINACONSTANZA
Overall Comment: Lo primero y más importante, me parece NEFASTO que el baño de la habitación de un hotel de tal envergadura, no tenga ningún tipo de ventilación. Segundo, que teniendo una tina de hidromasaje, este no funcione, más aún cuando la piscina del hotel, la tienen en mantenimiento en PLENO VERANO y con 37 grados de temperatura. Los amenities de muy mala calidad y poca cantidad (hay que estar pidiendo todos los días para poder ducharse). La habitación no cuenta con secador de pelo ni plancha, no es posible que haya que pedirlo, y te envíen un aparato que se desarma solo. Por último, encuentro de muy mal criterio cobrar por hacer llamadas locales a números públicos, eso ya raya en la avaricia. La verdad esperaba MUCHO más de este hotel. No creo que vuelva a repetir mi estadía.
Translated Overall Comment: First and foremost, I think it is TERRIBLE that the bathroom in a hotel of such magnitude does not have any type of ventilation. Second, that even though it has a whirlpool tub, it does not work, even more so when the hotel pool is being maintained in the MIDDLE OF SUMMER and with temperatures of 37 degrees. The amenities are of very poor quality and in short supply (you have to ask for them every day to be able to shower). The room does not have a hair dryer or iron, it is not possible that you have to ask for them, and they send you a device that falls apart by itself. Lastly, I find it very bad judgment to charge for making local calls to public numbers, that is bordering on greed. The truth is that I expected MUCH more from this hotel. I don't think I will repeat my stay.

Name: FERNANDO
Overall Comment:
Hotel is our place to stay in Buenos Aires. 
Excellent and confortable rooms plus professional hotel services are our preferences.
Translated Overall Comment:
Hotel is our place to stay in Buenos Aires. 
Excellent and confortable rooms plus professional hotel services are our preferences.

Name: NAHUEL
Overall Comment:
Casi todo estaba en remodelacion o cerrado.
Muy pocas opciones en la carta de comidas.
Habitaciones con cama al lado del pasillo, muy ruidoso por la noche y pasan aspirando a las 23:00.
Servicio bueno, pero no excepcional.
Translated Overall Comment: Almost everything was being remodeled or closed. Very few options on the food menu. Rooms with beds next to the hallway, very noisy at night and they vacuum at 11:00 p.m. Service was good, but not exceptional.

Name: ADELA
Overall Comment: Need more personal at front desk
Translated Overall Comment: Need more personal at front desk

Name: DAVID
Overall Comment:
Bell, Front Desk, Housekeeping, Exercise & F&B Staff were all a 10+.  The property was very stale.  Lobby area had antiquated & uncomfortable furnishings, sitting / reading areas poorly lit, limited electrical outlets for devices, extremely limited reading materials (even for purchase) & even mis-matched furniture.

As for the rooms, words cannot describe how out of date & damaged furnishings are.  Anything short of a complete rooms renovation would be simply putting a "band-aid" on the issue.  

Therefore, I cannot recommend this property to any family member, business associate or acquaintance.
Translated Overall Comment:
Bell, Front Desk, Housekeeping, Exercise & F&B Staff were all a 10+.  The property was very stale.  Lobby area had antiquated & uncomfortable furnishings, sitting / reading areas poorly lit, limited electrical outlets for devices, extremely limited reading materials (even for purchase) & even mis-matched furniture.

As for the rooms, words cannot describe how out of date & damaged furnishings are.  Anything short of a complete rooms renovation would be simply putting a "band-aid" on the issue.  

Therefore, I cannot recommend this property to any family member, business associate or acquaintance.
